abilities.description: Increases 15% of Crit Rate.
abilities.name: Beast Factor

abilities.description: Increases 50% of Crit DMG.
abilities.name: Magical Beast Factor

1.description:
"Hah! You're leaving yourself wide open!"
A spirit combining the powers of a monkey, tanuki, tiger, and snake. These animal powers give her incredible physical abilities, so she doesn't need any weapons. Instead, she pulverizes her opponents with classical martial arts skills, preferring to win by knock out. Her only flaw is that she gets hungry really quickly, and then doesn't feel like fighting anymore.
1.name: Nue

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to current target, with a {probability} of inflicting Stun.
skill.name: Summon Fanged Beast

10.description:
"Doing laundry feels so GOOD!"
A spirit who lives in heaven. There are actually all kinds of people in heaven, including totally average people, and she is one of the average ones. She will make you feel right at home and lead you to believe that the only difference between heaven and earth is the address. But actually, her spirit essence is far greater than any human's, and so is her strength in battle.
10.name: Tennyo Ayame

skill.description: Restores {value} HP to all allies. Targets receive {delay1} less DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: Special Cooking

100.description:
"You need me here with you, right? Right?"
The spirit of a goddess supposed to exist somewhere in Japan. Both a guardian and a bringer of calamity, she's quite a mysterious local deity. She's also really needy and clingy, so when no one wants to hang out with her she spreads a noxious miasma to get attention. Great care should be taken when dealing with her.
100.name: Kamui Vipera

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to surrounding enemies, with a {probability} of inflicting Weak Poison.
skill.name: Wind of Vicious Poison

abilities.description: Increases 25% of Skill DMG.
abilities.name: Famed Blade Masamune

101.description:
"Is that the last of them already? What a cakewalk!"
The spirit of a famous sword bestowed with the Masamune name. A handsome and elegant woman, she is also a master swordsman. She is the only Masamune blade to be a long sword, so she conducts herself with great humility as the only one of her kind. She also looks after endangered species in her spare time... Perhaps she feels like she has something in common with them?
101.name: Kinoshita Masamune

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to the row of enemies directly in front.
skill.name: The Last Masamune

abilities.description: Skill attacks have 50% chance of decreasing the target's ATK speed by 50%.
abilities.name: Lunar Criminal

102.description:
"It'll be a cinch with my lunar technology."
The spirit of a woman from the moon. She may look like a child, but her knowledge is nearly unfathomable. If you talk to her you'll see that she is much smarter than you imagined. She always carries around a stuffed rabbit, because it makes her feel better when she's lonely. Actually, her cute little rabbit might have a really big secret hidden inside...
102.name: Kaguya

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to the 3 enemies with the highest ATK.
skill.name: Beautiful Moonbeam

103.description:
"You're not even on my level! Give me a break!"
A girl's spirit who controls a giant skeleton fueled by the ill will of the dead. The skeleton understands her commands to a degree, kind of like a dog--at least, that's what she says. It actually takes a huge amount of spirit essence to get it to behave properly, and there's a certain trick to it, so she's the only one who can pull it off. She's also the appointed leader of the Bureau of the Occult's Roof Cleaning Unit.
103.name: Gasha Dokuro

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to the enemy with the highest ATK.
skill.name: Fear of the Skull

abilities.description: Reduces 20% of DMG taken.
abilities.name: Diminutive Diva

104.description:
"My singing brings happiness to all!"
A spirit half as tall as your thumb. She's strong-willed and has immense confidence in her singing ability. There's actually a strange power in her voice that makes people feel calm and peaceful. Many people hear about it and come looking for her, but they usually just go home feeling peaceful and satisfied instead. Her songs are so calming, it's scary.
104.name: Thumbelina

skill.description: Restores {value} HP to all allies.
skill.name: A Song to Heal All

abilities.description: Increases 20% of Crit Rate.
abilities.name: Importance of a Promise

105.description:
"Break a promise, and you'll regret it!"
The spirit of a mysterious box found in a castle deep in the ocean off the coast of Japan. A deep sea law enforcer who punishes those who don't keep their word. Whoever opens the box turns into an old man or woman, although he can also restore one's youth...which explains why Mikado Tsuchimikado keeps trying to contact him. But it's a heavily guarded secret, and she refuses to reveal it.
105.name: Tamatebako

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to nearby enemies.
skill.name: Eternal Instant

abilities.description: Takes 5% more DMG and deals 25% more DMG.
abilities.name: Blade of Tragedy

abilities.description: Increases 35% of Crit DMG.
abilities.name: Blade of Glory

from_description.event_name: Is This Destiny? -Orochi on the Counterattack-

106.description:
"I'm here to prevent another tragedy."
The spirit of the favorite sword of a hero from German epic poetry. Aware of the great suffering she's caused, she urges her owner to act properly so that such tragedies don't happen again. She always tries to solve things without violence if she can, but when her opponent is unreasonable she loses all qualms and will readily knock them out.
[Event] Is This Destiny? -Orochi on the Counterattack-
106.name: Balmung

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to current target.
skill.name: Swing of Glory

abilities.description: Reduces 25% of DMG taken.
abilities.name: Japan's Greatest Warrior

1062.description:
"I'll stake my life on defeating Ieyasu!"
Ultimate form. A military hero from the Sengoku period of Japanese history. He fought with demonic strength as shogun of the western army, and was a constant thorn in the side of Ieyasu Tokugawa.
1062.name: Yukimura Sanada[aya]

skill.description: Can be used as bond and in guild conquest.
skill.name: Heroic Roar

abilities.description: Increases 5% of ATK speed of all allies.
abilities.name: Priest

abilities.description: All melee allies take 5% less DMG
abilities.name: God's Favor

from_description.event_name: Is This Destiny? -Orochi on the Counterattack-

107.description:
"It's not so bad being a woman!"
The spirit of a Christian martyr from ancient Rome who killed a dragon in order to spread Christianity. A curse from Yamata-no-Orochi turned him into a woman, but now she actually likes it better than being a man. It's much easier to convert people, for one thing. Her missionary work is getting out of control, actually—there have even been reports of injuries.
[Event] Is This Destiny? -Orochi on the Counterattack-
107.name: Georgius

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to the enemy with the most HP. Targets take {delay1} more DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: Saint's Conviction

from_description.event_name: Is This Destiny? -Orochi on the Counterattack-

108.description:
"This is it! I'm next!"
The spirit of a legendary Geatish hero who had the strength to topple a giant, become king, and then stab a dragon. Yamata-no-Orochi cursed him to be eternally young, but he likes being a child again. His kingly speech and behavior never ceases to surprise those around him. They're doubly shocked by his extensive wisdom and strength, which extends far beyond his apparent age.
[Event] Is This Destiny? -Orochi on the Counterattack-
108.name: Beowulf

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to current target.
skill.name: Dragon-Slayer Pose

from_description.event_name: Is This Destiny? -Orochi on the Counterattack-

109.description:
"Oh, how I adore my little Susanoo!" The spirit of a goddess from Japanese mythology. She lived peacefully as the wife of Susanoo-no-Mikoto, until one day her husband turned into a little girl. She believes he will return to his old self someday and is secretly determined to protect him.
[Event] Is This Destiny? -Orochi on the Counterattack-
109.name: Lady Kushinada

skill.description: Restores {value} HP to the 3 allies with the lowest percentage of HP.
skill.name: Dance of Life

11.description:
"I'll put a curse on you even if you run to the ends of the earth!"
A spirit who controls the deep and sharply negative feelings of humanity, including but not limited to violent anger, vague resentment and general ill-will. They say Sugawara no Michizane is the one who gave him a reason to be reborn as A spirit. That's also why he wears a kimono. He looks gloomy and has a negative attitude all year round.
11.name: Tenjin

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to all enemies.
skill.name: Indignation

from_description.event_name: Is This Destiny? -Orochi on the Counterattack-

110.description:
"Stay calm, breathe, and here we go...NOW!"
A spirit that believes she has the strength to kill a dragon. She's always practicing just in case of emergency, memorizing all kinds of different techniques. Currently she's searching for the heir of the "Assassin's Fist" technique. That is to say, she's looking for someone strong enough to be worthy of such a powerful move.
[Event] Is This Destiny? -Orochi on the Counterattack-
110.name: Dragonia Killa

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to current target. Target receives {delay1} more DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: The Joy of Slaying

from_description.event_name: Is This Destiny? -Orochi on the Counterattack-

111.description:
"Now THIS is a fun toy!"
The spirit of a mythic Japanese sword that defeated Yamata-no-Orochi. Though she's technically a servant of Susanoo, in reality she likes to make fun of him...it's kind of an unhealthy relationship. Otherwise she's very nice and does whatever Lady Kushinada says. [Event] Is This Destiny? -Orochi on the Counterattack-
111.name: Ame-no-Habakiri

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to current target.
skill.name: Off With Eight Heads

abilities.description: Increases 10% of Max HP.
abilities.name: Hero of Legend

abilities.description: Increases 20% of Skill DMG.
abilities.name: Mini-Goddess of War

from_description.event_name: Is This Destiny? -Orochi on the Counterattack-

112.description:
"Why...why did this have to happen to me?"
The spirit of a hero from Japanese mythology. Yamata-no-Orochi, revived once again, cursed him to look like a small girl, and he can only use his powers if he acts like one, too. However, it's hard for him to accept that he's no longer a man. When he behaves like a girl his power is formidable, but if he doesn't keep it up, his powers fade fast. He's also starting to be concerned that his wife is falling for a little girl...
[Event] Is This Destiny? -Orochi on the Counterattack-
112.name: Susanoo

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to the row of enemies directly in front, with a {probability} of inflicting Stun.
skill.name: Adorable Hero

abilities.description: Increases 20% of Crit Rate.
abilities.name: Legendary Beast

from_description.event_name: Is This Destiny? -Orochi on the Counterattack-

113.description:
"Treat women with respect! Who knows what might happen if you don't..."
The spirit of a legendary creature from Japanese mythology. Although he's gotten a bad rap, he's always polite when dealing with women and makes sure to get their full consent before taking them captive, and even returns them safely afterwards. His captives are taken somewhere up in the sky, but Susanoo misunderstood him and made him stop. It was all just a part of his plan to build a youthful feminine paradise, which Susanoo effectively nipped in the bud.
[Event] Is This Destiny? -Orochi on the Counterattack-
113.name: Yamata-no-Orochi

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to current target; decreases target's speed by {delay1} for a limited time.
skill.name: Eight Sword Dance

abilities.description: Increases 15% of DMG dealt when one of the Five Swords under Heaven is on the team.
abilities.name: The Five Swords under Heaven

abilities.description: Increases 43% of ATK speed.
abilities.name: Miraculous Brandish

114.description:
"Oops! There goes the sword again!"
The spirit of one of the Five Swords under Heaven. She's a bit on the spacey side and often accidentally lets her sword fall from its scabbard. But this carelessness might also have something to do with her vow of loyalty, so its not all bad. Maybe that's also why she doesn't care that she's the only one of the Five Great Blades that hasn't been declared a National Treasure or Important Cultural Property of Japan.
114.name: Onimaru Kunitsuna

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to further enemies.
skill.name: Giant Demon-Slicer

abilities.description: Increases 5% of the number of soulstones received from battle and 3% of battle reward drop rate.
abilities.name: Beast of the Ocean

115.description:
"...Where have all the pirates and their beautiful treasure gone?"
A spirit of the sea that loves jewels, gold, and silver. She hunts pirates and attacks merchant ships—at least, she used to, but lately there haven't been many pirate ships around so she's on hiatus. She came to the Bureau of the Occult after hearing rumors of another spirit who loves jewels. They say her expression scared the living daylights out of the first spirit agent that she ran into.
115.name: Kraken

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to all enemies; decreases targets' speed by {delay1} for a limited time.
skill.name: One Way Ticket to the Deep Sea

abilities.description: Skill attacks have 13% chances of inflicting Stun.
abilities.name: Cursed Sight

116.description:
"I wouldn't recommend standing directly in front of me."
The one-eyed spirit of a creature thought to exist in Ethiopia. His "evil eye" curses anyone who looks directly into it. The curse itself is pretty strong, but it's easy to remove. However, things can get complicated since he is a extremely defiable fellow. His helmet can simply amplifies or restrains his power, according to his words, it's just like a faucet.
116.name: Catoblepas

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to current target.
skill.name: Evil Eye of Despair

abilities.description: Increases 21% of Crit Rate and increases 50% Crit DMG when one of the other elfs is on the team.
abilities.name: Top Idol

117.description:
"Being a celeb isn't so bad after all!"
The spirit of an elf based on an elementary particle, she's the central member of the elven dance group "ELF 118." However, there are some very...er...interesting theories about how she was able to come out ahead of the other members. For example, a flower pot just happened to fall on another popular member's head while she was walking down the street...but let's not jump to any conclusions about who might have done it!
117.name: Titanium Elf

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to current target. Target receives {delay1} more DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: Warning Dance

abilities.description: Restores 5% HP to Anima team members at the start of each wave.
abilities.name: Holy Sword

abilities.description: All melee foes take 10% more DMG at the start of each wave.
abilities.name: Sword of the King

118.description:
"This holy sword is no decoration!"
The spirit of a holy sword that belonged to a king who ruled the land. The sword is famous for being used to determine the next king, and she always chooses her master. Her chosen owner receives strong new powers, but otherwise she can be really difficult to deal with. She's not looking for spoiled sons from rich families, so poor Hijiri doesn't stand a chance...
118.name: Excalibur

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to 3 enemies (melee priority).
skill.name: Holy Sword Excalibur

abilities.description: Increases 15% of Crit Rate.
abilities.name: Blade Whirlwind

119.description:
"Don't think you can escape me!"
The spirit of a sword from Celtic Mythology. She can send her blade whizzing straight into the enemy and then back to her hand with a whim. It's actually a type of psychokinesis that works on other things, too, but it can be kind of hard to control. One time she wanted the remote control, but she accidentally sent the TV flying through the air and totally wrecked the Bureau's break room.
119.name: Fragarach

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to 2 enemies (ranged priority). Targets deal {delay1} less DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: Full Throttle Sword

12.description:
"Can you see how fast this is?"
The spirit of a double-action revolver. His birth story is complicated, but let's just say he wasn't very blessed. He stepped out of the public eye, living with outlaws and making shady behind-the-scenes deals. He is very serious at his core.
12.name: Lightning

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to the enemy with the lowest HP.
skill.name: Crotch Shot

abilities.description: Increases 30% of Crit DMG by the 2 allies with the highest ATK.
abilities.name: Ukiyo-e Master

120.description:
"You like my drawings? Wonderful, wonderful! Have a seat and relax. I'll draw you a nice one!"
The spirit of an artist from Japan's Edo Period. After becoming a spirit he started drawing in the air instead of on paper, and whatever he draws comes to life and starts chasing people. It's pretty cool, but as a result he never has any portfolio pieces to show off afterwards.
120.name: Katsushika Hokusai

skill.description: Increases the Crit Rate of 2 allies with the highest ATK by {delay1} for a limited time.
skill.name: Finishing Touch

abilities.description: Increases 15% of Max HP and restores 2.5% HP every 5 seconds.
abilities.name: The Giant

121.description:
"I don't wanna die, but you can call me 'Dai'! Get it?"
A giant spirit living in Hakone. She can change her size at will, but she usually chooses a normal little girl size. She's strangely positive and smiles even at sad times.
121.name: Daidarabotchi

skill.description: Restores {value} HP and receives {delay1} less DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: Giant's Sandbox

abilities.description: 18% chance of inflicting Petrifaction on all melee foes at the start of each wave.
abilities.name: Petrifying Gaze

122.description:
"Let's all go out for lunch sometime!"
A spirit with the ability to turn people to stone through eye contact. She used to be extremely arrogant, much to the annoyance of a certain goddess who turned her into a horrifying monster as punishment. As a spirit, she reformed her behavior and the goddess turned her back into her human form...but apparently this was all just part of her master plan. Now, as a beautiful young woman who also has the power to petrify, she's watching and waiting for a chance for revenge.
122.name: Medusa

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to 3 enemies (melee priority), with a {probability} of inflicting Petrifaction.
skill.name: Gorgon's Eye

abilities.description: Increases 10% of Crit Rate and increases 50% Crit DMG
abilities.name: One Shot, One Smile

123.description:
"It's no use hiding. There will be no escape once I find you."
The spirit of an anti-materiel rifle that pierces even thick armor with ease. No matter where her target hides, she can shoot through walls and bring them down. This generally leads to her racking up huge repair bills when she works alone, so she's always being told to stick with a friend.
123.name: AMR Rem

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to the enemy with the most HP.
skill.name: High Impact Multi-Shot

abilities.description: Increases 20% of Crit DMG by all Anima team members.
abilities.name: Orrery

abilities.description: Increases 23% of Crit Rate.
abilities.name: Observer

124.description:
"Observing the movements of heavenly bodies... That's what I was originally made for. Now what?"
The spirit of a device created long ago for astronomical observation. It's famous as an OOPArt (out-of-place artifact) using technology seemingly too advanced for its time. Her powers of observation far surpass anyone else's and she can quickly see through any pretense or ruse, but she's not the best with words so she has trouble conveying her insights.
124.name: Antikythera

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to 3 enemies (ranged priority).
skill.name: Studied Strike

125.description:
"You'll find the way, right, Master?"
A spirit who plays pranks on passerby and has become a legend in certain areas. He's not aware that he's hurting anyone—he's just lost and seeking help. But since normal people can't see him they misunderstand his actions as pranks. He's been lost for so long that he forgot all about his original goal of trying to get home.
125.name: Sodehiki Kozo

skill.description: Increases DMG taken by 2 enemies (melee priority) by {delay1} for a limited time.
skill.name: Lost Child's Guidance

abilities.description: Increases 10% of the number of soulstones received from battle and increases 3% of battle reward drop rate.
abilities.name: Gentleman Thief

126.description:
"That old box was your safe? My goodness! You should be more careful!"
The spirit of a thief so famous everyone knows his name. He used to break into safes and vaults in his spare time, but now he's grown a bit bored of it all. His new plan is to travel the lands stealing not from humans, but from nature.
[Event] Jewels and The Secret Workshop
126.name: Arsene Lupin

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to all enemies.
skill.name: The Pain of Loss

abilities.description: Increases 10% of the number of soulstones received from battle.
abilities.name: Golden Pickaxe

127.description:
"If it's treasure you seek, look no further. For you, I can find anything."
The spirit of a pickaxe carried by treasure hunters as a good luck charm. She likes to brag that finding a golden pickaxe can turn any treasure hunter into a legend, but she just made that up. All her "legendary treasure hunters" just happened to get lucky, that's all.
[Event] Jewels and The Secret Workshop
127.name: Goldy Pick

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to current target, with a {probability} of inflicting Stun.
skill.name: Golden Rock Breaker

abilities.description: Increases 3% of battle reward drop rate.
abilities.name: Greedy Demon

128.description:
"My power is about more than just money!"
The spirit of the demon of avarice. He may look like an innocent little boy, but he's super greedy and uses his spirit essence to purify jewels and sell them for profit. The excessive amount of spirit power at his disposal means he can polish them enough that he worries they might actually start to lose value. Still, that doesn't stop him from polishing and selling jewels all day long. No one can fathom the true extent of his greed.
[Event] Jewels and The Secret Workshop
128.name: Mammon

skill.description: Restores {value} HP for 2 allies (melee priority); increases targets' speed by {delay1} for a limited time.
skill.name: Boundless Greed

129.description:
"C'mon! Nothing wrong with taking a short break."
The spirit of the mineral nephrite. Compared to other minerals it is relatively flexible, and so is her mind, often to the surprise of those around her. Or maybe she's just really careless and does whatever she wants. Either way, she gets a lot of lectures from Diamond, but doesn't really mind.
[Event] Jewels and The Secret Workshop
129.name: Nephrite

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to current target.
skill.name: Weapon of Jade

abilities.description: Reduces 15% of DMG taken.
abilities.name: Miracle Knight

13.description:
"I'm a man, okay? Get it right or pay the price!"
The spirit of the captain of the first unit of the Shinsengumi. He died suddenly of natural causes, so he seems to have left behind a lot of regrets. As a result he tends to immediately notice and point out negative things. In winter he always catches whatever sickness is going around and sleeps a lot, so he and everyone who knows him acknowledge that he doesn't reach his true potential. He is sometimes bewildered at his own form. since it is a representation of how people imagine him to be.
13.name: Okita Soji

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to current target, with a {probability} of inflicting Stun.
skill.name: Godspeed Level 3

abilities.description: Restores 4.5% HP to Anima team members at the start of each wave.
abilities.name: Ocean Drop

130.description:
"Let's just say I strengthen bonds of all kinds! Including yours, of course!"
The spirit of the biggest aquamarine gem in the world. She values relationships with others a little too much and tends to meddle in other people's business. She tends to act flirty, too, so lots of guys have fallen for her.
[Event] Jewels and The Secret Workshop
130.name: Dom Pedro Aquamarine

skill.description: Restores {value} HP; increases DMG dealt by {delay1} for a limited time.
skill.name: Infinite Bravery

abilities.description: All allies take 3% less DMG.
abilities.name: Perfect Service

1301.description:
"Now then... Shall I teach you the proper way to roast a pumpkin?"
The soul of a steward android developed by a scientist. The memories of all Stewart models are part of a network, enabling them to be continually updated with the latest data.
1301.name: Stewart [HW]

skill.description: Can be used as bond and in guild conquest.
skill.name: Silver Sliver

abilities.description: Increases 10% of Crit rate.
abilities.name: Strength in Numbers

1302.description:
"You know you can rely on the Rat Clan!"
A rat spirit that has developed the ability to transform. The Rat Clan always stick together, and have recently begun to venture beyond their home turf.
1302.name: Rat Clan Henchman [HW]

skill.description: Can be used as bond and in guild conquest.
skill.name: Bluff

abilities.description: Reduces 10% of DMG taken.
abilities.name: Club Q

1303.description:
"Hold still... This might sting a bit."
A rat spirit that has developed the ability to transform. Rat Clan: Koko After conducting a straw poll among Rat Clan members at their HQ, Club-Q, she decided to go with a nurse outfit for Halloween.
1303.name: Rat Clan: Koko [HW]

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to 2 random enemies, with a {probability} of inflicting Weak Poison.
skill.name: Phantom Sigh

abilities.description: Reduces 4% of DMG dealt by all foes at the start of each wave.
abilities.name: Impending Doom

1304.description:
"This outfit suits me, wouldn't you say? I'd be happy to dress like this for a while."
It's said that all who come into contact with this goddess will be struck by disaster. She has come all the way to the Halloween Tower to meet you.
1304.name: Goddess of Misfortune [HW]

skill.description: Can be used as bond and in guild conquest.
skill.name: Evil Destiny

abilities.description: Normal attack targets have 33% chances of increasing 15% more DMG taken.
abilities.name: Plagued by Poverty

1305.description:
"Tee hee hee! It's so nice to be here with you!"
It's said that all who come into contact with this goddess will be plagued by poverty. She has come all the way to the Halloween Tower to meet you.
1305.name: Goddess of Poverty [HW]

skill.description: Can be used as bond and in guild conquest.
skill.name: Good Fortune

abilities.description: Increases 10% of DMG of all Phantasma allies.
abilities.name: Leader's Dignity

1306.description:
"Nothing can stop us if we stick together!"
A rat spirit that has developed the ability to transform. The leader of the Rat Clan. He boasts formidable powers, but now that he's risen to the top, he can relax and show his more light-hearted side.
1306.name: Rat Clan Boss [HW]

skill.description: Can be used as bond and in guild conquest.
skill.name: Phantasm

abilities.description: Increases 10% of Crit Rate by all Phantasma team members at the start of every wave.
abilities.name: Loyal Partner

1307.description:
"If you and Cat Sith are happy, then so am I!"
A dog sprite that originates in Scotland. "Cu" is a Celtic term for "dog". She is best friends with Cat Sith. She was responsible for organizing the Halloween Tower event.
1307.name: Cu Sith [HW]

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to all enemies, with a {probability} of inflicting Stun.
skill.name: Hair-Raising Howl

abilities.description: Reduces 40% of DMG taken at the start of the final wave.
abilities.name: Five Scents Doll

abilities.description: Increases 10% of Crit DMG dealt at the start of each wave.
abilities.name: Heart of a Doll

1308.description:
"I feel so happy and blessed! My life is like a dream come true!"
The soul of an automated doll made by the genius doll-maker, Abel. She is Doll No. 3 in the hard-to-come-by Five Fragrances Series. Musk twisted her arm and got her to come to the Halloween Tower.
1308.name: Amber [HW]

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to the enemy with the most HP. Targets deal {delay1} less DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: Amber Concentrate

abilities.description: Increases Crit DMG by 90% when 'Amber' is present.
abilities.name: Five Scents Doll

abilities.description: Increases 60% of DMG dealt at the start of the final wave.
abilities.name: Enchanting Scent

1309.description:
"I feel like I'm dreaming whenever I'm with you... Stay and dream with me forever..."
The soul of an automated doll made by the genius doll-maker, Abel. She is Doll No. 2 in the hard-to-come-by Five Fragrances Series. She got Vanilla to make her Halloween costume for her.
1309.name: Musk [HW]

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to enemy with highest ATK, target receives {delay1} more DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: Musk Concentrate

abilities.description: Increases 18% of skill DMG.
abilities.name: Sacred Gem

131.description:
"I'm an honest gal, by all accounts!"
The spirit of the largest amethyst geode in the world. She is an honest and noble empress, to be certain, but she has a "shoot first, ask questions later" wild side to her as well. She often goes running off into groups of enemies by herself, causing headaches for her allies. But she always thinks she's in the right and never doubts herself.
[Event] Jewels and The Secret Workshop
131.name: Empress of Uruguay

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to all enemies.
skill.name: Jeweled Stinger

abilities.description: Increases 15% of max HP of Phantasma team members.
abilities.name: Mischievous Heart

abilities.description: Increases 35% of DMG dealt by Phantasma team members at the start of the final wave.
abilities.name: Best Friends Forever

1310.description:
"I'm sleepy. Do you mind if I curl up on your lap?"
A cat sprite originally from Scotland. She loves pranks, jokes, and japes. She and her best buddy Cu Sith are inseparable.
1310.name: Cat Sith [HW]

skill.description: Can be used as bond and in guild conquest.
skill.name: Catcall

abilities.description: Increases 60% of skill DMG.
abilities.name: Death's Hand

abilities.description: Increases 15% of Max HP and Reduces 20% of DMG taken.
abilities.name: Three Great Calamity Gods

1311.description:
"Now you are free of all ties and bonds..."
A goddess with dominion over death itself. She is one of the Three Goddesses of Trouble, along with the Goddesses of Poverty and Misfortune. She is feared as the bringer of death, but she also symbolizes rebirth and new beginnings.
1311.name: Grim Reaper [HW]

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to enemy with highest ATK, target receives {delay1} more DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: Final Judgment

abilities.description: Decreases 15% of the ATK speed of all foes at the start of each wave.
abilities.name: Autumn Cruise

abilities.description: Increases 15% of skill DMG dealt at the start of each wave.
abilities.name: Yacht Party

1312.description:
"Who's for a Halloween cruise? If you don't join, I'll play a trick on you!"
The soul of a cruiser. She has decided to dress up especially for you. She's just waiting to sail away with you on an autumnal cruise.
1312.name: Yottie [HW]

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to the 3 enemies with the highest ATK.
skill.name: Hook, Line, Sinker

abilities.description: Restores 25% HP to all allies at the start of each wave.
abilities.name: Generous Spirit

1313.description:
"I'm so happy to see your smiling faces!"
The soul of the Tower, she only appears at Halloween. An ally of Cu Sith and Cat Sith, she is a generous soul who is willing to go to the ends of the earth to cheer people up. She wants nothing more than to make you happy.
1313.name: Halloween Tower

skill.description: Can be used as bond and in guild conquest.
skill.name: Under Siege

abilities.description: Increases 15% of skill DMG dealt at the start of each wave.
abilities.name: Fairy Queen

abilities.description: Increases 15% of Crit Rate at the start of each wave.
abilities.name: Forest's Protection

1314.description:
"Halloween is so much fun! I can't wait to tell the folks in the forest all about it! "
The Queen of the Fairies who reigns over the other sylvan sprites. The late-night Halloween event took her fancy, so she came all the way to Japan to take part. She forced her way into the Halloween Tower especially to see you.
1314.name: Titania [HW]

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to all enemies.
skill.name: A Queen's Blessing

abilities.description: All Anima team members take 10% less DMG
abilities.name: Symbol of Halloween

abilities.description: Increases 15% of skill DMG to Anima team members at the start of each wave.
abilities.name: Tsukumogami

1317.description:
"With me, it's trick or treat all year round!"
It wouldn't be Halloween without this little one. She is the Anima of a pumpkin lantern. She loves to eat and hates to be left alone. Now she's come to see you and is hoping for some Halloween candy.
1317.name: Jack-O-Lantern

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to all enemies, with a {probability} of inflicting Burn.
skill.name: Jack-O-Lantern

abilities.description: Increases 30% of Crit DMG.
abilities.name: Online Gamer

1318.description:
"I await the return of the mighty one!"
A hardcore online gamer who got sucked into cyberspace. Mino is his online nickname, and he's a warrior belonging to the "Grilled Meat Gobblers" Guild.
1318.name: Mino

skill.description: Can be used as bond and in guild conquest.
skill.name: Upscale

abilities.description: Increases 20% of Crit Rate.
abilities.name: Born Lucky

1319.description:
"This is my moment! I'm finally going to be top of the class!"
A trainee witch. She may be something of a klutz, but she boasts impressive magical abilities. She was born lucky and can turn any setback into a success.
1319.name: Little Witch

skill.description: Can be used as bond and in guild conquest.
skill.name: Witch's Draught

abilities.description: Increases 10% of the EXP gained from battle.
abilities.name: Founder of Alchemy

132.description:
"I, I'm just a little girl! Show some modesty!"
A spirit considered to be the founder of alchemy. She's looking for a way to divide her body into three to deal with her triple personality disorder, and continues researching her condition every day. While it has a few benefits, in the end it causes trouble. Her tendency to shamelessly blame anything and everything on one of her other personalities, for example...
[Event] Jewels and The Secret Workshop
132.name: Hermes Trismegistus

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to 2 enemies (ranged priority), with a {probability} of inflicting Paralysis.
skill.name: Unethical Organism

abilities.description: All allies deal 3% more DMG.
abilities.name: Sword of the Shinsengumi

1320.description:
"Oi, ... Stop staring at me like that! You're making me uncomfortable..."
The soul of the beloved inscribed sword of Isami Kondo, head of the Shinsengumi special police force. On the orders of the Shinsengumi, she is wearing a Halloween costume. She's very reserved and somewhat lacking in grace, but is lovable all the same.
1320.name: Kotetsu [HW]

skill.description: Can be used as bond and in guild conquest.
skill.name: Fiery Spirit

abilities.description: Increases the ATK speed of all divina allies by 25%.
abilities.name: Goddess of the Arts

abilities.description: Increases 40% of DMG dealt by the 2 allies with the highest ATK.
abilities.name: Party Fever

1321.description:
"Halloween's a great excuse for a party... I'm really getting into the mood!"
A goddess with extraordinary artistic talents. She heard there was a party going on, so decided to dress up and take a look for herself.
1321.name: Ameno Uzume [HW]

skill.description: Restores {value} HP to 3 allies with the highest ATK. Targets deal {delay1} more DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: War Dance

abilities.description: Increases 15% of the EXP gained from battle.
abilities.name: God of Pranks

1323.description:
"There's no better time to play all manner of tricks!"
The white hare that appears in the Izumo myth of ancient Japan, she is also a goddess who has had a temple built in her honor. She loves nothing better than playing tricks on people, so she wasn't going to miss Halloween.
1323.name: Hare of Inaba [HW]

skill.description: Restores {value} HP to 2 allies with the lowest percentage of HP and cures them of all negative status effects.
skill.name: Divine Hymn

abilities.description: Restores 15% HP to the ally with the lowest percentage of HP at the start of each wave.
abilities.name: Accumulation of Light

abilities.description: Increases 12% all Anima team members' Crit Rate when this daemon is Team Leader.
abilities.name: Stone in the Dark

133.description:
"I just wanna be useful to people. No matter how minor, I wanna help people somehow..."
The spirit of a precious stone that accumulates light during the day and shines at night. They say this light is the source of a mysterious power and that absorbing it can make incredible things possible. Recently people have found clever ways to use this to protect against brutes, and other helpful things. This has her smiling a lot more than before. But people who know her former haughty personality have started making fun of her more, too.
[Event] Jewels and The Secret Workshop
133.name: Luminous Pearl

skill.description: Restores {value} HP to all allies. Targets receive {delay1} less DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: Phenomenological Transformation

abilities.description: Increases 20% of Skill DMG.
abilities.name: Eternal Empire

abilities.description: Skill attacks have 13% chances of inflicting Petrifaction.
abilities.name: Tomb Manager

134.description:
"I am an entire world in itself."
A spirit who guards a tomb that symbolizes incredible power. It was built as an underground empire to provide an eternal afterlife for the first emperor of China., and this spirit's been managing it all on her own for quite some time. But due to its massive size she started needing an extra hand to help out sometimes. So at her request the Bureau of the Occult secretly began to manage information and data collection on her behalf. But some say she had other reasons for involving the Bureau...
134.name: Qin Shi Huang's Tomb

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to all enemies.
skill.name: Terracotta Army

abilities.description: Increases 50% of ATK speed when Diamond is on the team.
abilities.name: Artificial Crystal

135.description:
"I sparkle beautifully, I tell you! More beautifully than anyone else!"
The spirit of synthetic diamonds that don't exist in nature. Though completely man-made, her beauty rivals that of a true diamond. At heart she is a serious and good person, but she has a burning grudge against Diamond...jealousy, perhaps? She's embarrassed by her full name, Gadolinium Gallium Garnet, and is open to suggestions for a nickname.
135.name: GGG

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to the row of enemies directly in front.
skill.name: Man-made Jewel Blade

abilities.description: Increases 20% of Skill DMG.
abilities.name: Rainbow Sparkle

136.description:
"Don't test me! I can bust concrete with the poke of a finger, okay?"
The spirit of a man-made crystal created through mineral reactions. She can be domineering, but there's no denying her strength. She can wield a hammer that weighs ten times more than her, flying like a butterfly and stinging like a bee, so to speak. She's perfectly proper and polite but also a little sheltered, so she doesn't really know how to act around men.
136.name: Bismuth Crystal

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to further enemies.
skill.name: Rainbow Crash

abilities.description: Normal attacks decrease target's ATK speed by 20%.
abilities.name: Like a Blade of Magic

abilities.description: Increases 20% of all allies' Crit DMG.
abilities.name: Alchemist's Achievement

137.description:
"Impossible? No such thing! Not for me!"
The spirit of a stone created by an alchemist long ago. Though at first considered a mistake, the stone was kept afterwards in the alchemist's lab. There she witnessed all sorts of experiments, ever wishing for her master's success. The wishes were finally answered about a hundred years later when people started to call her "The Philosopher's Stone" and she gained the power to grant wishes. However, the alchemist is no longer anywhere to be found...
137.name: Philosopher's Stone

skill.description: Restores {value} HP to all allies and cures them of all negative status effects.
skill.name: Miracle Cure

138.description:
"There's nowhere my scratcher can't reach!"
The spirit of a tool made to scratch the itches you can't reach on your own. She used to be very sweet, but then people stopped having any need for back scratchers. That brought out her bad side, and she started inventing new ways to make people's backs itch.
138.name: Backscratcher

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to current target.
skill.name: Scratch Off

abilities.description: Increases 20% of Skill DMG.
abilities.name: Magic Prayer

139.description:
"Break a promise and you'll have to deal with me and my rats!"
A spirit formed by the malice of a resentful monk who was let down by a broken promise. If you break a promise with her she'll bring her 80,000 rats to your house! One time someone brought a bunch of cats to get rid of them, but it didn't work. Her rats are too well-trained for that.
139.name: Tesso

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to 3 enemies (melee priority).
skill.name: Return of the Rats

abilities.description: Increases 15% of Crit Rate.
abilities.name: Royal Demon

14.description:
"Hey, you're really cute!"
The right hand man of Shuten Doji. He is super friendly and has no dignity, in a good way. He's also known as a playboy who is constantly going after girls, which surprisingly doesn't seem to bother most people. So he has lots of connections, which might explain why he's so well liked in the first place. Deep down inside he's honest and hardworking.
14.name: Ibaraki Doji

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to current target.
skill.name: Demon Claw

abilities.description: Increases 16% of Crit Rate and Increases 25% of Crit DMG.
abilities.name: Eye for Detail

140.description:
"I'm observing your every action."
The spirit of the legendary creator of the writing system of ancient China. She loves to watch people, so she's always observing things. Sometimes she gets overwhelmed by the desire to observe in the middle of battle and quits fighting altogether just to watch. But once she's done, she knows her opponent's every weakness, tic, and nervous habit—everything.
140.name: Cangjie

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to 3 enemies (ranged priority). Targets take {delay1} more DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: The Observed

abilities.description: Increases 10% of skill DMG.
abilities.name: Musical Revolutionary

abilities.description: Increases 10% of ATK speed of all allies.
abilities.name: Celebrated Composer

141.description:
"Music is art. You'll understand if you listen to my symphonies."
A spirit who revolutionized the history of music. His passion and dedication for music haven't changed since becoming a spirit, but now he's focused on music that moves both humans and animals. His songs are so good that people get completely lost in them and stop doing work or anything else, so he's been banned from performing at the Bureau of the Occult.
141.name: Beethoven

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to all enemies, with a {probability} of inflicting Stun.
skill.name: Null Symphony "Ode to Death"

abilities.description: Increases 25% of DMG dealt when another "Black Ship" is on the team.
abilities.name: Black Ship

142.description:
"It's okay. That's just how the Commodore is."
The spirit of one of the four black ships led by Commodore Perry when he reopened Japan. She and Perry had already known each other for quite some time and worked together on a number of other voyages. She's yet another casualty of his passion for Japanese anime, manga and video games. At first she was surprised when he asked her to cosplay with him, but she gradually got used to it and now even enjoys it. Some say she's been spotted cosplaying at major anime events.
[Event] Meiji Monster on a Rampage
142.name: Saratoga

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to the enemy with the most HP.
skill.name: Black Bombardment

abilities.description: Increases 25% of DMG dealt when another "Okita's Favorite Sword" is on the team.
abilities.name: Okita's Favorite Sword

143.description:
"Um... What's the proper way to hold a blade again?"
The spirit of one of the supposedly favored swords of Okita Soji. As she remembers being his favorite, she shows single-minded devotion to him. However, details of her existence are unclear, so she can't really remember how to fight. She's clearly not able to exert her full power, but nonetheless she's proud of what strength she has.
[Event] Meiji Monster on a Rampage
143.name: Kikuichimonji Norimune

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to current target.
skill.name: Hidden Talent

abilities.description: Absorbs a 15% of DMG dealt as HP.
abilities.name: Goddess of Snow

1430.description:
"Stay by my side and I'll make sure you'll get the white Christmas you've been dreaming of!"
A Hawaiian snow goddess. She'll be spending Christmas with you this year, so she's planning a romantic festive season with plenty of snow.
1430.name: Poli'ahu [Xmas]

skill.description: Can be used as bond and in guild conquest.
skill.name: Snowdrop

abilities.description: All allies take 3% less DMG.
abilities.name: Pride of the Spetsnaz

1431.description:
"You're shivering! ...Aren't I cold, you ask? No... No, for some reason, I'm strangely warm inside..."
The soul of a standard-issue Soviet army knife. She hides it well, but in actual fact she's pretty nervous about her first Christmas spent with you.

changes.new: 1 events (added: 172)
changes.old: 0 events

1431.name: Natalia Nyfe [Xmas]

skill.description: Reduces all enemies' DEF by {delay1} for a limited time.
skill.name: Holy Night's Offering

abilities.description: Increases 10% of Skill DMG and increases 60% of Crit DMG.
abilities.name: First Squad of the Shinsengumi

1432.description:
"Well, what do you think? I've never dressed up like this before, not even for Officer Okita..."
The soul of a sword that was used by Sochi Okita, commander of the first unit of the Shinsengumi police force. Urged on by the others, she's dressed up in a special Christmas outfit to please you.
1432.name: Kiku Ichimonji [Xmas]

skill.description: Increases the Crit Rate of 2 allies with the highest ATK by {delay1} for a limited time.
skill.name: Code of the Shinsengumi

abilities.description: Increases 17% of skill DMG of the 2 allies with highest ATK.
abilities.name: Ushi no Koku Mairi

1433.description:
"We'll still spend wonderful evenings together next year too, right...? And the year after that...? That's a promise, yes?"
A jealous she-devil who kills with her powerful curses. She was the first to perform the cursing ritual known as Ushi no Koku Mairi, in which nails are driven into a straw doll used to represent someone. You'd be best to keep your roaming eye in check this festive season...

changes.new: 1 events (added: 172)
changes.old: 0 events

1433.name: Hashihime [Xmas]

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to 3 enemies (ranged priority).
skill.name: All-Consuming Envy

abilities.description: At the start of the final wave, enemy with the most HP takes 12% more damage.
abilities.name: World in Glass

1434.description:
"How beautiful the snow is! And how much better it would be if I could watch it close beside you..."
The soul of a snow dome depicting a gorgeous snow scene. Each year, she watches the Christmas festivities from within her glass capsule, but what she'd really like is to spend it by her loved one's side...
1434.name: Snow Dome

skill.description: Can be used as bond and in guild conquest.
skill.name: Silent Night

abilities.description: Increases 15% of skill DMG dealt at the start of each wave.
abilities.name: Christmas Present

1435.description:
"It was destiny to meet you here, on this Holy Night when I distribute my love... My gift to you is me myself. The space beside me belongs to you and you only..."
The one and only Santa Claus, who makes everyone's wishes come true. Outside of Christmas time, though, he lounges all day and night in your bed.

changes.new: 1 events (added: 172)
changes.old: 0 events

1435.name: Santa Claus

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to the 3 enemies with the highest ATK.
skill.name: Merry Christmas

abilities.description: Reduces 25% of DMG taken.
abilities.name: The Four Elements

1436.description:
"Oh! Is this a d-d-date? Aren't you cold? You can share my coat, if you like... Oh, was that the wrong thing to say?"
A fire spirit and one of the Four Elements. In the summer, everyone found her heat too much to bear, but she's secretly pleased that people are keen to cuddle up to her now that it's winter. She came to town to buy presents for you and all the fairies in the forest.

changes.new: 1 events (added: 172)
changes.old: 0 events

1436.name: Salamander [Xmas]

skill.description: Restores {value} HP. Target deal {delay1} more DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: Flame Column

abilities.description: All Phantasma allies take 15% less DMG taken.
abilities.name: Fox Spirit's Art

abilities.description: Decreases 50% the ATK speed of all foes.
abilities.name: Waiting for Presents

1437.description:
"My master will be here soon, no doubt... I must ensure that this is a truly enjoyable evening for my favorite agent... "
This fox spirit once served a renowned ghost agent master. It can hardly contain its excitement about the arrival of Santa Claus. Of late, it has cast off its favorite pipe and has taken to snuggling up beside the fire to get warm.
1437.name: Pipe Fox [Xmas]

skill.description: Can be used as bond and in guild conquest.
skill.name: Bewitchment

abilities.description: Reduces 25% of DMG dealt by opponent with highest ATK at the start of each wave.
abilities.name: The Commander's Blade

abilities.description: Increases 20% of DMG dealt at the start of each wave.
abilities.name: Kondo's Beloved Sword

1438.description:
"...It's fine. I'm not uncomfortable. If it pleases you, then that is satisfaction enough for me..."
The soul of the beloved inscribed sword of Isami Kondo, head of the Shinsengumi special police force. She's dressed up in Christmas costume following yet another cosplay request from the Shinsengumi officers. Of late she seems to be rather enjoying it...
1438.name: Kotetsu [Xmas]

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to enemy with highest ATK. Target takes {delay1} more DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: Fiery Spirit

abilities.description: Reduces 20% of DMG taken.
abilities.name: Demon World Idol

abilities.description: Absorbs 15% of DMG dealt as HP.
abilities.name: Power of the Behemoth

1439.description:
"Oooh... That cake is absolutely delicious... Say, today seems like a great day for us to stick together. What do you say?"
A huge monster that has risen from the underworld. If she gets too worked up she'll turn back into a enormous monster, so you'll need to keep an eye on her. She's something of a celebrity in both the underworld and the heavens, and receives a huge number of Christmas presents, but she claims that spending her time together with you is the best gift of all.
1439.name: Behemoth (Calm) [Xmas]

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to the 2 enemies with the highest ATK, with a {probability} of inflicting Freeze.
skill.name: Thunderball

abilities.description: Increases 25% of DMG dealt when another "Black Ship" is on the team.
abilities.name: Black Ship

144.description:
"Even a fraction of my strength will blow you to smithereens!"
The spirit of one of the four black ships led by Commodore Perry when he reopened Japan. She tries to make a show of her strength to get what she wants, but Saratoga usually gets on her case about it and shuts her up. If Perry says anything, on the other hand, she'll hit and abuse him without a second thought. But it seems like he enjoys it...
[Event] Meiji Monster on a Rampage
144.name: Susquehanna

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to all enemies.
skill.name: Black Tyranny

abilities.description: Increases own level by 13 when another member of Shinsengumi is on the team.
abilities.name: The Samurai of Shinsengumi

145.description:
"We protect the streets of the capital."
The spirit of the captain of the first unit of the Shinsengumi, a group of swordsmen who maintained the peace in the capital's streets. He's been ravaged by disease, but you'd never guess it from the way he beats up brutes. Having failed to keep the peace in his former life, he is utterly commmited to doing so this time around and has no mercy for anyone causing a disturbance on the streets.
[Event] Meiji Monster on a Rampage
145.name: Okita Soji [Restoration]

skill.description: Restores {value} HP to 2 allies (melee priority). Targets receive {delay1} less DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: Protector of the Streets

abilities.description: All allies deal 3% more DMG.
abilities.name: Opening

1452.description:
"How will you respond to my next move?"
A spirit that visits dedicated players of Go, a traditional Chinese board game. Playing with him will lead to a marked improvement in your game. He has been really looking forward to teaching you the rules.
1452.name: Go-Go

skill.description: Can be used as bond and in guild conquest.
skill.name: God's Hand

abilities.description: Reduces 25% DMG dealt by all foes at the start of the final wave.
abilities.name: Demon-Quelling Light

abilities.description: Reflects 25% of DMG taken back to attacker.
abilities.name: Protective Mirror

1453.description:
"Gaze upon my surface, and who knows what you'll find! Heh heh!"
The spirit of an ancient mirror, it is said to reflect the true nature of any demon, faerie, or human who looks into it. Not to be confused with your altogether less mysterious companion Mira.
1453.name: Cloud Mirror

skill.description: Restores {value} HP to 3 allies with the lowest percentage of HP. Targets receive {delay1} less DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: Polished Mirror

abilities.description: Increases 20% of Skill DMG.
abilities.name: Destroyer

146.description:
"If you ever get locked up in Hell, we can be besties!"
The spirit of a demon whose name also refers to a bottomless pit in Hell. She normally works as gatekeeper to the place where the most evil spirits are locked away in Hell. But no one's been coming lately, so she got really lonely and decided to leave. The machine she rides in is powered by some hellish form of science and can track and capture in addition to just zooming around. Once you get grabbed, it carries you straight back to Hell.
[Event] Meiji Monster on a Rampage
146.name: Abaddon

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to all enemies; decreases targets' speed by {delay1} for a limited time.
skill.name: Hell Unlocked

abilities.description: Increases 40% of skill DMG.
abilities.name: Bodyguard's Spirit

1465.description:
"Who d'ya think you're calling 'sweetheart'? I'll wipe that smile off your face!"
A wandering warrior who trained in the arts of swordmanship to avenge her father. Currently acting as your bodyguard, she often fights on behalf of those weaker than herself.
1465.name: Riya Amagasaki

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to further enemies, with a {probability} of inflicting Stun.
skill.name: Vengeance Blade

abilities.description: Increase 15% of DMG dealt by the 2 allies with the highest ATK.
abilities.name: 808 Tanuki

1466.description: <color=#f4e48e>"With me in tow, that makes 808! Onwards, soldiers!"</color>The spirit of a <color=#ef9843>military general</color> raccoon dog in charge of <color=#ef9843>808 raccoon dog soldiers</color>. It came all the way from Shikoku to join forces with you.
1466.name: Kyobu Tanuki

skill.description: Can be used as bond and in guild conquest.
skill.name: Belly Bash

abilities.description: Increases own level by 17 when another member of Shinsengumi is on the team.
abilities.name: The Samurai of Shinsengumi

147.description:
"Don't you know how to listen to your teammates? Laugh one more time and I'll knock you out!"
The spirit of the man who managed the Shinsengumi, a group of swordsmen who maintained the peace in the capital's streets. He trained rowdy young hooligans into competent swordsmen. He's not only a talented fighter, but also faultless as a human being, which has earned him trust and respect. As a spirit he walks the streets with his fellow swordsmen to keep the peace.
[Event] Meiji Monster on a Rampage
147.name: Kondo Isami

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to current target, with a {probability} of inflicting Stun.
skill.name: Tennen Rishin-ryu

abilities.description: Restores 5% HP to all allies at the start of each wave.
abilities.name: Reformation

1476.description:
"Right, you lot!　Are you behaving yourselves?"
She was once a people-eating devil, but changed her ways after coming to understand the pain of losing a loved one. Having understood how wonderful life can be, and the joy that comes of securing that wonder, she began to work as an educator in the demon kingdom.
1476.name: Hariti

skill.description: Can be used as bond and in guild conquest.
skill.name: Discipline Time

abilities.description: Increases 15% of DMG dealt; Increases 25% of ATK speed.
abilities.name: Demon's Strength

148.description:
"I know I might look like a final boss or something, but I swear I'm not up to anything bad!"
Evil energy of extreme intensity has made Commodore Perry stronger than ever before. He absolutely loves his new demonic appearance and can't wait to be the center of attention at the next cosplay event... Some worry that he'll scare other attendees, but that doesn't turn him off one bit, and he's already getting started on sewing together the costume.
[Event] Meiji Monster on a Rampage
148.name: Commodore Perry [Demonic]

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to all enemies.
skill.name: Demon Invasion

abilities.description: Reduces 40% of DMG taken and slowly restores HP over time when HP is 1/2 or below.
abilities.name: Oni of Mt. Oe

1489.description:
"Gnnnyyyaaarrrrrrrrgghh!!!"
Japan's most powerful demon, who lives in the Oeyama mountain in old Tanpa province, governing over a pack of several hundred demons, and striking fear into the hearts of those in the neighboring city. It loves a drink and, when it's feeling tipsy, likes to capture young girls, take them home and eat them as snacks. It's an earnest sort, though, and always makes sure to thank those who come to capture him before murdering them. A hardliner, it hates nothing more than half measures.
1489.name: Shuten-doji (Wild)

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to current target.
skill.name: King's Return

abilities.description: Skill attacks have 19% chances of inflicting Stun.
abilities.name: Okita's Favorite Sword

abilities.description: Reduces 20% of DMG taken.
abilities.name: Partner in Tough Times

149.description:
"Don't be careless. Look after yourself."
The spirit of one of the favorite swords of Okita Soji, top team leader of the Shinsengumi. They made it through many tough fights together, even having a sort of rivalry with one another to see who's better. Now she's concerned about his illness and feels she has to work extra hard to make up for his weakened state. And she believes everything he says, even when he's joking.
[Event] Meiji Monster on a Rampage
149.name: Kashuu Kiyomitsu

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to current target.
skill.name: Blade Storm

abilities.description: Skill attacks have 50% chances of inflicting Virulent Poison.
abilities.name: Oni King's Dignity

abilities.description: Reduces 30% of DMG taken.
abilities.name: A Dear Friend's Love

1490.description:
"Parfait, I said! Bring me parfait!"
Japan's most powerful demon, who lives in the Oeyama mountain in old Tanpa province, governing over a pack of several hundred demons and striking fear into the hearts of those in the neighboring city. She is very partial to drinking, but even more than that, she likes Ibaraki Doji. Of late, she's acquired a taste for parfait as well. She has something of a regal air about her, and remains unflappable. Her important position, she feels, makes it shameful to make her true feelings known.
1490.name: Shuten-doji (Calm)

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to the 2 enemies with the most HP. Target take {delay1} more DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: Demonic Ambition

abilities.description: All Divina team members deal 4% more DMG.(only take effect once to the team)
abilities.name: Four Heavenly Kings

1491.description:
"Now I can show what I can really do!"
Named as one of Minamoto no Yorimitsu's retainers, known as the Four Heavenly Kings, he was involved in slaying Shuten-doji. As well as a rare strength and a great beauty in which he has unending faith, he is also dutiful and devoted to the people around him, and has a tendency to cry at the drop of a hat. Everyone from Yorimitsu to the other Heavenly Kings dote on him, and regard him as a younger brother figure. As a complete package, though, he has his flaws... Particularly in the brains department...
1491.name: Kintaro

skill.description: Can be used as bond and in guild conquest.
skill.name: True Spirit

abilities.description: Restores 30% HP to the ally with the lowest percentage of HP at the start of each wave.
abilities.name: Blood of the Yasha

1493.description:
"Don't worry! I won't eat you so long as you behave yourself."
In her days as a Yasha demon, she stole other people's children in order to feed her own, thought to number over a thousand. After a lot of fuss, she became the goddess of children and easy childbirth. She has still not forgotten the taste of human flesh, however, and her cold eyes never show signs of smiling.
1493.name: Kishimojin[aya]

skill.description: Can be used as bond and in guild conquest.
skill.name: Munch

abilities.description: Increases 7% all Divina team members' Crit Rate at the start of each wave.
abilities.name: Wealth Abound

abilities.description: Increases 20% of the EXP gained from battle.Increases the number of soulstones received from battle by 30%.
abilities.name: Poverty Begone

1494.description:
"Forget about fortune tellers. If I'm around, happiness is guaranteed!"
A goddess who brings good luck to all around her. She is especially fond of money, drinking, and fine clothes, and is usually found hanging around seedy areas where money changes hands, talking about love. She is the nemesis of the Goddess of Poverty.
1494.name: Goddess of Good Fortune

skill.description: Increases Crit Rate to all allies by {delay1} for a limited time.
skill.name: Breeze of Fortune

abilities.description: Increases 3% of max HP of Divina team members.
abilities.name: Amazake

1495.description:
"Come on, just one quick drink. You won't regret it!"
The goddess of making sake, she brews special amenotamu sake for the other gods. Since she doesn't drink alcohol herself, she is always encouraging others to sample her product. The vibrant and aromatic sake she produces is simply without equal. She is very well connected, and is a familiar face in the ghost community.
1495.name: Sakatokego no Kami

skill.description: Can be used as bond and in guild conquest.
skill.name: Rush of Energy!

abilities.description: Increases 10% of DMG dealt; Increases 10% of skill DMG.
abilities.name: Yakiniku Teishoku

1496.description:
"Hey noobs! You're going down!"
A hardcore online gamer, and leader of the Yakiniku Teishoku guild. He is known online by his username Hive Hunter. He ventured into cyberspace searching for powerful monsters for his game. Apparently, he was looking for a monster known only as the Demon.
1496.name: Hive Hunter

skill.description: Can be used as bond and in guild conquest.
skill.name: Gamer Spirit

abilities.description: Reduces 30% of DMG taken when one of “Shuten Doji” is on the team.
abilities.name: Loyal Oni

1497.description:
"Whatever you desire, my Lady..."
Shoten-doji's most valued lieutenant, and the only demon she trusts. She refers to Shoten-doji as "my Lady," and they appear to be close friends. Some claim they are more than friends, however... She speaks rather roughly when Shoten-doji is not around. She has quite a dry personality, but is certainly evil enough to be considered a demon... She loves desserts.
1497.name: Ibaraki Doji[aya]

skill.description: Restores {value} HP to 2 allies (melee priority). Targets receive {delay1} less DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: Great Demon's Love

abilities.description: Increases 50% of DMG dealt when one of the Five Swords under Heaven is on the team.
abilities.name: Five Great Swords

abilities.description: Increases 50% of Crit Rate.
abilities.name: Oni-Slaying Blade

1498.description:
"No need to worry when I'm around. I'll silence all those whining brats!"
One of the five heavenly swords. Yoritomo used this sword to decapitate Shoten-doji. It seems the presence of this sword stops children crying at night. She values personal relationships so highly, she believes they are the only thing that cannot be cut.
1498.name: Dojigiri

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to enemy with highest ATK, target receives {delay1} more DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: Moonlit Slice

abilities.description: Increases 15% of DMG dealt.
abilities.name: Best Thing on Earth

15.description:
"S-so hungry tonight... Need food..."
The spirit of a sword that is considered as the demon sword. By some mistake most of the legends about her have to do with being unlucky. She never wanted it to be like this... But since that is what everyone expects of her, she uses some kind of quasi-hypnotism to make herself into the demon sword she was meant to be. Apparently she has monster DNA in her.
15.name: Muramasa

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to 2 enemies (ranged priority).
skill.name: Strange Invocation

abilities.description: Increases 10% of DMG taken; Increases 9% of Crit Rate.
abilities.name: Abandoned by God

150.description:
"Oh, I doubt I'll be going to heaven."
The spirit of a commander considered to be a hero and savior of France. He earned himself a pretty bad reputation while alive through a number of unsavory incidents. But he actually had a period where he behaved as a deeply loyal knight, even if that's not the story history books tell. He knows it's too late to change the past, but he feels like he can possibly start making up for his sins by putting on his old armor and devoting himself to the cause of justice.
150.name: Gilles de Rais [Knight]

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to all enemies.
skill.name: Knight's Cry

abilities.description: Increases 15% of skill DMG.
abilities.name: Pillar of Justice

abilities.description: Reduces 20% of DMG of the enemy with the most HP at the start of each wave.
abilities.name: Gentle Heart

151.description:
"If only there was some way to make it hurt less..."
The spirit of a machine that comes in handy when people need to be beheaded. Before becoming a spirit she made sure lots of criminals had a painless journey to the other side. Now people misunderstand her and think she's just a tool of cruelty. But she still feels the intent of her inventor to "find a way to kill without inflicting any pain." She even has some qualms about defeating enemies in battle.
151.name: Guillotine

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to the enemy with the most HP. Decreases target's speed by {delay1} for a limited time.
skill.name: Heaven to Hell

abilities.description: When HP is 1/2 or less, Increases 25% of Crit Rate and Crit DMG.
abilities.name: Maiden's Rage

152.description:
"Who started that crazy rumor? WHO WAS IT?"
The spirit of a girl found dead in the streets with her dreams only half-fulfilled. The story of her death became an inspirational tale across Japan, and now every outcast aspires to be like her. She was turned into a spirit by people's hopes and wishes, so she's pretty powerful. She ascended to Heaven, but they say that now she's involved in the turf wars up there.
152.name: Restless Ghost [Serious]

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to current target.
skill.name: Legendary Punch

abilities.description: Increases 25% of ATK speed.
abilities.name: Power Tool

153.description:
"Careful in the dark. You don't wanna bump into me."
An electric saw composed of lots of little blades on a rotating ring. You know, the kind that makes scary noises and rips things apart. He's good at hiding on the side of the road at night and suddenly jumping out to scaring passerby. People have even started calling him "Mr. Jump Scare." In the process of all of these scary performances he's memorized every lane and back alley in town, and can run 50 meters in only four seconds. Needless to say he's giving this hobby his all.
153.name: Chainsaw

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to nearby enemies.
skill.name: Spread the Fear

abilities.description: Increases 15% of skill DMG.
abilities.name: All of Evil

abilities.description: Skill attacks have a 60% chances of inflicting Poison.
abilities.name: Pure Evil

154.description:
"The name's Mainyu, and I'm absolutely evil♪"
The spirit of a destructive being in Zoroastrianism who loves to annoy those around her. It's actually inspiring how she's willing to go to any length to bother others. Mikado's been making good use of her at the Bureau, and she's happy just to see the pissed off looks on people's faces. Some say her arrival brought about the rise of "Dictator Mikado."
[Special Bond] Increases Azi Dahaka's skill DMG.

changes.new:
"The name's Mainyu, and I'm absolutely evil♪"
The spirit of a destructive being in Zoroastrianism who loves to annoy those around her. It's actually inspiring how she's willing to go to any length to bother others. Mikado's been making good use of her at the Bureau, and she's happy just to see the pissed off looks on people's faces. Some say her arrival brought about the rise of "Dictator Mikado."
[Special Bond] Increases Azi Dahaka's skill DMG.
changes.old:
"The name's Mainyu, and I'm absolutely evil♪"
The spirit of a destructive being in Zoroastrianism who loves to annoy those around her. It's actually inspiring how she's willing to go to any length to bother others. Mikado's been making good use of her at the Bureau, and she's happy just to see the pissed off looks on people's faces. Some say her arrival brought about the rise of "Dictator Mikado."
[Special Bond] Increases {#MonsterName#240}'s skill DMG.

154.name: Angra Mainyu

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to 2 enemies (melee priority).
skill.name: Grounds for Evil

abilities.description: Reflects a 15% of DMG taken back to attacker.
abilities.name: Sky Mirror

155.description:
"Am I asking too much?"
A spirit who uses a huge mirror to reflect the sky. She can create a mirror anywhere using her purified salt and water. She uses the mirror to conceal herself while practicing sexy poses. Rain makes her more motivated and focused, apparently because she's on the good side of all the rain gods of the worlds. She boasts that her poses are so sexy that they can stop any man—or god—in his tracks.
155.name: Uyuni

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to the enemy with the most HP, with a {probability} of inflicting Burn.
skill.name: Magnified Sunlight

abilities.description: Increases 10% of the number of soulstones received from battle.
abilities.name: Greatest Pirate

156.description:
"Rules are rules! If ye can't follow 'em, ye'll walk the plank!"
The spirit of the last great pirate from the Age of Exploration. He attacked countless ships and committed unthinkable atrocities—at least according to the stories. He claims that he's the rare kind of leader who looks after the downtrodden, and that all he wanted was to expand his influence.
156.name: Cap'n Bartholomew

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to 2 enemies (ranged priority).
skill.name: A Pirate's Battle

157.description:
"Goblins get their butts kicked if they slack off, you know!"
The spirit of a goblin famous for always getting blamed for everything. But no one says it to her face, because they know they'll get beat up by her radical group of goblin fundamentalists. She has a pure and simple desire to improve goblins' social status, and she trains every day to achieve that goal.
157.name: Gobrute

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to current target. Target receives {delay1} more DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: Goblin Counter

abilities.description: Increases 10% of skill DMG.
abilities.name: Rising Warrior

158.description:
"Well, well, you look promising."
The spirit of the samurai who became the first prime minister of Japan during the Heian Period. He slowly worked his way up to the position over the course of his life, and is very confident, with the work ethic to back it up. Lots of people love him because of the way he cares about everyone he meets. Given the terrible fires and other misfortune born from misunderstandings during his lifetime, he now tries to constantly create safe spaces where everyone can interact and come to agreement. He's definitely not just doing it for fun!
158.name: Taira no Kiyomori

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to 3 enemies (ranged priority). Targets take {delay1} more DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: Lifelong Samurai

abilities.description: Increases 20% of Skill DMG.
abilities.name: Obsidian Strength

159.description:
"Can you believe a god did that?"
A spirit who once ruled the sun. She doesn't get along well with Quetzalcoatl, who struck her down from the sun and has been nothing but trouble ever since. Recently she decided it's not worth trying to maintain a relationship and has been avoiding Quetzalcoatl altogether. But Quetzalcoatl still sneaks up on her every now and then before Tezcatlipoca has time to get away. The next time this happens, she's vowed to settle things once and for all, but who knows if she'll succeed...
[Special Bond] Increases Quetzalcoatl's normal ATK.
[Event] Thanksgiving Day Beatdown
159.name: Tezcatlipoca

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to current target.
skill.name: Power of the Black Stone

16.description:
"I am the King, so I make the Laws."
A king who built a castle on Mount Oe and controls all the demons across Japan. He originally never intended to settle down. It's just that he made a deal with Mikado and decided to come down to the human world. Ever since then he's been living at the Bureau of the Occult with Mikado. His motto is "lively and clear," and he's a nice guy, really manly. That's why so many demons have faith in him as they live their lives running free. He's also a little on the fancy side, writing poems in his spare time.
16.name: Shuten Doji

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to 2 enemies (ranged priority), with a {probability} of inflicting Weak Poison.
skill.name: Song of Karmic Downfall

abilities.description: Increases 4% of  battle reward drop rate.
abilities.name: Harvest Helper

160.description:
"Ugh... Do I HAVE tooo?"
A spirit considered to be the god of fertility in certain parts of the world. He is constantly altering the energy levels of the land. Actually, his health affects the production of local crops, so when he's sick it can cause a shortage of food. As a result people are extremely nice to him, and he's gotten kind of spoiled. If he so much as pretends to be sick, people come running with food for him. Apparently a certain goddess noticed this and sent him to the Bureau of the Occult to try to build some strength and endurance.
[Event] Thanksgiving Day Beatdown
160.name: Kokopelli

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to all enemies, with a {probability} of inflicting Weak Poison.
skill.name: Abandoned Land

abilities.description: Skill attacks have 22% chances of inflicting Stun.
abilities.name: Ruler of Earth

161.description:
"Not bad, not bad at all. You'll do just fine!"
The spirit of a demon that controls the land and earth. She's really open-minded about most things, which has won her the affection of many other spirits. She's also known for being a passionate fan of a certain elven dance group. Although she never gets angry under normal circumstances—almost like some sort of enlightened Buddha—when it comes to her favorite group of elves, she gets worked up over even the tiniest of details. This has made her a legend among hardcore fans.
[Event] Thanksgiving Day Beatdown
161.name: Amaymon

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to all enemies.
skill.name: Earthen Demon

162.description:
"I always feel like the star of the show!"
The spirit of a famous bird. She appeared after hearing that the Bureau of the Occult was going to celebrate Thanksgiving. She makes a point to tell people that turkey is an extremely popular dish in certain parts of the world. Of course, this popularity means that many of her brethren are killed and eaten, but she explains this away as being an unavoidable side effect of fame. She's surprisingly good at cooking, and prepares many of the dishes for the Bureau's Thanksgiving feast—including the roast turkey, naturally.
[Event] Thanksgiving Day Beatdown
162.name: Turkey Lurkey

skill.description: Restores {value} HP to the ally with the lowest HP.
skill.name: National Dish

163.description:
"I always hit my target!"
The spirit of a chivalrous thief residing in Sherwood Forest. He once fought against the Bureau of the Occult, but that is all a thing of the past now. He claims that at that time he thought Mikado was tyrant, and so the poor, oppressed spirit agents needed his help. But working together to cleanse a massive evil energy outbreak cleared up all the misunderstandings, and in the end he joined the Bureau himself.
[Event] Thanksgiving Day Beatdown
163.name: Robin Hood

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to 3 enemies (ranged priority), with a {probability} of inflicting Stun.
skill.name: Deep Green Shadow

abilities.description: Increases 20% of Skill DMG.
abilities.name: Earth-rending Blade

164.description:
"This blade brings honor to the Goto name!"
The spirit of a blade with miraculous sharpness. A slice from her can cut through anything. She constantly requests duels with other sword spirits so that she can improve her skills. She hopes her time put into self-improvement will one day allow her to stand alongside the Five Swords under Heaven. In terms of sharpness, she is equal or superior to any other sword. But what she really needs might not be sharpness at all...
[Event] Thanksgiving Day Beatdown
164.name: Dotanuki

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to current target.
skill.name: Secret Technique of Goto
