abilities.description: Restores 10% HP to the ally with the lowest percentage of HP at the start of each wave.
abilities.name: Caring for Friends

165.description:
"Purrrrfect!"
The legendary spirit of a supposed "demon blade." Ceaseless training has given her considerable control over her supernatural powers, though it's by no means perfect. Still, she's confident in the strength she's honed over the years in order to protect her friends. Always having been seen as an honest and direct individual, her powers are recognized and appreciated both by herself and others. One can assume she'll continue to wield her powers freely in the future as well.
[Event] Thanksgiving Day Beatdown
165.name: Muramasa [Thanksgiving]

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to 2 enemies (ranged priority), with a {probability} of inflicting Sleep.
skill.name: Supernatural Release

abilities.description: Increases 20% of all allies' Crit DMG when this daemon is Team Leader.
abilities.name: Pilgrim Progenitor

abilities.description: Increases 2% of Crit Rate at the start of each wave.
abilities.name: Vessel of Freedom

166.description:
"Everyone deserves freedom!"
The spirit of a boat that carried people in search of personal liberty. When she sees an oppressed person or someone trying to hold true to their convictions she just can't stop herself from getting involved, and many people have been dragged into situations by her interfering efforts. Still, people take kindly to her because they know how serious she is. She has actually managed to help a lot of people, and will most likely continue to do so in the foreseeable future.
[Event] Thanksgiving Day Beatdown
166.name: Mayflower

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to the 2 enemies with the highest ATK.
skill.name: Freedom's Course

abilities.description: Increases 25% of the number of soulstones received from battle.
abilities.name: God of the Harvest

abilities.description: Restores 5% HP to Divina team members at the start of each wave.
abilities.name: Power of Life

167.description:
"I just want to test myself"
A spirit worshipped as a fertility god. Celebrating Thanksgiving at the Bureau of the Occult was originally his idea. This year's celebration, though with its fair share of hitches, came to a happy end with the formation of many new bonds of friendship. He managed to convey his feelings to others, and they to him. In the future he hopes that he and the many people he is proud to call friends will not only rely upon each other, but be happy to take on each others' troubles.
[Special Bond] Increases Mayflower's skill DMG.
[Event] Thanksgiving Day Beatdown
167.name: Freyr

skill.description: Increases DMG dealt by all allies by {delay1} for a limited time.
skill.name: Surging Life Force

abilities.description: Immune to Poison.
abilities.name: Doll of Forgiveness

168.description:
"Don't worry, I'm right here."
The spirit of a doll made from straw in the shape of a person. Despite common belief, she's not a tool for applying curses. She actually takes on people's sins and delivers them to heaven. She has a strong sense of self-sacrifice, fully prepared to give her own life in the service of others. Some people make fun of the way she goes diving headfirst into all sorts of trouble, but she doesn't mean any harm by it. On the contrary, she does it all out of compassion. However, many at the Bureau have been warned not to ask too much of her—she might just do it.
168.name: Straw Doll [Thanksgiving]

skill.description: Restores {value} HP and receives {delay1} less DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: World on One's Shoulders

abilities.description: Skill attacks have a moderate chance of inflicting Paralysis and 20% increasing DMG taken by the target for a limited time.
abilities.name: Power of Thunder

169.description:
"If you hear thunder, then I'm on my way!"
The spirit of a beast that appears when there's thunder. She gets teleported to the spot where lightning strikes against her will, regardless of whether she's in the middle of dinner or asleep in her bed. At this point, she's accepted it as a fact of life. She and Nue are close friends, and hang out so much that some people think they're sisters. However, she usually ends up getting summoned off by a lightning strike at the worst possible times whenever they're hanging out. But apparently she won't get teleported away if someone is touching her. So it's best to take a very hands-on approach when working with her.
[Special Bond] Increases Nue's skill DMG.
169.name: Raiju

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to current target.
skill.name: Lightning Dropkick

abilities.description: Increases 5% of DMG dealt at the start of each wave.
abilities.name: Heavenly Lineage

17.description:
"One man's strength is another's fear."
A spirit known as the leading supernatural spirit in Japan. It all started with a tragedy when he was still alive. These days not many people go out of their way to try to understand him, so he keeps fighting, all alone. His elite lineage, combined with the explosive bursts of spirit essence granted him by his sublimated anger, make him quite powerful. Then again, maybe these rare powers have something to do with his constant loneliness.
17.name: Emperor Sutoku

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to all enemies, with a {probability} of inflicting Silence.
skill.name: Anti-Curse Resonance

abilities.description: Skill attacks decrease target's ATK speed by 33%.
abilities.name: Wind Power

abilities.description: Normal attacks have 53% chances of inflicting Burn.
abilities.name: Ruler of the Sun

170.description:
"So she's here, too, eh? Heh, heh, heh..."
A spirit that once ruled the sun. She loves Tezcatlipoca, and most of their fights over the years originated from Quetzalcoatl's failed attempts at flirting. She boasts proudly that the only reason she's still chasing Tezcatlipoca around after all this time is because she wants to hit on her. This very much irritates Tezcatlipoca, but seeing the look of chagrin on her face makes Quetzalcoatl like her all the more.
170.name: Quetzalcoatl

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to further enemies.
skill.name: Godly Storm

abilities.description: 24% chances to inflict Petrifaction on the enemy with the highest ATK at the start of each wave.
abilities.name: Mouthpiece of God

abilities.description: Normal attacks by Divina team members have a 10% chance of inflicting Burn.
abilities.name: Seraphim

171.description:
"Where could he have gone...?"
The spirit of an archangel responsible for spreading the word of God. She also serves as liaison to the other archangels. Lately she's been working with an inventor spirit to see if she can find a way to make cellphones function on spirit essence. She's been having a tough time trying to find two free-wheeling angels: one is fixated on young girls, the other is a party angel who tends to wander off and get lost. Behind closed doors she's often found wondering aloud why she can't get more help on the job.
171.name: Gabriel

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to the enemy with the highest ATK, with a {probability} of inflicting Silence.
skill.name: Message to the Disobedient

abilities.description: Reduces 20% of DMG taken.
abilities.name: Unchanging Edge

abilities.description: Increases 20% of DMG dealt when one of the Five Swords under Heaven is on the team.
abilities.name: The Five Swords under Heaven

172.description:
"The centuries may pass, but my strength doesn't change!"
The spirit of one of the Five Swords under Heaven whose edge hasn't dulled even after all this time. But that's only because she's been working hard and doing whatever repairs are necessary to stay in top shape. She makes sure to provide the best care possible, and even polishes daily. You know what they say, the sharper the sword, the more people want to polish it. She gets a lot of attention from other sword fans as a result.
172.name: Outenta Mitsuyo

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to current target; reduces target's DEF by {delay1} for a limited time.
skill.name: Eternal Slicer

abilities.description: Skill attacks by Phantasma team members have 7% chances of inflicting Stun.
abilities.name: Black Giant

173.description:
"I'll destroy anyone who causes a ruckus on the open seas."
A spirit who controls a black giant that sinks ships at night. The giant does whatever he tells it to do, so if sailors are noisy at night when he's trying to sleep, he summons his giant to silence them. He pretty much just lets it run wild on the open seas until the noise goes away.
173.name: Umibozu

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to 3 enemies (melee priority); decreases targets' speed by {delay1} for a limited time.
skill.name: Massive Shadow

abilities.description: Normal attacks have 9% chances of inflicting Freeze.
abilities.name: Icicle of Death

174.description:
"Be careful. I don't want you to die."
A spirit who turns everything she touches into a freezing icicle. She exudes a coldness that freezes everything around her even though she doesn't mean to. It's extremely dangerous just to touch her—if you're lucky, the only thing that happens is your body freezing over. No matter how high the temperature is, her coldness never lets up. There's no end to the number of people she's inadvertently frozen in place on a hot summer's day.
174.name: Brinicle

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to current target, with a {probability} of inflicting Freeze.
skill.name: Approaching Absolute Zero

abilities.description: Increases 13% of the number of soulstones received from battle.
abilities.name: Stash Finder

175.description:
"Their secret stash is at the back of the desk drawer."
The spirit of a demon who defeated 36 armies. She appears on the battlefield as a hunter and takes out her foes with long-range sniping. She's also a walking dictionary that knows all about the past and future, and has other versatile skills, like mending bonds of friendship and locating where people hide their savings. Once she pushed her skills to the fullest, not only getting her hands on Mikado's secret stash, but living to tell about it after. That made her an instant legend around the Bureau.
175.name: Barbatos

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to all allies. Targets deal {delay1} more DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: Contract With a Demon

abilities.description: Skill attacks increase target's ATK speed by 40%.
abilities.name: Cloud-Riding Santa

176.description:
"Child, spotted! Preparing to drop present!"
The spirit of a magic flying cloud. She loves people with inner beauty, strength, and pure dreams, and forms partnerships with them. She even once formed a partnership with Santa Claus himself. During the Christmas season, she helps deliver presents to children, partially in an effort to promote herself. This has led some children to be under the mistaken impression that Santa Claus rides around on a cloud.
[Event] Shadow over Christmas
176.name: Flying Nimbus [Christmas]

skill.description: Restores {value} HP to the ally with the lowest percentage of HP. Target deals {delay1} more DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: Sonic Present

abilities.description: Restores 10% HP to all melee allies at the start of each wave.
abilities.name: Love Guide

177.description:
"Helping people fall in love is my mission in life!"
A spirit who presides over love and carries a quiver of love arrows with him wherever he goes. These arrows help guide people along the path to true love. They are only useful, however, when the couple is already romantically inclined toward each other. While it is possible for Cupid to force two disinterested people to fall in love, such unions almost always end in misery, so the practice is forbidden. That's why Cupid always asks the couple first if their feelings are true.
[Event] Shadow over Christmas
177.name: Cupid

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to current target, with a {probability} of inflicting Stun.
skill.name: Arrow of Lovesickness

abilities.description: Increases 4% of  skill DMG by Phantasma team members.
abilities.name: Huge Hit

178.description:
"Ooh, the kids are gonna love this! Hee hee!"
The mysterious spirit of a high school girl who wears a cute reindeer puppet. The puppets she used to wear made her rather unapproachable, but, this winter, she finally managed to gain popularity with children. After relentless practice, she got really good at puppet theater, and became a huge hit with her impromptu shows. She does all of this to bring the gift of a smile to as many children as possible.
[Event] Shadow over Christmas
178.name: Rudy Red-Nose

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to current target. Target receives {delay1} more DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: Christmas Comedy Show

179.description:
"Whaaat better place to be in winter than a kotatsu? It's paaaradise!"
The spirit of a kotatsu, a traditional heater table, considered to be one of the "three sacred treasures" of winter. She says warming up in a kotatsu is life's greatest joy, and few can resist her allure on a cold day. She has transformed many a chilly person into an unmoving do-nothing. Even if you manage to escape, she is always right there all winter, ready to suck you back in. That explains why she is known as the "black hole" around the Bureau of the Occult.
[Event] Shadow over Christmas
179.name: Kotatsu

skill.description: Restores {value} HP to all allies.
skill.name: Kotatsu Entrance

abilities.description: Increases own level by 10 when Princess Tatsuta is on the team.
abilities.name: Superstar

18.description:
"Oh, a warm spring day would be so nice..."
The spirit of Mount Saho, which lies to the east of the ancient capital, Nara. The daughter of a good family that rules spring, and very close with Princess Tatsuta. They are eternal rivals, constantly vying to become more popular than the other. Actually, they perform as an underground idol duo, too. But this is a well-kept secret, and even the Bureau of the Occult doesn't officially recognize it. Lots of people are secretly fans, though. Their music is pretty loud, and she is in charge of vocals and shouting.
[Special Bond] Increases Princess Tatsuta's speed.
18.name: Princess Saho

skill.description: Increases DMG dealt by 3 allies (ranged priority) by {delay1} for a limited time.
skill.name: Idol Hands

180.description:
"My gingerbread men are first-rate!"
The spirit of a ginger-laden cookie cut into the shape of a girl. The gingerbread men she bakes are imbued with a mysterious power that makes them come alive. During assignments, the fighting force of these cookies—faithful to her every command—have lead many a conflict to a swift resolution. At the moment, Ginger's greatest worry is weight gain from all that sampling during the baking process.
[Event] Shadow over Christmas
180.name: Ginger Breadman

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to 3 enemies (melee priority).
skill.name: Gingerbread War

abilities.description: Increases 20% of Skill DMG.
abilities.name: Fixed Personality

181.description:
"Things are so much better when I'm with you."
This spirit of a perfectly preserved pistol is no stranger to frontline action. With a weapon in her hand, this girl puts the "miss" in "missile." Since forming an alliance with Sola, she has helped with many assignments. She discovered that, for some reason, whenever she's around Master, her sudden personality changes stop, and so she has started hanging out with Master a lot. She's becoming more and more frightened, however, by the looks Sola—who doesn't want Master stolen away—gives her.
[Event] Shadow over Christmas
181.name: Tokarev Pistol [Christmas]

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to the enemy with the lowest HP.
skill.name: Painless Bullet

abilities.description: Reduces 4% DMG dealt by all foes at the start of each wave.
abilities.name: Couple Buster

182.description:
"Of course, my offer of help is only good for a limited time."
An amorous princess with a constant eye out for potential suitors. During her lifetime, a love relationship ended in tragedy, and this eventually made her hate everyone. No one outshines her when it comes to the harassment of couples in love. She claims it doesn't matter what she does, because nobody loves her anyway. She is still as fond of negative emotions as ever, so the fact that she agreed to help this time must mean she has reasons of her own.
[Event] Shadow over Christmas
182.name: Kiyo [Christmas]

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to 2 random enemies, with a {probability} of inflicting Stun.
skill.name: Fierce Love-Hate

abilities.description: Normal attacks have 30% chances of inflicting Silence.
abilities.name: Crawling Chaos

183.description:
"Come on and have some fun!"
A spirit with many forms who leads people into chaos and madness. She has multiple personalities, and can switch between them at will. When helping with assignments, she uses whichever personality suits the situation, but it's hard for her to switch when she's emotionally overwrought. When in the victim's role, she's been known to snap and go off on violent rampages. Recently, however, she has repented of this behavior and tries to make up for it by throwing herself into her work. Surely, Santa Claus will reward her?
[Event] Shadow over Christmas
183.name: Nyarlathotep

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to all enemies, with a {probability} of inflicting Stun.
skill.name: Invitation to Madness

abilities.description: Reduces 25% of Crit DMG by all foes at the start of each wave.
abilities.name: Pure Heart

184.description:
"Someday, I'm gonna be the real Santa!"
A spirit who was mistaken for Santa Claus, the hero of Christmas. She just happened to be passing by and wearing a red suit when she was mistaken for the jolly old elf himself. While helping out with cases at the Bureau of the Occult, she has started training to become the real Santa Claus. While her methods may be questionable, nobody can doubt the sincerity of her determination. Maybe she really will become the real Santa someday soon.
[Special Bond] Increases Nyarlathotep's skill DMG.
[Event] Shadow over Christmas
184.name: Miss Santa

skill.description: Restores {value} HP to all allies. Targets deal {delay1} more DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: Training Present

185.description:
"Hey, kid! You being naughty or nice?!"
A spirit who admonishes and punishes misbehaving children throughout the Christmas season. He is currently looking after the spirit children at the Bureau of the Occult, constantly telling them to "follow the rules" and "moderation in all things" and the like, trying to instruct them in proper spirit values as if he were their teacher. Thanks to his efforts, the bureau has saved a lot of money on repair and maintenance fees.
185.name: Krampus

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to current target.
skill.name: Punishment Time

abilities.description: Skill attacks have 12% chances of inflicting Freeze.
abilities.name: Evergreen Queen

186.description:
"Do you think this looks good on me?"
An oddly friendly snow spirit who often pops up unexpectedly during the winter months. This Christmas, she has decided to dress up in a special holiday outfit. She usually isn't all that interested in fashion, but rumor has it there's a special someone she wants to impress. She also has an arsenal of Christmas jokes, but it's up to you if you want to listen to them or not. If you do listen, be prepared to be bored.
186.name: Christmas Tree

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to all enemies.
skill.name: Lovely Branches

abilities.description: Skill attacks decrease target's ATK speed by 20%.
abilities.name: Gifter of Disappointments

abilities.description: Skill attacks have 52% chances of inflicting Silence.
abilities.name: Sinister Santa

187.description:
"Heh heh. And what do you want, my child?"
A spirit that accompanies St. Nicholas on his travels. He asks children if they can pray, and gives naughty children who can't disappointing presents like coal or sticks, gathered from deep in the mountains just before Christmas. But, these days, there are fewer and fewer naughty children, so, more often than not, Knecht Ruprecht is the one who ends up being disappointed.
[Special Bond] Increases Miss Santa's skill DMG.
187.name: Knecht Ruprecht

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to an enemy (healers priority).
skill.name: Impish Present

abilities.description: Increases 10% of Crit Rate.
abilities.name: New Year's Fashion

abilities.description: Increases 25% of Crit DMG by Phantasma team members when this daemon is Team Leader.
abilities.name: Queen's Caprice

188.description:
"Where are you going to take me next?"
The beautiful queen of the fairies. She celebrates New Years with her Japanese friends and tries out some of the traditional New Year's games played there. When she played fukuwarai, she arranged the features on the blank face so beautifully, you'd swear she wasn't wearing the blindfold—probably because she's so attached to beauty. When she played the badminton-like game of hanetsuki, she got the penalty of ink painted on her face before she even understood the rules, and that made her storm off sulkily. But she returned within the hour, not wanting to spoil her New Year's experience.
188.name: Titania [New Year]

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to the enemy with the most HP.
skill.name: Queen's Amusements

abilities.description: Increases 13% the skill DMG of the 2 allies with the highest ATK at the start of the final wave.
abilities.name: Seasonal Fun

189.description:
"Come on, everybody! Let's play!"
The spirit of traditional Japanese New Year's games. Every New Year, he and the spirits that preside over each of the six traditional New Year's games travel the country encouraging children to play these time-honored amusements. They do this by quietly placing the game equipment in front of children who come to the park to play, and that seems to do the trick. If you ever see New Year's game equipment in the park, it just might be a gift from New Year Game himself.
[Special Bond] Increases crit rate of Titania New Year.
189.name: New Year Game

skill.description: Restores {value} HP to all allies. Targets receive {delay1} less DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: Infinite Playfulness

abilities.description: Increases own level by 10 when Princess Saho is on the team.
abilities.name: Superstar

19.description:
"Oh, a clear autumn day is so nice!"
The spirit of Mount Tatsuta, which lies to the west of the ancient capital, Nara. The daughter of a good family that rules fall, and very close with Princess Saho. They are eternal rivals, constantly vying to become the more popular one. Actually, they perform as an underground idol duo, too. But this is a well-kept secret, and even the Bureau of the Occult doesn't officially recognize it. Lots of people are secretly fans, though. Their music is pretty loud, and she is in charge of choruses, guitar and manipulation.
[Special Bond] Increases Princess Saho's speed.
19.name: Princess Tatsuta

skill.description: Increases all allies' DEF by {delay1} for a limited time.
skill.name: Wicked Idol of the West

abilities.description: All melee allies take 7% less DMG
abilities.name: Fleeting Dream

190.description:
"Zzz... What a great dream..."
The spirit of the first dream of the New Year. She spends nearly the entire day sleeping, and even when she's awake, she's so out of it, there's no talking to her. The first dream of the New Year that she shows you has the mysterious power to change your fate. This is accomplished mainly by the efforts of "The Three Fortunes," spirits who support New Year Dream in her endeavors, and their every activity apparently energizes her.
190.name: Hatsuyume

skill.description: A {probability} of inflicting Stun to all enemies.
skill.name: Dream Divination

abilities.description: Increases 5% of battle reward drop rate.
abilities.name: Luckbringer

191.description:
"Leave it to me! I'll bring you all the good luck you could ever want!"
The spirit of a boat on which seven gods are said to ride. Tasked with delivering good luck across the land, she stays pretty busy carrying the gods around...and she goes so fast that it's not exactly a pleasant ride, either. Some gods have developed hip and back problems as a result. She's even been known to help sneak spirit agents and their daemons into the locations for their assignments at times.
191.name: Treasure Ship

skill.description: Increases the Crit Rate of 2 allies (ranged priority) by {delay1} for a limited time.
skill.name: Special Delivery

192.description:
"Winter means snow, and snow means...me!"
The spirit of a woman fashioned out of snow. As you might expect, she is rather an expert on the treatment and handling of snow and ice. She was once asked to judge an ice sculpting contest but spent the whole time rushing around telling the contestants how to improve their creations. As a result, the quality of the sculptures was far better than any year previous.
192.name: Miss Snowman

skill.description: Restores {value} HP to 2 allies (melee priority). Targets receive {delay1} less DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: Snow Formation

abilities.description: Increases 15% of DMG dealt when one of the Five Swords under Heaven is on the team.
abilities.name: The Five Swords under Heaven

abilities.description: Reduces 20% of DMG taken.
abilities.name: Buddha's Protection

193.description:
"I'll use every ounce of my strength to protect you!"
The spirit of one of the Five Swords under Heaven. She's a leading sword fighter with talent to match her blade's famous name. She adds double the polish to her skills so that no one can come close to copying her. She also becomes even more powerful when protecting something, possibly because her sword is said to have been used for self-defense. When seeking a companion for an escort mission, look no further.
193.name: Juzumaru Tsunetsugu

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to all enemies. Targets deal {delay1} less DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: Buddhist Protector

abilities.description: Absorbs 10% of DMG dealt as HP.
abilities.name: Cruel Goddess

abilities.description: Inflicts Silence on all Phantasma team members and Increases 25% of their DMG dealt at the start of the final wave.
abilities.name: Demonic Mistress Deity

194.description:
"Goddess or demon—which will it be today♪?"
The spirit of a demon who rules hell, though sometimes she behaves more like a goddess. She's very moody so you never know which one she's going to be. It's pretty frustrating, according to those around her. Still, that's how she ended up with the seemingly contradictory nicknames "Ruler of Hell" and "Goddess of Death and Rebirth."
194.name: Astaroth

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to all enemies.
skill.name: Stern Goddess

abilities.description: Restores 2% HP every 5 seconds.
abilities.name: Beast of Myth

abilities.description: Increases 49% of Crit DMG when Cerberus and Chimera are all on the team.
abilities.name: Three Beasts, One Body

195.description:
"It's me, Chimera, in Hydra Form!"
Chimera, the spirit who uses puppets and changes forms, as a hydra. She's quite proud of her super-strong poison and incredible recovery ability. She's also both extremely ferocious and sly, which can make her troublesome to have around. Generally, she tries to find people's weaknesses, then takes advantage of them to get what she wants. But in the end all she wants are cute things, like a lunch date together at her favorite restaurant.
[Special Bond] Increases “Orthrus [Festival]”’s skill DMG

changes.new:
"It's me, Chimera, in Hydra Form!"
Chimera, the spirit who uses puppets and changes forms, as a hydra. She's quite proud of her super-strong poison and incredible recovery ability. She's also both extremely ferocious and sly, which can make her troublesome to have around. Generally, she tries to find people's weaknesses, then takes advantage of them to get what she wants. But in the end all she wants are cute things, like a lunch date together at her favorite restaurant.
[Special Bond] Increases “Orthrus [Festival]”’s skill DMG
changes.old:
"It's me, Chimera, in Hydra Form!"
Chimera, the spirit who uses puppets and changes forms, as a hydra. She's quite proud of her super-strong poison and incredible recovery ability. She's also both extremely ferocious and sly, which can make her troublesome to have around. Generally, she tries to find people's weaknesses, then takes advantage of them to get what she wants. But in the end all she wants are cute things, like a lunch date together at her favorite restaurant.
[Special Bond] Increases “{#MonsterName#409}”’s skill DMG

195.name: Hydra

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to nearby enemies, with a {probability} of inflicting Weak Poison.
skill.name: Deadly Poison Play

abilities.description: When HP is 1/2 or less, Increases 40% of DMG dealt.
abilities.name: Great General's Spear

196.description:
"The key to my strength is flexibility."
The spirit of a spear wielded bravely by the military general Zhang Fei during the Three Kingdoms Period. Stubbornly obsessed with "flexibility," he insists that that is what makes both of them so strong. he boasts that anyone could become a great general if they simply imitate his flexible style. But nobody believes him once they see the way he wriggles and twists around in combat. Still, he continues to believe that flexibility brings strength, and makes sure to stretch every morning.
196.name: Snake Spear

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to the row of enemies directly in front.
skill.name: Undulating Blade

197.description:
"Hurry and bring me the other scrolls!"
The spirit of a collection of portraits of 36 famous Japanese poets. There were originally two volumes, and her strength hasn't been the same ever since they were separated. She dreams of someday finding and combining them into a single volume. Mikado likes to trick her into going on expeditions to distant places by making up tips on the location of the other volume. She knows she's being manipulated, but goes anyway on the off-chance that the scrolls really are there.
197.name: Handscroll of Immortal Poets

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to 2 random enemies.
skill.name: Sheer Poetry

abilities.description: Increasing 15% of crit rate of skill target with a low chance.
abilities.name: Resourceful Doctor

abilities.description: 15% chances of restoring HP to skill targets by 100%.
abilities.name: Goddess of Medicine

198.description:
"Bring me your wounded! I can heal anyone!"
The spirit of a demigod revered as the "god of medicine" for achieving a great deal in various medical fields. However, once she went too far and managed to bring someone back from the dead, which really pissed off Zeus. He claimed that she disrupted the laws of nature, so she has never tried reviving the dead again. But it's not clear if she stopped because he told her to, or if becoming a god made her start following the laws of nature herself.
198.name: Asclepius

skill.description: Restores {value} HP to 2 allies with the lowest percentage of HP and cures them of all negative status effects.
skill.name: Medical Goddess's Pride

abilities.description: Reduces 40% of DMG taken and slowly restores HP over time when near death.
abilities.name: Auto-Submersible

abilities.description: Increases 20% of Skill DMG.
abilities.name: Captain's Strength

199.description:
"My ship can go anywhere, even the bottom of the sea!"
The spirit of a ghost ship on the prowl. She is the ship itself, so she can go wherever she wishes. She enjoys using this during battle to really mess with her foes. And even though she's the only one aboard, she NEVER gets lonely. The last person who suggested that ended up at the bottom of the ocean...
199.name: Ghost Ship

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to 2 enemies (ranged priority).
skill.name: To Davy Jones' Locker

abilities.description: Increases 25% of skill DMG by Divina team members.
abilities.name: A Saint's Prayer

abilities.description: Increases 45% of DMG dealt.
abilities.name: Unwavering Faith

1991.description:
"Let us pray. Let us atone for all that has been done in our names."
A veritable saint, she witnessed the resurrection of the one she served. Since then, she has suffered all manner of lies and aspersions cast on her character. She still prays for peace and justice to reign. These prayers ensure that the faith her master taught her never wavers.
1991.name: Mary Magdalene

skill.description: Can be used as bond and in guild conquest.
skill.name: Glory of Redemption

abilities.description: 50% chances of restoring HP to skill targets by 100%.
abilities.name: Phantom Thief

abilities.description: All Phantasma team members deal 30% more DMG.
abilities.name: Gift Swap

1992.description:
"Sorry! I'm not quite what I seem!"
The last ghost anyone wants to encounter at this time of year. She rifles through the stacks of presents delivered by Santa Claus, takes the ones she wants, and replaces them with fake gift boxes with nasty surprises inside. Known by some as the Phantom Thief, she is unmistakably a real pain.
1992.name: Sacred Mimic

skill.description: Restores {value} HP to ally with the highest ATK, increases {delay1} crit rate to target for a limited time.
skill.name: Surprise, Surprise

abilities.description: Reduces 40% of DMG taken at the start of the final wave.
abilities.name: Dreams Come True

1993.description:
"Take whichever one you like!"
A spirit that was formed from the mountains of presents under Christmas trees around the world. She symbolizes the hopes and dreams of every child. Although she embodies so many things, she takes the form of an individual female ghost. She appears to them in the form that each child desires.
1993.name: Gift Box

skill.description: Can be used as bond and in guild conquest.
skill.name: Merry Time

abilities.description: Increases 23% of skill DMG dealt by Divina team members at the start of the final wave.
abilities.name: Gorgeous Decorations

1994.description:
"Hee hee hee! I look pretty cute, wouldn't you say?"
A sprite born from a festive fir tree. She loves being draped in flashing lights, and is insanely enthusiastic about anything remotely shiny. If it's gaudy, glitzy or garish, you can rest assured that she's all over it. No one gives her the time of day once January rolls around, so she has to take her chance to show off while she can.
1994.name: Fir Tree Sprite

skill.description: Can be used as bond and in guild conquest.
skill.name: Glitzy Lights

abilities.description: Restores 3% HP every 5 seconds.
abilities.name: Full of Goodwill

1995.description:
"Sorry! I just can't fit any more in!"
A ghost who aims to cater to the expectations of children during the festive season. She's the stand-by of choice in the world of socks. She's folded away, worn by no one, for the whole year, then she comes into her own at Christmas. She loves to really sock it to you by being jam-packed with a jaw-dropping selection of presents. She's the ghost who keeps on giving.

changes.new: 1 events (added: 172)
changes.old: 0 events

1995.name: Wish-Filled Stocking

skill.description: Can be used as bond and in guild conquest.
skill.name: Countless Gifts

abilities.description: All Divina team members deal 5% more DMG.
abilities.name: Maiden's Prayer

from_description.event_name: Outbreak! A Day of Battle in Shinjuku!

2.description:
"I will build and protect a future for everyone."
A soldier who captured the hearts of a generation with her charisma and mystique. Perhaps because of her heroic yet untimely death she developed a bit of a sarcastic streak as a spirit, and she tends to poke fun at people. But now that the heresy has been cleared from her name, she's giving her cynical side a rest. Instead she just feels deep pride over being the first national beauty of France.
[Event] Outbreak! A Day of Battle in Shinjuku!
2.name: Joan of Arc

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to all enemies.
skill.name: Holy Knight's Oath

20.description:
"You got anything I can cut?"
The spirit of what some say is the finest sword ever made. Whenever he gets excited he tends to start randomly cutting things. Even if it's Christmas Eve, once his adrenaline gets going he just loses himself and starts slashing through everything in the Bureau of the Occult -- the walls, the ceiling, desks, everything. He's built up a big tab for all the things he's destroyed, so he's not in a position to stand up against Mikado. He works with them as best he can, and uses the payment from the Bureau of the Occult to pay off his debt.
20.name: Meito Kotetsu

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to current target.
skill.name: Cut Up

abilities.description: Reduces 15% of DMG taken and restores 2% HP every 5 seconds.
abilities.name: Millennia of Experience

200.description:
"Um, you know I've lived hundreds of times longer than you, right?"
The spirit of the largest yakushima cedar in Japan, thought to be as much as 3,000 years old. However, her appearance changes only once every 1,000 years, and until recently she looked like a tottering old woman. But no one noticed when she changed this time, not even the spirit agent with whom she had a contract...
200.name: Jomon Sugi

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to further enemies; decreases targets' speed by {delay1} for a limited time.
skill.name: Deep Roots

201.description:
"Awaiting your instructions, m'lord."
The spirit of a folding fan used by women in the Imperial Court on formal occasions. Popular ones are said to resemble the owner in some way. Unlike many spirits, she doesn't have any weird hobbies or eccentric tastes; she's just beautiful. If she has any flaw, it's that she looks after every single thing for her master, so any spirit agent would eventually become incapable of self-maintenance after spending too long with her.
201.name: Akome Ogi

skill.description: Restores {value} HP to a random ally. Target deals {delay1} more DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: Akome's Dance

abilities.description: Increases 25% of DMG dealt when another angel is on the team.
abilities.name: Commander

from_description.event_name: A New Year's Tale of Laziness

202.description:
"Beat the heck out of whoever defies us. It's as simple as that."
The spirit of an archangel who commands hundreds of thousands of other angels. She is the commander of the heavenly executioners who eliminate the adversaries of the gods. Most of the angels she leads are warlike and rowdy, giving her trouble daily. Other angels are nice to her, maybe because they feel sorry for her rather than fear her. The truth is, however, she doesn't feel sorry for herself, saying that seeing some action refreshes her, being so bellicose herself.
[Event] A New Year's Tale of Laziness
202.name: Camael

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to the enemy with the lowest HP.
skill.name: Angel of Destruction

abilities.description: Skill attacks have 50% chances of inflicting Virulent Poison.
abilities.name: Perversity

from_description.event_name: A New Year's Tale of Laziness

203.description:
"You WANT me to play a trick on you? You're odd."
A spirit who used to play tricks on people using her ability to read minds. She once played the trick of hiding a child and ended up being frantically chased by the demon mother searching for her child. Since then, she has rarely played any tricks, maybe because she learned she shouldn't do things others don't want her to do. Now, she works for the Bureau of the Occult to prevent malicious mischief, making use of her observational skills.
[Special Bond] Increases Hariti's speed.
[Event] A New Year's Tale of Laziness

203.name: Amanojaku

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to the enemy with the most HP. Targets take {delay1} more DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: Mind-Reading Strike

abilities.description: Increases 20% of Skill DMG.
abilities.name: Esoterica Sword

from_description.event_name: A New Year's Tale of Laziness

204.description:
"I'm training hard...so I can slash that rogue down!"
The spirit of a great swordsman who is famous for a duel on Ganryu Island. Once every several years, he fights another duel with Miyamoto Musashi, whom he fought to the death during their lifetime. They don't remember how many duels they've had, but each has had an even number of wins and losses. To avoid his disciples, he disguises himself by wearing modern clothes, which he has come to love for their form and function.
[Event] A New Year's Tale of Laziness
204.name: Sasaki Kojiro

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to an enemy (ranged priority).
skill.name: Swallow Reversal Technique

from_description.event_name: A New Year's Tale of Laziness

205.description:
"I explode, therefore I am!"
The spirit of a firecracker that makes lots of loud noises. Dedicated to making as much noise as possible with firecrackers, she appears out of nowhere to cause a commotion around Lunar New Year. She carries various firecrackers, ranging in size from very large to very small. She says, with the regulations getting stricter, she needs different firecrackers for different situations. She sure loves to explode them, but she's unexpectedly considerate when it comes to cleaning up after herself or being careful of reverberations.
[Event] A New Year's Tale of Laziness
205.name: Firecracker

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to a wide area of enemies.
skill.name: Super Firecracker Palooza

abilities.description: Increases 50% of Crit DMG.
abilities.name: Demon Prince

abilities.description: Increases 20% of DMG dealt when Shuten Doji is on the team.
abilities.name: Shuten Doji's Right Hand

from_description.event_name: A New Year's Tale of Laziness

206.description:
"How do you like this getup? Not bad, huh?"
Shuten Doji's right-hand man. A pretty famous spirit in the demon world. Coming to town on an assignment by direct order of Shuten Doji, he let his hair down and changed his clothes there, perhaps influenced by the evil energy of laziness. It's a secret that he was making merry and neglecting his duties for a while.
[Event] A New Year's Tale of Laziness
206.name: Ibaraki Doji [Lunar New Year]

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to all enemies, with a {probability} of inflicting Silence.
skill.name: Demonic Dance

abilities.description: Increases 5% of the EXP gained from battle.
abilities.name: Visiting God

from_description.event_name: A New Year's Tale of Laziness

207.description:
"Here I am to bring happiness to everyone."
A spirit who visits every home at the beginning of the New Year. One of the many visiting gods. Chronos is her colleague, and his time-controlling power makes it possible for gods such as her to visit every home in a seemingly short time. Despite her very young look, she is attentive and dependable, and even Chronos, who is critical of everyone, trusts her. Some say she has the emotional maturity of Mikado (when Mikado is being serious and reliable, that is).
[Event] A New Year's Tale of Laziness
207.name: Wakatoshi

skill.description: Restores {value} HP to 2 allies with the lowest percentage of HP. Targets receive {delay1} less DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: Bringer of Happiness

abilities.description: Decreases 7% of the ATK speed of all foes at the start of each wave.
abilities.name: Ruler of Sloth

abilities.description: Increases 20% of Skill DMG.
abilities.name: The Seven Sins

from_description.event_name: A New Year's Tale of Laziness

208.description:
"Pay more attention to me...or else..."
The spirit of the demon of sloth, one of the seven deadly sins. She herself is an out-and-out lazybones, and spares no effort in being lazy. She works for Chronos, however, and, having someone have hopes for her for the first time, she tries to measure up to his expectations. Lately, however, she has become emotionally dependent on him.
[Event] A New Year's Tale of Laziness
208.name: Belphegor

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to the 3 enemies with the highest ATK.
skill.name: Deadly Sin "Sloth"

abilities.description: Increases 10% of the ATK speed of all allies at the start of the final wave.
abilities.name: Space-Time Continuum Manipulation

abilities.description: Increases 10% of battle time limit.
abilities.name: God of Time

from_description.event_name: A New Year's Tale of Laziness

209.description:
"What am I going to do with her?"
The spirit of the god of time. Because his power is too great, he uses an old clock as a physical representation of his presence, to hold his power in check. If he were to show his true self, as the god of time, he would be able to use unspeakable power. He's not willing to do that, however, saying that his present power is just enough. Since the incident in Chinatown, his relationship with Belphegor has been restored, and now he is attentive and caring towards her (or, more like, they have more time to spend together so he has no choice but to pay attention to her?).
[Special Bond] Increases Belphegor's speed.
[Event] A New Year's Tale of Laziness

209.name: Old Clock Chronus

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to 2 enemies (melee priority), and removes all buffs from the targets.
skill.name: Space-Time Continuum Acceleration

abilities.description: Restores 2% of HP every 5 seconds.
abilities.name: Blood of Legend

21.description:
"Just what do you think I am?"
She may resemble something else, but don't be so fast to judge a book by its cover. A strange spirit who looks like an animal but isn't. She's the incarnation of a dragon. When she has spare time, she likes to fly around in the air looking for men she likes. But when she finds one she doesn't do anything. She just watches him.
21.name: Elaphure

skill.description: Restores {value} HP; increases DEF by {delay1} for a limited time.
skill.name: Storm Dragon Transformation

abilities.description: Skill attacks have a 50% of inflicting Paralysis.
abilities.name: Prank-lover

abilities.description: Skill attacks by Phantasma team members have 15% chances of inflicting Paralysis.
abilities.name: Malicious Deity

210.description:
"Leave it to me, and I promise you'll be fully entertained!"
The spirit of a trickster god from Norse mythology. He's a professional when it comes to copying someone's appearance and voice—even family members and close relatives can't tell the difference. His skills were displayed at their fullest when he took on Mikado's form one time. Weeks went by without anyone noticing a thing. Then Mikado showed up just at the moment when he finally revealed himself, almost as if to take his place. She looked very pleased with him for some reason, and also much more tan than before...
210.name: Loki

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to the enemy with the most HP, with a {probability} of inflicting Burn.
skill.name: First Joke in Ages

abilities.description: Increases 30% of Crit DMG.
abilities.name: Artistic Genius

abilities.description: Increases 20% of DMG dealt and slightly reduces DMG taken.
abilities.name: Multi-Talented

211.description:
"Please don't tell anyone about this."
The spirit of the Renaissance Period's most famous and multi-talented artist. Everyone calls him a genius, and he has to admit they're right. They say he was even involved with the founding of the Bureau. Recently he's been getting into doll-making. He even made a doll for the Bureau, but it didn't work out too well and he ended up getting kicked out of the support item development team. That's why he started to receive random assignments. But in the meantime he continues gathering parts to tries to improve his creations.
211.name: Leonardo Da Vinci

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to the enemy with the highest ATK, with a {probability} of inflicting Paralysis.
skill.name: A Genius's Struggle

abilities.description: Reduces 20% of DMG taken.
abilities.name: Power of Delusion

212.description:
"Kidnapping?! I'd never do such a thing! I was just thinking about it, that's all!"
The spirit of a mythological Chinese beast that captured humans. Now that she's a spirit, she stopped kidnapping people altogether. Instead, she just puts them in an altered state where they gain supernatural powers of concentration and don't respond to anything around them. As the effect gets more extreme, so does the look on her face. Needless to say, most people keep their distance from her when she's using her powers.
212.name: Ubume

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to all enemies. Targets take {delay1} more DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: State of Delusion

213.description:
"Think you can get past me, eh?"
A spirit that blocks people with an invisible wall. The wall is really strong, so getting past it is tough no matter how skillful you might be. But it only lasts as long as she can hold her breath, so it's actually easy if you wait long enough. She tends to feel intimidated when facing a large group, so lately she's been practicing how to hold her breath for a long time without losing focus.
213.name: Nurikabe

skill.description: Reduces {delay1} DMG taken by all allies for a limited time.
skill.name: Invisible Barrier

214.description:
"I'm more than just your average natural phenomenon!"
A spirit who has the ability to create light pillars. She can make them from any source of light, natural or artificial. In the past, she would call on her wellspring of spiritual power to create light pillars so strong they would light up the night sky bright red on almost a daily basis. However, as the millennia passed, her spiritual power began to run low, so she's had to be more careful with its use. Sometimes she breaks the rules and makes the odd light pillar here and there, but no one really knows why.
214.name: Light Pillar

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to 3 enemies (melee priority), with a {probability} of inflicting Stun.
skill.name: Sun and Moon

abilities.description: Reduces 5% DMG dealt by all foes at the start of each wave.
abilities.name: Sensory Deprivation

abilities.description: 24% chances of inflicting Silence on all foes at the start of each wave.
abilities.name: Sealer of Gods

215.description:
"I'm at home in the peace and quiet."
The spirit of the mythological cave into which the sun goddess once fled. To lure her out all the other gods caused a big ruckus partying outside the cave, which must have been pretty annoying to Ama-no-Iwato since he likes things to be quiet. After becoming a spirit, he gave up on caves, and now spends all his time anywhere he can find that's nice and quiet.
215.name: Amano-Iwato

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to all enemies, with a {probability} of inflicting Silence.
skill.name: World Without Light

abilities.description: Increases 20% of Skill DMG.
abilities.name: Explosive Powder

216.description:
"Be more careful? But everything happens so fast during an explosion!"
The spirit of everyone's favorite explosive powder. She's certainly a formidable foe in battle, but she tends to scare people with her words more than anything else. She has this crazy theory that as long as she warns people in advance, she can't be blamed for any damage caused by a bombing. So she goes around joking about setting off bombs all the time, and no one ever knows if she's for real or not...
216.name: Nitroglycerin

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to further enemies, with a {probability} of inflicting Burn.
skill.name: Little Miss Bomber

abilities.description: Normal attacks have 5% chances of inflicting Stun.
abilities.name: Staff Master

217.description:
"I bet YOUR staff can't do this!"
The spirit of a staff that can expand and contract at the will of its owner. She's famous for being the favorite weapon of Sun Wukong, but she never liked how he always got all the attention, so now she set out to make a name for herself and started entering regional contests. They always introduce her as Sun Wukong's "toy," which makes her really angry, but this anger is what motivates her to keep training hard every day.
217.name: Ruyi Bang

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to the row of enemies directly in front.
skill.name: Dancing Cudgel

abilities.description: Skill attacks have 46% chances of inflicting Paralysis for a short time and increasing 10% DMG taken by the target for a limited time.
abilities.name: Thunder Cutter

218.description:
"I can cut anything. I don't care what it is, I'll cut it!"
The spirit of the sword that was used to defeat the thunder god. Afterwards she got a lot of praise and became famous under a different name. However, as a spirit she prefers her original name. This is because her master was gravely injured when attacking the thunder god, and she has felt bad about it ever since. She plans to keep using the name "Chidori" until the thunder god is defeated without injury.
218.name: Chidori

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to current target.
skill.name: Thunder God Killer

abilities.description: Deals 22% more DMG.
abilities.name: Elephantine Strength

estimate.note: Auctions typically start on the 15th, ~7 months after event

2182.description:
"It's all about the circus! Anything else is irrelephant!"
The ghost of a well-trained circus elephant. She tends to make bad elephant jokes, especially when she gets excited. She's a bit clumsy, too, and steps on a few toes now and then.
[Event] Greatest Show On Earth
2182.name: Circus Elephant

skill.description: Can be used as bond and in guild conquest.
skill.name: Thousand-Ton Press

abilities.description: Increases 6% of ATK speed of all allies.(only take effect once to the team)
abilities.name: Gunpowder Boost

estimate.note: Auctions typically start on the 15th, ~7 months after event

2183.description:
"Here we gooooooooo!"
The ghost of a cannon that fires human cannonballs. A spring is used to propel the person into the air, as gunpowder explodes for effect. She says that, with enough force, a human can be shot across an entire continent, but her claim remains unverified.
[Event] Greatest Show On Earth
2183.name: Human Cannon

skill.description: Can be used as bond and in guild conquest.
skill.name: Zero-Range Fire

abilities.description: Reduces 4% of DMG dealt by all foes at the start of each wave.
abilities.name: Yūgen Beauty

estimate.note: Auctions typically start on the 15th, ~7 months after event

2184.description:
"A circus, eh? Hmm. Interesting."
When the ghost of this great Noh theater playwright and actor heard of this particular form of entertainment for the masses, she rushed to see it. She was especially impressed with the circus clowns, and was apparently inspired by the stark white and bright red of their makeup.
[Event] Greatest Show On Earth
2184.name: Zeami Motokiyo

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to all enemies, with a {probability} of inflicting Silence.
skill.name: Fūshikaden

abilities.description: Reduces 35% the DMG taken by skill targets.
abilities.name: Ringmaster's Dignity

abilities.description: Increases 35% of Crit DMG by the 2 allies with the highest ATK.
abilities.name: Lion Tamer

estimate.note: Auctions typically start on the 15th, ~7 months after event

2185.description:
"I'm looking forward to seeing the circus of this new era!"
The ghost of the ringmaster of a circus company that travels all over the world. Earlier in her career, she was an unparalleled clown and lion tamer and a brilliant performer in her own right. She led her circus troupe for many years, but then finally stepped down after finding a talented successor.
[Event] Greatest Show On Earth
2185.name: Harlequin

skill.description: Restores {value} HP to 2 allies with the highest ATK, increases {delay1} crit rate to target for a limited time.
skill.name: Beast Clutches

abilities.description: Increases 20% of skill DMG of all anima allies.
abilities.name: Land of Gold

abilities.description: At the start of the final wave, all foes take 25% more damage.
abilities.name: Strange Tales

estimate.note: Auctions typically start on the 15th, ~7 months after event

2186.description:
"I have lots more tales to tell of the Far East!"
The ghost of a book detailing the adventures of a famed explorer in the Orient. On a subsequent trip to the Far East, he ran into a circus troupe and observed their performance. He is now apparently planning to write a new book with exaggerated tales of what he witnessed. Unfortunately, there still seems to be plenty of gullible folks willing to believe his every word.
[Event] Greatest Show On Earth
2186.name: Il Milione [Circus]

skill.description: Increases Crit Rate to all allies by {delay1} for a limited time.
skill.name: Very Tall Tale

abilities.description: When HP is 1/2 or less, Increases 42% of DMG dealt.
abilities.name: Beast's Instinct

estimate.note: Auctions typically start on the 15th, ~7 months after event

2187.description:
"Roooooooar!"
The ghost of a lion tamed by Harlequin. People originally thought that it was Löwe the Clown who had mastery over the beast, but it was always really Harlequin who was in control. It just goes to show what a truly skillful lion tamer Harlequin is.
[Event] Greatest Show On Earth
2187.name: Lion Clown [Wild]

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to nearby enemies.
skill.name: Riot

abilities.description: Increases 38% of skill DMG.
abilities.name: Playwright Master

estimate.note: Auctions typically start on the 15th, ~7 months after event

2188.description:
"What a glorious stage!"
The ghost of the great dramatist of Japanese joruri puppet theater and kabuki plays. He heard of a new and unusual form of entertainment called the circus, and, full of curiosity, rushed to see it. He was so greatly impressed with the dynamic flamboyance of the show that he left before it was over to start work on his next creation.
[Event] Greatest Show On Earth
2188.name: Chikamatsu Monzaemon

skill.description: Can be used as bond and in guild conquest.
skill.name: Love Suicide

abilities.description: Increases 18% of max HP of all allies.
abilities.name: New Ringmaster

estimate.note: Auctions typically start on the 15th, ~7 months after event

2189.description:
"Welcome to our great show!"
The new ringmaster of a circus company that travels all over the world. At first, she felt burdened by her new role, but after a certain incident, she experienced personal growth and began to embrace her destiny. Many believe that, at this rate, she may even surpass the great Harlequin one day.
[Event] Greatest Show On Earth
2189.name: Löwe the Clown

skill.description: Increases DMG dealt by all allies by {delay1} for a limited time.
skill.name: Beast Menace

abilities.description: Absorbs 15% of DMG dealt as HP.
abilities.name: Holy Relic

abilities.description: Normal attacks have 25% chances of inflicting Burn.
abilities.name: Holy Lance

219.description:
"Are you disappointed to find out someone like me is one of the Twelve Heavenly Generals?"
The spirit of a lance that pierced the side of a holy man and touched his blood long ago. She has capabilities worthy of the name "Holy Lance," yet she always seems to lack confidence. When granted a piece of Spirit Gear, she didn't accept it, but the gesture made her look humble for someone with such great power, and she was essentially forced to become one of the Twelve Heavenly Generals. She is one of the ones with the most potential, but her lack of confidence prevents her from bringing out her true power.
219.name: Longinus

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to current target.
skill.name: Piercing Holy Lance

abilities.description: Increases 10% of skill DMG dealt at the start of each wave.
abilities.name: Veteran's Wisdom

abilities.description: Increases 15% of Max HP.
abilities.name: Red Armor

estimate.note: Auctions typically start on the 15th, ~7 months after event

2190.description:
"Tut, tut. What ever are we going to do with that ringmaster?"
The ghost of a red grizzly. Her name comes from her hair, which gives her the appearance of wearing a red battle helm. She is one of the longest-serving members of the circus company, and acts as a sort of adviser to the troupe.
[Event] Greatest Show On Earth
2190.name: Russet Helm

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to all enemies.
skill.name: Great Bear

abilities.description: Increases 25% of DMG dealt by Anima team members at the start of the final wave.(only take effect once to the team)
abilities.name: Fiery Heart

estimate.note: Auctions typically start on the 15th, ~7 months after event

2191.description:
"Let it burn!"
The Anima of a blazing circle of fire. She's ordinarily quite fiery and hot-blooded, even to the point of being somewhat overbearing, but when her flames subside, her passion bottoms out, too. Some would even say she suffers from bipolar mood swings.
2191.name: Ring of Fire

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to 3 enemies (ranged priority), with a {probability} of inflicting Burn.
skill.name: Scorching Moonring

abilities.description: Increases 20% of Crit Rate.
abilities.name: Kabukimono

abilities.description: Increases 15% of DMG dealt.
abilities.name: Best in Sengoku

estimate.note: Auctions typically start on the 15th, ~7 months after event

2192.description:
"Ah! You see? This is why I can never give this life up!"
An eccentric character who can often be found trawling red-light districts. When he caught wind that an outrageously flamboyant show was coming to town, he was so excited he couldn't sleep. Completely enthralled by the circus, he even went around in a clown costume for a while.
[Event] Greatest Show On Earth
2192.name: Maeda Toshimasu [Circus]

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to all enemies.
skill.name: Show Time

abilities.description: Skill attacks increase target's ATK speed by 42%.
abilities.name: Perfect Stunt

estimate.note: Auctions typically start on the 15th, ~7 months after event

2193.description:
"Did you ever see a stunt like this?"
The ghost of a circus pony whose specialty is stunt-riding tricks. She and her rider are so in tune that there's never a slip-up no matter what tricky pose the rider attempts. She is devoted to practicing, and is fairly humble to boot. When it comes to the day of a show, however, she can become quite nervous and get a little out of control. But that's when her hours of practice kick in, and she always manages to give a flawless performance.
[Event] Greatest Show On Earth
2193.name: Trick Pony

skill.description: Can be used as bond and in guild conquest.
skill.name: Phantom Ride

abilities.description: All Phantasma team members deal 5% more DMG.
abilities.name: Competitive Spirit

2194.description:
"Someday... I'll do it someday...!"
A tamer of fierce animals, she is one of the newer members of the circus troupe. Her ability is undisputed, but she tends to be overshadowed by Löwe the Clown, and secretly considers her a rival. Perhaps this sort of competitive rivalry is really what's behind all of the circus troupe's successes?
2194.name: Beast Tamer

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to all enemies. Targets take {delay1} more DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: Wildebeest Migration

abilities.description: Increases 25% of ATK speed.
abilities.name: Flying Trapeze

estimate.note: Auctions typically start on the 15th, ~7 months after event

2195.description:
"Wheeeee!"
The Anima of a flying circus trapeze. Her breathtaking flights through the air are a featured attraction of the circus. But, truth be told, breakneak speeds are a little outside of her comfort zone, and she often feels quite nervous.
[Event] Greatest Show On Earth
2195.name: Circus Trapeze

skill.description: Can be used as bond and in guild conquest.
skill.name: Jet Swing

abilities.description: Increases 50% of Crit DMG.
abilities.name: Nine Lives

2196.description:
"You know, I think this world suits me just fine!"
A cat sprite originally from Scotland. Always a lover of pranks, jokes and japes, the fact that circus performers actually get paid for this stuff has come as a revelation to her. Rumors that she has cut some kind of secret deal with the circus troupe remain unconfirmed.
2196.name: Cat Sith [Circus]

skill.description: Can be used as bond and in guild conquest.
skill.name: Feline Feat

abilities.description: Increases 15% of DMG dealt when one of the Four Heavenly Kings of Raiko is on the team.
abilities.name: Four Heavenly Kings of Raiko

22.description:
"You mean there is someone stronger than me?"
A great hero known as one of the Four Heavenly Kings of Raiko who saved the capital from evil. The spirit's trademark is his height. His reputation comes from his superhuman strength. He can wield a hundred class war axe with one hand. He was an orphan and grew up in the woods with animals. But his former home is now all gone, and his friends have migrated to other places.
22.name: Kintaro

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to surrounding enemies, with a {probability} of inflicting Stun to targets.
skill.name: Great Blade of Magic

abilities.description: Increases 20% of DMG taken by skill targets.
abilities.name: Cursed Doll

estimate.note: Auctions typically start on the 15th, ~7 months after event

220.description:
"Um...just a minute, please!"
The spirit of a Japanese doll with hair that actually grows. The elaborate workmanship of this doll was unexpectedly ill-received, and it gained a reputation for being cursed. Because of the well-known rumor of the doll's hair growing, the spirit's hair keeps growing, too, and it takes up a lot of her time caring for it every day. If she skips even one day, it's enough to make her unrecognizable.
[Event] The Spirits' Doll Festival
220.name: Okiku

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to 2 enemies (melee priority).
skill.name: Horror Story of Okiku

abilities.description: Restores 1% HP to Festival Doll team members every 5 seconds.
abilities.name: Festival Doll Imperial Guard

abilities.description: All melee foes take 4% more DMG at the start of each wave.
abilities.name: Red Carpet

estimate.note: Auctions typically start on the 15th, ~7 months after event

221.description:
"In the name of the Imperial Guard, I vow to protect you!"
The spirit of the red-carpeted stand upon which the dolls are arranged during the Doll Festival. Also a proud member of the Festival Doll Imperial Guard, he does everything from serving as a bodyguard to the festival dolls, to helping prepare the festival itself. He is so competent that he's handling the preparation of this year's historically large-scale Doll Festival with the help of only a few others.
[Event] The Spirits' Doll Festival
221.name: Scarlet Stand

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to nearby enemies.
skill.name: Crimson Hammer

abilities.description: Reduces 10% of DMG taken and restores 7.5% HP every 5 seconds.
abilities.name: Beautiful Princess

estimate.note: Auctions typically start on the 15th, ~7 months after event

222.description:
"I will let her know how I feel one day."
The spirit of a beautiful princess who has overcome a witch's assassination attempts many times. She wanders around from place to place, looking for the witch who tried to kill her. Following the witch's trail, she has come to stay at the Bureau of the Occult for a time. She has something she desperately wants to tell the witch, and has been looking for her for a long time.
[Special Bond] Increases DMG dealt by Witch Ravenna.
[Event] The Spirits' Doll Festival

222.name: Snow White

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to current target.
skill.name: White Snow Sword Dance

estimate.note: Auctions typically start on the 15th, ~7 months after event

223.description:
"We might as well drink together, don't you think?"
A water spirit, one of the four main elementals. Most of her body is made up of liquid. Once this liquid was pure water, but due to an unparalleled love of liquor, she is now mostly made of alcohol. She was originally a spirit of good lineage, but an unrequited love drove her to drink and made her into what she is today.
[Event] The Spirits' Doll Festival
223.name: Undine

skill.description: Restores {value} HP to all allies.
skill.name: Torrent of Booze

estimate.note: Auctions typically start on the 15th, ~7 months after event

224.description:
"Is there anything you'd like to know?"
The spirit of a mirror that speaks only the truth. As rumors of her abilities spread, many came to ask her questions day and night. After answering thousands of questions a day, she finally got sick of it and turned lazy. If you depend on her too much, she'll use your weak points against you. She is obedient only to the witch.
[Event] The Spirits' Doll Festival
224.name: Magic Mirror

skill.description: Increases DMG taken by current target by {delay1} for a limited time.
skill.name: Foe's Weak Point

abilities.description: Increases 15% of Crit DMG by Festival Doll team members.
abilities.name: Festival Doll

estimate.note: Auctions typically start on the 15th, ~7 months after event

225.description:
"Where is this cur that is bothering Lady Ohina?"
The spirit of one of the dolls put on display during the Doll Festival. The spirit of the Minister of the Left, which is displayed on the fourth tier of the Doll Festival stand. Her job is to guard Ohina and Odairi, but she is so infatuated with Ohina that she doesn't seem to care for Odairi very much, and has a sharp attitude toward him.
[Event] The Spirits' Doll Festival
225.name: Minister Ichikami

skill.description: Restores {value} HP to 2 allies (ranged priority). Targets receive {delay1} less DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: Consummate Guard

abilities.description: Increases 15% of Crit DMG by Festival Doll team members.
abilities.name: Festival Doll

estimate.note: Auctions typically start on the 15th, ~7 months after event

226.description:
"I'd do anything for someone important to me."
The spirit of one of the dolls put on display during the Doll Festival. The Emperor, one of the two dolls on the top tier of the Doll Festival stand. His love for Ohina is true, but he's too shy to express it. He says his actions should speak louder than words. Ohina's possessiveness was starting to bother him, but as he realized the importance of letting his true feelings be known, their relationship got better.
[Special Bond] Increases Ohina's skill DMG.
[Event] The Spirits' Doll Festival

226.name: Odairi

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to a wide area of enemies.
skill.name: Doll Festival Sword Dance

abilities.description: Reduces 10% of DMG taken and restores 2.5% HP every 5 seconds.
abilities.name: Beautiful Princess

abilities.description: Normal attacks have 30% chances of inflicting Silence.
abilities.name: Beautiful Witch

estimate.note: Auctions typically start on the 15th, ~7 months after event

227.description:
"It feels strange, protecting love for once..."
The spirit of a witch who was fixated on beauty. Betrayed by her husband, she started to hate love, and went on a mission to wipe all love from the face of the earth. But after witnessing unbreakable, true love, she finally admitted her error—though not without plenty of fuss. Nowadays she fights to protect love even more fiercely than she destroyed it in the past, so that she can become a mother her daughter can be proud of.
[Special Bond] Increases DMG dealt by Snow White.
[Event] The Spirits' Doll Festival

227.name: Witch Ravenna

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to the enemy with the highest ATK. Target deals {delay1} less DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: Poison Apple Temptation

abilities.description: Increases 30% of Crit DMG by all Anima team members.
abilities.name: Festival Doll

abilities.description: Increases 35% of DMG dealt by Anima team members when this daemon is Team Leader.
abilities.name: Ohina

estimate.note: Auctions typically start on the 15th, ~7 months after event

228.description:
"With you, Odairi, I'd go anywhere."
The spirit of one of the dolls put on display during the Doll Festival. The Empress, one of the two dolls on the top tier of the Doll Festival stand. Since the incident, her ties with Odairi have deepened, and they learned how to truly care for one another. But, lately, some of their doll friends have been complaining to Odairi that Ohina just can't stop talking about how happy they are together.
[Special Bond] Increases Odairi's max HP.
[Event] The Spirits' Doll Festival
