228.name: Ohina

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to all enemies; decreases targets' speed by {delay1} for a limited time.
skill.name: Doll Festival Dance

abilities.description: Skill attacks have 20% chances of inflicting Stun.
abilities.name: Grimoire

abilities.description: All melee allies absorb 5% of DMG dealt as HP.
abilities.name: Lesser Key of Solomon

229.description:
"Which book would you like today?"
The spirit of five combined magic books on angels and demons. Each of the five books is incredibly powerful, so since becoming a spirit, she has kept them in separate locations. She can use the power of any of the books, but each book has a will of its own, so it's more like she asks them to lend her their power. Controlling the power is difficult, and if she mishandles it, the angels and demons come together and start fighting, and all chaos breaks loose.
229.name: Lemegeton

skill.description: Increases DMG taken by all enemies by {delay1} for a limited time.
skill.name: Goetia's Wave

23.description:
"We must always be prepared for the worst, yes?"
A spirit who charms men and leads them around like puppies. A master of the dark arts. She acts all innocent but behind the scenes she does some nasty stuff. She doesn't think twice about ruining the life of a guy who falls for her. There seems to be a reason why she keeps doing such horrible things... The darkness in her heart runs deep.
23.name: Diaochan

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to the 2 enemies with the highest ATK. Targets deal {delay1} less DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: Temptation

abilities.description: Increases 20% of the EXP gained from battle.
abilities.name: Troubadour

230.description:
"Shall I play you a song?"
A poet and musician who traveled around the underworld. The sound of his lyre, which he learned to play from Apollo, is said to heal all beings in the underworld. He was once deeply traumatized by a cruel group of women with whom he had a disagreement. However, he was able to turn even this experience into inspiration for his music and keep offering support to the downtrodden. Lately he's been holding recitals all across the lands.
230.name: Orpheus

skill.description: Increases DMG dealt by all allies by {delay1} for a limited time.
skill.name: Poem of Fortitude

abilities.description: Increases 10% of Max HP.
abilities.name: Ghoulish Body

abilities.description: Restores 5% HP every 5 seconds.
abilities.name: Ghoul Queen

231.description:
"Omigosh, this is the best food EVER!"
The spirit of a ghoul who's like a queen among flesh-eating monsters. Her favorite food is fermented meat. She used to eat it three times a day, but with her huge appetite she eventually ran out. That's when she started to consider the unthinkable: eating dead and decaying flesh. However, she knew that it was strictly forbidden, and promised herself she'd never go there. But she can barely fight when she's hungry, so lately she's been in search of a new food that can satisfy her appetite.
231.name: Ghoula

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to current target. Target receives {delay1} more DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: Ghoul Power

abilities.description: Increases 20% of DMG dealt.
abilities.name: Sundown

232.description:
"I'm not the old me anymore!"
The spirit of a legendary Chinese hero's beloved bow, who has undergone intense training to improve her mental capabilities. She has the same issues as ever, but now it takes a little more to set her off. Her secret to success was working as the assistant to a certain popstar group of elves. From the very get go she was getting into trouble every other minute, but this helped her develop nerves and will of steel. Now she's known for cheering the group on with her charisma.
232.name: Scarlett Shott [Serious]

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to 2 enemies (ranged priority), with a {probability} of inflicting Burn.
skill.name: The Ninth Arrow

233.description:
"No one can beat me in a bamboo grass tasting contest!"
The spirit of a self-proclaimed "beautiful girl" whose true form is unknown but who takes the form of a giant panda. So, basically like a big panda spirit. None of the other spirits can deny how endearing she is in this form, so she's pretty popular. She's also known to have really high standards when it comes to bamboo. In fact, she was appointed as Bamboo Grass Ambassador and walks around distributing high quality samples. On a side note, she gets angry at the very sight of bamboo grass that doesn't meet her standards.
233.name: Giant Panda

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to current target.
skill.name: Bamboo Blade

abilities.description: Skill attacks have 39% chances of inflicting Poison.
abilities.name: Overflowing Poison

abilities.description: 25% chances of inflicting Poison on all foes at the start of each wave.
abilities.name: Poison Gas Aura

234.description:
"Do you know any nice perfumes?"
The spirit of a demon that spreads noxious miasma. She remembers waking up one day as a spirit, but not much else before that. A strange smell of pencil lead emanates from her body like some sort of decaying miasma. People keep their distance from her because of this, but she doesn't seem to notice or care, which makes things kind of awkward. This is all somehow connected with her past, but she hasn't figured out exactly how.
234.name: Sessho Seki

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to the enemy with the most HP, with a {probability} of inflicting Stun.
skill.name: Death's Embrace

abilities.description: Normal attacks decrease the current target's ATK speed by 15%.
abilities.name: The Spider's Thread

235.description:
"If you're happy, that's all that matters..."
The spirit of a spider woman who used to attack human settlements, possessing and killing young men. Lately she's been doing some soul-searching and decided to devote herself to helping humans instead. In her former life she used to love chasing men, and she still finds herself having salacious thoughts from time to time, but now she has vowed to have more restraint when it comes to the opposite sex. She made this decision after breaking up with a certain man she met...but that's another story.
235.name: Nephila Clavata

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to further enemies; decreases targets' speed by {delay1} for a limited time.
skill.name: Jail of Silk

abilities.description: Immune to Poison.
abilities.name: Unicorn

236.description:
"Is that all you wanted to say?"
The spirit of a unicorn that values reason and justice above all else. Whenever she witnesses quarrel or strife she steps in to mediate using her unique "headbutt" approach. This involves ramming into someone with all her might if they make an illogical argument. It's not the person, but rather what they say that matters—she'll even headbutt Bureau Chief Mikado if she has to! Sometimes she goes too far with the whole self-righteous act, and even she acknowledges that her rigid way of thinking is a slightly simplistic expression of "justice."
236.name: Xiezhi

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to current target.
skill.name: Horn of Justice

237.description:
"I will obtain the strength necessary to protect those I care about!"
A spirit who lives quietly in Japanese homes. She's usually all smiles, and on top of that she brings happiness to the homes where she dwells. However, she got really angry for the first time in her life when a couple of hooligans played a really bad prank on the house where she was staying. This awakened a new power inside her. Embodying an aura of anger, she takes on the form of a dragon to fry her foes. Now she not only brings happiness, but also provides protection.
237.name: Zashiki Bokko [Awakened]

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to 3 enemies (ranged priority).
skill.name: Good Luck Charm

abilities.description: Decreases 20% the ATK speed of all foes.
abilities.name: Anomalous Rain

abilities.description: Increases 75% of skill DMG.
abilities.name: Raining Fish

2370.description:
"What shall I rain down next?"
If it ever rains anything other than rain, snow, or sleet, this spirit is surely somewhere close by. Any rain that passes through her sphere of influence metamorphoses into fish or spears before raining down to the earth.
2370.name: Peculiar Raine

skill.description: Can be used as bond and in guild conquest.
skill.name: Spearstorm

abilities.description: Increases 45% of DMG of the 2 Phantasma team members with highest ATK.
abilities.name: Moon's Blessing

abilities.description: Increases 4% of max HP of Phantasma team members at the start of each wave.
abilities.name: Existential Crisis

2373.description:
"Everyone, stop staring at me! You're making me blush!
The spirit of the magnificent full moon that appears from the 15th to 16th of the 8th month of the lunisolar calendar. She gives off an aura so enchanting no one caught in its glow can look away from her spellbinding glory. But if you look too long, you will inevitably recognize your own insignificance in this universe, forcing you to reconsider your own existence.
2373.name: Harvest Moon

skill.description: Restores {value} HP to all allies. Targets deal {delay1} more DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: Full Moon Energy

abilities.description: Skill attacks have a 100% of inflicting Stun.
abilities.name: Traditional Theft

abilities.description: At the start of the final wave, enemy with the most HP takes 35% more damage.
abilities.name: Swift Moves

2374.description:
"I'll take that, thank you very much!"
This spirit of a dumpling-stealing bandit always appears around the time of autumnal moon viewing in Japan. For the record, she is actually quite welcome to steal on this night, as it is the one time it is permitted for anyone to help themselves to dumplings. It's a tradition that anyone is allowed to pretend they're stealing, you know, just for fun. So if you're looking for crime and drama at a public event, she may let you down. If you do spot her, feel free to give a playful "Lock up your valuables, everyone," but there's no need to call the police.
2374.name: Moon Viewing Pickpocket

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to the 2 enemies with the highest ATK.
skill.name: Dumpling Swiper

abilities.description: Increases 20% of skill DMG.
abilities.name: Harvest Festival

2376.description:
"Nobody harvests 'em like I do!"
A spirit who gathers taro potatoes for the moon viewing. If the harvest yield is high enough around the night of the 15th, she offers up the harvested taro to the moon at a harvest festival. She counts among her friends chestnuts and beans.
2376.name: Tannia

skill.description: Can be used as bond and in guild conquest.
skill.name: Taro Entrée

abilities.description: Restores 9% HP to the ally with the lowest percentage of HP at the start of each wave.
abilities.name: Generous Gift

2377.description:
"I'll put you in a calorie coma!"
The spirit of a Far Eastern treat. She has a sweet tooth, and is particularly generous of heart. She can't help but think the greatest gift is the gift of oneself, so you're likely to find her distributing large quantities of mooncake. She has been known to bake bombs into the cakes as a prank, so double check before taking a bite. Don't eat too many. They're rather calorific.
2377.name: Mooncake

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to 2 enemies (ranged priority), with a {probability} of inflicting Burn.
skill.name: Calorific Terror

abilities.description: Increases 10% of Crit Rate and Crit DMG.
abilities.name: Grand and Luxurious

abilities.description: All Anima team members take 5% less DMG
abilities.name: World Famous Castle

238.description:
"Isn't the design on this shirt just perfect?"
The spirit of the castle where Oda Nobunaga lived. Almost as soon as it was built it it became famous across Japan and even abroad as a grand and luxurious castle. After becoming a spirit she turned into a pure fashionista who prefers foreign brands. When she met Titania they became instant rivals, always competing to see who has the best sense of fashion.
238.name: Azuchi

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to all enemies, with a {probability} of inflicting Burn.
skill.name: Dazzling Inferno

abilities.description: Increases 10% of battle reward drop rate.
abilities.name: Perfect Jade

239.description:
"You have to decide for yourself."
The spirit of a precious jewel that two kings unfairly declared to be a "mere stone." Having her value arbitrarily decided by someone else hurt pretty bad, so she vowed never to treat others in that way. Now when she sees someone behaving in a high-handed manner she is filled with the courage to stand up to them. In the process of doing this she's made a lot of good connections, too. Let's just say she has a really broad network.
239.name: He Shi Bi

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to the enemy with the lowest HP.
skill.name: Rare Jewel

abilities.description: Increases 15% of Crit Rate when Cerberus and Hydra are on the team.
abilities.name: Three Beasts, One Body

24.description:
"Three beasts, one body! That's me, Chimera! Yea!"
The spirit of a high school girl with beast strength in both hands. She forgot her real name, but everyone calls her Chimera because of the way she looks. She's surprisingly cunning, and once she finds someone's weak spot she really likes to jab them there. People say she's like an evil snake in that way. She's really nice to kids, though, and popular with them, too. She's always putting on original improvisational comedy shows with them.
[Special Bond] Increases crit rate of Cerberus.
24.name: Chimera

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to 2 enemies (melee priority).
skill.name: Tragic Pattern

abilities.description: Increases 21% of Crit Rate.
abilities.name: Snake Dragon God

abilities.description: Increases 50% of Crit DMG when Angra Mainyu is on the team.
abilities.name: Imprisoned Dragon

240.description:
"Japan is so awesome!"
The spirit of a monster that used a thousand types of magic to battle the gods, but her stubbornness got her imprisoned in a mountain. After becoming a spirit, she headed to Japan to send the country spiraling into terror...but then she encountered the Bureau of the Occult and switched gears to offer her help instead. Angra Mainyu seems to have played a key role in this transformation...
[Special Bond] Increases Angra Mainyu's skill DMG.

240.name: Azi Dahaka

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to current target. Target receives {delay1} more DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: Dragonese

241.description:
"Camellia the Ninja, at your service!"
The spirit of a female ninja. She's not very experienced yet, but sometimes her ability to focus and notice small details surprises even her master. Her ninja skills aren't the best, so she messes up a lot. However, her consistent effort is starting to reveal hints of future potential. Her master refuses to praise her too much now, because he can see that she could grow into quite the ninja someday.
241.name: Camellia the Ninja

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to an enemy (ranged priority).
skill.name: Incomplete Fire Release

abilities.description: Increases 15% of skill DMG by all melee allies.
abilities.name: Sky Mirror

242.description:
"Am I asking too much?"
A spirit who uses a huge mirror to reflect the sky. She can create a mirror anywhere using her purified salt and water. She uses the mirror to conceal herself while practicing sexy poses. Rain makes her more motivated and focused, apparently because she's on the good side of all the rain gods of the worlds. She boasts that her poses are so sexy that they can stop any man—or god—in her tracks.
[Event] Chopping Trees? Stop, Please!
242.name: Uyuni

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to current target. Target deals {delay1} less DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: Magnified Sunlight

abilities.description: All melee foes take 10% more DMG at the start of each wave.
abilities.name: Fallen Angel

243.description:
"Spread some rumors, ruin some lives... What better way to keep the peace?"
The spirit of a demon with powers of deception, betrayal and general evil. Her mouth is her greatest weapon. She spreads seeds of doubt in the minds of her foes, causing them to spiral into deep paranoia. Then it's only a matter of time until they're finished. Rumors say that back when she was an angel she sought to peacefully resolve any and all disagreements...though, really, you shouldn't listen to rumors.
[Event] Chopping Trees? Stop, Please!
243.name: Avnas

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to a random enemy, with a {probability} of inflicting Silence.
skill.name: Angel of Deceit

abilities.description: Restores 2.5% HP to all melee allies every 5 seconds.
abilities.name: God of Trees

244.description:
"Could someone open a window or something?"
The god of trees from Japanese mythology...in spirit form. She's quite the god, sitting atop the tallest trees of Japan, but her powers have been greatly weakened by people's lack of faith and widespread deforestation and air pollution. She came to the city in order to regain her powers, but she's been having trouble getting used to all the smog...
[Event] Chopping Trees? Stop, Please!
244.name: Kukunochi

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to nearby enemies.
skill.name: Out of Season

245.description:
"I have no intention of letting my powers grow dull."
The spirit of the most famous female spy in the world. She lures her targets with seductive dances in order to extract top secret information. Her job has become much harder now that she's gotten so famous, but she's been doing a fine job nonetheless. After taking time off to focus on a side job, returning to missions has her filled with motivation.
[Event] Chopping Trees? Stop, Please!
245.name: Mata Hari

skill.description: Decreases DMG dealt by a random enemy by {delay1} for a extended time.
skill.name: Beguiling Dance

246.description:
"Leave it to me! I'll help out whoever!"
The spirit of a strong-willed girl who was killed unexpectedly.One day, She met a spirit while in a bit of a sulky mood, but seeing his strength inspired her to protect the streets better than ever before. Swearing to keep others from going through the tragedy she did, she works hard to protect all living things. Her uniform is proof that she works for justice.
[Event] Chopping Trees? Stop, Please!
246.name: Sakurada Mon

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to an enemy (ranged priority).
skill.name: Sign of Justice

abilities.description: Restores 10% HP to all allies at the start of each wave.
abilities.name: Mother of Cherry Blossoms

247.description:
"I'll work hard for my beautiful daughters!"
The spirit of the Edohigan, one of Japan's five great cherry blossom trees. She is called the mother of all cherry blossom trees in Japan. She also has a reputation for her pruning skills. Being able to telepathically communicate with trees enables her use just the right techniques for each one. She can make a withered old tree go into full bloom in the blink of an eye! But if she prunes too much they'll bloom out of season in the next year, so she can't work on the same tree too often. She came to town upon hearing the cries of all the cherry blossom trees there.
[Event] Chopping Trees? Stop, Please!
247.name: Yamataka Jindai Sakura

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to all enemies.
skill.name: Blossom Blade

abilities.description: Immune to Poison and reduces 10% of DMG taken.
abilities.name: True Heart

abilities.description: Absorbs 10% of DMG dealt as HP.
abilities.name: True Fiction

248.description:
"I just wanna help people!"
A spirit created by the legend of George Washington and the cherry tree. He serves as a prime example of the way that widespread belief in something can make it real, regardless of whether the original story is true. This pure young man is always striving to work on behalf of the people. Though his outlook may seem limited for now, he will one day become the leader of a nation. In preparation for this he's been learning about all sorts of things from George Washington.
[Event] Chopping Trees? Stop, Please!
248.name: Forge Washington

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to current target.
skill.name: Strength, Resolve and Kindness

abilities.description: Increases 20% of skill DMG by all team members when this daemon is Team Leader.
abilities.name: Mr. President

249.description:
"If you keep at it long enough, most things eventually come true."
The spirit of the first US president. He values his country above all else, even himself, and devotes everything to it. He started spending more time with Forge after the copy incident blew over, passing on all sorts of lessons and making sure to spend more time in deep self-reflection. His manner has somehow grown more soft and relaxed than before. The two Washingtons look like brothers whenever they're together...which makes sense, considering they were originally the same person.
[Special Bond] Increases Forge Washington's skill DMG.
[Event] Chopping Trees? Stop, Please!

[Special Bond] Increases {#MonsterName#248}'s skill DMG.
[Event] Chopping Trees? Stop, Please!

249.name: George Washington

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to all enemies.
skill.name: Purge of Deception

25.description:
"So fun, school is just so fun..."
A spirit of the most evil woman in all of history. She ruined the largest country in East Asia using her looks and wits as her only weapons. Her true form is a huge spirit, but nothing is known beyond that. With the enormous spirit essences under her control she can turn into human form and slip into human society. But these days she adjusted her looks a bit and is apparently living as a high school student. The catch is that in human form she can only use her spirit essence for a few minutes at a time.
25.name: Daji

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to the 2 enemies with the least HP. Targets take {delay1} more DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: Evil and Ash

abilities.description: All melee allies take 5% less DMG
abilities.name: Sacred Shield

abilities.description: Reflects 10% of DMG taken back to attacker.
abilities.name: Shield of the Gods

250.description:
"Don't come any closer! There's a speck of dust on your shoulder!"
The spirit of a shield that can fend off every type of evil and calamity. The shield was originally made to protect the beloved daughter of the god of the sky. Today, her powers are as strong as ever, and getting past her solid defenses is no small feat. However, she is a hardcore clean freak who can't stand dirt. She takes off running the minute she thinks someone is going to rub their grime off on her. When there's no escape she tries to destroy the source of contamination, what—or whoever that might be. You don't want to see the look on her face when someone actually manages to get her dirty.
250.name: Aegis

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to the row of enemies directly in front, with a {probability} of inflicting Stun.
skill.name: Holy Shield Smash

abilities.description: Increases 25% of Crit DMG by Phantasma team members
abilities.name: Song of Spring

251.description:
"Make those blossoms bloom!"
A spirit that let's people know when the cherry blossom trees are blooming. The daughter of a respectable family, she comes in with the warm spring breeze to make cherry trees blossom. It's actually a lot of work to make sure every tree in Japan blooms, so she keeps pretty busy. Apparently the key to the most beautiful blooms is shouted words of encouragement. But her habit of doing this makes people mistake her for a character from a fairy tale. However, lately she's been using this to her advantage to become a pop sensation.
251.name: Cherry Blossom Front

skill.description: Increases DMG dealt by all allies by {delay1} for a limited time.
skill.name: Warm and Carefree

abilities.description: Increases 10% of ATK speed to all melee allies.
abilities.name: Dancer

252.description:
"I'd like something sweet, neat, and good to eat!"
The spirit of an elf based on one of the periodic elements. She's the longest-running member of the famous pop group composed of elves. She's the rare type that gets along with everyone else in the group. All her friendships are real—none of those superficial "work friend" types of relationships. She actually meets up with other members during their off-hours for fun, usually to go out for dessert.
252.name: Neon Elf

skill.description: Increases DMG taken the 3 enemies with the highest ATK by {delay1} for a limited time.
skill.name: Sugary Dance

abilities.description: Increases 25% of Skill DMG.
abilities.name: Nectar of the Gods

abilities.description: Increases 20% of all allies' Crit DMG.
abilities.name: Drinking Party

253.description:
"Looks like the drinking starts early today!"
An unusual spirit that can produce a strange sake to weaken demons. When springtime arrives, everyone at the Bureau of the Occult wants to go cherry blossom viewing with her because they know how free she is with doling out the sake. She claims that spring sake is exceptional, enjoying it with the cherry blossoms almost every day. Naturally, she says exactly the same thing about the stars in summer, the moon in autumn, and the snow in winter...
253.name: Poison S. Brew [Flower Viewing]

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to all enemies.
skill.name: Drinking for the Blossoms

abilities.description: Reduces 10% DMG taken.
abilities.name: Auspicious Beast

abilities.description: Increases 5% of Crit DMG by Divina team members at the start of each wave.
abilities.name: Sacred Creature

254.description:
"What are you worth?"
The spirit of a mythical beast of legend. "Equality" is her number one guiding principle, and she treats everyone without favoritism or prejudice. So she was as surprised as anyone else when all of a sudden she was declared the "most sacred beast of them all." The stronger she gets, the more people want to come and take advantage of her powers. But, since they don't understand her spiritual nature they usually give up and go home. Still, the crowds grow bigger by the day, becoming more organized, and even beginning to function like an independent beast of their own. It's starting to scare her, to be honest.
254.name: Qilin

skill.description: Increases Crit Rate to all allies by {delay1} for a limited time.
skill.name: Jinrai

abilities.description: Increases 20% of Crit Rate.
abilities.name: Officer of the Law

abilities.description: Increases 50% of Crit DMG.
abilities.name: Familial Love

255.description:
"Ah! I'm on it, I'm on it!"
The spirit of a profoundly loyal cat that transformed into a cat monster to achieve revenge and clear the name of its wrongly blamed master. She wants people to viscerally understand her and her master's situation. As a cat spirit of justice, she exposes wrong-doing in all its forms and punishes the perpetrators. Apparently her former master was a policeman, which she loves to tell people.
255.name: Nekogami

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to current target; decreases target's speed by {delay1} for a limited time.
skill.name: Policeman's Tale

256.description:
"I can't just abandon those poor and unfortunate souls..."
The spirit of the Dragon King of the East Sea. Without going into to many details, let's just say he had a pretty pitiful past. This made him want to help the less fortunate, but he never offers aid to those who are already strong. He helps people who've been chased into corners by clearing the way for their escape.
256.name: Ao Guang

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to all enemies.
skill.name: Magic Dragon Fist

257.description:
"Give my best to ELF 118!"
The spirit of an elf derived from a periodic element, and a member of a music group created in the same vein as another famous pop group. She is the ultimate example of a band member who isn't universally known, but has wildly enthusiastic fans. She has an incredible sense for knowing when to take center stage, and when to allow other members to take the spotlight. Accordingly, many other members try to be like her.
257.name: Selenium Elf

skill.description: Restores {value} HP and receives {delay1} less DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: Courage in a Pinch

abilities.description: Increases 20% of ATK speed and Skill DMG.
abilities.name: Firework Shower

258.description:
"How's this one? I just made it!"
The spirit of a volley of fireworks. She used to secretly adjust the fuses of fireworks when people were setting them off in summer. But once everything started going digital, fuse management was taken over by computers—and she was out of a job. Suddenly she had more time on her hands than she knew what to do with...but the fireworks she's been making in her newfound free time have gotten rave reviews, and were even selected for use during a live show.
[Event] Spirit Idol Competition
258.name: Star Mine

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to all enemies.
skill.name: Firestarter

abilities.description: Increases 3% of skill DMG by Divina team members at the start of each wave.
abilities.name: Mood Maker

259.description:
"What'll our next performance be like?"
The spirit of an elf based on one of the periodic elements. She's considered the "mood maker" by all the other group members. No matter how low their spirits get, her presence alone makes everyone feel better. Even when they get in an argument, she has everyone's feathers smoothed in a matter of minutes. In fact, she's the reason they've never had to cancel a show due to an all-out brawl.
[Event] Spirit Idol Competition
259.name: Zirco Elf

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to the 2 enemies with the highest ATK. Targets deal {delay1} less DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: Conciliatory Dance

abilities.description: Increases 15% of ATK speed to all melee allies.
abilities.name: Supersonic Aviation

26.description:
"Here we go, wooo!"
The spirit of a magic flying cloud. She loves people with inner beauty, strength, and pure dreams, and tries to form partnerships with them. In something like a sponsorship contract, she agrees to help them with transportation if they outwardly appeal to her as a partner. The only problem is that she's booked solid and can't take on any new partnerships for the next few years.
[Special Bond] Increases Sun Wukong's skill DMG

The only problem is that she's booked solid and can't take on any new partnerships for the next few years.
[Special Bond] Increases Sun Wukong's skill DMG

The spirit of a magic flying cloud. She loves people with inner beauty, strength, and pure dreams, and tries to form partnerships with them. The only problem is that she's booked solid and can't take on any new partnerships for the next few years.
[Special Bond] Increases {#MonsterName#511}'s skill DMG

26.name: Flying Nimbus

skill.description: Restores {value} HP for 2 allies (melee priority); increases targets' speed by {delay1} for a limited time.
skill.name: High-Speed Wave

abilities.description: Increases 20% of DMG dealt.
abilities.name: Gaudy Mask

260.description:
"Enraptured yet?"
The spirit of a traditional dance performed in some areas. The concept for the dance is a devil born to the Virgin Mary, but it's actually a combination of many different dances. Since becoming a spirit, he spends every waking minute trying to come up with new dances. He was traveling the world in search of new trends when he heard that several pop stars would be holding a huge concert.
[Event] Spirit Idol Competition
260.name: Diablada

skill.description: Restores {value} HP to all allies; increases targets' speed by {delay1} for a limited time.
skill.name: A Demon's Passion

261.description:
"I want my elves to be at the top of the industry!"
The spirit of a demon that can change a person's form. He works as a scout for elf pop stars. He has quite the refined aesthetic sensibilities, and most of current stars rose to fame thanks to his efforts behind the scenes. He works relentlessly day and night to solidify the elves' popularity. In his off-hours he helps out at the Bureau of the Occult, which he claims comes in handy when searching for the next big star.
[Event] Spirit Idol Competition
261.name: Orias

skill.description: Increases DMG dealt by a random ally by {delay1} for a limited time.
skill.name: Business Card From Hell

262.description:
"Is this the part where I smile?"
The spirit of an elf based on one of the periodic elements. She's famous for being able to enchant audiences with her dance moves better than any other member. In fact, she joined the group just to improve her dancing and doesn't actually have much interest in stardom, which has left her shunned fans feeling salty. But after a certain performance where she went head-to-head with Platina, Sodium gained a newfound appreciation for the power of fandom. Her more hardcore fans weren't very happy with the new posers suddenly claiming to be Sodium fans, but they accepted her changed status nonetheless. These days, she and Platina are nearly equal in popularity.
[Event] Spirit Idol Competition
262.name: Sodium Elf

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to a random enemy, with a {probability} of inflicting Burn.
skill.name: Feeling Salty

abilities.description: Increases 10% of all allies' Crit DMG.
abilities.name: The Most Venerable Dancer

263.description:
"Just dance, I tell you! You'll never lose to anyone if you just dance!"
The spirit of a dancing girl from ancient Japan. Everyone who sees her perform is completely captivated. Now she wants to become famous as a pop singer and dancer. However, because she's so good at dancing, it's even more obvious how bad her singing is. Her vocal training course alone caused major property damage, including shattered windows and countless broken bulbs.
[Event] Spirit Idol Competition
263.name: Ame-no-Uzume

skill.description: Increases DMG dealt by all allies by {delay1} for a limited time.
skill.name: Ancient Dance

abilities.description: Increases 10% of the EXP gained from battle.
abilities.name: Imperial Treasure

264.description:
"If we're gonna do this, let's do it right!"
The spirit of a very free-spirited lute. She's the type that thinks before she acts, casually deciding to go on a big trip completely out of the blue. And whenever she goes on one of her trips to somewhere new, the first thing she does is check out the local music. She has a home of her own, but she doesn't like staying in one place for too long. As a result, she has friends all across the land. She's pretty famous among music-related spirits.
[Event] Spirit Idol Competition
264.name: Genjo

skill.description: Restores {value} HP to 3 allies (melee priority); increases targets' speed by {delay1} for a limited time.
skill.name: Free-spirited Performance

abilities.description: Reduces 4% of DMG dealt by all foes at the start of each wave.
abilities.name: Lord of Pride

abilities.description: Increases 20% of Skill DMG.
abilities.name: The Seven Sins

265.description:
"When it comes to my music, prepare yourself for the very best!"
The spirit of a demon known for controlling Hell. He's a pop star famous all the way from the highest reaches of Heaven to the lowest corners of Hell. He was banished from Heaven for his pride, but since then he's learned to appreciate other people more—proof that he's making progress in life. Together with his new rival, he will surely set his sights higher and endeavor to achieve even greater things.
[Event] Spirit Idol Competition
265.name: Lucifer

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to all enemies.
skill.name: Performance From Hell

abilities.description: Increases 10% of all Divina team members' Crit Rate when Aurum Elf is on the team.
abilities.name: Top Idol

266.description:
"I'll become the greatest idol in the world!"
The spirit of an elf based on one of the periodic elements. She's the most popular member of ELF 118, promoted as the best of the bunch. Living up to this reputation takes a massive amount of effort, but she doesn't see it as work—on the contrary, she believes it is her natural responsibility. But this means that she is incredibly demanding of her fellow members, too, and she's started to distance herself from those who don't live up to her expectations. After meeting several other idols at a certain event, she began thinking about the driving motivation from her early days: "enjoying every moment." This led her to question what it really means to be the greatest pop star, and she realized that the answer lies beyond talent and theory, in the relationship and feeling of togetherness with one's fans.
[Event] Spirit Idol Competition

changes.new: Increases 10% of all Divina team members' Crit Rate when Aurum Elf is on the team.
changes.old: Increases 10% of all Divina team members' Crit Rate when {#MonsterName#268} is on the team.

266.name: Platina Elf

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to the enemy with the highest ATK, with a {probability} of inflicting Stun.
skill.name: Dazzling Dance

abilities.description: Increases 10% of battle time limit.
abilities.name: Great Supernatural Power

267.description:
"So, how 'bout a glass or two?"
The spirit of one of Japan's three legendary tanukis. He's the boss of the bake-tanukis. Everyone in their community is a master of various supernatural powers, especially those involving stealth and covert activities. They boast that stealing state secrets is like taking candy from a baby. However, they never use their powers for selfish gain, dedicating them instead to serving the greater good. This is thanks to the leadership of none other than Gyobu himself.
267.name: Gyobu Tanuki

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to current target.
skill.name: Innumerable Attacks

abilities.description: Increases 10% of all Divina team members' Crit Rate when Platina Elf is on the team.
abilities.name: Top Idol

268.description:
"I'm giving this 110%!"
The spirit of an elf based on one of the periodic elements. She rarely appears front and center in any of their songs, but many fans love her nonetheless. Some secretly hope that she might someday outshine the likes of Titanium and Platina. But she has no desire to be the star of the show. She just wants to enjoy music as much as she can, whether that's in a live show or offstage.

changes.new: Increases 10% of all Divina team members' Crit Rate when Platina Elf is on the team.
changes.old: Increases 10% of all Divina team members' Crit Rate when {#MonsterName#266} is on the team.

268.name: Aurum Elf

skill.description: Reduces a random enemy (melee priority)'s DEF by {delay1} for a limited time.
skill.name: Sparkling Dance

abilities.description: Restores 7% HP to skill targets.
abilities.name: Kind Demon

269.description:
"Ask for anything, anything at all!"
The spirit of a demon who speaks about everything with great sincerity. He's famous in Hell for commanding kindness. He simply tries to grant the wish of whoever summons him without any demand of compensation. Nothing about him seems particularly demonic, causing many to wonder whether he's actually an angel. However, he does in fact have powers befitting a demon—his excessive kindness leads many to depravity and corruption.
269.name: Seir

skill.description: Reduces {delay1} DMG taken by all allies for a limited time.
skill.name: Reverse Transmission

27.description:
"I will stand by my master!"
The spirit of a sword that aided a knight of the Round Table. Her backstory is questionable since she got a bad rap for killing an ally. But she doesn't have any regrets about it. He was simply carrying out his duties and she aided him as a tool, no more, no less. There are a number of issues preventing her from being reunited with the knight who used to be her owner.
27.name: Arondight

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to surrounding enemies; reduces targets' DEF by {delay1} for a limited time.
skill.name: Liberated Sword

abilities.description: Increases skill target's Crit DMG by 25%.
abilities.name: Music of the Gods

270.description:
"Hey, keep your hands to yourself!"
The spirit of a harp made by the gods. She likes to create pleasant music, and has been searching for a kind harp player. The quality of her sound depends on who is playing—if they're talented, the roar of applause is sure to be deafening. But if they completely lack any skill, the sky and earth will probably rend apart to create a living hell. This theory was confirmed when Sola tried to play. Since then she's been making sure that only those with proper training are allowed to touch her strings.
270.name: Apollo's Harp

skill.description: Increases Crit Rate to all allies by {delay1} for a limited time.
skill.name: Uplifting Tone

abilities.description: Restores 29% HP to the 2 allies with the lowest percentage of HP at the start of each wave.
abilities.name: Sailor's Savior

271.description:
"I never planned to become a goddess, but you know what they say, stuff happens..."
The spirit of a girl who used supernatural powers to heal people. It all started when her father went missing in an accident. She went on vacation to recover from the grief and met a hermit who noticed her talent for healing and wanted to teach her more. Things went really well, and the next thing she knew she was a goddess. She's the real deal, converting evil spirits to her side and everything, in true goddess fashion.
271.name: Mazu

skill.description: Restores {value} HP to all allies. Targets receive {delay1} less DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: Great Goddess Guard

abilities.description: Increases 50% of Skill DMG.
abilities.name: Clean Cut

272.description:
"Don't get carried away, or it's off with your head."
The spirit of a scythe made from a magical metal. There's nothing she can't cut through—even a diamond-skinned demon may as well be a common tomato for all it matters to her. She hates self-centered people, especially male deities who joke around too much. This may or may not be related to the recent metrosexual trend among male deities.
272.name: Scythe of Adamas

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to a wide area of enemies.
skill.name: Sickle Storm

abilities.description: Increases 12% the EXP gained from battle.
abilities.name: Master Manager

273.description:
"Becoming king's not as easy as it used to be..."
The spirit of a cat who wore leather boots. His master was a penniless, uneducated nobody, but this cat used wits and a little trickery to help him become king of the land. When others hoping to pull off the same feat come asking him for help, they usually leave after only a few minutes in apparent satisfaction. You see, he's learned how to talk a good talk and avoid rejecting them outright, which would hurt his brand. It's all part of his cohesive branding strategy.
273.name: Charles in Boots

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to an enemy (ranged priority).
skill.name: Memory of the Hunt

274.description:
"I, uh, I do this for the people...yeah. That's all I'm gonna say."
A spirit of wafting smoke. Her body is made of smoke, and she can change shape at will. Since she can squeeze through the tiniest of cracks, she likes to dress up as a ghost and scare people. She ended up at the Bureau of the Occult after sneaking into a house belonging to none other than Mikado herself. No one knows exactly what took place that night, but Enenra started working for her the very next day. Whenever someone asks about it she goes pale and disappears with a poof, so people have learned not to bring it up.
274.name: Enenra

skill.description: Decrease the buff duration of an enemy (melee priority) by {delay1} for a limited time.
skill.name: Wrapped in Smoke

abilities.description: Increases 12% of battle reward drop rate.
abilities.name: God of Weddings

from_description.event_name: Romance of the Demon and Sword

275.description:
"Many blessings to you all."
A spirit of the Greek god of marriage ceremonies. Among his various ceremonial duties is singing a hymn as a blessing, and it's widely known among spirits that a ceremony lacking his dulcet tones will lead to a cursed marriage. No wonder he's never short of bookings.
[Event] Romance of the Demon and Sword
275.name: Hymenaios

skill.description: Restores {value} HP to all allies and cures them of Poison.
skill.name: Blessed Hymn

abilities.description: Increases 28% of Skill DMG.
abilities.name: White Demon

from_description.event_name: Romance of the Demon and Sword

276.description:
"You sure know how to get a girl's heart beating!"
The spirit of a demon who works for Shuten Doji. Crass and quick to anger. At heart, however, she's very much a naive and innocent girl. When facing someone of the opposite sex her heart starts to race, her face turns completely pale, and she starts to blush. But there is an explanation behind these outward changes: her heart races out of excitement for the coming fight; her white face signals a trance-like state of focus; and the blushing is caused by increased blood flow due to a rush of adrenaline. For her, encountering someone of the opposite sex is no different than being on the battlefield...but there's no equally sound explanation for why she's so crass.
[Event] Romance of the Demon and Sword
276.name: Torakuma Doji

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to current target.
skill.name: White Demon's Soul

abilities.description: Increases 23% of the number of soulstones received from battle.
abilities.name: Shiny Object

from_description.event_name: Romance of the Demon and Sword

277.description:
"Now that's what I call bling."
The spirit of a ring made of gold. She's also a collector of rings, but only those that bestow special powers when worn. Oddly enough, these powers vary depending on the finger on which you wear the ring, like a ring worn on your ring finger bestowing you with luck in love. Once other spirits—especially female spirits—found out about this her reputation skyrocketed, and she now operates as both a collector and buyer.
[Event] Romance of the Demon and Sword
277.name: Gold Ring

skill.description: Restores {value} HP to all allies. Targets receive {delay1} less DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: Golden Vow

from_description.event_name: Romance of the Demon and Sword

278.description:
"What do you wanna put in?"
The spirit of a chest used to gather items in anticipation of married life. She's so powerful that she can lift her wooden chest weighing many times more than herself with a single hand. She's also a bit of a hoarder, gathering things left and right and cramming them into her beloved chest. She'll put anything in there—literally ANYTHING—and people are starting to wonder when it's going to get full. But she doesn't seem to harbor any such concerns. Let's just say her chest contains many secrets...
[Event] Romance of the Demon and Sword
278.name: Chessa Dowry

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to further enemies.
skill.name: Treasured Heirloom

abilities.description: Increases 20% of Skill DMG.
abilities.name: Master Craftsman

from_description.event_name: Romance of the Demon and Sword

279.description:
"Oh, mine are the absolute best!"
The spirit of a swordsmith who produced many of the world's most famous swords. Dojigiri Yasutsuna is perhaps one of his most famous works. He dotes on his creations like his own children, causing them no end of trouble in the process. That's because his version of "doting" is more like butting in and meddling in their affairs. Still, they respect him like a father...to a certain degree, at least.
[Event] Romance of the Demon and Sword
279.name: Ohara Yasutsuna

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to the enemy with the highest ATK, with a {probability} of inflicting Stun.
skill.name: A Father's Hammer

28.description:
"I can see you, no matter how far you run!"
The spirit of the favorite bow of Nasu no Yoichi, a samurai famous for his archery skills. Yoichi was indeed a genius, but actually the bow has an auto-targeting function by which it predicts the movements of the target and fires on its own. With this pretty much anyone can become a "genius," so she is really popular.
28.name: Yoichi's Bow

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to the enemy with the highest ATK.
skill.name: Arrow of Light

abilities.description: Restores 7% HP to skill targets.
abilities.name: Tying the Knot

from_description.event_name: Romance of the Demon and Sword

280.description:
"My husband should be here any minute..."
The spirit of the goddess of marriage, motherhood and chastity. She's bothered by her husband's freewheeling behavior, and consequently their marriage has numerous problems. But it never completely falls apart thanks in large part to her tolerance. There are rumors that she arranged for a special familiar to keep an eye on him at all times, but she shrugs off such false accusations with a broad smile. Because they're definitely false and not true in any way. Ahem.
[Event] Romance of the Demon and Sword
280.name: Hera

skill.description: Increases DMG dealt by 3 allies (melee priority) by {delay1} for a limited time.
skill.name: Under the Goddess' Eye

abilities.description: Increases 15% of DMG dealt when one of the Five Swords under Heaven is on the team.
abilities.name: The Five Swords under Heaven

abilities.description: Increases own level by 10 when Shuten Doji is on the team.
abilities.name: Demon Lord's Bride

from_description.event_name: Romance of the Demon and Sword

281.description:
"I d-don't like getting all dressed up!"
The spirit of one of the Five Swords under Heaven, known for killing demons. Her feelings for Shuten Doji have helped her grow into a new woman. She also seems to have taken to care about her appearance, constantly admiring herself whenever she passes by a mirror. Their ceremony was never actually held, but, despite the outcome she was still very happy they reaffirmed their feelings for one another. And, after everything was said and done, she apparently made off with the wedding dress and all the accessories, too.
[Event] Romance of the Demon and Sword
281.name: Dojigiri Yasutsuna [Bride]

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to further enemies.
skill.name: Secret Oath Slash

abilities.description: Increases 20% of all allies' Crit DMG when this daemon is Team Leader.
abilities.name: Demon Leader

abilities.description: Increases own level by 10 when Dojigiri Yasutsuna is on the team.
abilities.name: Sword Princess's Groom

from_description.event_name: Romance of the Demon and Sword

282.description:
"Yes, yes. I've already been made well aware."
The spirit of the demon leader of Mount Oe. His feelings for his beloved Dojigiri Yasutsuna triggered an evil energy outbreak, and they had to throw together a last-minute wedding to deal with it. Although there was no ceremony in the end, the two talked their feelings over, and reaffirmed their vows to make each other happy. He also vowed in secret to earn her father's approval before the day they really do get married.
[Event] Romance of the Demon and Sword
282.name: Shuten Doji [Bridegroom]

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to all enemies, with a {probability} of inflicting Poison.
skill.name: Song of Hidden Resolve

abilities.description: Increases 6% of ATK speed of all allies.
abilities.name: Feline Monster

abilities.description: Increases 10% of the ATK speed of all allies when Socrates is on the team.
abilities.name: Anthropomorphic Cat

283.description:
"You wanna talk to little old me?"
The spirit of a cat that was once looked after by a certain master. She eventually became a spirit after living for a very long time as a cat. She's fond of humans on account of a loving master. And, maybe also thanks to her old master, she has a slightly philosophical bent. She's good friends with Socrates, and they often discuss things at great length. Many philosophical concepts appear quite different from the perspective of a cat, so talking with her definitely makes you think about things in a new way.
[Special Bond] Increases normal ATK by Socrates.

changes.old: Increases 10% of the ATK speed of all allies when {#MonsterName#84} is on the team.

283.name: Nekomata

skill.description: Restores {value} HP to all allies. Targets deal {delay1} more DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: The Cat Returns

abilities.description: Absorbs 22% of DMG dealt as HP.
abilities.name: Lord of Lust

abilities.description: Increases 20% of Skill DMG.
abilities.name: The Seven Sins

284.description:
"I'm off the clock, so let's have some fun!"
The spirit of the demon of lust, one of the seven deadly sins. He's also very well-known in the demon world as a male magazine model. His popularity even rivals that of Lucifer. However, he recently got tired of dealing with fans and secretly went to work at the Bureau of the Occult. He's apparently searching for people who will treat him not as a famous model but instead as just an average spirit. Still, when he does run into the inevitable fan he treats them with utmost respect, showing what a true professional he really is.
284.name: Asmodeus

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to all enemies.
skill.name: Demonic Temptation

abilities.description: Restores 10% HP to all allies at the start of each wave.
abilities.name: Recorder of Festivities

285.description:
"Leave the chronically to me!"
The spirit of an illustrated scroll documenting marriages in the spirit world. She tends to appear suddenly at weddings without being invited. She can instantaneously transfer everything she sees onto her scroll, so you don't have to worry whether she managed to capture a special moment—she definitely got it, and much more. However, she also records things in everyday life, even when you least expect it. It's not necessarily her intention, but she tends to record things that might be a tad shocking for the people involved. Thus many in the Bureau of the Occult have learned not to take her powers lightly.
285.name: Spirit Wedding Scroll

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to 3 enemies (melee priority), with a {probability} of inflicting Stun.
skill.name: Instant Brushstroke

abilities.description: Skill attacks have 50% chances of inflicting Burn.
abilities.name: Antagonistic Angel

286.description:
"I think you could use a little test!"
The spirit of an angel that tests your faith. She throws evil in people's path in order to test the extent of their faith and virtue. Perhaps it comes with the job, but she's quite cruel despite her angelic nature. Since she works with fallen angels a lot, people often mistake her for one, but she is in fact a fully fledged servant of heaven. So step out of line and you'd best watch your tongue.
286.name: Mansemat

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to the enemy with the highest ATK, with a {probability} of inflicting Paralysis.
skill.name: Angelic Bully

abilities.description: All melee allies take 10% less DMG.
abilities.name: Loyal General

287.description:
"Can you handle the famous Sanada resolve?"
The spirit of a general considered the best warrior in Japan. He became famous for putting his life on the line for the Toyotomi family he served, and he hasn't changed at all since becoming a spirit. Many spirits wish they could be like him, marching in alone and carving a path to success even when the chances of victory look slim. Currently he appears to be deeply indebted to Mikado... It's not clear why, but in any case he's not in any position to stand up to her.
287.name: Sanada Yukimura

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to the row of enemies directly in front. Targets deal {delay1} less DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: Stance of Determination

abilities.description: Increases 6% of DMG dealt at the start of each wave.
abilities.name: Water Spirit

abilities.description: Increases 20% of Skill DMG.
abilities.name: Cucumber Love

288.description:
"Gotta have my cucumbers!"
The spirit of a legendary Japanese creature that lives in lakes and rivers and loves cucumbers. He's been spotted all over the country and is considered very influential, probably because humans have always felt a certain closeness to kappas. He is also an excellent judge of cucumbers. His sense of smell is probably better attuned to determining a cucumber's quality than it is to detecting nearby brutes.
288.name: Kappa

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to 3 enemies (ranged priority).
skill.name: Suiko Claw

abilities.description: Increases 20% of DMG dealt and ATK speed.
abilities.name: Kenpo Master

289.description:
"Not up for it? Can you at least give me some red juice?"
The spirit of a dead body that can move around without rotting. Even before becoming a spirit she possessed incredible acrobatic powers, and now she can still leap around, ignoring the effects of rigor mortis. Apparently at one point there was a Jiangshi craze in Japan, which established her current appearance in people's minds. She was originally a vampire, but now she's a big fan of ketchup—although sometimes she drinks tomato juice instead. She gets happy at the sight of any red liquid, really.
289.name: Jiangshi

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to nearby enemies.
skill.name: Full Arteries

29.description:
"...Y-you can see me?!"
A spirit who lives quietly in Japanese homes. She's not hardworking or good at getting along with others, so she tends to be stiff and formal. She's not good at getting jokes either, which has earned her the title of "Joke Killer." Having a Zashiki Bokko around is actually a bigger deal than you might think. For example, last year a restaurant that used to be Deadsville reached three star status for a short time thanks to a Zashiki Bokko.
29.name: Zashiki Bokko

skill.description: Inflicts Sleep on an enemy (healers priority) for a limited time.
skill.name: Surge of Peacefulness

290.description:
"A simple change in perspective can change the way you feel, too."
The spirt of a folding screen depicting the story of the Tale of Genji. Her response to every situation is a bright "it'll all work out somehow!" She's pretty lackadaisical, but in a good way, giving her a very unique perspective on life. Sometimes she leaves people a little confused, though. And sometimes she takes the whole "it'll all work out" attitude a little too far, neglecting to take precautions for anything. But her carefree attitude is surprisingly popular with women.
290.name: Genji Monogatari

skill.description: Restores {value} HP to 2 allies (ranged priority). Increases targets' speed by {delay1} for a limited time.
skill.name: Wind Breaker

abilities.description: Restores 15% HP to Anima team members at the start of each wave.
abilities.name: Food-lover

292.description:
"Meet me in the ocean if you're in the mood for a tasty treat!"
The spirit of the trident that Poseidon is said to have wielded. In her glory days she was like an extension of Poseidon's own arm. Now, since becoming a spirit, she's secretly taken up cooking as a hobby. She just loves entertaining guests with a meal of freshly caught fish. This has led her to spend a lot of time with other food-loving spirits and thus form many close friendships.
[Special Bond] Increases Charybdis's skill DMG.
[Event] Coastal Calamity - Tanabata Beach Contest

[Event] Coastal Calamity - Tanabata Beach Contest
