[Event] Get Ready! The October Sports Meet at the Tokyo Blue Cemetery!

354.name: Aka Manah

skill.description: Increases DMG taken by all enemies by {delay1} for a limited time.
skill.name: Words of Madness

from_description.event_name: Get Ready! The October Sports Meet at the Tokyo Blue Cemetery!

355.description:
"How about enjoying a nice bento box together?"
The spirit of the food of the gods. She's also a bento box seller responsible for catering at the October Sports Meet and making sure none of the gods go hungry. Her cooking is filled with love and gives you a big burst of energy when you eat it...a little TOO much energy, some say. They are afraid it might have a "special" ingredient, but the only thing special is how much love she puts into it.
[Event] Get Ready! The October Sports Meet at the Tokyo Blue Cemetery!
355.name: Ambrosia

skill.description: Restores {value} HP to all allies.
skill.name: Bento Boost

abilities.description: Increases 25% of skill target's Crit DMG.
abilities.name: Spirit of War

from_description.event_name: Get Ready! The October Sports Meet at the Tokyo Blue Cemetery!

356.description:
"We're too well-trained to lose!"
The spirit of a type of giant said to live throughout Japan. She's not actually that tall, but seems like a giant because of the aura that floats around her. This aura is created by a combination of throbbing passion for battle, spirit essence, and a number of other things. Any powerful spirit or spirit agent that lays eyes on her will instantly recognize what a giant she really is.
[Event] Get Ready! The October Sports Meet at the Tokyo Blue Cemetery!
356.name: Onyudo

skill.description: Increases Crit Rate to 2 allies(melee priority)  by {delay1} for a limited time.
skill.name: Battle Aura

abilities.description: Increases 20% crit rate of skill target when “Holy Grail” is on the team.
abilities.name: Discoverer of the Holy Grail

from_description.event_name: Get Ready! The October Sports Meet at the Tokyo Blue Cemetery!

357.description:
"Who needs miracles! This'll be over in no time."
One of the Knights of the Round Table that found the holy grail. He's still on the search even after becoming a spirit, and came to Japan after hearing a rumor. He has a wish that he wants fulfilled, but stubbornly refuses to tell anyone what it is. Instead, he just gets emotional and says he doesn't want to embarrass his fellow knights. Who knows what could've happened between them...
[Event] Get Ready! The October Sports Meet at the Tokyo Blue Cemetery!
357.name: Galahad

skill.description: Restores {value} HP to 3 allies with the lowest percentage of HP, increase {delay1} DEF to targets for a limited time.
skill.name: Knight's Pride

abilities.description: Increases 50% of ATK speed when HP is 1/2 or below.
abilities.name: Super Hot-blooded

abilities.description: Reduces 20% of DMG taken.
abilities.name: Kabuki Performer

from_description.event_name: Get Ready! The October Sports Meet at the Tokyo Blue Cemetery!

358.description:
"We can't just sit around twiddling our thumbs! Off we go!"
The spirit of a great kabuki actor who loved both watching and participating in sports. He heard about the sports meet from his fellow sports-lover and friend Holly Grail, and without thinking he proposed his own cemetery for the venue. Naturally many spirits were opposed, but he persuaded them all before the event got underway. Apparently he kept insisting that everyone had to participate, and in the end even spirits who initially opposed him agreed to join in the festivities. Not only that, but after a long night of sweat and exertion, he even managed to make friends with them, too.
[Event] Get Ready! The October Sports Meet at the Tokyo Blue Cemetery!
358.name: Danjuro

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to the enemy with the most HP. Targets deal {delay1} less DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: Persistent Heat

abilities.description: Increases 100% Crit DMG to skill targets.
abilities.name: Grail of Miracles

abilities.description: 50% chances of restoring HP to skill targets by 100%.
abilities.name: Miraculous Powers

from_description.event_name: Get Ready! The October Sports Meet at the Tokyo Blue Cemetery!

359.description:
"So you want your wish granted? Then show me what you've got!"
The spirit of the holy grail once sought by many knights. She also loves watching sports. She has the power to make miracles happen, so many people have sought her help. However, she only uses her powers for those who've impressed her with their strength, so most people go home empty-handed. That's why only the MVP of the sports meet is allowed to use her miraculous powers. It's like they say: you can't accomplish anything without hard work!
[Event] Get Ready! The October Sports Meet at the Tokyo Blue Cemetery!
359.name: Holy Grail

skill.description: Restores {value} HP to 2 allies with the highest ATK, increases {delay1} crit rate to target for a limited time.
skill.name: Inquiring Chalice

36.description:
"A nice hot bath is the best..."
The spirit of a monster said to roam about the land. He has a strong affinity for fire, and the long hair flowing from his body is like licks of flame. He likes beauty and he LOVES hot baths. But you have to be careful if you take a bath after him, because he prefers for the water to be almost literally boiling, around 176 degrees Fahrenheit.
36.name: Fire Mouse

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to current target.
skill.name: Burst of Flames

abilities.description: Increases 15% of the EXP gained from battle.
abilities.name: Scroll of Prophecy

abilities.description: Increases 20% of the number of soulstones received from battle.
abilities.name: X Marks the Spot

360.description:
"Want to learn my secrets...?"
The spirit of a sheet of copper with all sorts of things written on it. Apparently there's everything from ancient literature to the location of treasure. Parts of the scrolls included future predictions affecting the whole world, so she classified them as top secret and traveled all over trying figure out what the "something" was that would be destroyed. Eventually she figured it all out, averted the crisis, and then made the document publicly available again.
360.name: Dead Sea Scrolls

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to the enemy with the highest ATK, with a {probability} of inflicting Stun.
skill.name: Ancient Prediction

abilities.description: Increases 15% of max HP of all allies.
abilities.name: Guardian Deity of Izumo

from_description.event_name: Get Ready! The October Sports Meet at the Tokyo Blue Cemetery!

361.description:
"We're all hardworkers here, so let's do this together!"
A nation-protecting god in Japanese mythology, and also the organizer of the October Sports Meet. He's built up a lot of management experience from running it every year, so he didn't even break a sweat over changing the venue at the last minute. He's the kind of person that actually enjoys those moments of crisis. In fact, he had the whole event ready to go in the cemetery with just a few hours' prep. He's grown very gentle from all the years of hard labor he's put in, and the size of his heart is notable even among the gods.
361.name: Okuninushi

skill.description: Restores {value} HP to all allies. Targets receive {delay1} less DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: Defender of the Nation

abilities.description: Skill attacks have 70% chances of inflicting Burn.
abilities.name: God of Disaster

abilities.description: Restores 25% HP to Phantasma team members at the start of each wave.
abilities.name: Ward Against Evil

362.description:
"Are you sure it's okay for me to be here...?"
One of the gods of disaster in Japanese mythology. She has one of the most unusual dispositions of all the spirits: she's so negative that she draws evil energy like a magnet. She's well aware of this, but the self-loathing only spurs further negativity, thus making for a very vicious cycle. She' trying as hard as hard as she can to be more positive, and Okuninushi and all the other gods are praying for her success.
362.name: Magatsuhi

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to all enemies, with a {probability} of inflicting Weak Poison.
skill.name: Surge of Destruction

abilities.description: Reduces 20% of DMG taken.
abilities.name: Loyal Edge

363.description:
"When you follow a code of chivalry, you do things differently than other people."
The spirit of a sword that aided the Knights of the Round Table. She longs to be united with her former master, so she came running when she heard wishes were being granted by Holly Grail. She was able to meet her master's son, Galahad, but failed to get any information about Lancelot's whereabouts. But she did learn that the other Knights of the Round Table were searching for him, too...
363.name: Arondight [Sports Meet]

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to the enemy with the lowest HP. Target receives {delay1} more DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: Discredited Blade

abilities.description: Deals 20% more DMG.
abilities.name: Hardworker

abilities.description: All divina allies take 5% less DMG.
abilities.name: King of the Realm

364.description:
"I believe your strength needs testing!"
Master of the Asura realm and a very hard worker, he underwent unimaginable training in pursuit of greater knowledge and gained powers rivaling those of the gods. He sees Sakra, Lord of the Devas, as his rival, but he always finds himself falling one step behind. Right now he's traveling between the six realms to learn more in hopes of having a better chance of beating Sakra. He even stopped by the hell realm, but claims it was nothing compared to the behavior of the Chief of the Bureau of the Occult...
364.name: Asura

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to 2 enemies (ranged priority), with a {probability} of inflicting Paralysis.
skill.name: Dance of Carnage

abilities.description: Increases 30% of skill DMG.
abilities.name: Giants' Sword

365.description:
"No one can stop my hidden blade...including me."
The spirit of a gigantic longsword embedded with gems. Made by giants, the sword has survived numerous battles without a scratch. It was even nicknamed "Swinging King" after the way the wielder can take advantage of its weight with a powerful swinging attack. Once he gets it swinging it's unstoppable—anyone who touches it gets sliced apart, whether they are friend, foe, or even he himself.
365.name: Eckesachs

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to the 3 enemies with the lowest HP. Decreases target's speed by {delay1} for a limited time.
skill.name: Whirlwind Blade

abilities.description: Increases 5% of skill DMG of Phantasma team members.
abilities.name: Evil God

366.description:
"Lock eyes and you're done for!"
The spirit of an evil god from Celtic mythology. Witnessing horrific acts as a child gave him the power to render anyone immobile simply by looking in their eyes for a few seconds. He's also skilled at more conventional fighting, and able to create a sea of flames with a simple swing of his arm. Thus, he prefers to work alone so as not to harm the people around him with his evil eye or other powers.
366.name: Balor

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to the enemy with the highest ATK, with a {probability} of inflicting Petrifaction.
skill.name: Eye of Immobility

abilities.description: Increases 20% of skill DMG.
abilities.name: Bitter Candy

367.description:
"Enjoy yourself now, alright?"
The Princess of Wu from the Three Kingdoms period of ancient China. She's long had plans to wear a beloved costume and sell candy throughout the Halloween season. For reasons as yet unclear she holds deep feelings regarding the holiday and is one of many who hope for a quick resolution to the situation at hand.
[Event] Halloween Gets Real
367.name: Sun Shangxiang [Halloween]

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to all enemies, with a {probability} of inflicting Stun.
skill.name: Pumpkins Aplenty

abilities.description: Skill attacks increase 10% DMG taken by targets.
abilities.name: Roar of Fear

368.description:
"You're so fun to scare!"
The spirit of an electric saw with teeth along a round chain. He has great confidence in his ability to scare people and knows that he's a match for any ghoul or ghost when it comes to striking fear into people's hearts. Maybe it's because having an actual chainsaw in your face is a lot scarier than some wispy old ghost...
[Event] Halloween Gets Real
368.name: Chainsaw [Halloween]

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to the row of enemies directly in front. Targets deal {delay1} less DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: Creator of Tragedy

abilities.description: Skill attacks increase 10% target's ATK speed.
abilities.name: Monster Maker

369.description:
"Do you know who I REALLY am?"
The spirit of a scientific genius who created a monster. Unfortunately, in the popular imagination, her name is associated with the monster more than its creator. Since people's ideas are what give life and strength to spirits, her current state of confused identity makes it hard to exert her full strength.
[Event] Halloween Gets Real
369.name: Frankenstein

skill.description: Increases Crit Rate to 3 allies(melee priority)  by {delay1} for a limited time.
skill.name: Dark Monster

37.description:
"Are you sure you wanna do this? Your legs are shaking..."
The spirit of a knife that can flip and fold. Quick-witted and acrobatic. She's good at this one move where she flips around to mess with the enemy's eyes and then jumps in and attacks right where they least expect it. She used to be a gymnast.
37.name: Butterfly Knife

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to the enemy with the highest ATK.
skill.name: Limb From Limb

370.description:
"Hurrrh...hello!"
A zombie spirit. Halloween is the only time of year she can shuffle down the street without scaring anyone. She just loves that feeling, so she looks forward to the holiday every year. She's also a bit of a fashionista and owns tons of clothes...but if she doesn't keep her closet stocked with powerful deodorizers year-round, it can get pretty nasty.
[Event] Halloween Gets Real
370.name: Zombilina

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to a random enemy.
skill.name: The Shambler

abilities.description: Skill attacks increase 20% of DMG dealt by targets.
abilities.name: Watchman in the Dark

371.description:
"I rule all things Halloween!"
The spirit of a carved pumpkin that originated in Europe. He belongs to an organization called the "Halloween Spirit Society," but not many people have ever heard of it. He's very proud of being in charge of the spirits' Halloween festivities, and his attention to detail and concern for participants has earned him much trust and respect. When Halloween is over, he turns back into a pumpkin for the rest of the year.
[Event] Halloween Gets Real
371.name: Jack O. Lantern

skill.description: Restores {value} HP to ally with the lowest percentage of HP. Targets receive {delay1} less DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: Lighting the Way

abilities.description: Increases 10% of the number of soulstones received from battle.
abilities.name: Prestigious Doctor

372.description:
"It's all worth it if my research helps just one person..."
The spirit of a bacteriologist. His many accomplishments include work with yellow fever and syphilis, and even as a spirit he continues researching pathogens and infectious diseases. His work on viruses and vaccines that only affect spirits have earned him the respect of many spirits in the medical field. He's secretly been in contact with the Bureau of the Occult, too, seeing as how the Bureau works with so many different spirits.
[Event] Halloween Gets Real
372.name: Hideyo Noguchi

skill.description: Restores {value} HP to all allies and cures them of Poison.
skill.name: A New Vaccine

abilities.description: Increases 20% of the ATK speed of all allies at the start of the final wave.
abilities.name: Feast of Flies

abilities.description: Restores 10% HP to Phantasma team members at the start of each wave.
abilities.name: Enticing Scent

373.description:
"You're gonna regret saying that later..."
The demonic leader of all things dastardly and diabolical. Seeing the most disturbing beasts on a regular basis has made her pretty much immune to scary costumes, so when it comes to Halloween she can only laugh. But she does get a little freaked out by spirits that are flat-out dangerous—like men running around with chainsaws, for example. She gives off a unique, sweet scent, which has turned out to have some special properties, much to her surprise.
[Event] Halloween Gets Real
373.name: Beelzebub [Halloween]

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to the 3 enemies with the lowest HP. Targets receive {delay1} more DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: Hallowings

abilities.description: Deals 20% more DMG.
abilities.name: Supernatural Bladework

abilities.description: Increases 50% of Skill DMG at the start of the final wave.
abilities.name: Awakened Blade

374.description:
"I guess I've purrrsonally experienced my fur share of fighting."
Muramasa has finally become able to fully utilize her powers as a supernatural blade thanks to her time with Sola. She's overcome her personal issues and can now face anything and everything without fear. She has attained self-confidence at the deepest level thanks to her interactions with other spirits and, most of all, to her courage.
[Event] Halloween Gets Real
374.name: Muramasa [Halloween]

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to the enemy with the highest ATK.
skill.name: Peak Supernatural Power

abilities.description: Increases 10% of Crit Rate.
abilities.name: Wild Child

abilities.description: Skill attacks increase 10% DMG taken by targets.
abilities.name: Avatar of Destruction

375.description:
"Let's set stuff on fire!"
The spirit of the king of monsters from Greek mythology. Whenever something displeases her, she has the slightly inconvenient habit of blasting everything in the area with fire. There's no ill will involved; it's just that she has so much energy welling up inside all the time that she can't help letting it out. Whenever she has one of her incidents, a few of the gods get together to make it look as if nothing ever happened. Consequently, some people consider her a little spoiled.
375.name: Typhon

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to all enemies, with a {probability} of inflicting Burn.
skill.name: Set Ablaze

abilities.description: Reduces 10% DMG taken.
abilities.name: Ghoul's Day Off

abilities.description: Decrease 10% the ATK speed of all foes at the start of each wave.
abilities.name: Ghoulish Discipline

376.description:
"Ugh! Zombie kids these days..."
Something of a princess among flesh-eating monsters. She's the one who started all the Halloween trouble, but she has yet to explain herself. In her eyes, raising the social standing of zombies and ghouls is of utmost importance. That's why she did what she did, even though she knew it would inconvenience others. However, after everything was over, she made sure to go around and offer her sincerest apologies to everyone who was involved.
376.name: Ghoula [Halloween]

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to 1 enemy (melee priority), with a {probability} of inflicting Paralysis.
skill.name: Kiss From a Ghoul

abilities.description: Deals 20% more DMG.
abilities.name: Bow of a Costumed Hero

abilities.description: Skill attacks have 40% chances of inflicting Stun.
abilities.name: Squashdown

377.description:
"I've gotten quite used to the hectic schedule."
An able manager, well-respected among spirit idols. She also happens to be the spirit of a certain hero's favorite bow, but she's better known among spirits for her accomplishments as a manger. She was busily running around in preparation for a Halloween event for her idols when she suddenly got pulled into the whole mess.
377.name: Scarlett Shott [Halloween]

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to the enemy with the lowest HP.
skill.name: Pumpkin Piercer

abilities.description: Restores 10% HP to the 2 allies with the lowest percentage of HP at the start of each wave.
abilities.name: Passion for Scripture

378.description:
"This is my chance to get some fresh converts!"
The spirit of a clergyman from ancient Rome. She tried to take advantage of Halloween to slip in among the monsters, give people a good scare, then revert to her normal self and perform a miracle to win over new converts—the oldest missionary trick in the book! But this got her in some real hot water...
378.name: Georgius [Halloween]

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to the target with the highest ATK. Decreases target's speed by {delay1} for a limited time.
skill.name: Saint's Costuming

abilities.description: Increases 10% of DMG dealt at the start of each wave.
abilities.name: Fervent Study

379.description:
"I'm getting kinda tired of this..."
The spirit of a hero from Japanese mythology. He used to be a powerful male god, but one thing led to another and now he's ended up in the form of a young girl. Perhaps it's this reason that prompted the changes to Lady Kushinada's educational policy—despite being his wife, now that he's a little girl, she tasks Susanoo with three pages of drill work every day. He gets hit with a severe scolding if he slacks off.
379.name: Susanoo [Studious]

skill.description: Restores {value} HP. Target deal {delay1} more DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: Adorable Hero's Summer

38.description:
"One, two, here we go! And another one!"
The more you wave it around, the more things come flying out of this biscuit-looking spirit. It was originally created and used by a demon, but that was a little too violent for her, so she ran away. Ever since she met a certain person on the road, they have been traveling around together.
38.name: Magic Mallet

skill.description: Increases the Crit Rate of 2 allies (melee priority) by {delay1} for a limited time.
skill.name: Descent into Happiness

abilities.description: Reduces 14% the DMG taken by skill targets.
abilities.name: Love and Mischief

380.description:
"We may as well make the most of this!"
The spirit of a goddess from Japanese mythology. As Susanoo's wife, she vowed to support her husband until the day he returned to his original self, and she's been doing everything she can to live up to that promise. But the measures she's taking seem a little, er, biased, what with all the adorable children's clothing she keeps buying...
380.name: Lady Kushinada [Determined]

skill.description: Restores {value} HP to 2 allies (melee priority). Increases targets' speed by {delay1} for a limited time.
skill.name: Dance of Culture

abilities.description: Increases 50% of DMG dealt at the start of the final wave.
abilities.name: In Search of a Head

381.description:
"Hmm... Where DOES my voice come from?"
The spirit of a headless ghost. Many spirits wonder what exactly they'd find if he were to remove his helmet. The fact that he manages to talk despite his head being detached is pretty strange in the first place. Some engineer spirits hypothesize that he uses special speakers to produce sound through willpower alone.
381.name: Dullahan

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to an enemy (ranged priority), reduces target's DEF by {delay1} for a limited time.
skill.name: Headless Horseman

abilities.description: Skill attacks inflict Poison.
abilities.name: Toxic Dragon

382.description:
"Go ahead. Just ask for what you want."
A dwarf from Norse mythology. Whenever he gets excited, he instantly transforms into a dragon. People often speak ill of his greediness, but he doesn't see what's so bad about wanting things. He simply gives a hearty laugh in response, declaring that he'll be the first to follow through with his dreams and desires instead of hesitating and holding back out of fear.
[Event] Guild Conquest
382.name: Fafnir

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to the enemy with the most HP. Target take {delay1} more DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: Embracing Treasure

abilities.description: Increases 30% of Crit DMG by the 2 allies with the highest ATK.
abilities.name: Season of Love

abilities.description: Increases 40% of skill DMG and DMG dealt at the start of the final wave.
abilities.name: Christmas Miracle

383.description:
"Is it already that time of year again...?"
The spirit of a girl found dead in the streets with her dreams only half-fulfilled. Winter is the saddest time for her out of the whole year. Seeing all the lovey-dovey couples strolling around arm in arm, affectionately whispering in each other's ears, it's just so...so...ARGHHH!
[Event] Holidays From Hell
383.name: Restless Ghost [Christmas II]

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to current target, with a {probability} of inflicting Freeze.
skill.name: Wintertime Punch

abilities.description: Restores 11% HP to all allies at the start of each wave.
abilities.name: Gift of Love

384.description:
"I want to see everyone smile, just for one day."
Santa Claus, the gal in the red suit who keeps children all over the world on pins and needles for her yearly visit. She's third in the Santa Claus lineage. No one's really sure how the title is passed down, but it's probably better not to ask too many questions. She figures out what kids want, stocks up on all the things she needs to fulfill their dreams, and then delivers them on Christmas Day—but her job doesn't stop there! She also performs follow-up work in the days afterwards, and she does it all by herself to boot! Needless to say, she's a very talented spirit.
[Event] Holidays From Hell
384.name: Santa Claus the Third

skill.description: Restores {value} HP to all allies; increases targets' speed by {delay1} for a limited time.
skill.name: Coming to Town

abilities.description: 30% chances of inflicting Petrifaction on the enemy with the highest ATK at the start of each wave.
abilities.name: Crimson Invitation

385.description:
"Another slow day..."
The spirit of the red lanterns that have long been an important part of nighttime food culture in Japan. Her lanterns are most commonly found in old-fashioned Japanese-style pubs and bars. Around Christmastime these types of establishments inevitably lose customers to their Western-style counterparts, which never ceases to anger her. Actually, somewhere deep inside she wants to see every shop go all out with Christmas decorations, but her pride in being a part of traditional Japanese culture prevents her from acting on it. And once Christmas is over everyone holds parties to forget the old year and ring in the new one, which always boosts business and puts her back in a good mood.
[Event] Holidays From Hell
385.name: Aka "Red" Chochin [Christmas II]

skill.description: Restores {value} HP to ally with the highest ATK. Targets deal {delay1} more DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: Christmas Lantern

386.description:
"Ah... Another hard day of delifurring packages!"
The spirit of the famous familiar, the black cat. She always follows her employer's words to the letter. One day she was helping out with deliveries, and the next thing she knew she was being treated like an expert in parcel delivery. This is surely due to her sincere yet shrewd attitude and earnest effort to get the job done... However, the quantity of work is starting to be too much for her to manage. Nevertheless, she continues dashing around each day on her mission to help spirits with their deliveries.
[Event] Holidays From Hell
386.name: Kuroneko

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to an enemy (ranged priority).
skill.name: Dark Delivery Woman

abilities.description: Skill attacks increase target's ATK speed by 25%.
abilities.name: Robo-Maid

387.description:
"Greetings, human. What can I do to serve."
A humanoid, all-purpose servant robot created by Satan. There are various theories about her appearance, but apparently she was modeled on Satan herself, with a few extra touches to make people more inclined to ask her for help.
[Special Bond] Increases Satan’s skill DMG
[Event] Holidays From Hell

[Special Bond] Increases {#MonsterName#389}’s skill DMG
[Event] Holidays From Hell

387.name: Mayd N. Hell

skill.description: Restores {value} HP to 3 allies with the lowest percentage of HP. Targets deal {delay1} more DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: Super Service

abilities.description: Increases 7% of skill DMG by Divina team members.
abilities.name: Beautiful Poet

388.description:
"Now I can come up with a wonderful new song, hehe!"
The spirit of a poet of irresistible beauty. She's also considered one of the 36 Immortal Poets. It's not just her looks that make her popular, but also the special style in which she sings—her intense, undulating emotions naturally capture many teenage spirits' hearts. She travels around Japan performing as a singer-songwriter, but she refuses to sing in huge concert halls, preferring small, acoustic venues instead.
[Special Bond] Increases Ono-no-Takamura’s skill DMG
[Event] Holidays From Hell

changes.new:

388.name: Ono-no-Komachi

skill.description: Restores {value} HP to 2 allies (melee priority). Targets receive {delay1} less DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: Heart Hitter

abilities.description: Deals 23% more DMG.
abilities.name: Apocalypse

abilities.description: Increases 25% of Crit Rate at the start of the final wave.
abilities.name: Super Devil

389.description:
"The tough thing about Christmas is that it's only once a year..."
A spirit that reigns supreme over her home of Hell. She's forced to act as Hell's Santa Claus just because their names are spelled similarly. Beyond that, however, she's actually pretty much your average girl obsessed with beauty and fashion. She's an honorary member of a spa in Hell called "Cocytus," and on her off days she likes to take a dip in their cold baths to keep her skin healthy and fresh.
[Event] Holidays From Hell
389.name: Satan

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to the enemy with the highest ATK and decreases targets' speed by {delay1} for a limited time.
skill.name: Invitation to Hell

39.description:
"Alright, comrades! Follow my lead!"
The niece of Oda Nobunaga. A skilled orator with the gift of gab, whose distinctive timbre possesses a devilishly beguiling allure. As skilled at intimidating enemies as she is at inspiring feats of courage in others, she boasts a long line of ardent followers who hang on (or are controlled by?) her every word.
39.name: Lady Chacha

skill.description: Increases DMG dealt by 2 allies (ranged priority) by {delay1} for a limited time.
skill.name: Rousing Rhetoric Energy

abilities.description: Increases 30% of ATK speed.
abilities.name: Well Lover

abilities.description: Increases 11% of DMG dealt by Divina team members at the start of the final wave.
abilities.name: Ph.D. in Hell Studies

390.description:
"Traveling around Hell is nice, but one trip is enough."
An expert on Hell who is very knowledgeable. He's been to Hell many times and is an outstanding scholar, with many books on Hell to his name. He claims to be Ono-no-Komachi's grandfather, which even Ono-no-Komachi herself acknowledges to a certain extent. His love for his granddaughter transforms his personality completely, shocking many spirits who are used to his more academic persona. It's like how superheroes have wildly different alter egos, and no one is quite sure which personality is the real one.
[Event] Holidays From Hell
[Special Bond] Increases “Ono-no-Komachi” max HP

390.name: Ono-no-Takamura

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to the enemy with the lowest HP, with a {probability} of inflicting Silence.
skill.name: Well to Hell

abilities.description: Increases 15% of Skill DMG.
abilities.name: Pinnacle of Ninjutsu

391.description:
"The shadows don't speak..."
The spirit of a legendary, ultra top-grade ninja. Apparently her name is actually a title reserved for ninjas who have reached an extremely advanced level. As a ninja she performs dirty work in society's dark underbelly...but that's not enough to earn a living these days. So Hattori started working a so-called "day job" at the Bureau of the Occult, although no one's sure what exactly her job entails.
391.name: Hattori Hanzo

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to the enemy with the lowest HP. Target take {delay1} more DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: Shadowy Intruder

abilities.description: Reduces 7% of DMG dealt by all foes at the start of each wave.
abilities.name: Star of Pride

392.description:
"My sister is so annoying..."
The spirit of the world-renowned, one-and-only boss of Hell. Also famous as a perennial favorite pop idol. He's rumored to have some relationship with Satan, but the details are shrouded in mystery. There's a theory that this is why he acts so aloof and hard to approach despite his position in the public eye. Maybe, just maybe...he's actually a kind, normal young man? He would never admit as much, that's for sure.
[Special Bond] Increases Satan’s skill DMG

392.name: Lucifer [Christmas II]

skill.description: Restores {value} HP to 2 allies (ranged priority). Targets receive {delay1} less DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: Christmas Special

abilities.description: Increases 10% of skill DMG of all anima allies.
abilities.name: Power of Ice

abilities.description: Decreases 6% of the ATK speed of all foes at the start of each wave.
abilities.name: Snow Festival

393.description:
"Winter's here, so it's time for you-know-what...SNOWMEN!"
The spirit of snowmen. Whenever you see a snow-related festival or event you can bet that she's involved somehow or other. She even has a special reputation when it comes to carving ice sculptures. Lately there've been stories that she's trying to boost the popularity of winter sports by constructing an indoor ski slope, among other things.
393.name: Miss Snowman [Christmas II]

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to 2 enemies (melee priority), with a {probability} of inflicting Freeze.
skill.name: Arctic Xmas

abilities.description: Increases 35% of ATK speed.
abilities.name: Prohibited Materials

394.description:
"Well, I was really young back then, so, you know..."
The spirit of a courier who caused a lot of trouble with the things he delivered. He has powerful legs suited for the job, so he's kept making deliveries all over Japan to this day. However, he's afraid that his workload is starting to get close to that of Kuroneko. Nevertheless, he's happy and proud to be responsible for the cycle of joy created between sender and receiver as he delivers their most precious packages.
394.name: Umegawa Chubei

skill.description: Increases all allies' speed by {delay1} for a limited time.
skill.name: On the Move

abilities.description: Reflects 20% of DMG taken back to attacker.
abilities.name: Magic-Dispelling Mirror

395.description:
"Is that really the truth?"
The spirit of a mirror said to reflect reality. Whether he can actually do this is another question. Regardless, he's currently working as a freelance journalist who exposes shady goings-on in society. He calls himself a fighter for justice. Many in the spirit world know and rely on him as a source of information.
395.name: Shomakyo

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to an enemy (ranged priority). Targets take {delay1} more DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: Exposer of Darkness

abilities.description: Deals 20% more DMG.
abilities.name: Battle Princess

396.description:
"Let my lightning reduce them to ashes!"
An outstanding commander who rivals any of her male counterparts, and the daughter of Tachibana Dosetsu. AKA "Raijin." She's known for the lively fighting style she learned from her wild father. He dotes on his daughter a lot—a little too much, some might say—raising eyebrows with his intense physical affection. But she's kind enough to accept that this is just his unique way of expressing his fatherly love to her.
396.name: Tachibana Ginchiyo

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to 3 enemies (melee priority), with a {probability} of inflicting Paralysis.
skill.name: Princess Raijin

abilities.description: Reduces 15% of DMG taken.
abilities.name: Elucidator

397.description:
"You the man, Lucifer!"
A spirit that serves Lucifer. She works for the same pop idol company as Lucifer but hasn't been quite as successful, leaving her with an empty schedule almost every single day. She also has a big secret to share with the world...but that's another story altogether.
397.name: Agaliarept

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to 2 enemies (ranged priority), Targets deal {delay1} less DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: Mask of Many Mysteries

abilities.description: Increases 40% of DMG dealt at the start of the final wave.
abilities.name: Guan's Crescent

398.description:
"Show me something I can't cut! I dare you!"
The spirit of Guan Yu's beloved sword, the Frost Fair Blade. "Green Dragon" is actually just a nickname, but as it's more widely known, she doesn't mind when people use it since it only gives her greater strength. She's even taken to hiding her true name on purpose, because it's so fun to meet the rare person who actually knows it. Between the way people imagine her to be and the size of her own ego, she has considerable latent powers.
[Event] Guild Conquest
398.name: Green Dragon Crescent

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to current target, with a {probability} of inflicting Stun.
skill.name: Frost's Fair Gleam

abilities.description: Increases 10% of ATK speed of all allies.
abilities.name: Dulcet Tones

399.description:
"Battle awaits."
The spirit of Musashibo Benkei's naginata. Though his skill with a blade is undoubtedly what made him famous, his voice is what's endeared him to spirits fortunate to hear him sing. His deep voice resonates into the core of the listener and gently caresses their soul. As a spirit celebrity, he might rival the great Yoshitsune himself, though you wouldn't know it from talking to him. Fame is a foreign concept to the spirit.
399.name: Naginata Iwatooshi

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to an enemy (ranged priority) and decreases targets' speed by {delay1} for a limited time.
skill.name: Chivalrous Strike

abilities.description: Reduces 90% of DMG taken when near death.
abilities.name: Persistent Fighter

abilities.description: Increases 20% of skill DMG.
abilities.name: Mass Destruction

4.description:
"BOOM! BOOM!"
The spirit of a hammer from Norse mythology. People say her big bust is also like a "red hot hammer," and in a sense it does have incredible destructive power. Well, maybe they're more like spheres than hammers... But still, perhaps because of that destructive power, she is often found amid scrap heaps and junkyards. She may not show it publicly, but in fact she has had some terribly difficult times living in poverty. That's why she's so stingy. But, since she's also scatterbrained, she loses her purse a lot.
[Special Bond] Increases DMG dealt by Chidori.

changes.new:
"BOOM! BOOM!"
The spirit of a hammer from Norse mythology. People say her big bust is also like a "red hot hammer," and in a sense it does have incredible destructive power. Well, maybe they're more like spheres than hammers... But still, perhaps because of that destructive power, she is often found amid scrap heaps and junkyards. She may not show it publicly, but in fact she has had some terribly difficult times living in poverty. That's why she's so stingy. But, since she's also scatterbrained, she loses her purse a lot.
[Special Bond] Increases DMG dealt by Chidori.

She may not show it publicly, but in fact she has had some terribly difficult times living in poverty. That's why she's so stingy. But, since she's also scatterbrained, she loses her purse a lot.
[Special Bond] Increases DMG dealt by {#MonsterName#218}.

4.name: Mjölnir

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to all enemies.
skill.name: Lightning Hammer

abilities.description: Increases 5% of max HP of Phantasma team members.
abilities.name: Ghoulish Guv'nor

40.description:
"Wot's that, eh?! You startin'?!"
A fierce little number who's used to ruling the roost. She might look small, but there's nothing diminutive about this lairy lass. Quick to jump into action when her pals get into scrapes, she's widely admired by her spirited chums. Unfortunately, she can be a tad testy when tempted, and has been known to shower those she's sweet on with insults instead of kisses.
40.name: Nurarihyon

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to all enemies; decreases targets' speed by {delay1} for a limited time.
skill.name: Minion March

abilities.description: Normal attacks have 4% chances of inflicting stun.
abilities.name: Heavenly Allure

400.description:
"Beauty this fierce takes hard work."
The daughter of the Jade Emperor and Queen Mother of the West, who all appear in the Chinese classic, "The Creation of the Gods." She believes her beauty has no equal, not due to narcissism, but from a true sense of self-worth. It doesn't hurt that she really is quite stunning. Given her inhuman efforts to maintain her appearance, rather than ridicule her claim people tend to respect her for it.
400.name: Princess Longji

skill.description: Restores {value} HP to 3 allies with the lowest percentage of HP. Targets receive {delay1} less DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: Palm of Her Hand

abilities.description: Increases 10% of DMG dealt; Increases 20% of ATK speed.
abilities.name: Split Decision

401.description:
"What? Where'd my lower half go?"
A spirit with the frightening ability to separate her upper body from the rest. A magician whose tricks leave her audience as discombobulated as she is dismembered. As much as she tries to paint the illusion that it's all a clever trick, her audiences almost always get wise to the reality behind it, though they try not to spoil it for her.
401.name: Manananggal

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to 2 enemies (ranged priority), Targets take {delay1} more DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: Split Attack

abilities.description: Increases 35% of skill DMG.
abilities.name: Divine Dance

402.description:
"Holidays are for relaxing."
The spirit of a New Year's decoration. This festival maiden is often in charge of celebrations close to New Year's, such as the dedication dance of the Ama-no-Iwato Festival. Her grace and elegance have always caught the eye of spirits young and old. A shame, then, that she saves such appearances for end of year festivities. Her turntable skills pay the bills the rest of the year, and have earned her a reputation for throwing the best raves. No matter the occasion, she'll make sure you have a great time.
[Event] Farewell Rooster, Hello Year of the Dog
402.name: Kagami Mochi

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to current target. Target receives {delay1} more DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: All Ages Throwdown

abilities.description: Increases 10% of DMG of all Phantasma allies.
abilities.name: Gods' Guide

403.description:
"Right, that's it! You're gonna get it now!"
Host of the last New Year's festival and special advisor to the most recent one. Her dedication to showing the gods a good time on tour has her excited for this year's festival. Something about this year has her putting more meaning into the event than usual, possibly due to her strong sense of tradition and history. This is at direct odds with Orthrus, of course, whose carefree attitude to the weight of history is hard for her to stomach.
[Event] Farewell Rooster, Hello Year of the Dog
403.name: Yatagarasu [Festival]

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to the 3 enemies with the highest ATK, with a {probability} of inflicting Burn.
skill.name: Fireball Shot

abilities.description: Increases 6% of DMG dealt by the 2 allies with the highest ATK.
abilities.name: Timely Response

404.description:
"First come, first served!"
Spirit of a sake reserved as an offering to the gods. Whenever a festival is on, she's the first to volunteer to hand out drinks to festivalgoers. History remembers her as a stickler for sake standards, but she's quite proud of her adaptability to timely trends, even trying her hand at improving cocktail recipes. This year she may even add a bit of bubbles to her mix.
[Event] Farewell Rooster, Hello Year of the Dog
404.name: Miki Sake

skill.description: Restores {value} HP to the 3 allies with the lowest percentage of HP.
skill.name: Drink Distributor

405.description:
"That's a great idea!"
The spirit of a mountain cat who metamorphized later in life. The wielder of remarkably strong spirit essence, perhaps due to years of training and dedication to unlocking her latent powers. However, after living life to the full for all those years, her spirit is all but spent, as shamed as she is to admit it. The festival's calamity was most likely down to her careless attitude to partying.
[Event] Farewell Rooster, Hello Year of the Dog
405.name: Senri

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to the 2 enemies with the least HP.
skill.name: Kitty Fury

abilities.description: Increases 12% of skill DMG dealt by Divina team members at the start of the final wave.
abilities.name: Nighttime Me

406.description:
"It's so wrong, yet...so right!"
The spirit of the feline-headed deity of Egyptian legend. Typically known as a woman of sophistication, given the right circumstances she'll transform into a fiend of the flesh, seeking lustful encounters with spirits of any gender as long as they're younger than her. Though her mind often says "no," her body can't help but say "yes."
[Event] Farewell Rooster, Hello Year of the Dog
406.name: Bastet

skill.description: Deals {delay1} more DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: Look of Desire

abilities.description: Reduces 5% of skill DMG dealt by all foes at the start of each wave.
abilities.name: Arbitrator

407.description:
"Okay, sure, I'm being a nuisance. What's your point?"
The spirit of a chariot of fire that was once a cat. Known for her grave-robbing and body-burning past, recent years have seen her turn her hand to putting out fires rather than starting them. That doesn't always go to plan, of course. She's usually the one who sparks the flame of discord or presses someone's buttons, later struggling to make amends. Oh, and ironically she finds herself on fire sometimes, too.
[Event] Farewell Rooster, Hello Year of the Dog
407.name: Fyre Chariot

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to 3 enemies (melee priority), with a {probability} of inflicting Freeze.
skill.name: Extinguish

abilities.description: Increases 20% of the number of soulstones received from battle.
abilities.name: Sales Success

abilities.description: 50% chances of restores 70% HP to the ally with the lowest percentage of HP at the start of each wave.
abilities.name: Luck be a Cat

408.description:
"Sales is all about gaining their trust."
The spirit of a cat that beckons sales success. There isn't a person out there who doesn't know the power of this spirit to bring good luck. Not ashamed to use a charm offensive to get what he wants, he'll try any trick of the trade to get the target to pay up, which is possibly why he comes across as shallow and fake. There's no ill intent below the contrived persona, though, and others know deep down he's a bastion of virtue.
[Event] Farewell Rooster, Hello Year of the Dog
408.name: Tomcat Charming

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to current target; reduces target's DEF by {delay1} for a limited time.
skill.name: Lucky Punch

abilities.description: Increases 53% of Skill DMG.
abilities.name: Watchdog Might

409.description:
"Dude... Stop buggin' me. I'll do it, okay?"
The guard dog spirit who watches over Geryon's herd. Chosen as the cultural ambassador for the festival, in charge of facilitating exchanges between local and foreign spirits. In the past she balked at any opportunity to participate in stuffy old traditions, but she knows she must try harder to at least give them a try. She's really in her element when she's moaning about things that annoy her. Predictably rebellious for a girl her age.
[Event] Farewell Rooster, Hello Year of the Dog
409.name: Orthrus [Festival]

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to the row of enemies directly in front. Decreases target's speed by {delay1} for a limited time.
skill.name: First Bite

abilities.description: Increases 30% of DMG dealt when this daemon is Team Leader.
abilities.name: Hallowed Master

41.description:
"Hehe... D'ya want to see me get angry?"
Demonic leader of all things dastardly and diabolical. She sets to quaking the boots of even the most hardened of hellish heroes, and rules the underworld with an iron fist. Word has it her rather..."unique" body odor is a bit of a sore point—any known to have asked about it vanish quicker than you can say "deodorant deficit."
41.name: Beelzebub

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to 2 enemies (ranged priority).
skill.name: Soaring Skull

abilities.description: 50% chances of inflicting Silence to skill targets.
abilities.name: Devilry Revelry

abilities.description: Skill attacks by Phantasma team members have 25% chances of inflicting Silence.
abilities.name: A God's Whim

410.description:
"Well, look at that. This could be interesting..."
The spirit of a trickster from Northern European mythology. A mischievous soul who gets his kicks from watching other spirits squabble. Often represents Norse spirits in affairs related to the Bureau, and played a part in choosing organizers for the end of year festival.
410.name: Loki [Festival]

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to the enemy with the most HP, with a {probability} of inflicting Burn.
skill.name: Elaborate Prank

abilities.description: Increases 10% of DMG dealt by Divina team members when this daemon is Team Leader.
abilities.name: Guardian Spirit

abilities.description: All melee foes take 8% more DMG at the start of each wave.
abilities.name: Ultimate God

411.description:
"Neutrality and ambivalence to all things...that is what matters."
The symbol of the sun itself and guardian spirit of all Japan's celebrations. A lonesome spirit, her easily unnerved disposition means even close proximity to even the most respectful of others can trigger her anxiety. That said, according to her, it is her dignity that's at risk by such closeness. Nevertheless, her courage does not abandon her when the moment arises, and for that she is eternally admired.
411.name: Goddess Amaterasu

skill.description: Restores {value} HP to 2 allies with the lowest percentage of HP and cures them of all negative status effects.
skill.name: Sunrise

abilities.description: Increases 20% of Crit DMG by the 2 allies with the highest ATK.
abilities.name: Virtuoso Performance

412.description:
"Hehe. I love how every year has a New Year's!"
The spirit of an elf based on an elementary particle and member of the elven dance group "ELF 118." Since she was the 31st member of the group, it's become her role to perform a solo set on New Year's Eve every year. Sure, the audience at the outdoor venue is usually freezing, but she's proud to declare there have been no cases of frostbite at her shows! She claims it's because she gives her audience such a warm welcome.
412.name: Galea Elf

skill.description: Increases DMG dealt by all allies by {delay1} for a limited time.
skill.name: Countdown

abilities.description: Increases 14% all Anima team members' Crit Rate when this daemon is Team Leader.
abilities.name: Talisman

413.description:
"Evil energy, you say? Point me right at it!"
The spirit of arrows offered as a congratulatory gift to new shops, or at celebrations. Born with great innate spiritual power, she is drawn to persuading those who have turned to evil and sin to ask for forgiveness. Don't be fooled, though. She isn't afraid to give those beyond her righteous reach the rough treatment. While for the past thousand years she's often partnered with Lucky Bow, Quiver tends to do the heavy lifting. Even alone, she can more than hold her own as a exorcist of evil.
413.name: Lucky Quiver

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to enemy with highest ATK, target receives {delay1} more DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: Exorcism

abilities.description: Reduces 6% of DMG dealt by all foes at the start of each wave.
abilities.name: Buzzkill

414.description:
"Hah. You can't fool me. You're all the same."
The goddess of bad luck and calamity. Her sister is the goddess of fortune, Kishijoten. The sisters are rarely separated, which might explain Kokuanten's dark disposition. You see, so much time spent in the shadow of her sister's enviable beauty has turned her heart black. They say her soul is a labyrinth of complexities.
414.name: Kokuanten

skill.description: Reduces all enemies' DEF by {delay1} for a limited time.
skill.name: Doom and Gloom

abilities.description: Increases 6% of skill DMG of Phantasma team members.
abilities.name: Commander-in-Chief

415.description:
"All your secrets are laid bare before me."
President of Hell and commander of a demon army. Familiar to most when taking her lion form. Her majestic facade conceals a sinister undercoat of secret-trading and spymastery. Her ability to morph into a lion is thought to be just one of her powers. Her network knows no class lines or geographical boundary, but despite that, with her ever-changing appearance, she doesn't end up with many casual acquaintances.
415.name: Marbas

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to a random enemy, Decreases target speed by {delay1} for a limited time.
skill.name: Information Peddler

abilities.description: Increases 22% of the number of soulstones received from battle.
abilities.name: Commercial Flight

416.description:
"Well, if you put it like that, I am a jack-of-all-trades."
The spirit of the two snake-coiled staff Hermes treasured. Well known as a symbol of pharmacists throughout the world, and often spotted at medical facilities, though she will deny it if confronted with such reports. Why, then, she would tell you her job is to provide medical and technology services is difficult to explain.
416.name: Caduceus

skill.description: Restores {value} HP to all allies. Targets receive {delay1} less DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: Economical Development

abilities.description: Deals 30% more DMG.
abilities.name: Bontenmaru

417.description:
"Behold my belated genius!"
The spirit of the 17th head of the Date clan. Also known as the "One-Eyed Dragon." Historically speaking, she should be male, but disturbances in the Ryumaku Leyline caused her to take the form of a woman. This transformation has led to many inconveniences, most notably the loss of much of her physical strength. So she's constantly grumbling about wanting to be a man again.
[Event] Guild Conquest
417.name: Date Masamune [Dragon Form]

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to the enemy with the highest ATK.Targets deal {delay1} less DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: A Dragon's Threat

abilities.description: 50% chances of increasing 10% DMG dealt at the start of each wave.
abilities.name: Klutz

abilities.description: Increases 50% of skill DMG of the 2 allies with highest ATK at the start of the final wave.
abilities.name: Agent of Love

418.description:
"I'll shoot till I can't shoot no more!"
The spirit of the god of love in Roman mythology. She wishes earnestly for more close and heartfelt interactions between spirits, and she looses her arrows one after another to make this happen. But she often fails to think things through, and ends up causing more trouble than anything else. She's also one of the Battle Dating organizers.
[Event]Free-For-All Love Match: Battle Dating!
418.name: Amor

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to the enemy with the lowest HP, with a {probability} of inflicting Stun.
skill.name: Arrow of Love

abilities.description: Reduces 30% of DMG taken.
abilities.name: Prudent Approach

419.description:
"There are other strategies out there, too, you know..."
The spirit of a tight and powerful battle formation used by heavily armored soldiers in Ancient Greece. It involves tightening defenses while slowly encircling the enemy, which some call the "romantic" approach. Phalanx herself is a self-proclaimed late-bloomer when it comes to matters of the heart, but she makes her own batch of uniquely soft chocolates to celebrate Valentine's Day every year nonetheless.
[Event]Free-For-All Love Match: Battle Dating!
419.name: Phalanx

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to a wide area of enemies.Decreases target's speed by {delay1} for a limited time.
skill.name: Phalanx Formation, GO!

abilities.description: Reduces 25% of DMG taken.
abilities.name: Fox's Blessing

42.description:
"One forged sword, comin' right up!"
An Anima with a voracious appetite for deep-fried tofu. This sword-tempering master's work includes some of the finest blades known to man or spirit. She's also famed for her sharp tongue, and is a hit among fellow spirits for her witty comebacks. In fact, her only weakness is her utter inability to resist deep-fried tofu, which she guzzles down with a gusto bordering on manic.
42.name: Kogitsunemaru

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to the row of enemies directly in front.
skill.name: Vexing Vixen

abilities.description: Increases 5% of ATK speed of all allies.
abilities.name: Light and Sweet

420.description:
"Ooh, I could really go for something sweet!"
The spirit of soft and pure white chocolate. This type of chocolate is thought to have started as a special treat for nobility, which also explains her "sweet Lolita" fashion choices. She and Chocolat Noir are like sisters, though they're not actually blood-related. She loves to boss Noir around and tell her what to do—out of the deepest mutual respect, of course.
[Special Bond] Increases “Chocolat Noir” max HP
[Event]Free-For-All Love Match: Battle Dating!

[Event]Free-For-All Love Match: Battle Dating!

420.name: Chocolat Blanc

skill.description: Restores {value} HP to the ally with the lowest percentage of HP. Target deals {delay1} more DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: Pale Pity

421.description:
"I hope you don't mind that I can be a bit blunt now and then."
The spirit of firm, dark chocolate. The bitter taste is prefered by those with a more refined palette, and you could also call her word choice a tad bitter at times. Noir gets along well with the self-absorbed Chocolat Blanc, having mastered the art of letting Blanc feel like she's in charge while actually controlling her all the while.
[Special Bond] Increases “Chocolat Blanc”’s skill DMG
[Event]Free-For-All Love Match: Battle Dating!

421.name: Chocolat Noir

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to current target.
skill.name: Dark Diversion

abilities.description: Restores 5% HP to all allies at the start of each wave.
abilities.name: Goddess of Grain

422.description:
"I wonder where our next meal will come from?"
The goddess of food in Japanese mythology. Though she maintains a somewhat strong connection with Susanoo, she's reluctant to discuss the details. She's also the family-oriented type who loves to look after others. If she hears you complaining about being hungry, she'll produce a home-cooked meal seemingly out of nowhere. This may be related to the rumor that she carries around massive amounts of Tupperware wherever she goes.
[Event]Free-For-All Love Match: Battle Dating!
422.name: Ogetsu Hime

skill.description: Restores {value} HP to 2 allies with the lowest percentage of HP and increases targets' speed by {delay1} for a limited time.
skill.name: Homemade Bento

abilities.description: Reduces 30% of DMG taken and increases 30% of ATK speed when HP is 1/2 or below.
abilities.name: Chains of Restraint

423.description:
"Grrr... GYAAHHH!"
One of the violent-natured brutes that appeared out of nowhere. Though they seem to attack spirits indiscriminately, there is some order to their madness—they are actually unique in that they only rampage within the confines of the Battle Dating area. They won't attack anyone who's not a participant.
[Event]Free-For-All Love Match: Battle Dating!
423.name: Durga Magatsu

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to current target; decreases target's speed by {delay1} for a limited time.
skill.name: Bite

abilities.description: Increases 10% of Crit Rate and ATK speed.
abilities.name: Ten Sacred Weapons

abilities.description: 50% probability of increasing 10% DMG dealt at the start of each wave.
abilities.name: Hunter of Evil Gods

424.description:
"Well, I have nothing better to do... I-I mean! I'm ever so honored to be here!"
The spirit of a Hindu goddess. She used all manner of legendary weapons in the wars of the gods to destroy advancing armies, and she displays top-notch prowess in even the most tiring battles. However, she's not so good when it comes to strategies for love and romance. So she decided to join Battle Dating in hopes of finding a kind, strong, and dependable man...
[Event]Free-For-All Love Match: Battle Dating!
424.name: Durga

skill.description: Restores {value} HP. Target deal {delay1} more DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: 10,000 Weapons

abilities.description: Reduces 35% of DMG taken.
abilities.name: Undying Loyalty

425.description:
"I stand together with my brothers at all times!"
The spirit of a warrior that served Liu Bei of Shu Han during the Three Kingdoms Period of Chinese history. He is sworn brothers with both Liu Bei and Zhang Fei. The sublime nature of their bond is hard for others to understand, and some feel uncomfortable just being around him, but his outstanding battle skills combined with his very stoic nature make him extremely popular with men. Some say he needs a good, strong woman who can handle a man like him.
[Special Bond] Increases “Red Hare” normal ATK
[Event]Free-For-All Love Match: Battle Dating!

changes.new:
"I stand together with my brothers at all times!"
The spirit of a warrior that served Liu Bei of Shu Han during the Three Kingdoms Period of Chinese history. He is sworn brothers with both Liu Bei and Zhang Fei. The sublime nature of their bond is hard for others to understand, and some feel uncomfortable just being around him, but his outstanding battle skills combined with his very stoic nature make him extremely popular with men. Some say he needs a good, strong woman who can handle a man like him.
[Special Bond] Increases “Red Hare” normal ATK
[Event]Free-For-All Love Match: Battle Dating!

The sublime nature of their bond is hard for others to understand, and some feel uncomfortable just being around him, but his outstanding battle skills combined with his very stoic nature make him extremely popular with men.
