[Special Bond] Increases “{#MonsterName#86}” normal ATK
[Event]Free-For-All Love Match: Battle Dating!

425.name: Guan Yu

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to the row of enemies directly in front.
skill.name: All in One

abilities.description: All divina allies take 9% less DMG taken.
abilities.name: Love Evangelist

426.description:
"Who knows what surprises the future holds..."
The goddess of marriage and childbirth in Roman mythology. "June brides" are famously blessed with her favor. With a reputation as an event organizer often involved in events related to love and romance, it should come as no surprise that she was the one who came up with the idea for the Battle Dating event as a way to help bring spirits together. When asked about her motivations for doing it, she simply explains: "Everyone enjoys watching other people's love lives!"
426.name: Juno

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to the 2 enemies with the highest ATK, target receives {delay1} more DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: Love Affair

abilities.description: Deals 20% more DMG.
abilities.name: Cursed Sword

abilities.description: Skill attacks increase 10% of DMG taken by targets.
abilities.name: Unhealing Wounds

427.description:
"I came all the way here, so why not?"
The spirit of a cursed sword from Norse mythology. Folklore states that "once drawn from its scabbard, the sword may not be returned until it has tasted fresh blood." True to the legend, once he leaves home, he can't return without hitting on at least one woman. But, he's also the type to lose interest after the first date. He's run into all sorts of trouble over the years, so he decided to join Battle Dating for a fresh start, free from the bonds of his past.
427.name: Dáinsleif

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to the 2 enemies with the least HP, with a {probability} of inflicting Paralysis.
skill.name: Whetted Blade

abilities.description: Absorbs 26% of DMG dealt as HP.
abilities.name: Washing Blood with Blood

428.description:
"I'll destroy everything from right here to waaay over there!"
The goddess of slaughter and destruction in Hindu mythology. She's exceedingly simple-minded and gets carried away very easily, loving nothing more than a bloody battlefield where she can fight to her heart's content. Her undying, almost sublime appetite for destruction has real bite—as in, she'll eat just about anything. The slightest movement from her makes others break out in a cold sweat, and yet no one dislikes her. This is apparently thanks to the simplistic, almost child-like joy she takes in what she does.
428.name: Kali

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to current target; decreases target's speed by {delay1} for a limited time.
skill.name: Destroy

abilities.description: Normal attacks have 3% chances of inflicting Stun.
abilities.name: Giant's Gaze

abilities.description: Increases 15% of DMG dealt.
abilities.name: Master Craftsman

429.description:
"Ah, there we go!"
The spirit of a one-eyed giant from Greek mythology. He has surprisingly nimble fingers and has achieved great things as a craftsman. He tends to wander off on adventures, gather materials along the way, then get to work and create something new. His ability to pull this off is almost like magic.
429.name: Cyclops

skill.description: Restores {value} HP and receives {delay1} less DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: Complete Concentration

abilities.description: Increases 10% of DMG dealt.
abilities.name: Tempestuous Talisman

43.description:
"Back in the woods, eh? Those were the good ol' days..."
The Anima of Kintaro's legendary trusty battleaxe. After years at Kintaro's side through thick and thin, the two developed an almost brotherly bond. They don't seem to spend as much time together as they used to, but you know what they say—once a BFF...
[Special Bond] Increases DMG dealt by Kintaro.
43.name: Kintaro's Axe

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to surrounding enemies.
skill.name: Here Cometh The Thunder God

abilities.description: Increases 50% of the number of soulstones received from battle.
abilities.name: China Town

430.description:
"Hush! You're standing in the presence of a god, you know."
The spirit of a shrine dedicated to Guan Yu. As the legend of the great warrior Guan Yu was told and retold over the years, she eventually came to be known for his commercial rather than martial prowess. This new version of him in people's minds bestowed Marsha with real business skills—yet another intriguing example of the interplay between humans and spirits.
430.name: Marsha L. Shrine

skill.description: Increases Crit Rate to 3 allies (ranged priority) by {delay1} for a limited time.
skill.name: Infinite Abacus

abilities.description: Deals 21% more DMG.
abilities.name: Servant of Thunder

431.description:
"Over here, mow!"
The spirit of the Tao goddess of thunder. She's proud of how her name is both striking and cute. Her name also explains why she likes to say "mow" at the end of every sentence. But don't be put off by her cuteness—as a deity of thunder, she has the astonishing ability to command lightning at will. You probably don't want to make her angry.
431.name: Leizi Mow-Mow

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to current target, with a {probability} of inflicting Paralysis.
skill.name: Thunderstrike

abilities.description: 70% chances of inflicting Burn to Normal attacks targets.
abilities.name: Breath of Flame

432.description:
"Look out, comin' through! Outta my way!"
The spirit of hot wind that melts away snow in the mountains. She originally comes from the Rocky Mountains. People basically consider her a nuisance since she makes things extremely hot and dry wherever she goes. But she insists that it's not her fault—the tall mountains are to blame for this very natural phenomenon.
432.name: Snow Eater

skill.description: A {probability} of inflicting Burn to all enemies.
skill.name: Heat Gun

abilities.description: All Phantasma allies take 6% less DMG taken.
abilities.name: Smothering Love

433.description:
"I told you to clean that up!"
The goddess of the Mesopotamian sea. Also known as a flood-causing dragon. Though the goddess of love and creation, she also wields her will over chaos and fear. Her strict enforcement of tidiness and common courtesy leads to some uncomfortable situations. When a dear one leaves the toys she gave them out, she'll throw them away--love and chaos. If you hadn't guessed, she's the kind of mother you'd best obey at once.
[Event] Guild Conquest
433.name: Tiamat [Dragon Form]

skill.description: Restores {value} HP to all allies.
skill.name: Spring Clean

abilities.description: Reduces 20% of DMG taken.
abilities.name: Hidden Embarrassment

abilities.description: Increases 40% of DMG dealt at the start of the final wave.
abilities.name: Flight of Fancy

434.description:
"Come on, this isn't a joke!"
A spirit who likes to think up pranks to play on people. She hasn't been playing too many pranks lately, but still suffers blowback from ones she's played in the past. This can lead to misunderstandings at the most crucial of moments. The chocolates she hands out could contain a sharp blade, for example...or maybe they're completely normal, sweet as can be. Which is it, which could it be?!
[Event]The Hina Doll Squad
434.name: Amanojaku [Valentine's Day]

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to the enemy with the most HP. Target take {delay1} more DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: Chocolate Surprise

abilities.description: Increases 30% of skill DMG by all team members when this daemon is Team Leader.
abilities.name: Sense of Superiority

435.description:
"Huh? Is that for me...?"
The spirit of one of the Four Heavenly Kings of Raiko who rid the capital of evil that lurked within. When that day in February rolls around each year, even Kintaro gets worked up about it in his own special way. Will he ever get something sweet from a close and trusted partner of his own...? That's what he secretly thinks about sometimes.
[Event]The Hina Doll Squad
435.name: Kintaro [Valentine's Day]

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to surrounding enemies, with a {probability} of inflicting Stun to targets.
skill.name: Energetic Aura

abilities.description: Reduces 30% of DMG taken.
abilities.name: Unbreakable Chocolate

436.description:
"Mm, they might be a little solid..."
The spirit of the much-acclaimed diamond, the hardest of all naturally occurring materials. Her chocolates, made with great care and the firmest determination, are hard enough to break marble. And they're not half-bad if you heat them up a little bit before you eat them.
[Event]The Hina Doll Squad
436.name: Diana Monde [Valentine's Day]

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to current target, with a {probability} of inflicting Petrifaction.
skill.name: Super Solid Chocolate

437.description:
"Heh, heh. You sure you wanna get involved in this?"
The spirit of the Onyudo, a yokai from Japanese mythology. As a yokai, she appeared in the form of a burning wheel of an ox cart, and this imbued her with a deep desire to be a part of something bigger than herself. Maybe that's why she's now a member of the evil Blackmark Gang, working her body to the bone under Yaobikuni.
[Event]The Hina Doll Squad
437.name: Wanyuudou

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to the enemy with the lowest HP, with a {probability} of inflicting Burn.
skill.name: Swirling Flames

abilities.description: Increases 10% of Max HP and restores 2.5% HP every 5 seconds.
abilities.name: Giant Transformation

438.description:
"The eyes of the forest, watching from above! I am Hina Green!"
A giant spirit who lives in Hakone. ...At least, she used to live in Hakone until a series of unexpected events led to her obtaining the power of Hina Green. She's used to spending all her time alone, so now she seems slightly uncomfortable doing things together with "grown-ups." Still, her strangely positive attitude shines through as strong as ever.
[Event]The Hina Doll Squad
438.name: Daidarabotchi [Green]

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to all enemies. Targets take {delay1} more DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: Green Giant

abilities.description: Increases 30% of Crit DMG.
abilities.name: Yellow Turban

439.description:
"The sunny glow that lights people's smiles! Hina Yellow!"
The spirit of the founder of Great Peace Taoism, who also started the Yellow Turban Rebellion. Great Peace Taoism won the hearts and minds of the masses, and eventually Zhang led tens of thousands of followers in an armed uprising against the Han Emperor... But that's a story for another day! For now, he's decided to bring the power of numbers against Yaobikuni, instead. However, he doesn't hold a grudge. These days, bad puns and dad jokes are the only weapons he uses, and the only treasure he seeks is to make people smile.
[Event]The Hina Doll Squad
439.name: Zhang Jiao [Yellow]

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to the 3 enemies with the highest ATK, with a {probability} of inflicting Paralysis.
skill.name: Yellow Sky

44.description:
"At-choo! Oh, poor me... ANOTHER cold?"
Daughter of Lü Bu, the most formidable and feared commander of China's Three Kingdoms period. Used to being treated with reverence on account of her lofty lineage, she longs for the warmth of a close human connection. Of late, she's taken to feigning sickness to lower herself in others' eyes, but she lacks the acting chops to pull it off.
44.name: Lü Lingqi

skill.description: Restores {value} HP.
skill.name: Legendary Lineage

abilities.description: Increases 40% of DMG dealt and 40% reduce DMG taken at the start of the final wave.
abilities.name: Hidden Determination

440.description:
"People are selfish creatures, after all."
The spirit of an undead Buddhist nun who eats the flesh of mermaids. She's the leader of the Blackmark Gang, standing in staunch opposition to the Hina Doll Squad. But it seems as if she's also hiding something deep within her, something no one would ever imagine...and which she's in no place to talk about. Something to do with who she really is, at the very core of her being...
[Event]The Hina Doll Squad
440.name: Yaobikuni [Leader]

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to 1 enemy (melee priority), with a {probability} of inflicting Weak Poison.
skill.name: Black Mermaid

abilities.description: Reduces 20% of DMG taken.
abilities.name: Fashionably Blue

abilities.description: All "Doll Squad" allies deal 5% more DMG.
abilities.name: Doll Squad

441.description:
"The blade of truth that slices through evil! Hina Blue!"
Captain of the first unit of the Special Police Force, a group of swordsmen who maintained peace in the capital's streets. His body is riddled with disease, but you'd never guess it from his deft movements in battle. Add to that his characteristic refined looks, and he was a natural to be picked as Hina Blue. However, he's not great at playing up bravado, and as a result, he often looks awkward and out of place at key dramatic moments.
[Event]The Hina Doll Squad
441.name: Okita Soji [Blue]

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to all enemies. Targets deal {delay1} less DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: True Blue

abilities.description: Restores 20% HP to all allies at the start of each wave.
abilities.name: Healer

442.description:
"Ooh, so nice and warm..."
The Greek goddess of the hearth. Also called the virgin goddess. She loves sitting next to a nice, warm fire and just zoning out. Since most people find this relaxing atmosphere to be very enticing, few have anything but a positive opinion of her. The fact that she's a good listener and very likable means that people often ask her for advice with their problems in love, which she's usually able to resolve with great success.
442.name: Hestia

skill.description: Restores {value} HP to 3 allies (ranged priority).
skill.name: Sacred Fire's Light

abilities.description: All Anima team members take 5% less DMG
abilities.name: Defensive Formation

abilities.description: Increases 20% of DMG dealt and slightly decreases the ATK speed.
abilities.name: Super-Sized

443.description:
"It's time for...DAIRIOOO!!"
Whenever the Hina Doll Squad is in trouble, they can combine their powers to summon this defensive spirit. No one knows anything about its origins, development, structure, or power source...but it's probably safe to assume that Odairi had something to do with it.
443.name: Legendary Defender Dairio

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to the enemy with the lowest HP, with a {probability} of inflicting Silence.
skill.name: Dairio Drive

abilities.description: Increases 20% of Crit Rate.
abilities.name: Rosy Doll

abilities.description: All "Doll Squad" allies deal 5% more DMG.
abilities.name: Doll Squad

444.description:
"The rosy bloom that gives color to justice! Hina Pink!"
A doll used as decoration at Hina Matsuri. She gets along with Odairi as well as ever, but now it's come to light that she's been secretly working behind the scenes to pursue world peace. Any mention of this fact is strictly prohibited, and only the heads of state in each country know the truth.
444.name: Ohina [Pink]

skill.description: Restores {value} HP to all allies and increases targets' speed by {delay1} for a limited time.
skill.name: Queen of Pink

abilities.description: Skill attacks increase 10% DMG taken by targets.
abilities.name: Kurama Pedigree

445.description:
"Super stoked and going for broke! Hina Red, ready to go!"
The spirit of a tengu goblin that lived on Mount Kurama. He actually comes from a pretty prestigious family, but he makes a point never to talk about it. He hasn't learned many fighting techniques, but the sheer force of his willpower and personality make him strong nonetheless. His unshakable sense of justice is why he was chosen as Hina Red, the central member of the Hina Dolls.
445.name: Oniichi Hogen [Red]

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to a wide area of enemies, with a {probability} of inflicting Burn.
skill.name: Red Strike

abilities.description: Increases 20% of skill DMG.
abilities.name: Divine Punishment

abilities.description: Deals 20% more DMG.
abilities.name: Heaven's Grudge

446.description:
"I wonder if anyone will recognize me?! Heehee!"
The spirit of a legendary creature from European folklore. The gem of deep crimson she carries is said to hold incredible magical powers. She's also a master of disguises and likes to take on various appearances to trick people. But don't worry, she doesn't have any nefarious ends in mind. Her disguises are actually meant to bring justice to cruel villains through divine punishment.
446.name: Carbuncle

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to 1 enemy (melee priority).
skill.name: Master of Disguises

abilities.description: 5% more DMG by all team members when this daemon is Team Leader.
abilities.name: Student Body President

447.description:
"Don't forget to do your homework! Or brush your teeth! And don't kick the covers off when you're sleeping!"
A goddess from Greek mythology. She's what you'd call a star student—she LOVES to study. And she's especially into astronomy. Other spirits consider her elegant appearance to be something they could never hope to achieve in their wildest dreams. But this tends to give her a big head, and sometimes it's painfully obvious just how narrow-minded she is.
447.name: Urania

skill.description: Restores {value} HP to 2 allies with the lowest percentage of HP. Targets receive {delay1} less DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: Personal Horoscope

abilities.description: Deals 22% more DMG.
abilities.name: Unyielding Defiance

448.description:
"Hey there, little kitty... You like that?"
The spirit of an ancient rat. She's formed strong bonds of friendship with cats and loves to play with them. In fact, thanks to part-time work with her kitty friends, she's been able to buy a fancy furisode kimono. Lately she's been spotted all over town taking selfies in it.
448.name: Kyuso [Kimono]

skill.description: Restores {value} HP. Targets deal {delay1} more DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: Rat's Conviction

abilities.description: Reduces 6% of DMG dealt by all foes at the start of each wave.
abilities.name: Ancient Song

449.description:
"I've been holding this thing up for millenia..."
The spirit of the oldest bell in Japan. Her voice has been described as either a dragon's roar or the instrument of the devil. Either way, it is captivating, and can't be easily ignored.
[Event] Guild Conquest
449.name: Belle Bonsho

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to all enemies, with a {probability} of inflicting Stun.
skill.name: Howling Sound

45.description:
"Hm? I spy with my little eye... something approaching from afar."
An ancient goddess who presides over the Nile's fertile banks. She's adored as a mother-figure among spirits for her kindness and silky-soft compassion. Her talents include a keen and penetrating insight, which she uses to deliver expert advice to those in a spot of bother.
45.name: Isis

skill.description: Restores {value} HP to all allies.
skill.name: Heavenly Mother

abilities.description: All Phantasma team members deal 5% more DMG.
abilities.name: Emperor Wu

from_description.event_name: There's Something About Honnoji: The Q Incident

450.description:
"How do you choose to live your life?"
A well-known and cunning man from a time of great turbulence. He strives to enact his grand vision upon the world, piercing as the blue sky. Many historians have attempted to explain what happened during his legendary lifetime, but he only laughs at their "silly theories." It may very well be impossible to truly grasp the depths of his mind and the scope of his far-reaching vision.
[Event]There's Something About Honnoji: The Q Incident
450.name: Cao Cao

skill.description: Restores {value} HP to all allies; increases targets' speed by {delay1} for a limited time.
skill.name: Man of Revolution

abilities.description: All Divina team members deal 5% more DMG.
abilities.name: Lifelong Dictator

from_description.event_name: There's Something About Honnoji: The Q Incident

451.description:
"And what amusements have you to offer, I wonder?"
A man of ambition in ancient Rome who seized his place in history. His interests were broad-ranging, from the military to the literary. He loved everything the world had to offer, wanting nothing more than to enjoy himself. This might sound innocent enough, but he actually hurt a lot of people in the course of satisfying his curiosity and greed, which is how he came to be considered a tyrant.
[Event]There's Something About Honnoji: The Q Incident
451.name: Julius

skill.description: Restores {value} HP to ally with the highest ATK. Targets deal {delay1} more DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: Victory Feast

abilities.description: Reduces 20% of DMG taken.
abilities.name: Golden Inscription

from_description.event_name: There's Something About Honnoji: The Q Incident

452.description:
"Can you refute any of that? I don't think so."
The spirit of a sword created during the Namboku-cho Period of Japanese history. Historically speaking it was a hefty broadsword, but over the years people began to imagine her as an ordinary-sized sword. Belonging to Oda Nobunaga is her main claim to fame, and her name originates from their days together. She also LOVES to talk, and is the type to get into arguments really easily. Anyone who's done wrong in her eyes can expect to be argued into the corner and promptly crushed with logic and reasoning. At least, that's what the stories say, but in this case they might actually be true...
[Event]There's Something About Honnoji: The Q Incident
452.name: Heshikiri Hasebe

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to the 2 enemies with the highest ATK.
skill.name: Crushing Logic

from_description.event_name: There's Something About Honnoji: The Q Incident

453.description:
"It was a different time back then... I had to do it!"
The spirit of the man who planned and carried out the assassination of Julius Caesar. He was deeply impressed by the dazzling persona of Caesar, his mentor and father figure, and he saw himself as pathetic and weak in comparison. Now he's begun to reflect on his inability to overcome the self-loathing and negativity of those days, attributing it mostly to lack of willpower.
[Event]There's Something About Honnoji: The Q Incident
453.name: Brutus

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to current target. Target receives {delay1} more DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: Assassin's Dagger

abilities.description: Reduces 3% of DMG dealt by all foes at the start of each wave.
abilities.name: High Priest

from_description.event_name: There's Something About Honnoji: The Q Incident

454.description:
"Ahem! That's all I can say about that...!"
A monk and consultant to the shogun who laid the foundations for 200 years of peace. His unusually long lifespan, the mysterious first half of his life, and the strange abilities he possessed led to many theories about his true identity. But he is in no position to speak on these matters, naturally, and keeps his mouth firmly shut.
[Event]There's Something About Honnoji: The Q Incident
454.name: Tenkai

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to an enemy (ranged priority), with a {probability} of inflicting Stun to targets.
skill.name: Behind the Scenes

abilities.description: 60% chances of inflicting Burn to Normal attacks targets.
abilities.name: In Blazes

from_description.event_name: There's Something About Honnoji: The Q Incident

455.description:
"I can't ignore this anger...!"
The site of Oda Nobunaga's dramatic final moments. Already chock full of powerful emotions, a touch of evil energy was all it took to give the temple its strange new form.
[Event]There's Something About Honnoji: The Q Incident
455.name: Honnoji Mirage

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to the 3 enemies with the lowest HP, with a {probability} of inflicting Burn.
skill.name: Capricious Flame

abilities.description: Restores 10% HP to all allies at the start of each wave.
abilities.name: Purity-Focused

from_description.event_name: There's Something About Honnoji: The Q Incident

456.description:
"I wonder what fate has in store for me next...?"
The spirit of the daughter of Akechi Mitsuhide. History wasn't kind to her, and she's now seen as having lived quite the checkered life. She can come off as a little intense due to her serious attitude and obsession with following the rules... But she behaves this way because she believes that living a proper life is the most efficient path to happiness. Perhaps her father's past deeds and karma also help push her down this strict path of integrity.
[Event]There's Something About Honnoji: The Q Incident
456.name: Hosokawa Tamako

skill.description: Restores {value} HP to all allies. Targets receive {delay1} less DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: Stuck in Love

abilities.description: Increases 15% of Crit Rate.
abilities.name: Embodiment of Mara

abilities.description: Increases all allies' Crit DMG by 10%.
abilities.name: Rule by Force

from_description.event_name: There's Something About Honnoji: The Q Incident

457.description:
"Everything is but a dream, a figment of the imagination..."
The most famous historical figure from the Warring States Period. The spirit of a man who nearly had it all, but lost everything in the end. One of the three famous unifiers of Japan. His heroic deeds combined with the dramatic final moments of his life made for a very captivating story after his death, and he has become the subject of much research and many fictional works. He's now a part of the Bureau of the Occult, but he seems to know more about the current situation than he's letting on... Some say it's all part of an untold story that's been kept secret for centuries.
[Event]There's Something About Honnoji: The Q Incident
457.name: Oda Nobunaga

skill.description: Restores {value} HP. Target deal {delay1} more DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: Eccentric Warlord

abilities.description: Increases 30% of DMG dealt by Divina team members at the start of the final wave.
abilities.name: Private Secretary

from_description.event_name: There's Something About Honnoji: The Q Incident

458.description:
"I would go anywhere for Lord Nobunaga."
The spirit of a loyal attendant to Oda Nobunaga. He also served as his personal secretary and helped manage Nobunaga's military rule. He perished together with his lord during the Honnoji Incident.
458.name: Mori Ranmaru

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to the 2 enemies with the highest ATK, decreases target's speed by {delay1} for a limited time.
skill.name: Ranmaru Rhythm

abilities.description: Increases 60% of Crit Rate at the start of the final wave.
abilities.name: Miracle Child

from_description.event_name: There's Something About Honnoji: The Q Incident

459.description:
"...Let's see, where should we start?"
A boy injured by Unholy Honnoji. His memory seems to have taken a hit from the shock of the attack as well...
459.name: Francisco

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to a random enemy. Target takes {delay1} more DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: Levitation

abilities.description: Increases 15% of skill DMG.
abilities.name: Poison Sneeze

46.description:
"Whatcha starin' at? You lookin' to get gobbled up?"
This pesky spirit is notorious for pestering people out for strolls along the beach. Ever since taking her brand of nuisance abroad, her antics have become infamous the world over. She sprays poison when she sneezes, so make sure to hide the pepper when she's around.
46.name: Ox Demon

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to 2 enemies (melee priority), with a {probability} of inflicting Poison.
skill.name: Hell Render

abilities.description: 20% chances of inflicting Silence to Normal attacks targets.
abilities.name: Decaying Power

460.description:
"My feelings aren't worth wasting time on."
The spirit of a pope thought to have existed in medieval times. Her story is now recognized as pure fiction, but people developed an emotional attachment to her nonetheless and started to expect great things from her. It thus comes as no surprise that she has set her heart on becoming the standard-bearer in the fight against evil in all its forms.
460.name: Pope Joan

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to the enemy with the lowest HP.
skill.name: Hunting

abilities.description: Increases 50% of ATK speed at the start of the final wave.
abilities.name: SURPRISE!

abilities.description: Normal attacks have 10% chances of inflicting stun.
abilities.name: What The Gods Fear

461.description:
"Did I get you that time?!"
The spirit of a mythological helmet. She's considered a genius when it comes to jump scares, and her performances can be downright dangerous to those who have heart conditions. One time she tested out an unimaginably scary surprise at the Bureau of the Occult, and...let's just say she got in big trouble with Mikado.
461.name: Helmetta Egil

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to the 3 enemies with the lowest HP. Targets receive {delay1} more DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: Heart Stopper

abilities.description: 80% chance of inflicting Burn to Normal attacks targets.
abilities.name: Kettle of Gunpowder

abilities.description: Restores 5% HP every 5 seconds.
abilities.name: Hisahide's Love

462.description:
"No explosions, please, that's all I ask..."
The spirit of a teakettle treasured by Matsunaga Hisahide during the Warring States Period. No matter how desperately Nobunaga coveted it, Hisahide refused to hand over his beloved teakettle, and for this she was very grateful. Needless to say she was shocked when he filled the teakettle with gunpowder to blow himself up! She never quite saw him the same way after that...
462.name: Ketill Hiragumo

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to self, and increase DMG dealt by {delay1} for a limited time.
skill.name: The Art of Self-Combustion

abilities.description: Increases 10% the number of soulstones received from battle.
abilities.name: Flower Seller

463.description:
"Would you like some flowers? They're really cheap!"
A strange spirit that can produce flowers from thin air. Creating flowers comes as naturally to her as breathing, and since it's free of charge, she can sell them at extremely low prices. But eventually she realized how much trouble she was causing for spirits who sell flowers for a living, so she decided to only sell flowers wholesale to retailers instead. This essentially gives her a monopoly on the wholesale market, but everyone agrees it's the best option for all parties involved in the long run.
463.name: Flora Kashin

skill.description: Restores {value} HP to all allies.
skill.name: Petals in the Wind

abilities.description: Increases 3% all Divina team members' Crit Rate.
abilities.name: Clergyman

464.description:
"Ah, yes! I must make note of this!"
The spirit of a missionary who lived in Japan during the Warring States Period. He was deeply interested in Japan and wrote prodigiously while he was there, like some sort of pre-modern journalist. His extensive writings would later become deeply valuable historical documents for the time period. Since becoming a spirit he's taken up the job of traveling the world in search of newsworthy stories—and selling them for top dollar.
464.name: Luís Fróis

skill.description: Restores {value} HP; increases targets' speed by {delay1} for a limited time.
skill.name: Observation and Analysis

abilities.description: Increases 15% of DMG dealt by Divina team members when this daemon is Team Leader.
abilities.name: Leader of the Four

465.description:
"Welcome to my palace, child of man."
The center of the universe and fifth of the Four Divine Beasts in Chinese astrology. She never shirks her position at the front and center of every conversation... In other words, she's very self-centered and gets in a bad mood if she's not the focus of attention at all times, no matter what people are talking about.
[Event] Guild Conquest
465.name: Huanglong

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to all enemies. Targets deal {delay1} less DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: Angry Dragon Roar

abilities.description: Increases the number of soulstones received from battle by 60%.
abilities.name: Wealthy Trader

466.description:
"Let's go to the beach! I miss that salty sea breeze!"
The spirit of a sailor from the story of One Thousand and One Nights. Formerly an esteemed adventurer in eternal pursuit of glory, he now travels the land recounting tales from his heyday. They say he has quite the stage presence, and his presentations are always bursting with excitement and surprise. A veritable master of entertainment, he comes up with all sorts of wild ideas to grab his audience's attention.
466.name: Sinbad

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to further enemies.
skill.name: Wave of Coral

abilities.description: Restores 10% HP to Phantasma team members at the start of each wave.
abilities.name: Wild Plant

467.description:
"Stay here with me and you'll be happy."
The spirit of a legendary plant said to grow in the wild. The plant grows a sheep instead of fruit, and once fully grown the sheep eats the plant for nourishment. After that the sheep roams free for awhile before finally dying, and then the plant grows once again from its body. It's like she's going through the process of reincarnation before your very eyes. In any case, she REALLY has a thing for sheep.
467.name: Barometz Tartarica

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to current target, with a {probability} of inflicting Stun.
skill.name: Sheep Toss

abilities.description: Increases 75% of Crit DMG.
abilities.name: Rain of Sorrow

468.description:
"Quit crying and pull yourself together!"
The spirit of a bow that belonged to the Yellow Emperor in Chinese mythology. She refuses to forget her legendary former master and has shed many tears over him. The warm feelings he poured into her gave her great strength, enabling her to take on the sadness of the people and respond in kind... And that's just one small part of their sad, beautiful story together.
468.name: Ugo

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to enemy with highest ATK, target receives {delay1} more DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: Call of Grief

abilities.description: Increases battle reward drop rate by 15%.
abilities.name: Endless Funds

469.description:
"These are the very best! How many would you like?"
The spirit of a wealthy man who was once the de facto ruler of Florence. He sought to bring a revolutionary new era to his country and loved to see things change. But he could be pretty harsh towards people who stood in the way of progress, and he has very little patience for those who don't appreciate the arts. His tendency to throw money at his projects also makes the common folk a bit jealous sometimes...
[Event]Five Blades, One Thief
469.name: Cosimo de' Medici

skill.description: Restores {value} HP to ally with the lowest percentage of HP. Targets receive {delay1} less DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: Donation

abilities.description: 32% chances of inflicting Sleep on all ranged foes at the start of each wave.
abilities.name: Last Chance

47.description:
Oh, go on then... But this is your last chance!"
A merciful spirit given to taking pity on even the least deserving of souls. Her attention span is short, however, and she's been known to give short shrift to potential benefactors when not "in the mood." All things considered, you're far more likely to get an earful of abuse from her than an extra chance. But hey, such is life, right? That's what she says, at least.
47.name: Spider's Thread

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to all enemies. Targets take {delay1} more DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: Zero Chance

abilities.description: Reduces 15% of DMG taken.
abilities.name: The Thinker

470.description:
"(Whoopsie...was that a bit much?)"
A spirit who tends to overanalyze. You COULD say she thinks long and hard before she acts if you wanted to be nice, but it's more accurate to say she's just plain indecisive. Her eyes are also perpetually closed, so people have trouble telling whether she's awake or not. Lately she's gotten into virtual currency trading, which her friends warn is the absolute LAST thing she should be doing...
[Event]Five Blades, One Thief
470.name: Gates of Hell

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to 2 enemies (ranged priority).
skill.name: Think It Over

abilities.description: Reduces 3% of DMG dealt by all foes at the start of each wave.
abilities.name: Cursed Chair

471.description:
"I probably shouldn't be doing this..."
A spirit with a very strange connection to a chair that supposedly curses whoever sits on it. It used to be a normal chair, but it got cursed through a strange series of events that grabbed people's attention and made it famous. In order to live up to people's superstitious expectations, she decided to start pretending to be a ghost. Her physical appearance and self-presentation are a part of this elaborate performance.
[Event]Five Blades, One Thief
471.name: Busby Stoop

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to an enemy (healers priority), decreases target's speed by {delay1} for a limited time.
skill.name: Have a Seat

472.description:
"Hee hee..."
The spirit of one of the most famous works of art in the world. She was created by Leonardo Da Vinci, who managed to evoke a deeply mysterious atmosphere in the piece. Apparently Da Vinci used a secret technique in the painting process, but she refuses to speak about it since she knows her value lies in her mystique. When asked she replies simply, "no comment," and flashes that infamous smile of hers.
[Event]Five Blades, One Thief
472.name: Mona Lisa

skill.description: Increases DMG dealt by a random ally by {delay1} for a limited time.
skill.name: Mystic Smile

abilities.description: Increase 8% of DMG dealt by the 2 allies with the highest ATK.
abilities.name: Eye for Quality

473.description:
"Business boils down to two things: money and spirit!"
The spirit of a merchant who built a name for himself during the Warring States Period. He's known to have excellent knowledge and judgment, with an international reputation for his ability to discern a product's true worth. As a spirit he now finds himself face-to-face with more legendary items than he ever did as a human, so he's beside himself with joy nearly every single day. He also knows a lot of people, which he's putting to use in his new career as an information broker... Let's just say he's not the kind of guy that can be dealt with by ordinary means.
[Event]Five Blades, One Thief
473.name: Luzon Sukezaemon

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to current target; decreases target's speed by {delay1} for a limited time.
skill.name: Power of Persuasion

abilities.description: Restores 5% HP every 5 seconds.
abilities.name: Nimble Fingers

474.description:
"Even destruction gets boring after a while..."
The spirit of the demon that commands Hell's armies. She's the rare type of demon that takes more joy in creation than destruction, preferring knitting and handicrafts to armed invasion. So it's fitting that her powers grant incredible manual dexterity. Now, you might be wondering what's so great about manual dexterity, and the answer is...nothing, really. You can't do much with that alone unless you have some sort of special training or knowledge to go along with it. So it's more a matter of granting her powers to the right person than anything else.
[Event]Five Blades, One Thief
474.name: Naphula

skill.description: Increases the Crit Rate of 2 allies with the highest ATK by {delay1} for a limited time.
skill.name: Magical Dexterity

abilities.description: Absorbs 30% of DMG dealt as HP.
abilities.name: The Perfect Thief

475.description:
"Lupin the Thief never fails...never."
The spirit of a thief whose name is known far and wide. Supposedly he's given up his old thieving ways. However...
[Event]Five Blades, One Thief
475.name: Arsene Lupin [True Form]

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to the 3 enemies with the highest ATK. Targets receive {delay1} more DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: Splendid End

abilities.description: Increases 25% of skill DMG.
abilities.name: Man of Beauty

abilities.description: Increases 20% of DMG dealt when one of the Five Swords under Heaven is on the team.
abilities.name: Five Great Blades

476.description:
"What's so bad about a little flirting?"
The spirit of one of the Five Great Blades, considered a national treasure. He's a daredevil, but also generous and open-minded. Women are his greatest weakness—he does whatever they want and often ends up getting tricked or deceived. But some women really fall for this single-minded masculine side of him. His friends say they've never seen him put 100% into anything he does, but agree it would be interesting to see what would happen if he did.
[Event]Five Blades, One Thief
476.name: Mikazuki Munechika

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to the enemy with the most HP.
skill.name: Straight to the Point

abilities.description: Increases 25% of Crit Rate.
abilities.name: Unfairly Matched

abilities.description: All Phantasma team members deal 5% more DMG.
abilities.name: Ruler of Demons

477.description:
"You think you're gonna give ME orders...? Don't make me laugh!"
The spirit of the king of demons. She once held a high-ranking position in Heaven, but tired of it and fell into evil instead...at least, according to her self-deprecating explanation. No one knows what really happened. But one thing is certain: she possesses great power, such that a single miscalculation can lead to scorching an entire area in the blink of an eye. Of course, she'd never DREAM of doing such a thing these days. In fact, she always shows special care and self-restraint to avoid it.
477.name: Belial

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to all enemies, with {probability} of inflicting Burn.
skill.name: Super Flare

abilities.description: Increases 3% of Crit Rate of Anima allies at the start of each wave.
abilities.name: End of the Silk Road

abilities.description: Restores 10% HP to Anima team members at the start of each wave.
abilities.name: Big Mama

478.description:
"We've known each other since we were in diapers!"
The spirit of a famous log-cabin style storehouse. She stores the motherload of illustrious artifacts from Japanese history, making many spirits feel nothing but respect and admiration towards her. But she doesn't let any of it go to her head! She knows it's all thanks to her inherent qualities—nothing that she's in any place to take credit for. Her one quirk is that despite having been around longer than most, she can't stand being treated like an old woman. That's best avoided unless you want to be dragged into the "Forbidden Room"...
478.name: Shosoin

skill.description: Restores {value} HP to ally with the highest ATK. Targets deal {delay1} more DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: Great Mother

abilities.description: Increases 25% of DMG.
abilities.name: Me

abilities.description: Increases 15% of Crit DMG when Mikazuki Munechika is on the team.
abilities.name: You

479.description:
"The more I transform, the worse I feel..."
A spirit with a hallucinatory disorder where she sees replicas of herself. She has an extremely negative view of herself, without the slightest shred of confidence. Her only relief from this suffering is that she can shapeshift to look like anyone else at will, which also changes her personality through the power of suggestion. But the effects don't last long and eventually she falls back into the same old patterns. This entire process is probably due to her living in a perpetual state of fear and the deep psychological wounds it causes.

changes.new: Increases 15% of Crit DMG when Mikazuki Munechika is on the team.
changes.old: Increases 15% of Crit DMG when {#MonsterName#476} is on the team.

479.name: Doppella Gänger

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to the 2 enemies with the least HP.
skill.name: Tracer

48.description:
"Come, stain my sword with your blood!"
A brilliant blue blade coveted by many, and no stranger to victory on the battlefield. His military record has seen him recommended for various positions of authority, but he declines each time, claiming to prefer the raw thrill of the frontlines.
48.name: Azure Sword

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to current target.
skill.name: Slice of Life

abilities.description: Increases 75% of Skill DMG at the start of the final wave.
abilities.name: Tenacity

480.description:
"Get him, I said! GET HIM!"
The spirit of the police investigators who devoted themselves to capturing a certain elusive thief. She's not the spirit of any particular person, but rather the embodiment of the combined desires of all investigators who ever pursued Arsène Lupin. Using the name Zenimaru was the easiest way to get the concept across, but she's taken a liking to it. She continues to chase the famous thief even as a spirit, but now it's more a cat-and-mouse game performed for sport than anything else.
480.name: Inspector Zenimaru

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to 1 enemy (melee priority), decreases target's speed by {delay1} for a limited time.
skill.name: Encircle

abilities.description: Increases 10% of skill DMG of all anima allies.
abilities.name: Hero's Ally

abilities.description: Increases 10% of DMG dealt; increases 15% of ATK speed.
abilities.name: Rage

481.description:
"Don't give up as soon as you fail! You should stand up and try again!"
The spirit of a legendary sword possessed by the hero Sigurd. She was once beaten black and blue until her will was completely broken, but the support of her allies combined with her undying will to fight helped her to not only recover but also blossom into a new sword altogether—one strong enough to slay dragons. These experiences bestowed her with both heroic strength and deep compassion for the weak, making her an ideal partner for any hero.
481.name: Gramr

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to current target; reduces target's DEF by {delay1} for a limited time.
skill.name: Supreme Blade

abilities.description: Increases 10% of Skill DMG and increases 50% of Crit DMG.
abilities.name: Freeshooter

482.description:
"Would you mind working with me for a bit?"
The spirit of a ball of magic with a long story behind it. She's also a demon and has the power to grants people's wishes, but she always mixes in her own desires to take them one step too far. If you're not careful what you wish for, you might end up partially paralyzed, or worse. It's better to keep your distance and interact with her with utmost care. Many at the Bureau of the Occult still have bad memories from the time she pulled a prank involving fire... Although in the end, fault was found on both sides, and everyone's since been able to set aside their differences and work together without issue.
482.name: Zauber Kugel

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to the enemy with the lowest HP. Target take {delay1} more DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: Seventh Shot

abilities.description: Decrease 5% the ATK speed of all foes at the start of each wave.
abilities.name: Tempest

483.description:
"I'll do anything in my power..."
The spirit of a demonic entity dwelling on Suzuka Mountain. She's willing to put up with anything for the one she loves. Wanting to be liked is a big part of it, naturally, but not wanting to be disliked is probably more of a motivating factor...which kinda bothers her friends. They say she should be more bold, take a stand, capture people—you know, demonic stuff! But their words won't convince this bashful, warm-hearted demon. On the other hand, when she DOES get mad, even Shuten Doji can't stop her, so you're probably better off not messing with her.
483.name: Otakemaru

skill.description: Restores {value} HP to 2 allies with the lowest percentage of HP. Targets deal {delay1} more DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: Song of Love

abilities.description: Normal attacks have a 15% of inflicting Freeze.
abilities.name: Flood Warning

484.description:
"Hope you're ready to get SOAKED!"
The spirit of a snake that can cause floods. She can't use her powers unless she happens to be particularly sad or angry, so most of the time all she does is spray people with a hand-crafted water hose and enjoy the looks of surprise on their faces. She's really just a harmless prankster at heart.
[Event] Guild Conquest
484.name: Kada

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to 3 enemies (ranged priority), with {probability} of inflicting Freeze.
skill.name: H2O Blast

abilities.description: Reduces 35% of DMG taken.
abilities.name: Knight's Conviction

485.description:
"Ha ha, no need for thanks! I'm just doing what knights do!"
The spirit of the titular character from the novel "Don Quixote." Don Quixote is a knight among knights who adheres strictly to the code of chivalry...at least that's how he hopes people will describe him one day. His strength is nothing to be trifled with, enabling him to wield a spear in just one hand. At heart he's a complete gentleman, but he has the bad habit of jumping into action based on simple misunderstandings. He's also acutely aware that he's not technically a knight and secretly feels guilty about misleading people.
[Event]Once Upon a Root...
485.name: Don Quixote

skill.description: Restores {value} HP. Target deal {delay1} more DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: Chivalrous Heart

abilities.description: Increases 40% of skill DMG.
abilities.name: Mysterious Shine

486.description:
"Miss Cinderella, where ARE you?!"
The spirit of the glass slipper from the story of Cinderella. Her personality is as delicate and breakable as glass, and you can always tell exactly what she's thinking and feeling from her face. The slipper was miraculously created by a powerful mage, and she has served as Cinderella's lifelong partner ever since. Only Cinderella is able to bring out Glassie's true powers, so together they are quite the pair. However, Cinderella tends to carelessly leave her behind, so she's often seen running around desperately in search of her friend.
[Event]Once Upon a Root...
486.name: Glassie Slipper

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to a random enemy, Decreases target speed by {delay1} for a limited time.
skill.name: Left Behind

abilities.description: Restores 2% of HP every 5 seconds by the 2 allies with the highest ATK.
abilities.name: Search for Happiness

487.description:
"I've been standing here the whole time..."
The spirit of the bluebird of happiness from the play "The Bluebird." Her blue-tinged armor is meant to be as eye-catching as the brilliant sky overhead...but somehow she just isn't the type to stand out in a crowd, so people tend to forget about her. With her quiet voice and reserved personality, many people don't even notice when she's standing right behind them.
[Event]Once Upon a Root...
487.name: Bluebird

skill.description: Restores {value} HP to 2 allies with the highest ATK. Targets deal {delay1} more DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: Sharing is Caring

488.description:
"I don't think we're in Kansas anymore..."
The spirit of Dorothy from the Wizard of Oz. She has a simple and direct type of personality. She also watches a lot of television and movies, and likes repeating popular phrases from them. But she's been repeating the same lines for so long that they started to get boring, and lately, she's been adding her own twists and making up new phrases altogether. This habit has lead to some truly odd turns of phrase...[Event]Once Upon a Root...
488.name: Dorothy

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to a random enemy.
skill.name: Slapstick Sideshow

abilities.description: 40% chance of reducing all enemy's DMG by 10% at the start of every wave.
abilities.name: Witch's Trap

489.description:
"It's best to try to talk things out before resorting to force."
The spirit of the poisoned apple eaten by Snow White. Even though she once tried to murder Snow White, they're on perfectly friendly terms now. And she may look like the kind of person you'd want to avoid, but once you get to know her, she's actually really nice.[Event]Once Upon a Root...
489.name: Poisona Appel

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to 3 enemies (ranged priority), with a {probability} of inflicting Paralysis.
skill.name: Neurotoxin

49.description:
"Make fun of my size, will ya!"
A pint-sized spirit from the northern provinces. Feisty with a capital "F," he hunts opponents twice his size camouflaging himself in burdock leaves to get the jump on prey. He's somewhat of a burdock leaf connoisseur, in fact, and will talk the ears off anyone foolish enough to raise the subject.
49.name: Koropokkur

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to current target.
skill.name: Lethal Strike

abilities.description: Normal attacks have 10% chances of inflicting stun.
abilities.name: Mysterious Being

490.description:
"Tee hee... Let's pull off a prank or two!"
The spirit of a turnip monster. Children's fear gives her the nourishment she needs to grow, so she uses her magic to turn picture books into horror stories. She acts sly and mischievous but is actually pretty cowardly on the inside. Normally she's satisfied with just a prank or practical joke here and there, but with so many children and famous characters at the Folktale Fest, she can't help but go all out.[Event]Once Upon a Root...
490.name: Rutabaga

skill.description: Restore {value} HP to self, increase crit rate for a limited time {delay1}
skill.name: Fractured Fairy Tale

abilities.description: Increases 50% of Skill DMG.
abilities.name: Power Princess

abilities.description: Increases 50% of Crit DMG.
abilities.name: Snow White Destruction

491.description:
"It's dangerous to go alone...but together we have a chance!"
The spirit of Snow White from the famous fairy tale. After being reunited with her stepmother and getting back on good terms, she moved into the Bureau of the Occult so as to better help out. As a child she was driven into the forest, and then the next thing she knew she was a princess, so she never had a chance to make any childhood friends. But now she's finally found a few at the Folktale Fest! The catch is that they're an unusual bunch, to say the least, and they don't always treat her the way friends should...[Event]Once Upon a Root...
491.name: Snow White [Demon Hunter]

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to an enemy (healers priority).
skill.name: Demon Buster

abilities.description: Reduces 30% of DMG taken and reduces DMG dealt by 10% at the same time.
abilities.name: Dust & Cinders

abilities.description: Increases 55% of skill DMG of the 2 allies with highest ATK at the start of the final wave.
abilities.name: Midnight Magic

492.description:
"Call me Cinderella. Leave your defense to me!"
The spirit of Cinderella from the famous fairy tale. Years of being bullied gave her the desire to grow stronger in order to protect the weak, and so she vowed to master the very magic that changed her own life. Now, while still a princess, she has also become a mage. She doesn't hold any grudge against her stepmother and stepsisters...but she can't help but feel slightly awkward around them. Apparently she'd always looked forward to meeting Snow White since they have such similar backstories.[Event]Once Upon a Root...
492.name: Cinderella

skill.description: Restores {value} HP to 3 allies with the lowest percentage of HP. Targets receive {delay1} less DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: Support Spells

abilities.description: Increases 15% of Crit DMG.
abilities.name: Mob Moll

abilities.description: Deals 30% more DMG.
abilities.name: Scarlet Hood

493.description:
"You got guts to stand up to me, I'll give you that much."
The spirit of the titular character from "Little Red Riding Hood." She may look calm and elegant, but her true personality is more like a mafia boss. She was trained in battle by the hunter who rescued her, and then she made every last of one the wolves join her self-proclaimed "Red Gang." The gang has expanded since then and is starting to gain the respect of more than a few spirits.
493.name: Red Ridinghood

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to the enemy with the lowest HP, with a {probability} of inflicting Silence.
skill.name: Tough Talk

abilities.description: Increases 25% of ATK speed.
abilities.name: A Goddess' Challenge

494.description:
"Enemies sighted! Gonna take out every last one of 'em!"
The spirit of the gold and silver axes given to the woodcutter in Aesop's fable "The Honest Woodcutter." She's perfectly nice under normal circumstances, but once it's time for battle she enters a berserker state, dual-wielding her axes like a madwoman. So a little caution is recommended when dealing with her.
494.name: Aks Goldsilver

skill.description: Increases DMG taken by 2 random enemies by {delay1} for a limited time.
skill.name: Which One?

abilities.description: Increases 10% of Crit DMG by the 2 allies with the highest ATK at the start of every wave.
abilities.name: Alluring Melody

abilities.description: Increases 5% of Crit Rate by the 2 allies with the highest ATK at the start of every wave.
abilities.name: I Love Sükh

495.description:
"I'll do anything for Sükh...even if it means giving my own life!"
The spirit of the Mongolian horsehead fiddle that appears in the folktale "Sükh and the White Horse." As a musician she's beautiful, dignified, and pure. The clear tones of her music also happen to ward off evil. Her personality is kind, gentle and rational, but when it comes to her beloved Sükh, she can turn into a blazing ball of fire. Trying to talk sense to her in that state is about as effective as beating a dead horse.
495.name: Morin Khuur

skill.description: Restores {value} HP to ally with the highest ATK, increases {delay1} crit rate to target for a limited time.
skill.name: Tearful Performance

abilities.description: Increases 10% more DMG to all team members when this daemon is Team Leader.
abilities.name: Worldly Ambition

abilities.description: Increases 30% of ATK speed.
abilities.name: Musketeer

496.description:
"Come with me, everyone!"
The spirit of a man who went on a wild adventure with the Three Musketeers to bring down a scheming Cardinal. People often underestimate him at first sight, but any naysayers are proven wrong as soon as it comes time to actually fight. These days, he's putting his extraordinary past to use as a leader and coach for the younger and less experienced. You'd be surprised by how many hardcore Three Musketeers fans there are out there, and their faith in him is pretty intense. (Many also mistakenly think he was one of the Three Musketeers himself, but he's heard that so many times it doesn't even faze him anymore.)
496.name: Charles d'Artagnan

skill.description: Increases the speed of 3 allies with the highest ATK by {delay1} for a limited time.
skill.name: Summon the Musketeers

abilities.description: All melee allies take 8% less DMG.
abilities.name: Perfect Defense

abilities.description: Reduces 15% of DMG dealt by opponent with highest ATK at the start of each wave.
abilities.name: Impenetrable

497.description:
"Pretty awesome, am I right?"
The spirit of a flatland-mountain castle located in Kanagawa Prefecture. The stronghold of the Hojo clan, it had extremely strong defenses and was considered impregnable. Her defenses have developed even further nowadays and made her highly resistant to even the most pushy flirting and requests for dates. But she has more expertise in this area than she lets on and secretly gets excited whenever anyone shows interest in her.
497.name: Odawara Casella

skill.description: Restores {value} HP to ally with the lowest percentage of HP. Targets receive {delay1} less DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: Impregnable Fortress

abilities.description: Restores 15% HP to Anima team members at the start of each wave.
abilities.name: Fantastic Fragrance

498.description:
"Relax, everything will be fine."
The spirit of a treasured piece of fragrant wood carried around by Date Masamune. She's both humble and elegant, giving off a distinct air of sophistication. The memories of being loved by Date Masamune are also very precious to her. A very blessed woman to begin with, the experiences and emotions she gained make for a powerful aroma that is enough to make anyone fall head over heels.
498.name: Shibufune

skill.description: Restores {value} HP to all allies.
skill.name: Ultra Relaxed

abilities.description: Deals 21% more DMG.
abilities.name: Career Woman

499.description:
"One must be calm and classy everyday."
The spirit of the woman married to Date Masamune. She and her husband are very close, bound by powerful faith that creates a strong unspoken bond between them. Confident that they sail together on the same course, she works hard to pursue a career of her own, which is exactly what Masamune likes about her. It makes her happy to support her husband, too, and she's willing to act as his right hand when the time calls or it. On top of all that, she's accomplished in the ways of the samurai, having come from a respected samurai family.
499.name: Megohime

skill.description: Restores {value} HP. Target deal {delay1} more DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: Ancestral Awakening

abilities.description: Skill attacks have 40% chances of inflicting Burn.
abilities.name: Sun God

5.description:
"Burn, my sweet sword!"
A spirit worshipped as the sun god. He holds a sword in his right hand while sinister magic swirls around his left. You could say he's a magic swordsman. He always ranks at the top of the list of the World's Richest Spirits, and his bank account is enough to overturn heaven and earth. That's why he doesn't have much faith in other people -- he's always surrounded by spirits who are after his money.
5.name: Adramelech

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to 3 enemies (melee priority).
skill.name: Magic Bullet Storm

50.description:
"My malevolent eye destroys all!"
A powerful spirit revered as the king of all serpents. Tales of his petrifying gaze and deadly venom send shudders through any who hear his name. Though his combat abilities are beyond dispute, he's still rather new to the monarch racket, so all eyes are on him to see how he'll fare.
50.name: Basilisk

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to current target, with a {probability} of inflicting Poison.
skill.name: Stony Stare

abilities.description: Increases battle reward drop rate by 15%.
abilities.name: Finder of the Lost

abilities.description: Normal attack targets have 33% chances of increasing 20% more DMG taken.
abilities.name: Festival of Suffering

500.description:
"That sounds kinda dirty..."
The spirit of the Buddhist embodiment of the emotions that cause suffering. Pretty much all you need to know is that he's in the middle of puberty. He has an incredible ability to find rain-soaked adult magazines washed up alongside the river. He uses them to better understand the world of adults and get one step closer to becoming one himself. Still, whenever he likes someone he teases them, and has trouble expressing how he really feels.
500.name: Mara

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to all enemies.
skill.name: Free From Dirty Thoughts

abilities.description: Restores 3% of HP every 5 seconds by the 2 allies with the highest ATK.
abilities.name: Traveler

501.description:
"Traveling is just something swords do."
The spirit of a sword owned by Minamoto no Yoshitsune. She had many other owners afterwards and took on many other names, which partly explains why as a spirit she's always been on the road. But she doesn't travel out of an unwillingness to settle down—she really just loves to notice and appreciate the differences between each place she goes. Her favorite thing is to stumble upon a nice little hole-in-the-wall restaurant and pop in for a meal.
501.name: Usumidori

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to 1 enemy (melee priority). Target take {delay1} more DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: Full Power

abilities.description: All Divina team members deal 5% more DMG, and increases 5% of crit DMG of all targets at the same time.
abilities.name: Love and Justice

502.description:
"We give love, we seek love, and love brings us tears..."
The spirit of the Greek goddess of justice. Referred to as the "star maiden." She hates to see fighting, and used to urge people to choose love and justice instead. However, once the massacres began, she lost all faith in humanity. Now she's become a something of a bad-tempered beauty who gets sulky and negative at the slightest provocation...which is actually kind of charming in its own way.
502.name: Astraea

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to an enemy (healers priority). Decreases target speed by {delay1} for a limited time.
skill.name: Holy Hammer

abilities.description: Restores 25% HP to all allies at the start of each wave.
abilities.name: Natural Fragrance

503.description:
"Feeling healed yet?"
The spirit of a mineral formed in the intestines of sperm whales as well as its related scent. She's not the type you see around very often, but when you do cross paths, you know right away by the sweet-smelling aroma in the air. With all the artificial fragrances on the market today, she's afraid that she'll be replaced by inferior aromatic substitutes.
[Event] Guild Conquest
503.name: Ambergris

skill.description: Restores {value} HP to the 3 allies with the lowest percentage of HP.
skill.name: Aromatherapy

abilities.description: Increases 40% of DMG dealt at the start of the final wave.
abilities.name: Strong Heart

abilities.description: Reduces 20% of DMG taken when one of “Journey to the West” is on the team.
abilities.name: Journey to the West

from_description.event_name: To the Source of the Milky Way

504.description:
"This way! Follow me!"
A monk and the central character of Journey to the West, a book that details her and her companions' quest to reach India. The alluring purity that turned strangers into allies combined with the wisdom and confidence she gained from her journey makes her a very formidable leader today. She may come off as a little blunt and intense at times, but she's actually very caring, pious, and rational.
[Event]To the Source of the Milky Way
504.name: Tang Sanzang

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to all enemies, with a {probability} of inflicting Silence.
skill.name: Mahaprajnaparamita

abilities.description: Reduces 20% of DMG taken.
abilities.name: Hardworker

from_description.event_name: To the Source of the Milky Way

505.description:
"I know it's a bit of an odd ability..."
The spirit of a magical gourd that appeared in Journey to the West and could suck people inside. She looks up to and deeply respects Daode as a teacher. For better or worse, she has an inseparable bond with the Golden and Silver Horned Demon Kings, with whom she can stay up all night recounting stories from the days they fought Sanzang and her companions. She's the type to really go all in on what she does, but then she tends to forget important details and get into trouble as a result.
[Event]To the Source of the Milky Way
505.name: Redda Gourdo

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to current target; decreases target's speed by {delay1} for a limited time.
skill.name: Sucked Inside

abilities.description: Increases 35% of skill DMG.
abilities.name: Pigsy

abilities.description: Increases 20% of DMG dealt when one of “Journey to the West” is on the team.
abilities.name: Journey to the West

from_description.event_name: To the Source of the Milky Way

506.description:
"Come on, you know who I am, don't you?"
The spirit of one of Sanzang's allies in Journey to the West. He's known in Heaven by his formal title as a marshal, but most people know him as Zhu Baijie. At first he can come across as a wild child or some sort of outlaw with a heart of gold, but he also has a more determined and considerate side that gets misunderstood. Still, there's no denying that he can be a little inappropriate around women...
[Event]To the Source of the Milky Way
506.name: Marshal Tianpeng

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to the enemy with the most HP. Target takes {delay1} more DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: Heavy Punch

from_description.event_name: To the Source of the Milky Way

507.description:
"The year's flying by so quickly, I tell you!"
The spirit of a bird whose song signals the start of the "Great Crossing Ceremony" in the Milky Way. She loves a good mystery and can often be found eagerly discussing conspiracy theories. She and her husband are passionately in love with each other, so much so that even Vega and Altair get jealous.
[Event]To the Source of the Milky Way
507.name: Maggie Pie

skill.description: Restores {value} HP to ally with the lowest percentage of HP.
skill.name: Song of Love

abilities.description: Increases skill DMG of all team members by 8% when this daemon is Team Leader.
abilities.name: The First

from_description.event_name: To the Source of the Milky Way

508.description:
"It's really quiet in outer space."
The spirit of the first man-made satellite to orbit Earth. After accomplishing this incredible feat the satellite burned up in the atmosphere, which was very traumatic and gave her a deep fear of fire. As a spirit she's on a mission to "explore the whole wide universe," but on that scale the Earth is like a tiny appetizer before the main course. So she hasn't gotten much respect for her exploits thus far.
[Event]To the Source of the Milky Way
508.name: Sputnik

skill.description: Restores {value} HP to ally with the highest ATK, increases {delay1} crit rate to target for a limited time.
skill.name: Other Side of the Universe

abilities.description: Restores 5% HP every 5 seconds.
abilities.name: Hopeless Romantic

from_description.event_name: To the Source of the Milky Way

509.description:
"I've so much more to learn..."
The spirit of the stream of stars that dot the night sky. The Tanabata Festival used to play an important role in people's lives, but over the years many people have lost interest. This made her realize that traditions aren't meant to last forever, and they should adapt to suit the needs of people's modern lives.
[Event]To the Source of the Milky Way
509.name: Milkana Wayford [Formal Wear]

skill.description: Restores {value} HP to 2 allies with the lowest percentage of HP and increases targets' speed by {delay1} for a limited time.
skill.name: Cosmic Romance

51.description:
"Eeep! I've got a bad feeling about this..."
A rabbit spirit who received the grace of a god. She's convinced the vivid dreams she has whenever she takes a nap are trying to tell her something. Unfortunately, they have an uncanny knack of ending before the most important part, and as a result are totally useless.
[Special Bond] Increases Okuninushi's skill DMG

changes.new:
"Eeep! I've got a bad feeling about this..."
A rabbit spirit who received the grace of a god. She's convinced the vivid dreams she has whenever she takes a nap are trying to tell her something. Unfortunately, they have an uncanny knack of ending before the most important part, and as a result are totally useless.
[Special Bond] Increases Okuninushi's skill DMG

"Eeep! I've got a bad feeling about this..."

[Special Bond] Increases {#MonsterName#361}'s skill DMG

51.name: White Hare of Inaba

skill.description: Increases DMG dealt by 2 allies (melee priority) by {delay1} for a limited time.
skill.name: Integer Comparison

abilities.description: Increases 30% of Crit DMG.
abilities.name: Gazing Eyes

abilities.description: Reduces 25% of DMG taken when "Hikoboshi [Formal Wear]" is on the team.
abilities.name: A New Legend

from_description.event_name: To the Source of the Milky Way

510.description:
"I must change myself, too."
The spirit of the daughter of the Sky King from the story of Tanabata. The fiasco with the Great Crossing Ceremony made her reflect on her past actions and decide to do things differently in the future. Now she's trying to get in touch with the "real" her after realizing that she has a lot of work to do if she wants to hold a place in people's hearts.
[Event]To the Source of the Milky Way
510.name: Orihime [Formal Wear]

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to an enemy (ranged priority). Targets take {delay1} more DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: True Raiment of Heaven

abilities.description: Normal attacks have 60% chances of inflicting stun when HP is 1/2 or below.
abilities.name: Monkey King

abilities.description: Increases 45% of ATK speed when one of “Journey to the West” is on the team.
abilities.name: Journey to the West

from_description.event_name: To the Source of the Milky Way

511.description:
"I was young and dumb back then, okay?"
The spirit of one of Sanzang's companions in Journey to the West. He's also known in Japan as Son Goku. He's begun to feel a sense of justice and a desire to help the weak, like what you'd expect from a king of the monkeys. So by all accounts he certainly SEEMS to have matured a lot...but in the thick of battle you can still see the burning passion in his eyes as he wields his powers to the fullest, filled with excitement and joy.
[Event]To the Source of the Milky Way
511.name: Sun Wukong

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to the 3 enemies with the least HP, with a {probability} of inflicting Silence.
skill.name: Supernatural Feast

abilities.description: Increases 15% more DMG dealt of all team members when this daemon is Team Leader.
abilities.name: Emperor's Symbol

512.description:
"Do you like to play hide-and-seek?"
The spirit of the imperial seal passed down from dynasty to dynasty in Chinese history. Whoever possesses the seal is declared emperor, which has gotten her into all sorts of messy situations and made her go missing more than once. But at least now she's a self-proclaimed expert at hide-and-seek. She's also had the chance to get to know a lot of famous people over the centuries and has some interesting anecdotes to share as a result. But no one's quite sure how much is fact and how much is fiction—not even her!
512.name: Seel Imperio

skill.description: Restores {value} HP to 3 allies (melee priority); increases targets' speed by {delay1} for a limited time.
skill.name: Hide-and-Seek

abilities.description: Reduces 20% of DMG taken.
abilities.name: Grasping Grip

abilities.description: Increases 25% of DMG dealt when "Orihime [Formal Wear]" is on the team.
abilities.name: A New Legend

from_description.event_name: To the Source of the Milky Way

513.description:
"What do we really seek...?"
The spirit of a cowherd who appears in the story of Tanabata. He lives in love and harmony with Vega, without a care in the world. At least that's what he says...
513.name: Hikoboshi [Formal Wear]

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to nearby enemies. Targets receive {delay1} more DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: Unyielding Determination

abilities.description: Increases 50% of ATK speed.
abilities.name: Furious Flyer

abilities.description: Increases 70% crit rate of skill target and increases 80% Crit DMG
abilities.name: Magical Moving Cloud

from_description.event_name: To the Source of the Milky Way

514.description:
"That touch, that smell...! Ah, how I missed this!"
The spirit of a magic cloud that soars through the skies. She likes to partner up with people whose hearts are beautiful and dreams are pure, in addition to being strong. She's been working with Sun Wukong for longer than anyone else, and their relationship is filled with deep, mutual respect. Apparently some spirits get excited just to witness the two of them working together.
[Special Bond] Increases Sun Wukong's skill DMG
