514.name: Flying Nimbus [Awakened]

skill.description: Restores {value} HP to ally with the highest ATK, increases targets' speed by {delay1} for a limited time.
skill.name: High-Speed Transport

abilities.description: Increases 15% of DMG dealt.
abilities.name: Fighting Monk

abilities.description: Restores 5% HP every 5 seconds when one of “Journey to the West” is on the team.
abilities.name: Journey to the West

515.description:
"What? Did something go wrong again...?"
The spirit of one of Sanzang's companions in Journey to the West. He's better known to most people as Sha Wujing, but in Heaven he goes by his official title as a general. Always the analytical type, he tends to forget his surroundings in his internal quest to reach a logical conclusion. He's also extremely honest about things and can be a little awkward, but it's also refreshing to watch him stubbornly push forward with his logic. He may not talk much, but when he does, he gets to the point and makes sure not to do anything that would injure his pride. Needless to say, his personal values often clash with his companions' more carefree approach to life.
515.name: General Juan Lian

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to all enemies.
skill.name: Red Rain

abilities.description: When HP is 1/2 or less, Increases 50% of DMG dealt.
abilities.name: Guardian of Souls

abilities.description: Increases 25% of skill DMG.
abilities.name: Path of Purity

516.description:
"No mistakes for me today, not one!"
The spirit of a valkyrie who guides the souls of fallen warriors to a palace in heaven. After marrying Siegfried, the strength of their love helped her awaken to her true calling in life. Her powers are truly formidable, binding together the world, the gods, and humanity through the power of death.
516.name: Brynhildr [True Form]

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to an enemy (melee priority), with a {probability} of inflicting Stun.
skill.name: The Radiant Valkyrie

abilities.description: All allies take 3% less DMG.
abilities.name: Heirloom Fragrance

517.description:
"Feeling a little more sophisticated now, aren't you?"
The spirit of a treasured piece of fragrant wood handed down in the Hosokawa family. She is one among four pieces from the same tree but is very highly regarded in the (admittedly small) fragrant wood community. She doesn't just bask in the glory, though—instead she devotes herself to healing the hearts of those who appreciate a good aroma. However, she has a petty side and refuses to show interest in those who don't care for her scent.
517.name: Chrysanthia White

skill.description: Restores {value} HP to 2 allies with the highest ATK.
skill.name: Concentration

abilities.description: Increases 60% of Crit DMG.
abilities.name: Thousandfold Surprise

518.description:
"Heh, heh, you're gonna love this one!"
The spirit of a tanuki who loves playing practical jokes and devotes her life to them. Her pranks are multi-faceted and cause her targets to be suspicious of even the most harmless objects for days afterwards. She once pulled a pretty extreme prank on Mikado and was put through the wringer afterwards, so now she makes sure not to do anything that causes actual harm or that her victims don't personally find funny.
518.name: Danzabura Tanuki

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to the enemy with the lowest HP. Target take {delay1} more DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: Sneak Attack

abilities.description: All Divina team members deal 10% more DMG.
abilities.name: Britain's King

519.description:
"You know what happens if you're rude to me, right?"
The spirit of the king of Britain. He led a dramatic life that involved a wizard, a legendary sword, and the Knights of the Round Table. Nowadays, as one of the most famous subjects of research and reenactments, he's well-known to many...and yet he has his insecurities nonetheless. Suffice it to say, he lacks emotional stability and tends to fly off the handle.
[Event] Guild Conquest
519.name: Arthur Pendragon

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to an enemy (healers priority), with a {probability} of inflicting Silence.
skill.name: Brandished Blade

abilities.description: Normal attacks have 9% chances of inflicting Freeze.
abilities.name: Frosty Spirit

52.description:
"Are you okay? You're not too cold?"
A spirit the very opposite of frosty in her dealings with others. This sweet-natured snow spirit will go to extraordinary lengths to make those she warms to comfortable. Partial to the odd cheek-reddening tipple, she also has a tiresome habit of speaking in groan-tastic puns when excited.
52.name: Yuki Onna

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to 3 enemies (melee priority), with a {probability} of inflicting Freeze.
skill.name: Snowy Investigation

abilities.description: Increases 35% of Crit DMG.
abilities.name: Worldly Suffering

520.description:
"Where would my strengths best be used?"
The spirit of a poet from the Kamakura Period. Originally a samurai, he later became a monk. He and Yoritomo Minamoto go way back, and Saigyo advised him on how to organize the music festival. He's great when it comes to at looking at the bigger picture, easily able to analyze a situation and figure out what to do next. But sometimes he can get a little carried away...
[Event] The Great Feudal Music Festival
520.name: Saigyo

skill.description: Can be used as bond and in guild conquest.
skill.name: Assist Class Daemon

abilities.description: Increases 10% of Crit rate.
abilities.name: Instrument of Revolution

521.description:
"I am without peer as a violinist."
The spirit of a man known as the premier violin virtuoso of his day. Minamoto contacted him about including one of his breathtaking performances in the festival. He has a unique artistic vision to which he holds true in all his work. His lack of interest in anything besides music has caused a number of problems, but it never seems to motivate him to make any changes. Maybe he really DID sell his soul to obtain those extraordinary skills of his...
[Event] The Great Feudal Music Festival
521.name: Niccolo Paganini

skill.description: Can be used as bond and in guild conquest.
skill.name: Assist Class Daemon

abilities.description: Increases 4% of DMG dealt at the start of each wave.
abilities.name: One Hit Wonder

522.description:
"This one's gonna get your heart racing!"
The spirit of a ritual gong stand declared to be a National Treasure. Highly excitable and with a very loud voice, she tends to draw a lot of attention to herself. That said, she isn't the type to perform on her own, she'd rather be part of an ensemble. Apparently Homer served as her producer on their piece for the music festival.
[Event] The Great Feudal Music Festival
522.name: Kay Kagen

skill.description: Can be used as bond and in guild conquest.
skill.name: Assist Class Daemon

523.description:
"You're gettin' a taste of the real deal today, baby!"
The spirit of the first electric guitar on earth. She's a very...unique...spirit who tends to stand out in a crowd. She's pretty well-known among musical spirits, but her ostentatious sensibilities and lifestyle sometimes make her clash with spirits who come from other times and places in history.
[Event] The Great Feudal Music Festival
523.name: Fryeen Panna

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to a random enemy, with a {probability} of inflicting Stun.
skill.name: Musical Outburst

abilities.description: Deals 20% more DMG.
abilities.name: Immortal Poet

524.description:
"Don't let me forget to write in my diary today!"
The spirit of one of the 36 Immortal Poets. She's known for compiling the Kokinshu, an ancient anthology of poetry, but she claims it was just something she threw together "in her spare time." Nonetheless, her skills are deeply respected by other spirits. She also has a severe side and can be quite harsh when reviewing the work of her fellow poets...but with fans, she is nothing but professional and polite.
[Event] The Great Feudal Music Festival
524.name: Kino Tsurayuki

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to an enemy (ranged priority).
skill.name: Depiction of Beauty

abilities.description: All divina allies take 5% less DMG.
abilities.name: Troubadour

525.description:
"I'm seeing a lot of potential here..."
The spirit of the legendary author of the Iliad and the Odyssey. She decided to devote herself to the festival's success in order to boost her own career, thinking that any hard work now would pay off in acknowledgement and recognition later.
[Event] The Great Feudal Music Festival
525.name: Homer

skill.description: Increases DMG taken of 2 random enemies by {delay1} for a limited time.
skill.name: Producer

abilities.description: Restores 10% HP to Phantasma team members at the start of each wave.
abilities.name: Sound of Love

abilities.description: Increases 15% of skill DMG of Phantasma team members at the start of each wave.
abilities.name: Tear Jerker

526.description:
"My voice is my greatest treasure."
The infamous singing ghost. Her music is top-of-the-line when it comes to making audiences cry, thanks to her deeply sensitive nature. It's no exaggeration to say she puts a little of herself into each and every song she sings. Minamoto fell in love with her music the first time he heard it, and he was convinced to organize the whole festival solely for the purpose of introducing her music to the world.
[Event] The Great Feudal Music Festival
526.name: Siren [Singer]

skill.description: Restores {value} HP to all allies. Targets receive {delay1} less DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: Love Song

abilities.description: Increases 18% more DMG dealt of all team members when this daemon is Team Leader.
abilities.name: Kamakura shogunate

abilities.description: Increases all allies' Crit DMG by 20%.
abilities.name: Unifying Leader

527.description:
"The country's come a long way since my day."
The spirit of a shogun who relocated Japan's capital to Kamakura. During his lifetime he did everything he could to consolidate power through military force, but these days he's more interested in culture and the arts—especially in how people form bonds through music. As a spirit, he's taken it upon himself to promote music and a sense of community across the land.
[Event] The Great Feudal Music Festival
527.name: Yoritomo Minamoto

skill.description: Increases Crit Rate to all allies by {delay1} for a limited time.
skill.name: Strength of a Shogun

abilities.description: Increases 45% of DMG.
abilities.name: Creation & Destruction

abilities.description: Increases 30% of skill DMG and Increases 10% of max HP.
abilities.name: Greatest God

528.description:
"Oh my gosh, this is AMAZING!"
The spirit of the greatest deity in Hinduism. Being the goddess of destruction, she likes her music loud and is pretty hardcore, often spotted thrashing around in moshpits... At least, that's how people imagine her, but it couldn't be further from the truth. Actually she enjoys listening to all sorts of music in a completely normal way. Nevertheless, there's an unwritten rule among spirits that you do NOT want to make her angry.
528.name: Shiva

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to all enemies.
skill.name: Pounded to a Pulp

abilities.description: Increases attack speed by 45%.
abilities.name: Earnest Singer

abilities.description: Normal attacks have 40% chances of inflicting stun.
abilities.name: Still Dreaming

529.description:
"I have my own song to sing, too!"
The spirit of a poet with a beauty no man could ignore. She rarely sings for large audiences but agreed to perform in the festival at Minamoto's behest. She already has her fair share of fans, but singing at such a big event has the potential to take her career to another level altogether.
529.name: Ono-no-Komachi [Festival]

skill.description: Can be used as bond and in guild conquest.
skill.name: Wistful Melody

53.description:
"Spick and span! I can almost see my face in these!"
An inveterate neat-freak with a specialty in azuki bean washing. The to-die-for taste of her washed beans has won her widespread adulation, but she doesn't work as much as you might think—early spring and late fall are her bean-washing seasons of choice.
53.name: Azukiarai

skill.description: Increases DMG dealt by the ally with highest ATK by {delay1} for a limited time.
skill.name: Scrape 'n' Polish

abilities.description: Reduces 10% of DMG taken.
abilities.name: Sacred Saga

530.description:
"Okay, so this is gonna take a while..."
The spirit of an epic musical drama created by Richard Wagner. She's always trying to spread the word about how great an opera it is, but most people just can't get past the length. Her few hardcore fans have been urging her to think up new ways to share the story and make it appealing to a wider audience...
530.name: Nibelunga Ring

skill.description: Can be used as bond and in guild conquest.
skill.name: Raise the Curtain

abilities.description: 100% chance of inflicting Burn to Normal attacks targets.
abilities.name: Magical Creature

531.description:
"Look, you've got me all wrong here."
The spirit of a djinn who appears in many stories and legends. She considers herself the most unlucky spirit in the world thanks to her wandering years when she had adventures all over the world. She's still remembered in many places, but since these "adventures" were generally of a negative nature, most people remember her as an intrusive evil spirit. She finds this incredibly unfair.
531.name: Ifrit

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to 3 enemies (ranged priority), with a {probability} of inflicting Burn.
skill.name: Flickering Flames

abilities.description: Skill attacks have 100% chances of inflicting Stun.
abilities.name: Alluring Lute

abilities.description: Increases battle reward drop rate by 15%.
abilities.name: Shared Treasure

532.description:
"I'm at my best out under the open skies!"
The spirit of a very free-spirited lute. She ran into Minamoto while on a mission to explore every nook, cranny, and backwater of Japan. Other spirits are excited to see her perform since she rarely appears onstage. She even prepared some new songs for the festival and is taking this chance to show a new side of herself.
532.name: Genjo [Festival]

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to a random enemy. Target takes {delay1} more DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: Open Air Concert

abilities.description: Reduces 5% DMG dealt by all foes at the start of each wave.
abilities.name: Great Tengu

abilities.description: Increases 5% more DMG by all team members.
abilities.name: Supreme Power

533.description:
"If you've got any problems, just lemme know, alright?"
The spirit of a tengu enshrined in Mount Atago in Kyoto. She's the most well-known tengu in all of Japan, perhaps the entire world. She has the strength to back it up, too, making her dependable, proud, and admired by many. Spirits even go on pilgrimages to Mount Atago when they need her help...but she's honestly finding all their requests a bit troublesome to deal with.
533.name: Atago Tarabo

skill.description: Reduces all enemies' DEF by {delay1} for a limited time.
skill.name: Prayer of Protection

abilities.description: Increases 10% of skill DMG.
abilities.name: Knights of the Round Table

534.description:
"Make sure to call me by my FULL name, okay?"
The spirit of one of the Knights of the Round Table from the legend of King Arthur. Arthur once told him he'd swipe right, and people often compliment his style. He would enjoy this reputation for being so handsome if it weren't ruined by his nickname "Tristy." No one's sure where the name came from, but it seems to stem from a fight he once had with a former lover...
534.name: Tristan

skill.description: Can be used as bond and in guild conquest.
skill.name: Knight in Love

abilities.description: Increases 20% of Crit Rate.
abilities.name: Dino Tyrant

535.description:
"Set your cup over there and watch."
The spirit of possibly the most famous dinosaur of them all, beloved by kids of all ages. There are debates about all sorts of details like whether the so-called "T. rex" had feathers, which she observes from afar with smug satisfaction. All dinosaur-related spirits know that this information is top secret, so her lips are sealed no matter how desperately you beg for the truth.
[Event] Guild Conquest
535.name: Tee Rex

skill.description: Can be used as bond and in guild conquest.
skill.name: Hot Pursuit

abilities.description: Increases 20% of DMG dealt by Divina team members when this daemon is Team Leader.

from_description.event_name:
Otogi 2nd anniversary special episode
Incident of the surprise assault at the Sakuma Mansion

536.description:
”Time truly flies quickly. “
The Spirit who leads the swordsmen of Shinsengumi group one protecting the capital. Although his body condition had never been fully recovered, he keeps training himself and now has become widely known as one of the most powerful persons in the Bureau of the Occult. In these two years through continuous training, he has pushed himself to a new level.
[Event] Otogi 2nd anniversary special episode Incident of the surprise assault at the Sakuma Mansion
536.name: Okita Soji [2nd Anniversary]

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to the enemy with the most HP. Target takes {delay1} more DMG for a limited time.

abilities.name: The Great Three

from_description.event_name:
Otogi 2nd anniversary special episode
Incident of the surprise assault at the Sakuma Mansion

537.description:
”Let us celebrate? “
Known as the right-hand man of Shuten Doji. He has been well known among the world of demons. He is capable of quickly expanding his circle of friends. Probably because of his positive personality, it makes it easy for him to make friends. Compared with the other males it is easier for him to build up a friendship with females. It is still a mystery why he is always being invited to female gatherings. He is now building up such a special position.
[Event] Otogi 2nd anniversary special episode Incident of the surprise assault at the Sakuma Mansion
537.name: Ibaraki Doji [2nd Anniversary]

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to all enemies, with a {probability} of inflicting Silence.

abilities.description: Increases 20% of DMG dealt by Anima team members when this daemon is Team Leader.
abilities.name: The Great Three

from_description.event_name:
Otogi 2nd anniversary special episode
Incident of the surprise assault at the Sakuma Mansion

538.description:
”The moon is so pretty tonight, meow. “
Because of many legends, the blade Spirit has been known as a demon blade. And since she has shared so much together with Sola and the others, she is beginning to be capable of controlling her massive potential power. As a result, the Bureau of the Occult assigns high difficulty missions to her, and she seems to get a bit tired recently.
[Event] Otogi 2nd anniversary special episode Incident of the surprise assault at the Sakuma Mansion
538.name: Muramasa [2nd Anniversary]

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to 3 enemies (ranged priority).
skill.name: Demon Essence

from_description.event_name:
Otogi 2nd anniversary special episode
Incident of the surprise assault at the Sakuma Mansion

539.description:
”Negative... I am not being shy. “
A Spirit transformed from a ninja weapon. Her origin is a mystery. Her relationship with the Fuma clan is also unclear. Although she loyally completes the mission assigned to her, her origin sometimes makes her doubt herself about her will.
[Event] Otogi 2nd anniversary special episode Incident of the surprise assault at the Sakuma Mansion

changes.new: Increases 20% of Skill DMG when Fuma Kotaro is on the team.

54.description:
"Nothing survives my all-powerful cleave!"
A straight-laced, no-nonsense spirit with a deep hatred of anything that isn't 180 degrees. She cuts straight to the chase in all she does, and to heck with any rough edges that get shaved off along the way.
54.name: Diamond Cutter

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to 2 random enemies.
skill.name: Diamond Storm

abilities.description: Increases 20% of Crit Rate.
abilities.name: Assassination

from_description.event_name:
Otogi 2nd anniversary special episode
Incident of the surprise assault at the Sakuma Mansion

540.description:
”Because I am a person who cares about detail. “
A Spirit transformed from an assassin who is engaged actively behind the scene during the French Revolution. Because of her beautiful nature, she has many supporters and is praised by the alias of “Angel.” However, rarely any of her supporters truly engages her and she feels lonely because of this. Sometimes a sad look can be seen on her face, but most likely she is thinking of an assassination in her thoughts. It is better not to disturb her at this time.
[Event] Otogi 2nd anniversary special episode Incident of the surprise assault at the Sakuma Mansion
540.name: Charlotte Corday

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to the enemy with the lowest HP.
skill.name: Silent Kill

abilities.description: Reduces 20% of DMG taken.
abilities.name: Legend of Ninja

from_description.event_name:
Otogi 2nd anniversary special episode
Incident of the surprise assault at the Sakuma Mansion

541.description:
”The wind of darkness blows for me. “
One of the legendary ninja. The Spirit is transformed from the best Fuma Ninja who is located at the top in the clan. Fuma Kotaro was known to be a monster-like giant man in legends. But in fact, Fuma Kotaro is the alias of a person with the talent in the Fuma clan. The alias is only granted to the most superior Fuma ninja of the time. For this reason, its existence is said to be a combination of dreams and romance.
[Event] Otogi 2nd anniversary special episode Incident of the surprise assault at the Sakuma Mansion
541.name: Fuma Kotaro

abilities.name: Hanzo Clan

from_description.event_name:
Otogi 2nd anniversary special episode
Incident of the surprise assault at the Sakuma Mansion

542.description:
”......Acknowledged. “
One of the legendary ninja. The ninja who served Tokugawa Ieyasu, had once led the Iga and Koga clan. He became an important minister during peaceful times serving Leyasu. He never forgets his loyalty even when he is transformed into a Spirit. However, becoming a Spirit he witnessed the passing of hundreds of years, and slowly he felt the distance along with the change in human minds.
[Event] Otogi 2nd anniversary special episode Incident of the surprise assault at the Sakuma Mansion
542.name: Hattori Hanzo Masanari

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to nearby enemies, with a {probability} of inflicting Burn.

from_description.event_name:
Otogi 2nd anniversary special episode
Incident of the surprise assault at the Sakuma Mansion

543.description:
Because Hijiri is a truly talented expert...”
The Spirit who takes care of Sakuma Hijiri, the talented expert who is also the pride of Sakuma clan. Hibiki's background is completely unknown. Even the Bureau of the Occult has no record of Hibiki's origin. If there's a relationship between Hibiki and the Sakuma clan, there should be bits and pieces of information exist. Or is Hibiki...
[Event] Otogi 2nd anniversary special episode Incident of the surprise assault at the Sakuma Mansion
543.name: Hibiki [Sun spear]

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to enemy with highest ATK. Target takes {delay1} more DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: The Discovery

abilities.description: Increases 20% of Crit Rate and increases 50% Crit DMG
abilities.name: Superior Adhesive

544.description:
”Hey, what is it? “
A Spirit born from the power of elements in the form of an elf. A member of the elves dancing team ELF118. In fact not long after she joined, she has been regarded as a graduate student. Although everyone said she has a very high potential, currently she is quite bothered by the fact that her ability and height are not growing too well as expected. The reason seems to be her enthusiasm in gaming causing her unable to leave her night live.
544.name: Mercury Elf

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to the 3 enemies with the highest ATK, with a {probability} of inflicting Sleep.
skill.name: Sleep Deprivation

abilities.description: Increases 30% of skill DMG.
abilities.name: Espionage Ability

545.description:
”I am not impressed, but work is work. “
It is being said that he brings fortune and misfortune to people. A moody spirit transformed from a fox whose temper changes all the time. Regarding the radical movement that rarely happens in the Spirit world, it seems that he has been collecting all kinds of information.
[Event] Otogi 2nd anniversary special episode The plan for the crusade against Tosho Daigongen
545.name: Pipe Fox [Training]

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to the enemy with the most HP. Target takes {delay1} more DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: Tombstone Pile driver

abilities.description: Immune to Poison.
abilities.name: Honorable Determination

546.description:
The situation seems to become not as beautiful as expected? “
The spirit transformed from Queen Bloody Mary. Perhaps because she was caught up in sufferings of many, karma made her name become a burden of sins in history. Although she is in control of her choices, she clearly understands that her radical action may lead to her own destruction. Now she becomes a counselor giving advice to the Spirit politicians in need of help.
[Event] Otogi 2nd anniversary special episode The plan for the crusade against Tosho Daigongen
546.name: Bloody Mary

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to 2 random enemies, with a {probability} of inflicting Weak Poison.
skill.name: Execution Adjudgment

abilities.description: Increases 15% of the EXP gained from battle.
abilities.name: Mistress of the Conqueror

547.description:
Everyone, walk on the path with my light. “
The Spirit of the niece of Oda Nobunaga, and the mistress of Toyotomi Hideyoshi. According to history, she became the conqueror following the death of Hideyoshi, but she actually committed suicide during the summer battle of Osaka.
[Event] Otogi 2nd anniversary special episode The plan for the crusade against Tosho Daigongen
547.name: Lady Yodo

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to an enemy (healers priority), with a {probability} of inflicting Silence.
skill.name: Word of Power “Anger”

abilities.description: Increases 15% of skill DMG by Divina team members.
abilities.name: Divine Vessel

abilities.description: Skill attacks increase 10% DMG taken by targets.
abilities.name: Peaceful Reign

548.description:
”There is no good nor evil in this world...”
The Spirit transformed from Tokugawa Lemitsu after the god-like being possessed a vessel. Although she is extremely powerful, the vessel with a fragile property cannot withstand her massive amount of evil essence. And as a result, the imbalance of essence causes her to take unexpected actions. She has become so powerful, more because others have worshipped her with trust, rather than merely a god in the legend. That is the true source of her borderless spirit essence.
[Event] Otogi 2nd anniversary special episode The plan for the crusade against Tosho Daigongen
548.name: Tosho Daigongen

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to all enemies. Targets deal {delay1} less DMG for a limited time.

abilities.description: Increases 40% of all allies' Crit DMG when this daemon is Team Leader.
abilities.name: Way of the Occult

abilities.description: Increases all allies' level by 15 when this daemon is Team Leader.
abilities.name: Fairy-tale Book

549.description:
”Hoho, that went well, Master. “
A Spirit work as servant at the Bureau of the Occult. Sola loves modern (special) Japanese culture so much and certainly knows very well about the sub-culture. When getting hungry, Sola loves enjoying grilled pork noodles but no one knows about it. Although hated anything unjust, Sola still loves to play with pranks on the others. “I can live with myself for my deeds.” is Sola's motto.
[Event] Otogi 2nd anniversary special episode The plan for the crusade against Tosho Daigongen
549.name: Sola [Sun idol]

skill.description: Restores {value} HP to all allies. Targets deal {delay1} more DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: Divine Form

55.description:
"Nothing can beat my tactical nous!"
The goddess of all things tactical and strategic. The plans she devises are models of military accuracy, right down to the tiniest detail. The only snag? She's never around to see them succeed, as she tends to spend the night before nursing an acute case of "pre-battle runs"... Still, the tactics are flawless, so let's forget that last bit.
55.name: Gennyo

skill.description: Reduces all enemies' DEF by {delay1} for a limited time.
skill.name: Operation "Codename F"

abilities.description: Increases 50% of ATK speed.
abilities.name: Beautiful Princess

abilities.description: Increases 10% of battle time limit. (only take effect once to the team)
abilities.name: Fox Spirit

from_description.event_name:
Otogi 2nd anniversary special episode
Incident of the surprise assault at the Sakuma Mansion

550.description:
”This is like taking candy from a baby, hahaha “
A Spirit transformed from a fox who lived over a thousand years. She has nine tails on her. The spirit essence within her can easily destroy even a country. Apprentice Spirit Agent who attempts to attack her would be countered and destroyed. For this reason, only a master spirit agent or authorities are allowed to get close to her.
550.name: Ninetails Fox

skill.description: Can be used as bond and in guild conquest.
skill.name: Curse and Violation

abilities.description: Increases 12% of Crit rate.
abilities.name: Power of the Emperor

551.description:
”Are you making demands from your king? ”
In ancient times, the Spirit transformed from the first emperor who conquered the land of China. For Spirits, the first one that succeeded have significant importance to them. Other than being widely accepted, his image has also been greatly improved and praised by most spirits because of his title as the first one. Naturally the thoughts of all manifests in the form of his power and existence.
551.name: Emperor Shi

skill.description: Can be used as bond and in guild conquest.
skill.name: Heavenly Voice

abilities.description: Increases 30% of Crit DMG.
abilities.name: Spear of Odin

552.description:
“Any attempt to escape is meaningless. “
Name of the spear held by the high god in Norse mythology. The homing spear will find its target simply by being thrown out. It can destroy its target at will. Whoever is approved and beloved by the spear, is also promised with ensured victory.
552.name: Gungnir

skill.description: Can be used as bond and in guild conquest.
skill.name: Destiny of Death

abilities.description: Increase 25% of DMG dealt by the 2 allies with the highest ATK.
abilities.name: God of Destruction

abilities.description: Increases 25% of Crit DMG by the 2 allies with the highest ATK.
abilities.name: Favor of the Judge

553.description:
”It is too naive compared to the Sakuma clan. “
The Spirit who transformed from the half-brother of Minamoto no Yoritomo, founder of the Kamakura shogunate. There was a time when he was known as Ushiwakamaru. His abnormal katana stance seems have been taught directly by Tengu. Although he is somewhat belligerent, he never acts carelessly. He enjoys combat at full strength without hesitation.
553.name: Minamoto no Yoshitsune

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to the enemy with the most HP. Target takes {delay1} more DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: Sword Dance of the Divine

abilities.description: Increases 5% of DMG.
abilities.name: Midsummer

554.description:
”Oh wow, the weather is so nice today! !”
A Spirit transformed from an elf of the ocean. In the hot summer season, she looks after the people wearing swimsuits at the shore with a warm sight. Being a Spirit and as well as an apprentice Nereid, she has much more to learn in the coming future.
554.name: Nereid: Galatea

skill.description: Can be used as bond and in guild conquest.
skill.name: The Song of Hope

abilities.description: Reduces 25% of DMG taken and reduces DMG dealt by 10% at the same time.
abilities.name: The All-knowing Scholar

from_description.event_name: A visitor from the outer space

555.description:
"Look upon the sky and you will see countless friends."
A spirit transformed from the Ptolemy 48 constellation. Ptolemy is the spirit who discovered the constellation. Even if he transformed into a spirit, his deep interest and curiosity towards the universe have never changed. It is being said that now he has become a comrade of Zeus, who also wants to make the universe a better place.
[Event] A visitor from the outer space
555.name: Ptolemy

skill.description: Can be used as bond and in guild conquest.
skill.name: 48 constellation

abilities.description: 12% chance of inflicting Silence to Normal attacks targets.
abilities.name: The Lyra

from_description.event_name: A visitor from the outer space

556.description:
"Just go take a walk for two light years."
A spirit transformed from the Ptolemy 48 constellation. She loves the universe, and he hates anyone who messes it up. She has been a wandering bard who never stays at the same place in the past. Since Zeus took her in, her life and destiny has changed but she feels reluctant to discuss.
[Event] A visitor from the outer space
556.name: Stella: Lyra

skill.description: Can be used as bond and in guild conquest.
skill.name: Performance

abilities.description: Increases 12% of Max HP.
abilities.name: Dr Monster

from_description.event_name: A visitor from the outer space

557.description:
"What a bunch of wild kids."
She is the spirit of a humanoid monster in Greek mythology. Since she has a history with Zeus in the past, now they still quarrel with each other quite often. However, the two of them have an agreement. Whenever they share the same purpose, they can put aside their disagreement and cooperate with each other. She is a mother monster of the legendary rank and so everyone calls her the "Big mom."
[Event] A visitor from the outer space
557.name: Echidna

skill.description: Can be used as bond and in guild conquest.
skill.name: Monster Theater

abilities.description: Restores 5% HP every 5 seconds.
abilities.name: Daily Improvement

from_description.event_name: A visitor from the outer space

558.description:
"It is true that one's effort is really important……"
An elven spirit emerged from the elements. ELF118member……She seems like a member of ELF118, but in fact she is a heroine protecting the Earth! However, she has just started as a heroine and lacks experience. It is believed that she has a bright future. Is she a soldier or an idol? Note that even she herself is quite confused of her true identity.
[Event] A visitor from the outer space
558.name: Earth Defense Force: Helium

skill.description: Restores {value} HP to ally with the highest ATK,Targets receive {delay1} less DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: Defensive Dance

abilities.description: Increases 30% of skill DMG.
abilities.name: The Reticulum

from_description.event_name: A visitor from the outer space

559.description:
"Sniping is not something can be taught, you must feel it."
A spirit transformed from the Ptolemy 48 constellation. She is a stoic with far superior endurance than anyone. She is renowned as an expert sniper. Her skills are not limited to rifles, but also throwing weapons that include any means of attacking from a distance. Because she needs to snipe in space, she has to use her senses to overcome any interference in physics and keep herself highly concentrated. It is unknown if that is the reason she is eating sweets all the time.
[Event] A visitor from the outer space
559.name: Stella: Reticulum

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to enemy with highest ATK, target receives {delay1} more DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: Long range Sniping

56.description:
"My dad's Yinglong! I bet he's way awesomer than your dad!"
This young whippersnapper dreams of growing up to be like his old man, the rain dragon Yinglong. He's true to his heritage and got the attitude down pat—unfortunately, his young age means he's naive to a fault, and is all too easily trickable as a result.
56.name: Mizuchi

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to the enemy with the most HP. Target deals {delay1} less DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: Young Dragon's Sigh

abilities.description: Normal attack targets have 33% chances of increasing 15% more DMG taken.
abilities.name: Malefic

from_description.event_name: A visitor from the outer space

560.description:
"……Should I break it, crush it or smash it?"
A spirit with negative emotions who came from outer space. Because he has such strong negative emotions deep down inside his bone, it is being said that being rude is just like breathing to him. On the other hand, he was born with such personality. Zeus saw his nature and named this nameless existence with the name "Thorn".
[Event] A visitor from the outer space
560.name: Malefic: Thorn

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to the 2 enemies with the highest ATK, with a {probability} of inflicting Weak Poison.
skill.name: Miasma Eruption

abilities.description: Increases 20% of Crit Rate and increases 50% Crit DMG
abilities.name: The Andromeda

from_description.event_name: A visitor from the outer space

561.description:
"Please put aside your unbeneficial quarrels".
A spirit transformed from the Ptolemy 48 constellation. She is proud and confident because of her connection to the royal bloodline in the universe. However, she is really scared of the ocean and monster. The dark side of her personality reveals when she faces her weakness. She has a well-established personal network, and capable to connect with any corner of the universe. Regardless of the status, she has such great magnanimity to accept others. Her straightforward and realistic personality is being praised by others with high credibility.
[Event] A visitor from the outer space
561.name: Stella: Andromeda

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to the enemy with the lowest HP, with a {probability} of inflicting Silence.
skill.name: Drowning Goddess

abilities.description: Reduces 25% of Crit DMG by all foes at the start of each wave.
abilities.name: The All-knowing

abilities.description: Increases 15% of DMG dealt.
abilities.name: God of the Sky

from_description.event_name: A visitor from the outer space

562.description:
"One's fault cannot be redeemed by any means……"
The spirit transformed from the all-father in Greek mythology. Even when transformed into a spirit, he still maintains order and rules the universe. Looking at their organized army, Sola named them the "Earth Defense Force". He takes discipline, reward and punishment very seriously. He made a great effort trying to maintain a good relationship among the spirit of constellations. It was never easy for him commanding an army of veterans. Zeus and Athena are father and daughter.
[Event] A visitor from the outer space
562.name: Zeus

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to 3 enemies (ranged priority), with a {probability} of inflicting Stun.
skill.name: Breathe of the Air

abilities.description: Increases 4% of DMG dealt at the start of each wave.
abilities.name: Rare and Precious

abilities.description: Increases 2% of DMG dealt by Anima team members at the start of each wave.
abilities.name: Stars of Tenmoku

563.description:
"Don't look at me like I am rare. Just treat me like normal."
A spirit transformed from the treasure Tenmoku tea bowl. The tea bowl was extremely precious among the Tenmoku tea bowls. She is worth mentioning because of her special existence. Her existence has become stronger as more people almost admire her, but she feels embarrassed about it. "What can a tea bowl do being special?" as she always said.
563.name: Inaba Tenmoku

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to the 2 enemies with the least HP.
skill.name: Frozen River of Star Dust

abilities.description: Increases all allies' Crit DMG by 40%.(only take effect once to the team)
abilities.name: Twenty-Thousand Miles

from_description.event_name: A visitor from the outer space

564.description:
"To the abyss of the sky!"
A spirit transformed from a submarine. Type S means it is remodeled for space. It was a submarine but obtained the function and ability to travel through space. These are granted by the imagination of people. Although she cannot warp in space yet, she has been practicing. It is unknown whether or not it is possible to learn how to warp through practice.
564.name: Nautilus[TypeS]

skill.description: Can be used as bond and in guild conquest.
skill.name: Top Speed in the Universe

abilities.description: Increases 50% of ATK speed.
abilities.name: 12 Gods of the Olympian

abilities.description: Increases 20% more DMG by all team members.
abilities.name: Talented Goddess

from_description.event_name: A visitor from the outer space

565.description:
"I will inherit father's great legacy."
The spirit transformed from the Greek goddess, daughter of Zeus in Greek mythology. Because she is always wearing her armor in the past, she was known as the bloodthirsty goddess. After transforming into a spirit, she started to realize people's expectations of her, and so she slowly changes. With her father Zeus, she works very hard to ensure the order of the universe is being protected .
565.name: Athena

skill.description: Restores {value} HP to ally with the lowest percentage of HP. Targets receive {delay1} less DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: Goddess Blessing

abilities.description: Increases 20% of skill DMG.
abilities.name: Point of Origin

566.description:
"……That is just bad for her reputation! Hehehe."
He appears on the Earth terrestrial at the same time as Thorn. His existence and purpose are yet unknown. He has an extremely aggressive personality. Whenever he is in a bad mood, he attacks everything on sight. It is believed that he is one of the four malefic in the Chinese mythology. From another perspective, his impulse of destruction may also be his desire to revive.
566.name: Chaos

skill.description: Can be used as bond and in guild conquest.
skill.name: Mix ‘em!

abilities.description: Decreases 10% the ATK speed of all foes at the start of each wave.
abilities.name: Flooding Rain

abilities.description: Increases 20% of skill DMG of Phantasma team members at the start of each wave.
abilities.name: Sincere Feelings

567.description:
"Wow, this dude is so powerful……"
A spirit of the demon who made his base in the Suzuka mountain. She worked hard to improve in her own way in order to get closer to the one she loves. With the help of many, now she could at least talk normally to the one she loves, but she still gets too nervous sometimes and acts a bit strange. People around her are getting even more impatient with her. Otakemaru's struggle for love may eventually come through some day.
567.name: Otakemaru [Pure Love]

skill.description: Increases DMG dealt by all allies by {delay1} for a limited time.
skill.name: Melody of Pure Love

abilities.description: Increases 10% of DMG dealt at the start of each wave.
abilities.name: Leader of Shinsengumi Team 2

568.description:
"Eh? My main skill should be swordsmanship……?"
The spirit transformed by a member of the Shinsengumi second team, a group of swordsmen who protected Kyoto in the past. He is well known for his swordsmanship mastery, and he seems to improve even more after he transformed into a spirit. Although he got used to being a tough guy, recently people seem to change their expectations about him. Rather than a sword master, people hope he gets better to pick on someone else.
568.name: Nagakura Shinpachi

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to the row of enemies directly in front, with a {probability} of inflicting Stun.
skill.name: Forward Slash

abilities.description: Skill attacks have a 60% chances of inflicting Sleep.
abilities.name: Haunted House

569.description:
"I have had enough with rain……"
A spirit transformed from Chinese umbrella. The spirit is famous with many different appearances, that even other spirits respect her because of that reason. However, she thinks that has nothing to do with her. She wants to live where the wind breezes through. Dance freely wherever she wants is her living purpose. ……Perhaps it is her personality not to think too much, or who knows it might be only one of her appearances in the journey of seeking for truth.
569.name: Kasa-obake

skill.description: Can be used as bond and in guild conquest.
skill.name: Chinese Umbrella Rush

57.description:
"Bow down to my almighty fists!"
"Small-fry" spirit no. 2, as made famous by classic RPG tradition the world over. In keeping with her small-fry status, her job is to be a thorn in the side of any hero at the outset of their journey. She's also a passionate practitioner of martial arts.
[Special Bond] Increases DMG dealt by Gobrute.
57.name: Goblerna

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to current target.
skill.name: Mauler's Maelstrom

abilities.description: Increases 25% of the EXP gained from battle.
abilities.name: Mani Jewel

570.description:
"Come to me with a pure heart."
The spirit of a jewel said to fulfill wishes in Buddhism and Hinduism. He is considered roughly equivalent to the Philosopher's Stone in the West. He gets along swimmingly with dragons and spends most of his time around them. He even relies on dragons for personal transportation, almost like some kind of personal dragon taxi service.
[Event] Guild Conquest
570.name: Cintamani

skill.description: Restores {value} HP to 2 allies (melee priority). Targets receive {delay1} less DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: Sparkling Stone

abilities.description: Absorbs 10% of DMG dealt as HP.
abilities.name: Unknown Engagement

571.description:
"Oh no...! Maybe too late...
The spirit of Dorothy from the fairytale "The Wizard of Oz" She loves TV series rated for families and children, now often repeating the same lines in an exaggerated way. Lately "Prophecies of Nostradamus" becomes her favorite book. While Dorothy enjoys the Halloween party at the Spirit Academy, she got involved in the "Mystery of the Vanished Tableware". It is believed that the mystery has been caused by the Illuminati formed by extra-terrestrial beings.
[Event] Record of the Spirit Halloween
571.name: Dorothy[HW2]

skill.description: Can be used as bond and in guild conquest.
skill.name: Magical Basket

abilities.description: Increases 2% of max HP of Phantasma team members.(only take effect once to the team)
abilities.name: Zombie Powder

572.description:
"I am~~ innocent~~!"
A zombie spirit who really loves Halloween festival. She starts getting bored by the surprising sight on her, and now she wishes to live normally like normal girls. Recently, she gets annoyed by the fact that milk turns into yogurt in time. Because of her infamous record last year, she quickly became the prime suspect in the "Mystery of the Vanished Tableware" in the Halloween party... The phrase "Zombie yuck!" is taboo at her presence.
[Event] Record of the Spirit Halloween
572.name: Zombilina[HW2]

skill.description: Can be used as bond and in guild conquest.
skill.name: Splatter Dance

abilities.description: Increases 15% of skill DMG of the 2 allies with highest ATK at the start of the final wave.(only take effect once to the team)
abilities.name: Red Lust

573.description:
"Hahaha! Forget it and drink~!"
A spirit of lantern used at a flea market booth being preserved nicely for many years.She works as the banner girl for the Japanese pub, and serves customers equally by ensuring all of them have a good and comfortable time. She plans to secretly investigate the Halloween party and give suggestion to the symbol spirit of the festival "Halloween lantern," but she got drunk in the party and totally forgot her own plan. She loves saying "Forget about details, just have a good time!" as an excuse, but perhaps she only loves alcohol... though she knows it's just not right.
[Event] Record of the Spirit Halloween
573.name: Aka "Red" Chochin[HW2]

skill.description: Can be used as bond and in guild conquest.
skill.name: Halloween Lantern

abilities.description: Increases 30% of Crit DMG.
abilities.name: Devourer

574.description:
"I am HUNGRY! Give me food!"
She is an energetic troublemaker who loves to bump around and can't stay still for a moment. Although she possesses an extraordinary power, she gets hungry too often and runs out of energy. She tends to follow whoever gives her food, although she knows that it is her weakness, she would say, "Because I am not good at thinking complicated things" as an excuse. An unexpected part from her is, a naughty brat like her always returns a favor seriously.
[Event] Record of the Spirit Halloween
574.name: Behemoth[HW2]

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to 2 random enemies.
skill.name: Gluttony

abilities.description: Restores 10% HP to all allies at the start of each wave.
abilities.name: Father of Medical Science

575.description:
"Persistence is difficult, but it always pays off.
The spirit of a prominent Japanese bacteriologist who made a great contribution.Because of his expertise in medical science, he has a deep connection with the Bureau of the Occult, and many Spirit Agents benefit from his work. He is also an instructor at the Spirit Academy. Every day he teaches complicated topics with enthusiasm and he patiently listens to his students when they seek his opinion. He earned the respect of many students and as a supervisor of the academy festival he got involved in the incident.
[Event] Record of the Spirit Halloween
575.name: Hideyo Noguchi[HW2]

skill.description: Restores {value} HP to 2 allies with the lowest percentage of HP and cures them from all negative status effects.
skill.name: New Medicine Creation

abilities.description: Increases 20% of Crit Rate.
abilities.name: Dutch Bouquet

576.description:
"Fame is not something built overnight."
Spirit of the most precious western porcelain ware. She was raised in a noble family with a sincere and sturdy personality. She won't forgive anyone who places a finger through the handle of a tea cup. On the other hand, she pushes herself too much and as a result the delicate side in her becomes rather vulnerable. Her words "A noble person should bare the related responsibility" has made her widely respected by many spirits. Because of her goof behavior, she has been elected as a member of the "Festival committee". However no one knows that it triggers the incident...
[Event] Record of the Spirit Halloween
576.name: Meißen

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to a wide area of enemies.
skill.name: Noblesse Oblige

abilities.description: Increases 4% of Crit Rate at the start of each wave.
abilities.name: Scripture of Blood

577.description:
"With only power it is impossible to stay at the top."
He is widely known as "The worst ferocious spirit in Japan".Because of his lineage and ability, he possesses a massive spirit essence as a powerful figure and a prefect at the Spirit Academy. He values tradition and formality and naturally he opposes the school festivals being held. His action caused many pressures on him and he had no choice but to adapt to this new era trend. His superior ability often made him isolated, nonetheless there are always fearless spirits in the academy who became acquainted with him. Rumors said that gods under similar circumstances often open out to each other.
[Event] Record of the Spirit Halloween
577.name: Emperor Sutoku[HW2]

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to all enemies, with a {probability} of inflicting Stun.
skill.name: Forbidden Curse

abilities.description: Increases 20% of Crit DMG by Phantasma team members when this daemon is Team Leader.
abilities.name: Good Wife, Wise Mother

abilities.description: Increases 20% of Crit DMG by the 2 allies Phantasma team members at the start of every wave.
abilities.name: Dance of the Swallowtail

578.description:
"Not too many and not too few! Precision is everything...
The spirit of the Japanese ghost tale "Sarayashiki".She is an energetic girl who took the position of "Academy executive committee". She might be too focus and becomes stubborn sometimes at work, and she cannot move on to the next job without finishing the work on hand. When she pays at a convenient store, she would feel lucky if she has the exact change. Although sometimes she is labeled as a "troublemaker", her root is a nice personality attracting many suitors. In the past, she saw her mother-in-law could not find herself all the dishware and developed into bullying the housewife. It seems that marriage problems also exists in spirit families.
[Event] Record of the Spirit Halloween
578.name: Sarayashiki

skill.description: Reduces an enemy (healers priority) DEF by {delay1} for a limited time.
skill.name: Counting Dishes

abilities.description: Skill attacks have 20% chances of inflicting Freeze.
abilities.name: Frozen Smile

abilities.description: All Phantasma team members deal 20% more DMG.
abilities.name: Honor Student

579.description:
"Can I really handle a great job like this...
The nice and friendly spirit of snow that appears when winter comes.Because she is mature and helpful, she is being elected as the "Committee Chief Executive" of the academy festival as an honor student. While she just began to think "Since I got elected I can't be a disappointment to anyone", the "Mystery of the Vanished Tableware" arises has truly hammered her. The current problem she faces, seems to be that her sighing causes the surroundings to decrease temperature by 1 degree. Even when she feels depressed, she still loves to joke using puns which speeds the surroundings to freeze up.
579.name: Yuki Onna[HW2]

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to all enemies, with a {probability} of inflicting Freeze.
skill.name: Melody of Snow

58.description:
"Target sighted. I shall conduct myself with honor."
The Anima of a throwing star that once belonged to an esteemed martial artist. As far as this fellow's concerned, the mission is all that matters. A true ninja with an unflinching sense of duty, he'll see the job through to completion no matter what dangers lie in store.
58.name: Shuriken

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to a random enemy.
skill.name: Airborne Annihilation

abilities.description: Increases battle reward drop rate by 15%.(only take effect once to the team)
abilities.name: Famous Detective

abilities.description: Increases 20% of the EXP gained from battle.(only take effect once to the team)
abilities.name: Heavy Smoker

580.description:
"This is just a very simple riddle!"
The spirit of the famous British detective.His courageous and outstanding actions made him remarkably noticeable. He is a gentleman who is way more judicious than anyone, and he absolutely dislikes failure. And for that reason, he never discloses his theory before he finds certain evidences, which often causes misunderstandings. Also, he is a heavy smoker and was lately bugged by the decrease in the number of smoking areas. Once in a while, someone saw him smoking artificial cigarettes, but no one is truly certain about it.
580.name: Sherlock Holmes

skill.description: Can be used as bond and in guild conquest.
skill.name: The Final Greeting

abilities.description: Immune to Poison and increases DMG dealt by 3% at the same time.
abilities.name: Grotesque of Evil Banishment

581.description:
"A real masterpiece is just special! Unlike a replica!"
A spirit created in the grotesque likeness of gargoyle in the shape of a demon.Although his knowledge in art is superior, but he almost failed on all other subjects. Because of this, he works at the spirit academy as a teacher in art but also a student, as well. He could go on discussing about sculpture, especially gargoyles even for days once he got to the topic. Although he has such a personality, his sociable behavior also made him quite popular among the students. Also, it was being said that last year that his published book "So said the Gargoyle" became a best seller, but no one is truly certain about it.
581.name: Gargoyle[HW2]

skill.description: Can be used as bond and in guild conquest.
skill.name: Iron Hammer of Art

abilities.description: Increase 20% of DMG dealt by the 2 allies with the highest ATK.
abilities.name: Child of the Devil

582.description:
"I peek outside the forest, and see a world full of uncomfortable noises……"
A spirit formed by an expert demon hunter who wishes to live peacefully on the mountain of Suzuka. Just like what the legend said, she has numerous appearances and can be useful in different time and place. She is a perfect wife, a scholar, a kind mother, and also a fighter. Many people are being attracted by her superior talent.
582.name: Suzuka Gozen

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to further enemies.
skill.name: Purify

abilities.description: All Anima team members take 8% less DMG
abilities.name: Strengthen

abilities.description: Increases 2% of Max HP to Anima team members at the start of each wave.
abilities.name: Secret Incense

583.description:
"Does anyone feel sick?"
The spirit of incense in slumber at the Shōsōin.She is familiar with incense and medicine, and to many spirits she has the image of a goddess who heals the mind and body. Even those who fainted or their hands and feet have gone cold, anyone in her care can be revived immediately. Because of her beautiful appearance, the spirit she revived often propose to her once they got back on their feet, and it seems to be happening everyday now. As the secret collection of Big Mom at the Shōsōin, they have a very close relationship like real mother and daughter.
583.name: Lady Musk

skill.description: Restores {value} HP to 2 allies with the highest ATK. Targets deal {delay1} more DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: Healing Aroma

abilities.description: Increases 4% of DMG dealt at the start of each wave.
abilities.name: Father of the Sword Saint

584.description:
"Show me what you got!"
The spirit of a great tactician, and the father of sword saint.He is a tough and broad-minded instructor who trains spirits at the academy. He is a master of all martial arts, and especially skilled in using dagger. He felt gratified looking at Musashi and Kojiro sparring with each other, but he also worries that they might surpass him someday. For that reason, he challenges other acquaintance sword masters imperatively, even if his challenge is not accepted. He is the type of person who cares nothing that happens around him once he gets overexcited.
584.name: Grandmaster Shinmen

skill.description: Can be used as bond and in guild conquest.
skill.name: Dagger Rush

abilities.description: Increase 10% of DMG dealt by the 2 allies with the highest ATK.
abilities.name: Master of Yamabiko

585.description:
"The nature is important~~ (Very important~~)"
The spirit of an ancient tree on the Holy mountain.She appears very young, but she is one of the most ancient creations in the world. Wherever she speaks echo can be heard, wherever plants grow she can teleport to anywhere, and she can manipulate sound at will. She dislikes solitude, and so when someone calls out in the mountain, she always replies right away.
585.name: Dryad

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to the enemy with the most HP. Target takes {delay1} more DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: Noisy Echo

abilities.description: Reduces 15% of DMG taken and Increases 15% of max HP.
abilities.name: The Libra

586.description:
"……Do you seek balance?"
A spirit transformed from the Ptolemy 48 constellation. She is also one of the twelve powerful zodiacs chosen by the sun. Although she acts as a mediator in a quarrel, but most of the time she would rather that both sides confront each other by force. It is her characteristic to use such rough methods in mediation. If troubles can be resolved easily, of course it would be great……
[Event] Guild Conquest
586.name: Stella: Libra

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to 2 enemies (ranged priority), Targets deal {delay1} less DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: Grand Crush

abilities.description: All divina allies take 2% less DMG.(only take effect once to the team)
abilities.name: Spirit of Benevolence

587.description:
"Oops, that's bad... Thanks for taking the trouble."
A spirit transformed from the witch house in a story from Grimms' Fairy Tales. Has the special ability to change everything she touches into candies and gives them out indiscriminately to friends and foes as long as they are hungry. She is a kind and caring big sister. Although it was not her intention, she had inadvertently exposed Hansel and Gretel to danger and has taken upon herself to protect the siblings as a way to redeem her own wrongdoing. Recently, she has been preoccupied with helping Gretel, who has reached the age to become rebellious, to become more honest with her feelings.
[Event] Maze of Red Leaves
587.name: Candy House

skill.description: Can be used as bond and in guild conquest.
skill.name: Avalanche of Candy

abilities.description: Increases 45% of DMG dealt at the start of the final wave.
abilities.name: Government Spy

588.description:
"That's alright; We'll just cross the bridge when coming to it!"
A spirit transformed from a renowned Haikai Poet during the Edo era. After becoming a spirit, he continues to travel across the country in a leisurely manner while reciting haikai poems. However, there had been rumors that he was actually a secret spy working for the government, and that he is a close friend of Hattori Hanzo Masanari. Expertly skilled in the martial arts, he has recently picked up the habit of identifying talented youths and offering his tutelage in way that is close to harassment. Despite his cheery demeanor and whimsical behaviors, his disciples had pointed out that he is actually unpredictable in his temperaments.
[Event] Maze of Red Leaves
588.name: Matsuo Basho

skill.description: Can be used as bond and in guild conquest.
skill.name: Punchline

abilities.description: Increases 10% of DMG dealt and 5% of max HP.
abilities.name: Beast Instincts

589.description:
"I am not fond of this form because it is not cute at all!"
A mysterious pretty gal (self-claimed) spirit who is a giant panda in her true form. She is also known by her moniker as "the spirit of panda". She tries her best to maintain her cute appearance but once she runs out of bamboos, she would go into withdrawal and unleash her instincts as a carnivorous beast. When transformed, her battle power sky rockets so much that even other spirits like Kintaro who are confident in their physical prowess would avoid getting into direct confrontation with her. Each time she involves herself in a deadly duel, her head and face would be splattered by the blood spilled by her opponents, and she has eventually earned the nickname of "Red Riding Hood" within the sumo wrestling circle.
[Event] Maze of Red Leaves
589.name: Giant Panda ［Untamed］

skill.description: Can be used as bond and in guild conquest.
skill.name: Strength of Wilderness

59.description:
"Tee hee! You should've seen the look on your face!"
This flickering mischief-maker can often found atop Japan's cliffs practicing her favorite pastime of spooking passersby. Thankfully, her antics have yet to result in serious injury, but everyone's agreed she's a pest all the same. Frequently features prominently at the Bureau of the Occult's rogues gallery.
59.name: Willy Wisp

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to a random enemy. Target deals {delay1} less DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: Fires of Grievance

abilities.description: Increases 30% of ATK speed.
abilities.name: Coward

590.description:
"I fail at everything I do..."
A spirit transformed from one of the titular characters from Grimms' Fairy Tales (the brother). Ever since his encounter with the witch who nearly succeeded in eating him in the fairy tale, Hansel has been traumatized, making him extremely timid and introverted. Due to his self-loathing, he keeps blaming himself for"being entirely of no help to others." The truth is, he is capable of getting things done as long as he puts his mind to it; all it takes is for the right opportunity to present itself for his talents to bloom. Recently, he has been troubled by the fact that his adorable sister has reached the age of rebellious adolescence.
[Event] Maze of Red Leaves
590.name: Hansel

skill.description: Increases DMG dealt by the ally with highest ATK by {delay1} for a limited time.
skill.name: White Stone Way Marker

abilities.description: All Anima team members take 5% less DMG
abilities.name: Reliable Sister

591.description:
"Oh this is such a hassle. I'll take all of you on, at once!"
A spirit transformed from the double-bitted axe that Minos wielded in mythology. Although she has bonded deeply with Minos as her partner over the years, the fact that Minos suffers from solitude due to her obsession with the pursuit of power has brought much dismay to Labrys. Despite her seemingly uncultured demeanor, she is actually kind and considerate at heart, making her surprisingly popular. While there had been rumors that suggest Minos and she are couples, no one stupid enough make such claims in front of Labrys had remained in one piece to verify the truth of the rumor.
[Event] Maze of Red Leaves
591.name: Labrys

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to enemy with highest ATK, target receives {delay1} more DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: Strike and Slice

abilities.description: Increases 15% of Crit Rate and 30% of Crit DMG.
abilities.name: God of Destruction

592.description:
"Get lost...I have no interest in the weak!"
A spirit transformed from a minotaur in the Greek mythology. She is a ferocious fighter who sees "fighting" as the meaning of existence and finds joy from fighting strong foes in order to build her own confidence. With an upright and honorable character that is typical of a true warrior, she would spare the lives of her opponent as soon as she realizes that they no longer have the spirit to fight. Cursed by the misfortune that surrounds her birth, Minos has been driven to seek answer for the question that would justify her existence: "What is power?" She is an old acquaintance and a good friend of Daedalus.
[Event] Maze of Red Leaves
592.name: Minos

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to current target, with a {probability} of inflicting Stun.
skill.name: Raging Bull

abilities.description: Increases 10% of skill DMG dealt at the start of each wave.
abilities.name: Awakening

593.description:
"You shall witness my true strength! "
A spirit transformed from the renowned Sakata no Kintoki, one of the Four Heavenly Kings of Raiko. In order to settle his years of unfinished feud with his fighting buddy "Giant Panda," Kintaro came to Mount Kikoku but inadvertently got involved in the incident. Feeling that his involvement with trivial affairs has affected his fighting prowess, Kintaro has been seeking ways to reinvigorate himself and under the tutelage of Matsuo Basho, he attained awakening and unleashed his true power. "Yokozuna" is the highest rank in sumo wrestling. However,"sumo" refers to an ancient martial art that later developed into different disciplines, not the modern day sport.
[Event] Maze of Red Leaves
593.name: Kintaro [Yokozuna]

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to further enemies; Targets deal {delay1} less DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: Air Demon Strike

abilities.description: At the start of the final wave, all foes take 20% more damage.
abilities.name: Legend of the Red Leaves

abilities.description: Increases 15% of DMG dealt by Phantasma team members at the start of the final wave.
abilities.name: Lineage of Mara

594.description:
"Come, entertain me.
A spirit transformed from a kijou at Mount Togakushi. Proud and willful, she is antagonistic in character despite her beautiful looks. She has no control over her whims and anything she feels like doing, she will just go ahead with it. Although she has always been a troublemaker, no one was ever able to get truly upset with her. Due to her lineage of Mara, she possesses great power. Despite her penchant for schemes and evil plans, her careless nature has often led her to failures. As a member of the demons just like Shuten Doji and Ibaraki Doji, she plays the role of "bad company" for them.
[Event] Maze of Red Leaves
594.name: Momiji Hime

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to all enemies; decreases targets' speed by {delay1} for a limited time.
skill.name: Scheme and Machination

abilities.description: Increases 25% of Crit DMG by Phantasma team members.
abilities.name: Constellation of Dream

595.description:
"One day I will become a celebrity! All I need is to create an attraction here.
The spirit of the Kitty constellation that no longer exists in the presence. To establish a certain identity for herself, she works hard to become a celebrity. She and the Lynx constellation are best friends, but her identity often has been confused with a Lynx by others, and she feels reluctant about it. Because of her strong curiosity that often endangers herself, some people became her fans just because they feel that she cannot be left alone... Hydra and Antlia constellations are her cousins.
595.name: Stella: Ferris

skill.description: Restores {value} HP to ally with the highest ATK, increases {delay1} crit rate to target for a limited time.
skill.name: Star Lord

abilities.description: Normal attacks have 20% chances of inflicting stun.
abilities.name: God of Maze

abilities.description: Increases 60% of skill DMG.
abilities.name: Spider that Summons Death

596.description:
"This is strange~ It was working just as expected in my calculations."
A spirit transformed from the god of the labyrinth in the Cthulhu myths. "A fool with a brilliant mind" would be an apt description for this crazy inventor. He is a genius with the talent to design and create all sorts of things, from small items to something as big as a maze. However, all of his designs will inevitably feature glaring defects in actual application. Examples of his failed inventions are plenty, such as "a burning blade that will engulf everything in flames, including its wielder" and "a water sprinkler that will submerge everything in water." Having been attracted to the willful and whimsical Kouyou Hime, he has volunteered to become her subordinate.
596.name: Eihort

skill.description: Can be used as bond and in guild conquest.
skill.name: The Choices of Despair

abilities.description: Decreases 45% the ATK speed of all foes.
abilities.name: Woman's Heart and Autumn Sky

597.description:
"Chance is only given to those who work hard."
A kind-hearted spirit with great compassion and more than willing to give opportunities to anyone. Sent by Mikado to help out Sola and company who ran into trouble in a rescue mission at Mount Kikoku. As capable and competent as she is, one of her weaknesses is her short temper. While she appears to care little for all things, with her habitual utterance of "The heart of woman," perhaps her greatest strength lies in her optimistic character and her eagerness to look at the bright side of things. Apparently, she has gained new insight by observing others in the activity of crab fishing as of late.
597.name: Spider's Thread [Autumn Sky]

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to the 3 enemies with the highest ATK. Targets receive {delay1} more DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: Zero Chance [Nirvana]

abilities.description: All Divina team members deal 3% more DMG.(only take effect once to the team)
abilities.name: Sibling Love

598.description:
"That...that was definitely not for your sake."
A spirit transformed from one of the titular characters (the sister) from the story in Grimms' Fairy Tales. A boyish girl who idolized the Restless Ghost as her senpai and took on the persona as a delinquent. Having had the unpleasant experience of being imprisoned by a witch, she sought to retrain herself and ended up becoming stronger than her brother without herself being aware of the fact. While she often looks down on her brother, she is actually very fond of him and still takes pride in the fact that he saved her from the witch's hands.
598.name: Gretel

skill.description: Can be used as bond and in guild conquest.
skill.name: Fist of Legend [Incomplete]

abilities.description: Deals 30% more DMG.
abilities.name: King of Giant Strength

abilities.description: Increases 2% of max HP of Phantasma team members at the start of each wave.
abilities.name: Nine-Headed Ox-Demon King

599.description:
"What? Would you like a taste of my power?"
A spirit transformed from the renowned ox demon from the classic Journey to the West. She once fought under the banner with her sworn brother Sun Wukong in rebelling against the Jade Emperor but when she was defeated. She repented her errors and righted her ways. As a generous and forgiving person, she is agreeable to almost all suggestions but it also makes her an easy target of manipulation by cunning spirits. It has been bothering her. Nevertheless, her power definitely lives up to her past title as a menace of the heavens. It is said that whenever she throws a tantrum, Sun Wukong is the only one capable of stopping her.
599.name: Heiten Taisei

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to current target, with a {probability} of inflicting Stun.
skill.name: Crushing Death

abilities.description: Increases 10% of DMG dealt by Divina team members when this daemon is Team Leader.
abilities.name: Child of God

6.description:
"Gather, comrades. There is someone we must defeat!"
The legendary demon-fighting warrior accompanied by a dog, monkey and pheasant. He wasn't the best in terms of swordsmanship or other fighting abilities, but his innate bravery, endless care for his friends, and visionary leadership enabled him to achieve his goals. Now, after much, much training and practice he has finally managed to become a top-class fighter.
6.name: Momotaro

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to current target.
skill.name: Cry of the Gods

60.description:
"Cooey-coo! Hello! Could you help a gal apply a spot of lotion to her back?"
Sea-dwelling goddess, and member of a band of mermaids known as the Nereids. In addition to wielding waves with her wile, she also launches fearsome psychic attacks with sweet ditties. She can't hold a note for toffee, however, and is often made fun of by friends and foes alike.
60.name: Nereid: Proto

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to the 3 enemies with the least HP.
skill.name: Forbidden Melody

abilities.description: Increases 40% of Crit DMG by the 2 allies with the highest ATK.
abilities.name: Dual Wield

600.description:
"Niten Ichiryu Cloudless Sky!"
A spirit transformed from the Book of Five Ringsauthored by the swordsman Miyamoto Musashi. With the ability to freely perform sword techniques of "earth, water, fire, wind and sky, "the spirit even has the potential to defeat Musashi himself as long as all the right conditions are met. On a related note, after his transformation into a spirit, he has taken an interest in sports and compared to his swordsmanship, he is now more competent in track and field. According to his own words, "It is too barbaric for people to kill each other. In this modern times, sports allows participants to show appreciation for the effort and performance of one another and as such, it is the best!"
600.name: The Book of Five Rings

skill.description: Increases the Crit Rate of 2 allies with the highest ATK by {delay1} for a limited time.
skill.name: Secret Tech [Earth]

abilities.description: Increases 20% of DMG and Reduces 5% of max HP.
abilities.name: Gate of Trouble

601.description:
"Public opinion is a frightening thing…"
A spirit transformed from the infamous queen who lost her life during the French Revolution. Even after becoming a spirit, her habit of having the last word proved to die hard, making her a figure of controversy time and again. Despite her intelligence and prudent nature, Marie suffers a good deal from rumors and outright slanders targeted against her, which is probably the result of her nasty mouth. In fact, the situation has gotten so bad that she will most definitely say something highly objectionable whenever she gets any screen time on SNS, and some have even come to recognize it as her unique talent.
601.name: Marie Antoinette

skill.description: Can be used as bond and in guild conquest.
skill.name: Extravagant Tea Party

abilities.description: Increases 20% of skill DMG of Phantasma team members.(only take effect once to the team)
abilities.name: Messenger of God

602.description:
“Calm the heart...“
A spirit that embodies the 48 Ptolemy Constellations. Often drifting in space, her existence is akin to God’s messenger. On some planets, she is actually worshipped as a deity. As she has already attained enlightenment, she does not communicate with words but shows her mercy and benevolence through her actions with her Buddha-like personality. And as such, many space spirits would often go to her to seek her advice.
[Event] Guild Conquest
602.name: Stella: Aquila

skill.description: Can be used as bond and in guild conquest.
skill.name: Winds of Mercy

abilities.description: Normal attacks decrease the current target's ATK speed by 25%.
abilities.name: Shiva's aide

abilities.description: Increases 20% of Crit Rate and increases 20% Crit DMG
abilities.name: Gigantic footprints

603.description:
"Sigh～ Where has Lady Shiva gone to?"
A spirit transformed from a member of the warrior tribe dwelling in the depths of snowy mountains. His duty is to stay by Shiva's side and keep her protected. However, because of Shiva's penchant to vanish from sight whenever there is a concert coming, he has been deeply perplexed. As Shiva yields great power, it isn't really her safety that he is concerned with; he is more worried that others would get on her nerves unknowingly and enrage her. So in reality, his job is to stay on top of things before Shiva loses her temper and get the situation sorted out as quickly as possible. Apparently, he has been taking medication for his stomach problems due to stress. Tsti and Miti are his family members.
603.name: Yeti

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to the 3 enemies with the highest ATK, decreases targets' speed by {delay1} for a limited time.
skill.name: Dance of Ice

abilities.description: Absorbs a 15% of DMG dealt as HP.
abilities.name: The resurrected

604.description:
"You thought I died?　Too bad."
A spirit transformed from the fourth princess of Russia's last Tsar. She is a naive tom-boy with nicknames such as "Destroyer of Locks" and "The Resurrected". When she was still in the mortal world, she studied under Rasputin and proven herself as a genius with her mastery of the magical arts within an incredibly short period of time. News of her pranks with grievous consequences have been commonplace. But after her transformation as a spirit, she has taken a liking to enjoy a lifestyle of peace. It is said she has been obsessed with SNS as of late. She became good friends with Marie Antoinette (who shared similar fates with her) through the internet and the two have been having tea parties while enjoying leisurely conversations.
604.name: Anastasia

skill.description: Can be used as bond and in guild conquest.
skill.name: Lock Breaker

abilities.description: Increases 5% all Divina team members' Crit Rate.(only take effect once to the team)
abilities.name: Red-Nose

605.description:
