"Here comes! I am going to deliver all the presents!"
A spirit transformed from one of the reindeers that have been working with Miss Santa. Incidentally, "Rudolph the Red Nosed" is more like a title rather than a name, and she happens to be the 3rd generation of Rudolph in training. With a natural disposition to get carried away and acting rashly, her ego can bloat without control if one ever makes the mistake of praising her for anything and it makes her a tricky character to deal with. However, she has a knack for easing the tension of any situation with her presence. This Christmas event is her first time to work independently, and it explains why she seems to be particularly focused and dedicated. On a side note, the person to hold the title of Rudolph before her happens to be her mother - one whom she fears the most.
[Event] Two Santas
605.name: Rudolph the Red Nosed

skill.description: Can be used as bond and in guild conquest.
skill.name: Blazing Speed! Super Expedited Delivery

abilities.description: Normal attack targets have 25% chances of increasing 10% more DMG taken.
abilities.name: The light that illuminates the darkness

606.description:
"This is all for the sake of Missy..."
A spirit transformed from the illuminated decorations for Christmas night. After he was thrown out during a snowy night, he was picked up by Star Atop Christmas Tree and later become her aide. He is one of those few who knows the true nature of the willy missy and his trust in her has never wavered even when she orders him around the clock. From the bottom of his heart, he truly wishes that happiness would come to Star Atop Christmas Tree. Perhaps it was due to his upbringing by his grandfather, he talks in a way that makes him sound like a old man. It is probably a reflection of his filial piety. However, he will show no mercy to anyone who dares to harm the missy and is capable of killing without hesitation.
[Event] Two Santas
606.name: Christmas Lights

skill.description: Can be used as bond and in guild conquest.
skill.name: Parade of Electricity and Light

abilities.description: Increases 36% of Crit DMG.
abilities.name: Star of glory

607.description:
"There only needs to be one at the top!"
A spirit transformed from the decorative stars traditionally placed on top of a Christmas tree. Firmly believing that Christmas would be ruined without her as the main character, she has an ego that is larger than life. Her arrogant words and demeanor not only reflect her lack of social experience but make her borderline obnoxious. While she is gentle by nature, because of her problematic conduct, most of the troubles she found herself in can be attributed to her. And it is exactly what had happened for this event; all she needed to do was to follow the instructions of Miss Santa and play her part in delivering the presents as an activity to build her social experience, and yet... It is worth mentioning that even as ignorant as she is, she has been infatuated with the origin of Christmas trees – the "Tree of the Knowledge of Good and Evil", to the point of idolizing the tree.
[Event] Two Santas
607.name: Star Atop Christmas Tree

skill.description: Can be used as bond and in guild conquest.
skill.name: Star of Brilliance

abilities.description: Increases 7% of the EXP gained from battle.
abilities.name: Premium food ingredients

608.description:
"Have I fallen behind?"
The spirit of a legendary bird that has plumes of seven different colors. Of course, it is actually a description for roasted turkey. Christmas just wouldn't be right without me! She has semi-aggressively vied for the job of food catering for the party and for some strange reason, she seems to be in low spirits. If one were to ask about the cause of her perplexity, the only response from her would be a murmur of pessimism such as "because the only way to go after reaching the top, is down..." One can't help but wonder what had happened to her, who used to be so confident about herself...
[Event] Two Santas
608.name: Turkey Lurkey [Christmas]

skill.description: Increases the Crit Rate of the ally with the highest ATK by {delay1} for a limited time.
skill.name: The Final Poultry

abilities.description: Increases 15% of Crit DMG by the 2 allies Phantasma team members at the start of every wave.
abilities.name: The great monster of the sea

609.description:
"Hey, we are good friends, aren't we?　We are great friends, right?　No, we are BFFs, wouldn't you say?"
A spirit transformed from the great sea monster referenced in the Hebrew Bible. She is also the demon that embodies Envy, one of the seven deadly sins. Perhaps it's due to her association with the sin of "Envy", she has the habit of quickly becoming envious of others for even the most trivial matter. A terrible shame, given her incredible beauty. On the flipside, she has trouble dealing with praises from others and when she receives any compliment, she would blush and just blindly follow whatever that person says. This makes her extremely easy to manipulate and because of this glaring flaw in her personality, there are few people she would refer to as her friends. Consequently, she is infatuated with becoming close friends with others. She used to have many spirits who got along fine with her in the past, but they all shared the same sentiment: "Her love is simply too oppressive".
[Event] Two Santas
609.name: Leviathan

skill.description: Restores {value} HP to 2 allies with the highest ATK. Targets deal {delay1} more DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: Super Tsunami

61.description:
"Don't you worry! My blade is as firm as rock!"
An Anima that served at her young master's side through thick and thin before he became a much-feared general. To hear this spirit tell it, her dedication, rousing rhetoric, and strength in adversity were all crucial influences on her young master during his formative years.
61.name: Takemitsu

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to current target.
skill.name: Master Wielder

abilities.description: Increases 5% of DMG dealt by Anima team members.
abilities.name: The king of tool kamis

610.description:
"I can't see anything funny about garbage throwing garbage away."
A spirit regarded as the king by other tool kamis of unwanted things. As she came to existence due to the congregation of wastes and trash, she has evolved into something that truly deserves her the title of "king" over the last few years in which the quantity of garbage has grown explosively. Although she has gotten sick of children who grow weary of things easily and thus took part in Knecht's scheme, in her heart, she has already reached the halfway point of giving up with the thought of "well, such are the tidings of the time." But at the same time, she also feels that "As long as there are more garbage, my powers will grow and maybe that's a good thing..." and the thought also brought her joy. It is also noting while Spirit Princess Fuguruma is her twin sister, the two share a tense and high strung relationship.
[Event] Two Santas
610.name: Chirizukakaiou

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to all enemies; decreases targets' speed by {delay1} for a limited time.
skill.name: Avalanche of Dust

abilities.description: At the start of the final wave, enemy with the most HP takes 20% more damage.
abilities.name: Dark Santa

611.description:
"Come; it's time to party!　Let's have some fun!"
A spirit who is better known by his nickname: Sinister Santa. He has the habit of asking children if they pray or have been praying. If they said no, he would give them disappointing gifts such as lumps of coal. In order to help those who are unable to enjoy the celebration of Christmas for any reason to have a good time, he carried out a plan to invade the Tower of the Holy Tree. Despite his knack for saying things that would make others feel like a fool, he cares about the feelings of others more than anyone and is pure at heart. But due to his demeanors, few were able to truly appreciate his clumsy and awkward way of caring for others.
[Event] Two Santas
611.name: Knecht Ruprecht [Christmas]

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to 3 enemies (ranged priority), with a {probability} of inflicting Stun.
skill.name: Gift From the Archdemon

abilities.description: All Divina team members deal 15% more DMG.
abilities.name: A sincere gift

abilities.description: Increases 9% of Crit DMG dealt of Divina allies at the start of each wave.
abilities.name: Pure resolve

612.description:
"I...have I become the real Santa Claus?"
Known as the hero of Christmas, she is a spirit in training under Santa Claus. After enduring harsh training under the tutelage of Santa Claus the Third, she has finally passed her final test in the event and earned her the rights to be Santa this year. Taking notes of children's wishes, processing orders, making the deliveries on the day and even after-sales services... the job and responsibilities of Santa Claus are more than she had imagined. Will she able to rise to the occasion and become the 4th-generation Santa Claus...?
[Event] Two Santas
612.name: Miss Santa [Christmas]

skill.description: Restores {value} HP to all allies. Targets deal {delay1} more DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: Coming to Town

abilities.description: Increases 25% of Crit Rate and increases 25% Crit DMG
abilities.name: Rage

abilities.description: Increases 15% of skill DMG dealt at the start of each wave.
abilities.name: One who opposes God

613.description:
"Witness the true form of Santa Claus!"
A spirit transformed from the ruler of hell and the embodiment of wrath of the seven sins. Due to the apparent similarity between her name and Santa Claus, she has therefore taken up the job of being the Santa of hell. She reworked the Robo-Maid that went berserk and held the opinion that delivering gifts on Christmas is nothing more than a simple task. As Miss Santa's predecessor, she has demonstrated the ease which she can handle these things but was seriously put off by Miss Santa's attitude of "delivering carefully chosen gift to everyone", which is terribly inefficient to her. Even though she has done well and accomplished her mission, the feeling of being denied due to the difference in their values has bothered her very much, making her unable to be frank towards her own feelings. Despite being the undisputed ruler of hell, she certainly has got a lot on her mind.
613.name: Satan [Christmas]

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to all enemies.

abilities.description: Increases 10% of the EXP gained from battle.Increases the number of soulstones received from battle by 10%.
abilities.name: The golden fruit

abilities.description: Increases own level by 5.
abilities.name: Paradise lost

614.description:
"Eh?　What interesting things are you guys doing?"
A spirit transformed from the tree that grew in the Garden of Eden which later became the archetype for Christmas trees. High regarded and respected by all spirits related to Christmas, she has been treated and perceived as a royalty. She is always on the list of VIPs to receive invitation each year. As the embodiment of wisdom, she possesses extraordinary insight and knowledge, with true vision that can see through the surface of things. However, she has serious flaws in terms of personality. Even though she already has the answer to everything, she would never utter a word to those involved in an incident beforehand simply because she finds that to be boring. In other words, she takes pleasure from seeing others panicking while she is protected by her indifference despite knowing the outcome in advance. She is a truly beautiful woman with a really mean character. On a related note, she is old friends with Samael and Lilith.
614.name: Tree of Wisdom

skill.description: Can be used as bond and in guild conquest.
skill.name: Summoning the Fiery Holy Sword

abilities.description: Increases 15% of ATK speed of all allies.
abilities.name: Guardian of the Sun

abilities.description: Increase 10% of DMG dealt by the 2 allies with the highest ATK.
abilities.name: Pisces

615.description:
"Follow the guidance of the aurora…"
A spirit transformed from one of the Ptolemy 48 constellations. As one of the twelve signs of Zodiac, she is a Amanogawa swordswoman who fights to protect the sun. A stickler for rules, she has a habit of ending all commotions and disputes with her pair of glimmering blades. Although she may appear to be old fashioned and strict, she will slack off and lose all her intense focus once she is off duty. Apparently, she has been witness to having entered a confectionary together with Reticulum...
615.name: Stella: Pisces

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to the 2 enemies with the highest ATK, target receives {delay1} more DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: Twin Blades that Shred Light

abilities.description: Increases own level by 20 when one of the other elfs is on the team.
abilities.name: Always the center performer

abilities.description: Increase 28% of DMG of the 2 allies with highest ATK at the start of the final wave.
abilities.name: The eternal Superstar

616.description:
"I will be by your side, always!"
A spirit transformed from an elemental elf. She has always been the center performer for the elvish idol group"ELF118". At the New Year's Concert for 2019, she demonstrated once again her incredible flair as an idol and remained the most popular member of the group for three years running, making her truly an oddball in the circle of Superstars. "There are many girls who are cuter than I am. Not to mention the countless others who can dance and sing exceptionally well. However, I will lose to no one. "Why" you ask? That's because I am a Superstar! "That's her description of her resolutions for the new year. It certainly looks like she will stay at the top of her game for a long time to come.
616.name: Titanium Elf [Furisode]

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to the enemy with the most HP. Target takes {delay1} more DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: Voice of angel

abilities.description: Increases 7% of the skill DMG of all ranged allies. (only take effect once to the team)
abilities.name: The heart of hospitality

617.description:
"Welcome, welcome♪"
A spirit who is known for placing pine decorations in front of homes during New Year. She is a beautiful girl with looks that brings warmth to others. Due to the folk superstitions that tell the stories of spirits inhabiting treetops, Kadomatsu has thus been perceived as the medium that receives the Wakatoshi. Perhaps it is due to her backgrounds that makes her very hospitable to others, and it is said that whoever receives her warm hospitability will be able to spend the rest of the year in a blissful mindset. But because of her tremendous popularity, her reception is now only available through a strict reservation system and apparently one has to wait for 15 years in the line...
617.name: Kadomatsu

skill.description: Can be used as bond and in guild conquest.
skill.name: Stranger of New Year

abilities.description: Increases 16% more DMG by all team members.(only take effect once to the team)
abilities.name: Big Battleships with Big Guns Orthodoxy

618.description:
"Target acquired...Commence elimination." "
A spirit transformed from one of the Ptolemy 48 constellations. As one of the twelve signs of Zodiac, she is an elite mercenary who has been involved in various battlefields in the universe. As for her signature combat style, she prefers to take out her targets with countless heavy weaponry and devastating fire power. As a result, every battlefield she has ever gone to ended up as wasted fields of nothingness. With a calm disposition but bold in her actions, she is capable of turning the tides of battle no matter how hopeless the situation may seem. And as such, she has been referred to as the"Goddess of Victory" or"Avatar of Destruction." Then again, these are only rumors. One thing is for certain: you don't want this woman on your bad side.
[Event] Guild Conquest
618.name: Stella: Aquarius

skill.description: Can be used as bond and in guild conquest.
skill.name: Melody of Annihilation

abilities.description: Skill attacks have 50% chances of inflicting Stun.
abilities.name: Cursed letter

abilities.description: Increases 5% of ATK speed to Anima team members at the start of each wave.
abilities.name: Postman

619.description:
"The world has become so convenient now."
A spirit mentioned in the famous novel "The Illustrated Bag of One Hundred Random Demons" It is unknown whether or not it was because the manifestation of the spirit came from the letters being written or the spirit itself seems very vulnerable to emotions. Because she loves to read good literature, she even helps deliver the mails so that she could read them. No matter what, her deeds as a result contributed to humans. She was being mocked that she changed so much since the time of the spirits.
619.name: Spirit Princess Fuguruma

skill.description: Decreases attack speed of all enemies by {delay1} for a limited time.
skill.name: Express Delivery

62.description:
"Last one to hit the target's a rotten egg!"
Y-shaped propeller of pebbles, and symbol of many a misspent youth. He fancies himself the daring leader of a neighborhood band of vigilantes, but it's mostly all in his head. His undeniable passion tends to inspire more affection than ridicule, however, and most people find him rather sweet.
62.name: Slingshot

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to the enemy with the most HP.
skill.name: Eye of the Tiger

abilities.description: Increases 15% of Max HP.
abilities.name: Relief

620.description:
"It is important to enjoy the short moment before falling asleep."
Legend said that she is a spirit transformed from a piece of Kara sandalwood left by the Kaga Maeda clan. Her job in the Bureau of Occult is to support Mikado. She is always calm with an elegant personality that often has a good influence on everyone around. And for that reason, even the most ruthless spirit in the team she leads will have a good manner.
620.name: Hatsune

skill.description: Can be used as bond and in guild conquest.
skill.name: Warmth Healing

abilities.description: Increases 5% of ATK speed of all allies.(only take effect once to the team)
abilities.name: Goblin elite

621.description:
"I'll do my best! "
A spirit transformed from a goblin; a renowned minion in the fantasy world. But she is definitely not one to be underestimated; she has received the finest training from Vildor - the hero of goblins and she is truly the best of the best goblins. Boasting incredible physical capabilities that far surpass that of the average goblin, Yagor has rightly earned her reputation as the rising star among her brethren. Coupled with her pure and naive disposition, Yagor enjoys support from a huge number of fans other than her goblin kin. Apparently she is aspired to become a member of ELF118. Will she be able to overcome the racial barrier and achieve her goal?
[Event] New Year Spirit Battle Marathon
621.name: Goblin: Yagor [Lunar New Year]

skill.description: Can be used as bond and in guild conquest.
skill.name: Dance of the ancient god

abilities.description: Reduces 15% of DMG taken.
abilities.name: Hard jade

622.description:
"Is anything the matter? I feel so lazy~"
A spirit transformed from a mineral that is also known as "hard jade". She is the cousin of "Nephrite". One may be tempted to compare her to Nephrite and assume that she is likely to be uptight and serious, as her nickname implies. However, she is lazy and sluggish in nature (despite her good looks) and this has surprised everyone who comes to know her. Apparently it is the consequence of her excessively harsh upbringing from her parents when she was young... But despite her demeanors, she still secretly harbors longing and preference for things that are hard and she will heed the orders from Diamond obediently.
[Event] New Year Spirit Battle Marathon
622.name: Green Jasper [Lunar New Year]

skill.description: Can be used as bond and in guild conquest.
skill.name: Weapon of Jade‧Method 2

abilities.description: Increases 20% of Crit Rate and increases 40% Crit DMG when one of “Three Sovereign” is on the team.
abilities.name: Three Sovereign

623.description:
"Why don't you show me what you are capable of?"
One of the Three Sovereigns, a spirit transformed from one of the ancient gods who created mankind. She is the younger sibling of Fuxi, who is also one of the Three Sovereigns. She enjoys playing practical jokes on others and has a short temper. Whenever she has the time to spare, she would use it to prank others. But due to her immense power, her innocent prank would often result in dire consequences... Now she is facing the punishment for the pranks (a gross understatement) that she pulled in the past and has 90% of her former power sealed, along with Fuxi. Nevertheless, she is still haughty and proud as ever and the only ones she considers to be her equals are "Shennong" and "Yuanshi Tianzun"...
[Event] New Year Spirit Battle Marathon
623.name: Nuwa

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to all enemies. Targets take {delay1} more DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: World Destruction

abilities.description: Increases the number of soulstones received from battle by 20%.
abilities.name: Talent for the trade

624.description:
"Master! I have some good stuff here, want to take a look?"
A spirit of people’s favorite item that is ubiquitous around New Year. A merchant spirit who has recently shown her talent for the craft, demonstrating her incredible skill as a trader that is incongruous with her child-like appearance. With a flair for words and sharp wit to match, many have found themselves emptying their wallets simply by listening to her sales pitch before even realizing what they were doing. She sees Red Chochin as her rival (but the feeling isn’t mutual), and she is often seen childishly bickering with Red Chochin whenever their paths cross.
[Event] New Year Spirit Battle Marathon
624.name: Mystery Bag

skill.description: Increases DMG dealt by all allies by {delay1} for a limited time.
skill.name: Come this way, good fortune!

abilities.description: Increases 20% of Crit Rate and increases 40% Crit DMG when one of “Three Sovereign” is on the team.
abilities.name: Three Sovereign

625.description:
"It's useless; I have already foreseen the next move you are going to make."
One of the Three Sovereigns, a spirit transformed from one of the ancient gods who created civilization for mankind. He is the elder brother of Nuwa, another member of the Three Sovereigns. He is cool-headed, thoughtful and has never succumbed to emotions. A rationalist in pursuit of perfection, he is known to gradually drive his opponents to despair like a chess master. He once possessed incredible spirit essence; however when Nuwa faltered and received her punishment, he was punished along with her by having 90% of his power sealed away. Because of his past, he tends to make others feel unapproachable due to his arrogance. But according to reliable sources, a mysterious person who bears an odd resemblance with him will always show up at every ELF118 concert without fail...
[Event] New Year Spirit Battle Marathon
625.name: Fuxi

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to the enemy with the highest ATK.Targets deal {delay1} less DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: Deluge Myth

abilities.description: Increase 18% of DMG of the 2 allies with highest ATK at the start of the final wave.
abilities.name: Wakatoshi

626.description:
"Mmmph~! Come on! Give me all your love!"
A spirit transformed from a great pig god according to the Records of Ancient Matters. With the appearance of a young girl, her head acts and thinks like an old woman. She is an expert martial artist who once defeated Yamato Takeru. She once appeared hairless in an animation that represented Japan and her appearance in the show gained more fame and popularity compared to her true self, and this irked her greatly. She is by nature straight as an arrow, cares little for formalities, bold and fearless. Because she is a great pig, her opponents have foolishly presumed that she would be incapable of attacking strategically without realizing that every move she makes, she does so with meticulous calculation and when they discover that, it is usually too late. She has zero resistance for sweet desserts, and every confectioner and dessert shops would close early because of her. "Savage" would be a modest word to describe the way she acts and behaves in those shops.
[Event] New Year Spirit Battle Marathon
626.name: White Pig Lord

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to the row of enemies directly in front.
skill.name: Glamorous Stomp

abilities.description: Skill attacks increase 40% DMG taken by targets.
abilities.name: True love

627.description:
"I have got to win the tournament this time......and then do this and that to Lord Munechika......"
A spirit transformed from the manifestation of hallucination, she has an incredible ability to transform into the perfect double of anyone. She has zero confidence in herself and believes the most untrustworthy person in the world to be herself; and as such, her personality creates headache for people around her. She is able to transform into anyone and once she does, it is literally impossible for others to tell her and the original apart. After the previous incident, she has been seeing Mikazuki Munechika and keeping their relationship simple and pure, with everything going smoothly. However, their relationship is so pure that she has been worrying on a daily basis if she should keep their relationship like that any longer. " Even so, she has summoned all the courage she can muster and prepared her New Year costume. Where will her path of romance lead in the end! ?
[Event] New Year Spirit Battle Marathon
627.name: Doppella Gänger [Lunar New Year]

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to the 2 enemies with the highest ATK.
skill.name: Copied Love

abilities.description: Increases 25% of Crit DMG by Phantasma team members.
abilities.name: Hunter

abilities.description: Increases 15% of DMG dealt at the start of each wave.
abilities.name: Monkey King

628.description:
"Don't blame me; I am just following Sister's orders!"
A famous spirit that is widely known for his role in the epic story Journey to the West as the disciple of Tang Sanzang. Following Sanzang’s instructions, he has assumed the role of a hunter in the New Year Hunting - Spirit Battle Marathon. Although he appears to lament his inability to take part in the race on the surface, he is in fact deeply excited about this opportunity to go all out after having been restrained for so long. Having reached adulthood seems to have not changed his character in any way. What he doesn't realize is... The spirit that has made a pact with him to become his god-sibling who, according to him, is "the spirit that I absolutely don't know how to handle", has come to the event to cheer him on......
[Event] New Year Spirit Battle Marathon
628.name: Sun Wukong [Lunar New Year]

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to all enemies.
skill.name: Full set spirit technique: TAKENAWA

abilities.description: Increases 20% of skill DMG of all anima allies.(only take effect once to the team)
abilities.name: Sagittarius

629.description:
"Have you forgotten my face?!"
A spirit transformed from one of the Ptolemy 48 constellations. He is also one of the twelve powerful zodiacs and has always been revered as the mighty "God of martial arts" by other spirits in the universe". For some spirits who have been around, the mere utterance of his name within earshot would cause them to tremble in fear. However, he has apparently made up his mind to become a hermit and sever his earthly ties, even to the point of turning a blind eye to any conflict that may occur. His unexpected exit from the scene has brought much doubt and speculation to everyone involved. However, according to reliable intelligence, his decision to call it quits had been due to his infatuation with a period drama that was broadcasted on earth. Apparently someone has saw him wearing an inro on his waist.
629.name: Stella: Sagittarius

skill.description: Can be used as bond and in guild conquest.
skill.name: Starry bow

63.description:
"Oh, stop being such a snivel baby!"
The spirit of a young girl who died before making her mark on the world. Legend has it her final act was single-handedly stopping six trucks in a valiant effort to save a defenseless kitty from a flattened feline fate. True or not, it's certainly done wonders for her street cred.
63.name: Restless Ghost

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to current target.
skill.name: Sola Punch

abilities.description: Increases 50% of ATK speed.
abilities.name: Art of shooting

abilities.description: Increases 50% of DMG dealt at the start of the final wave.
abilities.name: Heart of romance

630.description:
"So, how do you like a girl who’s good at shooting?"
A spirit transformed from an automatic revolver, which is always carefully stored even after she has long left the field of battle. A dangerous girl whose character will change drastically whenever she picks up a firearm. Gifted with exceptional combat abilities, ordinary spirits stand no chance against her even in swarms. Having discovered that her personality change will not take place when Master is around, she has set eyes on taking Sola’s place...... She will don her costumes for the New Year, with the intention of getting straight into Master’s heart.
630.name: Tokarev Pistol [Lunar New Year]

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to the enemy with the most HP. Target takes {delay1} more DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: Heart-crush Shot

abilities.description: Restores 15% HP to Anima team members at the start of each wave.
abilities.name: Yokozuna of the West

abilities.description: Increases 20% of skill DMG to Anima team members at the start of each wave.
abilities.name: Blade of national treasure

631.description:
"I am no inferior to any of The Five Swords under Heaven."
A spirit transformed from a famous sword known as the "Yokozuna of the West." She is perplexed by the fact that despite her great sounding name, she is less well-known compared to other famous katanas. And as such, she spends each passing day worrying about how she should attain true fame. She is serious by nature and never admits defeat. She has the habit of overtraining due to her fear of losing and then exhausting herself before competitions...... While she definitely has the strength to rival The Five Swords under Heaven, she is the type that often fails to demonstrate her abilities when she is put under the limelight. She harbors an excessive feeling of rivalry against Dojigiri Yasutsuna and once made the claim that her immediate goal is to become more famous than Dojigiri Yasutsuna......
631.name: Ookanehira

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to current target, with a {probability} of inflicting Stun.
skill.name: Body and Soul, Strike and Slice

abilities.description: Increases 100% Crit DMG to skill targets.
abilities.name: Obligation? Chocolate

abilities.description: Increase 20% crit damage for all allies.
abilities.name: Nectar of the Gods

632.description:
"Just...just accept it already! This is so embarrassing!"
A strange spirit transformed from a mysterious wine that has the ability to weaken demons. Although she often acts with confidence, she actually cares a great deal about this festive day with a tad of insecurity. She would tell herself: it'd be much easier to do the deed after having a glass of wine first, and yet her face would turn bright red when she presents her chocolate. Even though it's just obligation chocolate. It is said that her pure and innocent look during the act has given many people the wrong idea. And by the way, the chocolate she gives is of course full of whiskey.
632.name: Poison S. Brew [Valentine's Day]

skill.description: Restores {value} HP to ally with the highest ATK, increases {delay1} crit rate to target for a limited time.
skill.name: Full of whiskey

abilities.description: Increases 35% of skill DMG.
abilities.name: Pure at heart

633.description:
"Everyone! Be sure to enjoy yourselves!♪"
A spirit transformed from an elemental elf. A member of the elvish idol group "ELF118" With a passion for dessert making, it is said that she only tagged along with a friend who signed up to audition for the group, and ended up being selected. She is extremely mellow in temperament... in fact, she is so innocent that one may actually feel worried about her. She is usually under the care of Neon, who is another member of the idol group. During weekends, she would host dessert circuits with Neon as a way to thank Neon for taking care of her. But when it comes to the Valentine's Day Concert, it would be her time to shine. On this day, when she hands out her hand-made chocolate, no one can even dream of competing with her.
633.name: Carbon Elf [Valentine’s Day]

skill.description: Can be used as bond and in guild conquest.
skill.name: Chocolate of love

abilities.description: Reduces 15% DMG dealt by all foes at the start of each wave.
abilities.name: The guiding hand

634.description:
"One's path is created purely by one's own heart."
A spirit transformed from the now defunct constellation of Argo Navis. As the patron saint of travelers in this vast universe, he is trusted by many spirits. But for the lazy spirits who refuse to put in any effort, he would put them through trials instead. One can say that he's a bit Spartan in his beliefs. That said, for those aspired to overcome obstacles by their own efforts, he would be the perfect source of divine guidance. In this vast universe, if one wishes to be saved from the misfortune of losing his bearings, he can never afford to slack off.
[Event] Guild Conquest
634.name: Stella: Argo Navis

skill.description: Reduces an enemy (healers priority) DEF by {delay1} for a limited time.
skill.name: Hall of Poseidon

abilities.description: Increases 20% of Max HP.
abilities.name: Compassion

635.description:
"There is one thing that is so powerful that can even make the world tremble...and that is love."
The spirit transformed from one of the queens who reign in the Looking-Glass Land. She is the younger sister of the Red Queen and her personality is the polar opposite to that of the Red Queen. In other words, she is magnanimous and benevolent. She rejects all acts of bias, prejudice and violence and if one were to slap her on the right cheek, she would present her left cheek to the aggressor without hesitation; such is the extent of her conviction for non-violence. However, due to her nagging nature and her extremely naive way of thinking, very few actually understand her. While she often acts as the "buffer of reason" for her aggressive sister the Red Queen, apparently the two has never been able to see eye to eye according to the Chancellor. What may come as a surprise is the intimate relationship she shares with Red Ridinghood; however, the truth is still a mystery.
[Event] Alice in the Serious Kingdom
635.name: White Queen

skill.description: Can be used as bond and in guild conquest.
skill.name: Pure compassion

abilities.description: Increases the number of soulstones received from battle by 20%.
abilities.name: Soul of a noble

636.description:
"What I am about to divulge can never leave this place..."
A spirit transformed from a renowned piece of pottery. Although she was born into nobility, her aspirations and interests have driven her to become a maid in this wondrous kingdom. She is also eccentric by nature. She loves nothing more than gossiping and whenever she notices signs of potential trouble, she would dive right into the matters to make them worse; in other words, she is a troublemaker. Perhaps it is her penchant for gossip, her network of intelligence is incredibly expansive. She was even known to have made the claim that there's nothing in the wondrous kingdom that she does not know about . One would think that she could never get along with Meissen, who is known for her serious and no-nonsense personality. However, no one realizes that the two have always been the best of friends.
[Event] Alice in the Serious Kingdom
636.name: Imari

skill.description: Can be used as bond and in guild conquest.
skill.name: The antics of a maid who often steps out of line

abilities.description: Increases 5% of skill DMG dealt at the start of each wave.
abilities.name: The Gourmet

637.description:
"One who has lost his self-respect doesn't deserve to live."
A spirit transformed from a mysterious noble who appeared in the nursery rhyme Mother Goose. With regards to her true identity, the most convincing conjecture thus far suggests that she is an "egg". However, no definitive evidence has yet to be found. Proud and arrogant, she is a difficult individual to deal with. Coupled with her habit of lecturing others and refuting ideas proposed by others, one has to make relevant mental preparations before engaging in conversation with her. On top of that, as she claims to be a gourmet, she is way more picky and selective about food. With the exception of her preferred way of eating, she will deny all other methods of preparation. This makes her a pain to deal with. That said, she has recently commented that "there's nothing wrong with seasoning poached eggs with soy sauce", which would be a preposterous statement coming from her.
[Event] Alice in the Serious Kingdom
637.name: Humpty‧Dumpty

skill.description: Can be used as bond and in guild conquest.
skill.name: Vicious! Egg cannon!

abilities.description: All melee foes take 7% more DMG at the start of each wave.
abilities.name: Obstinate

638.description:
"I am a soldier! "
The spirit transformed from one of the guards of Wonderland. He is the officer who commands all the Heart soldiers. He plays everything by the books and is as stubborn as one can get. Considering his role as a soldier, his personality is rather fitting. However, when the topic of conversation gets complicated, the situation would get tricky very quickly. Perhaps it is a way to acknowledge his contributions, whenever a tea party is held in the kingdom, he would be asked to perform guard duties. The fact that he looks identical to his subordinates makes it very easy to confuse him with the other soldiers.
[Event] Alice in the Serious Kingdom
638.name: Jack of Hearts

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to the row of enemies directly in front. Targets take {delay1} more DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: Secret technique! Push the dominos!

abilities.description: Reflects a 15% of DMG taken back to attacker.
abilities.name: Disparager

639.description:
"How dare you even think of throwing me into jail; that's just bad form."
A spirit with a knack for making fun of others and the owner of a hat shop in Wonderland. Chatty by nature, he is the type of person who will actively push others' buttons in the conversation. His words can be sharper than knives and news of him being locked up for insulting others are nothing out of the ordinary. He never learned from his mistakes, and that's just the way he is.
[Event] Alice in the Serious Kingdom
639.name: Mad Hatter

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to the enemy with the most HP. Targets deal {delay1} less DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: Gatling gun

64.description:
"Did you like my dance?"
The childhood self of Fujiwara no Yorinaga. His cherubic looks are said to have won over more hearts than there are stars, as well as paving the road for the intoxicating influence he would enjoy over others in later life.
64.name: Aya Waka

skill.description: The 3 enemies with the highest ATK deal {delay1} less DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: Yorinaga's Purge

abilities.description: Increases 40% of Skill DMG and Crit DMG.
abilities.name: Tyrant

640.description:
"There's nothing that I can't do!"
The spirit transformed from one of the queens who reigns over the Looking-Glass Land. She is the elder sister of the White Queen. Her personality is just as described in the famous story - a tyrant. Full of fury and rash to act, she will not hesitate to utter her famous phrase "Off with your head!" when even the slightest thing doesn't go her way. A ruthless character through and through. That said, she has actually never executed anyone and would actually faint at the sight of blood - a weak side of hers that she tries very hard to hide. As she believes that a weak queen will not be able to assert a firm rule over the kingdom, she has been forcing herself to put on a tough act. Nevertheless, most of the citizens are already cognizant of the fact and have been playing along instead.
[Event] Alice in the Serious Kingdom
640.name: Red Queen

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to all enemies; decreases targets' speed by {delay1} for a limited time.
skill.name: Layers of thorn

abilities.description: Reduces 10% of DMG taken of all ranged allies; increases 15% of ATK speed.
abilities.name: Panacea

641.description:
"That...that was definitely not done for your sake, don't you get the wrong idea!"
The spirit transformed from the panacea that is capable of healing all ailments and illnesses. Intelligent and sharp minded, she has the heart of a maiden who fears solitude and yearns for romance despite her tough act. She came into existence when Hermes created the Philosopher's Stone but as she wasn't related to the research, she received little to no attention. After parting ways with Hermes, she was driven to perfect her magical craft in order to impress Hermes. However, her achievements were not sufficient to quench her desires. Just as she was suffering the pains of her solitude, she encountered Alice. And what exactly would result from their encounter is still up in the air.
[Event] Alice in the Serious Kingdom
641.name: Elixir

skill.description: Restores {value} HP to all allies. Targets deal {delay1} more DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: Mysterious remedy

abilities.description: Increases 15% of skill DMG by Divina team members.
abilities.name: Angelic compassion

abilities.description: At the start of the final wave, all foes take 20% more damage.
abilities.name: Madness from the Depths

642.description:
"I can't just sit idly and do nothing even if it would make me a busybody."
A spirit transformed from the titular character renowned for her adventure in a strange world. Polite and curious by nature, she can never resist lending a helping hand to anyone in need of assistance. She is a good looking girl with the heart of an angel. Her disposition gives her the special quality that enables her to befriend anyone almost immediately and she is renowned throughout Wonderland. Nevertheless, she is a character from Wonderland after all and it is said that every once in a while, you can catch a glimpse of her dark and unknown side through conversations... She is very close to the Cheshire Cat and they keep no secrets from each other.
[Event] Alice in the Serious Kingdom
642.name: Alice

skill.description: Increases the DMG of 2 allies with the highest ATK by {delay1} for a limited time.
skill.name: Smiles of an angel

abilities.description: Increases 50% of Crit DMG by the 2 allies with the highest ATK.(only take effect once to the team)
abilities.name: Leo

643.description:
"One who is not familiar with military strategies and tactics is as good as useless on the battlefield. "
A spirit transformed from one of the Ptolemy 48 constellations. Being one of the powerful twelve zodiacs, he is reputed as the most talented general to ever grace the battlefield in the last century. Recognized as a genius tactician with a 100% win rate track record, this is what others have to say about him: "If he ever shows up on the opposing side, just give up everything and run!" But even so, he used to be brash and reckless in his youth; no one dared to approach him, let alone try to start a conversation with him. And as such, he has spent a portion of his youth living in solitude and frustration. It was Argo Navis that steered the eccentric and secluded Leo back on the right track in life. And since then, Leo has always perceived Argo Navis to be his mentor and benefactor.
643.name: Stella: Leo

skill.description: Can be used as bond and in guild conquest.
skill.name: Lion Roar

abilities.description: Increases 15% of ATK speed of all allies.
abilities.name: Sage of Three

abilities.description: Increases 20% of the EXP gained from battle.
abilities.name: Founder of Alchemy

644.description:
"Come on, just let me have a little cut♪What do you say? "
A spirit transformed the legendary individual recognized as the Founder of Alchemy. Despite her appearance as a little girl, it is said that her spirit essence has reached the level of divinity and that she is capable of creating something out of nothing. However, she is plagued by having three separate personalities as a "little girl", a "man" and a "God"; in order to resolve this problem, she is currently seeking a way to split and isolate her different personalities. Although she has earned unparalleled renown for her creation of the Philosopher's Stone, she seems to be always in trouble due to her indifference to all matters not related to her research. But even so, she is unrivaled in the area of magic mastery and as such, the Bureau of the Occult has been rather dependent on her.
644.name: Hermes Trismegistus [Tea Party]

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to the 2 enemies with the highest ATK, target receives {delay1} more DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: Dark blessings

abilities.description: Increases 50% of Crit DMG.
abilities.name: Jester

abilities.description: Increases 50% of Skill DMG.
abilities.name: Philosopher

645.description:
"If we know nothing, then the outcome would be the same regardless of our choice."
A spirit transformed from a cat obsessed with philosophy in Wonderland. As the idiomatic expression "to grin like a Cheshire Cat", she is always seen wearing her signature grin. Mischievous by nature, she loves nothing more than seeing others in panic and distress. But before anyone tries to stop her devilish ways, she would utter something profound and philosophical that would serve as a pointer for others. In short, she is a whimsical character. She has never failed to confuse others, be it friend or foe. But in her defense, this is all she has to say, "Interpersonal relationship is never as simple as it appears on the surface." To her, she doesn't see her relationship with Alice to be anything special. In fact, she takes pride in the fact that she and Alice have been facilitating the growth of one another.
645.name: Cheshire Cat

skill.description: Can be used as bond and in guild conquest.
skill.name: Not-so-feline smile

abilities.description: Increases 10% of skill DMG dealt at the start of each wave.
abilities.name: Black Tengu

abilities.description: Increase 20% crit damage for all allies.
abilities.name: Heavenly way of Dakini

646.description:
"What do you think about the angle of this shot? "
A spirit transformed from the Black Tengu that reigns over Mount Itsuna. Known as the 3rd most famous Tengu of Japan, she has been worshipped by countless Daimyos during the warring era as the Goddess of Victory, which reflects the immense power that she commands. Although her Itsuna Way of manipulating White Fox and Flame Serpent has been perceived as evil magic, it also goes to show that her spirit essence is truly beyond imagination. It may come as a surprise that she is more than willing to help anyone in need and her knack for socializing goes to show that she is well deserving of her title as the Great Tengu of Eastern Japan. Her objective is to restore the Tengu clan's to its former glory and she would use various networking apps to keep in touch with other Great Tengus of other territories. However, with the situation escalating quickly, uploading pictures on a daily basis has become a routine for her...
646.name: Iizuna Saburo

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to the enemy with the highest ATK.
skill.name: The mysterious power of Atago's Goddess of War

abilities.description: Increases 15% of Max HP and Reduces 10% of DMG taken.
abilities.name: Crimson Demon

647.description:
"Why does everyone treat me like a Child!? "
A spirit transformed from a servant of Shuten Doji. Being careless by nature and due to his habit of picking up fights with others, one can count on most of the conflicts and disputes in the Demonic Realm having something to do with him. As he is the youngest of the Four Heavenly Kings, he has often been sent to run various errands. In order to change the status quo and accomplish the goal of overcoming his superiors, he has been training conscientiously on a daily basis. Although he tends to be picked on, another way of looking at it is the fact that he is actually popular with everyone. It just happens that he is totally unaware of the fact.
647.name: Kane Doji

skill.description: Can be used as bond and in guild conquest.
skill.name: Raging claws of the crimson demon

abilities.description: Increases 30% of skill DMG of Phantasma team members.(only take effect once to the team)
abilities.name: Betelgeuse

648.description:
"What? Would you like to dance with ill fortune? "
A spirit transformed from one of the Ptolemy 48 constellations. An aggressive delinquent who calls himself the "Boss of the Universe". Although it may not sound like much, but once he gets rowdy, he would cause super nova explosions that would affect entire nebulas and no one can withstand that. He is straight as an arrow and hates anything that is unfair or unjust. He is the type who will never rest until he is satisfied with the outcome with everything he does and really is quite tricky to deal with. But he is extremely bad at dealing with females and even more so when the person in question is good looking; he won't be able to even look at her straight in the eyes. He is actually rather shy. As of late, he is worried about the fact that his childhood friend Virgo is becoming more and more adorable by the day and he doesn't know how he should act or behave around her...
[Event] Guild Conquest
648.name: Stella: Orion

skill.description: Can be used as bond and in guild conquest.
skill.name: Supernova Explosion Headbutt

abilities.description: Increases 10% of battle reward drop rate.(only take effect once to the team)
abilities.name: Goddess of fertility

from_description.event_name: Black cherry blossom and demon blade

649.description:
"When it comes to Spring, that's my season you know."
The spirit transformed from the Greek goddess of flowers and fertility. As an expert horticulturalist, any flower she has tended to will reach full bloom. With her serious and non-nonsense personality, she is always saying that her secret to having a green finger is to take delicate care of plants. Apparently she is even capable of conversing with plants; but for those who are unfamiliar with her abilities, they may mistake her for "being a bit too exhausted" when they see her talking to the trees or meadows. Although Juno is her only intimate friend and someone she confides in, she is also often a victim of her practical jokes……
[Event] Black cherry blossom and demon blade
649.name: Flora

skill.description: Can be used as bond and in guild conquest.
skill.name: The breath of spring

65.description:
"Who're you callin' a lightweight!"
The Anima of a lantern that hangs above a nighttime street vendor. Dab-handed at pulling in both regulars and first-timers, she's also known to be partial to a drink or two (or three) herself... She often wakes up with no memory of the night before, so how she remembers regulars' faces is anyone's guess.
65.name: Aka "Red" Chochin

skill.description: Increases DMG dealt by all allies by {delay1} for a limited time.
skill.name: Crimson Ambience

abilities.description: Increases 10% of skill DMG by Divina team members.(only take effect once to the team)
abilities.name: The portrait of spring

from_description.event_name: Black cherry blossom and demon blade

650.description:
"Such wonderful weather! It makes me want to dance with the wind! "
A spirit transformed from allergic rhinitis - a common ailment that comes with the pollination of plants in the spring. Sometimes it can also manifest in the autumn. He would spread pollens unknowingly and as such, he is usually the culprit for causing symptoms such as sneezing and runny nose around him. Due to his special traits, he had been alienated from others for years and this has gradually twisted his personality. But he is really very kind at heart; he can't even bear to abandon the sick and injured who are unattended. Although the situation is a bit tricky for others, he primarily socializes with tree spirits (because they are immune from pollinosis) and he is apparently fairly popular among those who accept him as a friend.
[Event] Black cherry blossom and demon blade
650.name: Pollinosis

skill.description: Can be used as bond and in guild conquest.
skill.name: Outgoing alert

abilities.description: Increases own level by 10.
abilities.name: Manager of Hospitality and Catering

from_description.event_name: Black cherry blossom and demon blade

651.description:
"Hey~~! It's time for a drink already! Hurry! "
A spirit transformed from man-made fermented wine during the ancient times. The Manager of Hospitality and Catering who loves drinking and partying more than anyone else. Once intoxicated, she would cling to those around her and this has caused Poison S. Brew (her colleague) to stay clear of her... She was asked to host the Flower Viewing Party for the Bureau of the Occult, but to the surprise of everyone, all the flowers have been dyed black Wanting to get to the drinking as quickly as possible, she acted rashly out of her own accord in an effort to get the situation taken care of...
[Event] Black cherry blossom and demon blade
651.name: Kuchikamizake

skill.description: Can be used as bond and in guild conquest.
skill.name: Type 2 Party Skill - Bright

abilities.description: Increases 5% of Crit DMG by the 2 allies Phantasma team members at the start of every wave.
abilities.name: Urban legend

from_description.event_name: Black cherry blossom and demon blade

652.description:
"What business~~ do you have~~ with an unpopular figure~~ such as me? "
The spirit transformed from a zombie who had been buried under a cherry tree. He is as rotten as he is a doormat. Anything he touches would rot due to his abilities and as such, others would stay clear of him. Frustrated by this, he spends most of his daytime sleeping in the dirt. He has affections (unrequited) for Zombilina who is not affected by his abilities. Despite having had a fateful encounter with Zombilina, she is too obtuse to his advances. Can romance bloom between these two? ?
[Event] Black cherry blossom and demon blade
652.name: Zombie: Tim

skill.description: Reduces an enemy (healers priority) DEF by {delay1} for a limited time.
skill.name: Infectious corruption

abilities.description: At the start of the final wave, all foes take 10% more damage.
abilities.name: Manifestation of terror

from_description.event_name: Black cherry blossom and demon blade

653.description:
"I'll show you my latest moves! "
A spirit transformed from an electric chain saw that comprises numerous small blades. Takes joy from scaring people and to this end, he is passionate about devising various pranks; he is definitely a handful. Recently, he has become fascinated with chainsaw carving and designs and apparently has taken interest in this art form that is both impressive and surprising. It is said that his stunt of juggling multiple chainsaws while carving logs into wooden bears is a must-see trick.
[Event] Black cherry blossom and demon blade
653.name: Chainsaw[Black Sakura]

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to further enemies.
skill.name: The way to deliver desperation

abilities.description: Normal attacks decrease target's ATK speed by 20%.
abilities.name: One with special powers

from_description.event_name: Black cherry blossom and demon blade

654.description:
"What's the point of being a spirit if even a Brute could scare you? "
A spirit transformed from a talented figure during the Edo era. A genius with multiple talents; she is an expert in more than ten disciplines. A geologist, a physician and an inventor at the same time, she is as straight as a bamboo and will never beat around the bush in her words. She is a highly popular "big sister" figure. Although she is the advisor to Tokugawa Yoshimune, she cares not for formalities and pretenses. However, she is also farsighted and wise despite her bold and unconstrained disposition. She commands profound knowledge that definitely lives up to her reputation. And her favorite food is "kabayaki".
[Event] Black cherry blossom and demon blade
654.name: Hiraga Gennai

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to the 3 enemies with the lowest HP. Targets receive {delay1} more DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: Generator going berserk

abilities.description: Increases 90% Crit DMG to skill targets.
abilities.name: The dark superstar

from_description.event_name: Black cherry blossom and demon blade

655.description:
"I'll show you cherries in full bloom! They are cherry flowers that are dark as the night though!"
A spirit transformed from the forecast for cherry blossoms. When spring arrives, she will ride the warm wind and travel across Japan in order to bring the cherry flowers into full bloom. Although she seems like a well-nurtured daughter from an affluent family, she has a clumsy side to her and would often get roasted by her childhood playmate "Sumizome Zakura". As she is regarded as a superstar who rivals ELF118 in popularity, she is idolized by many spirits. She possesses great spirit essence that is disparate from her adorable looks. For the flower viewing party for the Bureau of the Occult, she has been preparing diligently in order to ensure full cherry blossoms but became inadvertently corrupted by evil essence. As a result, the entirety of Asukayama Park became covered by black cherry blossoms...
[Event] Black cherry blossom and demon blade
655.name: Cherry Blossom Front[Black Sakura]

skill.description: Restores {value} HP to ally with the highest ATK, increases {delay1} crit rate to target for a limited time.
skill.name: Blizzard of darkness

abilities.description: Increases 25% of DMG dealt by Anima team members at the start of the final wave.(only take effect once to the team)
abilities.name: Demon Blade・Holy

abilities.description: Increases 25% of skill DMG of Anima team members.(only take effect once to the team)
abilities.name: Demon Blade・Demonic

from_description.event_name: Black cherry blossom and demon blade

656.description:
"I never want to see anyone suffering from sorrow again nyan!"
Because of many legends, this blade spirit has come to be known as a demon blade. Although she had zero confidence in herself in the past, after enduring many battles, she had gained invaluable experience that significantly boosted her confidence. The immense power that is hidden within her has elevated her to new heights as she grew and matured, propelling to true greatness. In the flower viewing party organized by the Bureau of the Occult, she has been entrusted with eradicating the black cherry blossoms that had been corrupted by evil essence. What power could she possibly gain from it...! ?
[Event] Black cherry blossom and demon blade
656.name: Muramasa[Black Sakura]

skill.description: Can be used as bond and in guild conquest.
skill.name: Mixture of demon essence

abilities.description: All allies take 10% less DMG.(only take effect once to the team)
abilities.name: Virgo

657.description:
"In this world, no true evil exists"
A spirit transformed from the Ptolemy 48 constellation. She is also among the twelve Zodiacs, manifesting as a kind and pure hearted maiden. To illustrate the extent of her purity, apart from her ability to ride on unicorns, her smile would turn ditch water into fresh spring water and cause even the toughest villain who has never prayed to God to break down and weep in repentance; that should give you an idea of how pure and holy she is. She is the childhood friend of Orion and sees him as a naughty brother and cherishes him very much. Her current objective is to nurture him into a dependable spirit who can hold his own.
657.name: Stella：Virgo

skill.description: Can be used as bond and in guild conquest.
skill.name: Maiden's sacrifice

abilities.description: Increases 15% of skill DMG dealt at the start of each wave.
abilities.name: The 8th General

abilities.description: Increases 2% of max HP of Divina team members at the start of each wave.
abilities.name: Gentleman

from_description.event_name: Black cherry blossom and demon blade

658.description:
"There's no way I would do such a thing, would I? "
A spirit transformed from the famous 8th general of the Tokukawa Shogunate. He prioritizes the well-being of the people and would never hesitate to dish out punishment to villains and evil-doers who disrupt civil order. And as such, he is admired and respected by many. The sword skills he had learned from Matsuo Basho are second to none, and it makes him as powerful as Tosho Daigongen. But from time to time, he would get into the habit of yelling, "Have you forgotten my face!?" at someone he meets for the first time. Even though he claims such incidents to be simple moments of brain fart, apparently he has been doing it intentionally. He is a close friend of "Sagittarius" - the renowned God of Martial Arts and the two would meet from time to time to drink together. According to his somewhat chatty advisor Hiraga Gennai, his latest obsession lies in the ways of running away.
658.name: Tokugawa Yoshimune

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to 3 enemies (ranged priority).
skill.name: Take this!

abilities.description: Increases 50% of ATK speed.
abilities.name: The tome of demons and spirits

abilities.description: Increases 25% more DMG by all team members.(only take effect once to the team)
abilities.name: Clavicle of the King

from_description.event_name: Black cherry blossom and demon blade

659.description:
"Bwahaha♪ Freedom is such a wonderful thing."
A spirit transformed from one of the grimoires that belonged to Lemegeton after he became aware of his own existence. All of the five grimoires developed their own personalities, but one of them transformed into a spirit and left her former owner. Lemegeton became much weaker due to her loss of Theurgia. Despite her best efforts to track him down, Lemegeton has no clues as to his whereabouts. Incidentally, no one really knows what Theurgia is after now that he has earned his freedom.
659.name: Theurgia・Goetia

skill.description: Can be used as bond and in guild conquest.
skill.name: The path shown by the angel of compassion

66.description:
"Underestimate me at your own peril!"
The Anima of a short sword once used to perform festive rites. The stunning pattern on her finely curved blade is every sword enthusiast's dream. Some say she once even trounced an army of 400 ruffians single-handedly...
66.name: Kukri

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to current target.
skill.name: Kukri Kombo

abilities.description: Increases 40% of Crit DMG by the 2 allies with the highest ATK.
abilities.name: Cherry of legends

660.description:
"Superstar? What is that? "
A spirit that is known to dye cherry blossoms into black as a way to recreate a scene described by a poet during the Heian period. She is the childhood playmate of the Cherry Blossom Front and she is also a well-bred lady from an affluent family. As Sumizome Zakura is older, she is in the habit of lecturing Cherry Blossom Front for her clumsiness. While she is a typical beauty with a calm and collected personality, she can be somewhat stubborn and a stickler for rules and conventions. Due to her strict upbringing, she has little knowledge of the outside world; characters in English that are written horizontally are entirely foreign to her...…At the Bureau of Occult's flower viewing party, she was called upon to aid in the process of restoring the black cherry blossoms to their former colors, but...
660.name: Sumizome Zakura

skill.description: Increases the DMG of 2 allies with the highest ATK by {delay1} for a limited time.
skill.name: Dance of ink

abilities.description: Reduces 30% of DMG dealt by opponent with highest ATK at the start of each wave.
abilities.name: Initiation of Rokuhara

abilities.description: At the start of the final wave, enemy with the most HP takes 30% more damage.
abilities.name: The Taira family

from_description.event_name: Black cherry blossom and demon blade

661.description:
"There is no one in my clan who would lose to an uncultured samurai! "
The spirit transformed from the head of the Taira family. He was the first samurai to rise to the rank of Daijo-daijin. He was a military leader who managed to establish a samurai-dominated government with nothing but his wits and strength. Despite his proud and haughty character, he still has the magnanimity to extend mercy to his enemies. Not only that, he is also compassionate towards his subordinates and noble enough to treat everyone without discrimination. His noble character has won him many admirers. He has worked extremely hard so that even without equipping Spirit Gear, he would still be able to exert equivalent strength. His efforts had brought him to a higher level. It is said that the "Rokuhara Cannon" - the satellite weapon that embodies the culmination of Taira family's scientific achievements, is the ultimate weapon of destruction that utilizes the power of cosmic lasers and could overcome all enemies...
661.name: Taira no Kiyomori [Initiated]

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to 2 enemies (ranged priority), Targets deal {delay1} less DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: Rokuhara Cannon

abilities.description: Increases 10% of Max HP and Reduces 10% of DMG taken.
abilities.name: Troll

662.description:
"If it's you... maybe I can trust you..."
A spirit transformed from a troll who is telepathic. Although she is gifted with telepathy and can easily read the minds of others, she is nevertheless a clumsy girl who knows little of her own feelings. As she has read the minds of countless others, she found it more and more difficult to trust others and ultimately developed a fear for socializing. The only one who can put her at ease is her childhood playmate... although he always seems to be occupied with silly and absurd things. Even though she doesn't realize it herself, she has actually had a crush on him. The gift that she had received from him is not only a memorabilia but also the treasure she values above all else...
662.name: Satori

skill.description: Can be used as bond and in guild conquest.
skill.name: Prediction

abilities.description: Reflects 10% of DMG taken back to attacker.
abilities.name: Spectral messenger

663.description:
"That's not it...It was just a pure coincidence! "
A spirit transformed from a pottery decorated with three colors from Tang Dynasty. Future generations refer to her as the beginning of potteries and coupled with her dignified character, she is well-respected among the pottery and ceramic spirits. On a related note, as she would sometimes be chosen as a grave good for kings and nobles, rumor has it that she is capable of manipulating spirits of the netherworld... At any rate, she is most famous for the fact that whoever crossed her met with unfortunate endings……
663.name: Tang Sancai

skill.description: Can be used as bond and in guild conquest.
skill.name: Darkness from the earth

abilities.description: Increase 35% of DMG dealt by the 2 allies with the highest ATK.(only take effect once to the team)
abilities.name: Gemini

664.description:
"I am the Alpha and the Omega......"
A spirit transformed from the Ptolemy 48 constellation. She is also among the twelve Zodiacs, manifesting as an individual with two personalities. Regarded as "the existence that is closest to the Truth of the Universe", she can only achieve balance when both her bipolar personalities of "Coordination" and "Destruction" are present at the same time. Some has prophesied that the moment the balance within her body collapses would mark the annihilation of the Universe. However, there is no knowing if there's any truth to such claims. She is a close friend of Aries and both have the habit of spending extended period of time brewing and enjoying tea together.
[Event] Guild Conquest
664.name: Stella：Gemini

skill.description: Can be used as bond and in guild conquest.
skill.name: Passage of time

abilities.description: Increases 5% of DMG dealt at the start of each wave.
abilities.name: Machine Mechanic

from_description.event_name: Galaxy Express and the mysterious signal

665.description:
"Dreams do come true if you work hard!"
Spirit of the great engineer who started the industrial revolution. He comes up with different ideas on his journey, and his great enthusiasm in research makes him a workaholic. And he has a bad habit of writing everything down on his notes when he comes up with an idea. Once he started working, he can skip his meals and lock himself in a room for a week... If we have to comment on him, he is not only a genius but a person who never gives up no matter how many times he fails.
[Event] Galaxy Express and the mysterious signal
665.name: James‧Watt

skill.description: Can be used as bond and in guild conquest.
skill.name: Planetary gear mechanism

abilities.description: Increases 50% of Skill DMG at the start of the final wave.
abilities.name: Four Heavenly Kings of Demons

from_description.event_name: Galaxy Express and the mysterious signal

666.description:
"Anyone who engages in action will leave trails... and predicting these trails is my job..."
A spirit that serves under Ibaraki Doji. Compared with the other Four Heavenly Kings, she is a more mature type of person. She never likes to speak much. Even when she must speak, only a minimum number of words can be heard from her. Rather than possessing monstrous strength, she is great at reading actions that the others will take. It is a rare talent among the demons for a knowledgeable commander who can lead an army and exercise its power. In a clan full of powerful demons that approves only physical strength, she could take the seat as one of the four heavenly kings with only her wits. Her outstanding capability can only be imagined. She and Ibaraki share a common interest. For this reason, they spend quite a lot of time together. Rumors say that they are lovers, but she cuts it clear with "I am not interested in playboy..." The truth is still unclear...
[Event] Galaxy Express and the mysterious signal
666.name: Hoshikuma Doji

skill.description: Can be used as bond and in guild conquest.
skill.name: Reconnaissance

abilities.description: Increases 8% of the EXP gained from battle.
abilities.name: Space Probe

from_description.event_name: Galaxy Express and the mysterious signal

667.description:
"Recently I am highly interested in energy preservation!"
Spirit of the space probe furthest away from Earth in the outer space. In the infinitely expanding, empty space of the vast universe, she moves forward alone and thus is called "the Traveler." She feels very delighted when she crosses paths with someone else. However she has been used to being alone for too long, and sort of forgotten the way to speak properly. Once she gets excited, she often starts to speak in her own language, which makes communication become even more difficult. Although many spirits live in the universe, the chances of crossing paths with each other rather seem extremely rare. She must feel quite lonely most of the time. She and Sputnik are very close friends, but they have not met each other for decades.
[Event] Galaxy Express and the mysterious signal
667.name: Voyager 1

skill.description: Can be used as bond and in guild conquest.
skill.name: Charged particle cannon

abilities.description: Increases 3% of battle reward drop rate.
abilities.name: Enlightenment

from_description.event_name: Galaxy Express and the mysterious signal

668.description:
"Happiness... what is happiness...?"
The spirit of a lonely young girl traveling in the galaxy who enjoys dreaming. Because her family lives in poverty, she departed and sought a cure for her sick mother to the very end of the galaxy. Her best friend Campanella is like a twin sister to her. They can often understand each other's thought without a word. She never argues with others because of her kind personality. But once she has made up her mind about something, no matter what kind of obstacles awaits she will never back off from it. Her favorite animal is the "raccoon."
[Event] Galaxy Express and the mysterious signal
668.name: Giovanni

skill.description: Increases DMG dealt by the ally with highest ATK by {delay1} for a limited time.
skill.name: Journey of a Dream

abilities.description: Restores 2% of HP every 5 seconds by the 2 allies with the highest ATK.
abilities.name: Messenger of the Sky Emperor

from_description.event_name: Galaxy Express and the mysterious signal

669.description:
"Allow me to check your ticket~please♪"
Spirit of the magpie that is responsible for the important role of initiating the ritual "Bridge crossing" of the milky way with a loud cry. Normally she serves as the "Train Conductor" and "Car Attendant" of The Galaxy Express. Her cheerful personality and smooth tone of speech have become famous in the Galaxy Express. For a spirit, it is rather rare to be married. She and her husband share an intense passion in love. Once she got turned on, it is going to last for quite a while. Because she looks cute, customers could often have a hit on her at work, but for a wife she has a way to evade with ease...
[Event] Galaxy Express and the mysterious signal
669.name: Maggie Pie [Railroad]

skill.description: Restores {value} HP to 2 allies with the lowest percentage of HP. Targets receive {delay1} less DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: Ballad for the beloved

abilities.description: Reduces 10% of Max HP and increases 35% skill DMG.
abilities.name: Pioneer Spirit

67.description:
"I'm baaaack!"
Captain of the famous black-painted American naval vessels that were the first to visit Japan's shores. A dyed-in-the-wool Japanophile, he's been making the journey even more regularly since becoming A spirit. The locals used to call him a demon, a title he's taken to with strange enthusiasm—he rarely even leaves home without his comedy horn headband these days.
67.name: Commodore Perry

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to all enemies.
skill.name: Full Fleet Fusillade

abilities.description: Reduces 40% of DMG taken.
abilities.name: Black Diamond

from_description.event_name: Galaxy Express and the mysterious signal

670.description:
"Hey you... let me try out my skills on you?"
The spirit of charcoal with an alias of black diamond. Although she obviously is a beautiful girl, from the inside she is totally an energetic and sportive type of person just like her name. She loves nothing more than professional wrestling. Once she discovered a new technique, she cannot wait to search for a prey that could become her lab rat... Due to her physical condition, the impact she has made with her wrestling technique causes explosions. As a mechanical stoker on the Galaxy Express, she can train herself at work and supply power to the engine. Since she is not good at thinking and can get into dangerous trouble, every time her cousin Diamond has to give her a lesson when they meet each other. Her favorite wrestling hold is the "Fervent Max Bomber." Her skill will cause an explosion on impact. She hurts the opponent but hurts herself as well. This skill truly has the professional wrestling spirit.
[Event] Galaxy Express and the mysterious signal
670.name: Black Diamond

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to current target, with a {probability} of inflicting Stun.
skill.name: Passionate MAX bomber

abilities.description: Increases 15% of skill DMG dealt at the start of each wave.
abilities.name: Youngest child in the family

from_description.event_name: Galaxy Express and the mysterious signal

671.description:
"Anywhere even without a route~♪"
Spirit of a tender locomotive using overheating coal and water with 2 single tanks. She is the youngest daughter ranking number 1115 among many brothers and sisters in her huge family. She works as the "Railroad engineer" for the Galaxy Express every day. Because of her naive personality, she never doubts the others at all. For this reason, she often gets fooled by others, and she only expresses her anger by puffing out her cheeks. On the other hand, she is a nice person who can forgive others right away if she is being praised or given candies. However, her power should not be underestimated. Although she looks like a child girl, her powerful spiritual essence as the Galaxy Express itself is extraordinary.
[Event] Galaxy Express and the mysterious signal
671.name: Steam Locomotive

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to 3 enemies (ranged priority).
skill.name: The Starliner

abilities.description: Increases 20% of Crit DMG by the 2 allies Divina team members at the start of every wave.
abilities.name: Seraphim

abilities.description: Increase 40% of DMG dealt by the 2 allies with the highest ATK.
abilities.name: Owner of the Galaxy Express

from_description.event_name: Galaxy Express and the mysterious signal

672.description:
"I intended to keep myself distracted to nurture who I am protecting."
Spirit of the Archangel who watches over the sick and traveler. She is the owner of the Galaxy Express, and also the organizer of universe tours. Being a Seraphim, she is the protector of all the living and possesses massive healing powers. For a beautiful lady like Raphael, she only has to sit beside you to let you feel her warmth and kindness. On the downside, she is a person rather let others to complete her work so that she can enjoy her own time going out. That is probably the kind of flaw found on a piece of perfect jade as herself. Although it sounds capable to stay calm in any circumstances, her disastrous carefree personality and zero sense of danger personality may cause a problem to become magnified... Even if that is the truth, people around her offers assistance willingly. This is probably because of the good morality that she kept normally.
[Event] Galaxy Express and the mysterious signal
672.name: Raphael

skill.description: Restores {value} HP to 2 allies with the highest ATK. Targets deal {delay1} more DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: Guided Enlightenment

abilities.description: Increases 25% of skill DMG of Phantasma team members.(only take effect once to the team)
abilities.name: Demon Noble

abilities.description: Increases 30% of DMG dealt by Phantasma team members at the start of the final wave.(only take effect once to the team)
abilities.name: Rail fan

from_description.event_name: Galaxy Express and the mysterious signal

673.description:
"Woman and Railroad, which one should I go for?　That is a tough question..."
The right-hand man of Shuten Doji. He is a famous spirit in the world of demons. He is well known being a playboy, and has gone after many girls, but it is rather unexpected that he is a "rail-maniac."
