He loves nothing more than the railroad, as well as he enjoys going on a journey (Bashing), the train whistle and the sound generated by the engine of a locomotive (Sound Bashing). He seems to believe that he is second to no one when it comes to the railroad... About his relationship with the Hoshikuma Doji, who is also a huge rail fan, they have some kind of connection beyond genders. Even though they are soulmates, there seems to be lacking an emotion of love between them.
673.name: Ibaraki Doji [Railroad]

skill.description: Can be used as bond and in guild conquest.
skill.name: Demonic Rail

abilities.description: Increases 50% of ATK speed.
abilities.name: Singularity

abilities.description: Increases 50% of Skill DMG and 40% Crit DMG at the start of the final wave.
abilities.name: High Dimensional Being

from_description.event_name: Galaxy Express and the mysterious signal

674.description:
"Everything flows inside the inevitable occurrence... for you... and for me..."
The spirit emerged from a strong narrowband radio signal received by Ohio State University's Big Ear radio telescope on August 15, 1977. Generally it is being known as the "Wow! Signal." It is still unknown whether or not the signal is a spirit. Due to the uncertain existence of this being, almost no information is ever known but only very few have ever claimed that they witnessed it. All we know is that it always brings the world to a new era by the time she appears. Although it is still unclear whether or not her existence to humans is as a friend or foe, the only fact that is certain about her is the "Great change happens to the era on her appearance."
674.name: 6EQUJ5

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to the enemy with the highest ATK.Targets deal {delay1} less DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: Parallel Universe

abilities.description: Increases 35% of Crit DMG by the 2 allies with the highest ATK.
abilities.name: Opposite Existence

675.description:
"No matter who, giving their best to what they do means happiness."
Spirit of the girl who travels together with Giovanni in the galaxy. She is a social animal and also a vivacious honor student loved by everyone. She is highly empathetic, and always wants to help others in need. She has always been the one pushing shy Giovanni to continue on their journey. In fact, her actions are only a redemption for her sins, and a way to make up for her wrongdoings in the past. Although she felt a connection to Giovanni deep inside, but she has no idea where is this feeling coming from.
675.name: Campanella

skill.description: Increases the Crit Rate of 2 allies with the highest ATK by {delay1} for a limited time.
skill.name: Sins and Salvation

abilities.description: At the start of the final wave, all foes take 17% more damage.(only take effect once to the team)
abilities.name: Aries Zodiac

676.description:
"I shall decide are you appropriate to become a time arbitrator."
A spirit transformed from one of the Ptolemy 48 constellations. She is a member of the 12 Ecliptic zodiacs. As the Shrine Maiden of the temple of time, she is the protector that keeps time on the right path. She understands Gemini very well, and one of the few remaining ones who know about that fearsome power in the past. Although she is capable to mend the distorted space-time to its proper state, the action will consume a huge amount of her spirit essence. If she continues to use this power it may shorten her lifespan. Her serious personality is approved by everyone, and she is also one of the persons appointed by Zeus to judge Thorn.
676.name: Stella: Aries

skill.description: Can be used as bond and in guild conquest.
skill.name: Reality Restoration

abilities.description: Increases 45% of Crit DMG.
abilities.name: Genius Boy

abilities.description: Reduces 10% of Max HP and Reduces 30% of DMG taken.
abilities.name: Unfortunate Fate

677.description:
"You said she is someone's wife?　So what?"
Spirit of the genius musician passed away in his young age. Like Beethoven, he is one of the three most talented musicians who ever lived. His amazing creations are loved by many people. His nature has never changed after becoming a spirit. His memories towards sensation and music are incomprehensible to commoners, and even demons will be purified listening to his performance. Due to his close-to-insane personality with unexpected thoughts, he started to propose again to the woman who rejected him in life, Marie‧Antoinette.
677.name: Mozart

skill.description: Can be used as bond and in guild conquest.
skill.name: Eine kleine Nachtmusik

abilities.description: Normal attacks decrease the current target's ATK speed by 25%.
abilities.name: Alluring Fragrance

678.description:
"Don't lay your eyes on other women... only look at me♪"
Spirit of the famous spice used in ice cream. She dislikes loneliness and was also as a spoiled kid, perhaps because she is a crucial ingredient in all sweet desserts. Although she needs time to open up herself to others, once someone becomes a valued friend of her, she sticks tight with that person to anywhere. Perhaps because of her over-fervent love, her possessive desire may go out of control sometimes and try to take control of her master over and over again... so be careful not to get tied up by her in bed.
678.name: Vanilla

skill.description: Restores {value} HP to 2 allies with the lowest percentage of HP and cures them from all negative status effects.
skill.name: Vanilla Essence

abilities.description: At the start of the final wave, enemy with the most HP takes 10% more damage.
abilities.name: Honest Devil

679.description:
"I hate ugly people. Especially those who are ugly from the inside."
The spirit of a demon prince leading 20 legions of demons. She supposedly gives true answers of things past, present and to come. As an oracle, all information is in her hands as being seen naked. She is unbelievably honest for her kind. To those with pure intentions, she would give the correct answers for them to succeed. But to those with evil intentions, she would give the opposite answers leading them to their own destruction. Given what she does, even she thinks herself as a demon after all.
679.name: Orobas

skill.description: Can be used as bond and in guild conquest.
skill.name: The Wheel of Destiny

68.description:
"I've got eyes in the back of my head."
A testy fox spirit known for bringing fortune both good and bad. His proficiency with information- and enemy-scouring magic has made him quite the invaluable informant, while his ample fighting skills give his brand that extra-added boost.
68.name: Pipe Fox

skill.description: Increases all allies' DEF by {delay1} for a limited time.
skill.name: Iizuna Foxtrot

abilities.description: Increases 40% of the ATK speed of all allies at the start of the final wave.(only take effect once to the team)
abilities.name: Phoenix Constellation

680.description:
"The reason that others suspect that of you is because of your poor virtue."
Spirit of the Phoenix constellation on the Southern Sky. He was the champion of the interstellar light-speed race once. No one has ever beaten his record since he retired from his career. He has a resilient and straightforward character. It is not exaggerated to say that he contributes everything in his life to the race, which seems to fit in to his name of what a Phoenix is. His extraordinary mental strength is what supports him to stay on the unfaltering throne. However, he was suspected of doping in a certain race one day. He chose to retire without finding any excuse for the accusation made against him. Since then, the rest of the world looked at him with ice-cold stare. Except for one, his rival in that race - Stella: Corvus...
[Event] Guild Conquest
680.name: Stella: Phoenix

skill.description: Can be used as bond and in guild conquest.
skill.name: Skyride - Rush of Destruction and Revival

abilities.description: Increases 5% of Crit Rate at the start of each wave.
abilities.name: Captain of Shinsengumi's 3rd Unit

from_description.event_name: Unrest! Duel at the ancient city!

681.description:
"To see what is right and not do it is want of courage……"
A spirit transformed from the captain of Shinsengumi's 3rd Unit, which was a faction of the swordsmen who protected Kyoto during the Bakumatsu Era. Taciturn and calm in nature. Despite being the most skilled swordsman in Shinsengumi, he had never drawn attention to himself and would rather act in secrecy as Hijikata's shadow. When he became a spirit later, his habits didn't change. After he sealed his sword, he resonated with Hijikata's beliefs and chose to follow him in his path. When he gets emotional for any reason, he has a habit of wearing a faint smile on his face. But no one who saw his smile has lived to tell about it. Soba noodles is his favorite food. However he only likes it unflavored because the addition of seasonings or condiments only complicates how it tastes……
[Event] Unrest! Duel at the ancient city!
681.name: Saito Hajime

skill.description: Can be used as bond and in guild conquest.
skill.name: Silent straight lunge

abilities.description: Restores 5% HP every 5 seconds.
abilities.name: Faint heart of love

from_description.event_name: Unrest! Duel at the ancient city!

682.description:
"As long as you have the data, everything can go according to your wish, be it in the past or future. "
A spirit that is capable of computing the outcome of the future based on the laws of cause and effect. She has the rare quality of existing purely as a concept without any physical form through theurgic manifestations. She was sent to watch over Hijikata Toshizo after he has fallen as a Brute but on the surface, she assumes the role as his advisor. She has never fallen in love due to her serious disposition and the fact that she is only interested in researches. When she first met Hijikata, she only felt contempt for his frivolous demeanors but was later attracted to him after learning his true nature. However, her feelings for Hijikata were unreciprocated as he wasn't aware of the fact. And as such, she has been suffering from her conflicting feelings of loyalty towards Theurgy and her fondness for Hijikata.
[Event] Unrest! Duel at the ancient city!
682.name: Demon of Laplace

skill.description: Can be used as bond and in guild conquest.
skill.name: Corridors of mystic art

abilities.description: Increases 35% Crit DMG to skill targets.
abilities.name: Suiha

from_description.event_name: Unrest! Duel at the ancient city!

683.description:
"I will never miss my mark "
A spirit transformed from the divine bow that was once wielded by the most famous archer in the Middle Kingdom - Yang Youji. She later ended up in Japan through Minamoto no Yorimitsu. According to legend, she was the weapon that slayed Nue. Although she is proud and arrogant, she has the propensity of being stuck in the mire of self-loathing whenever she encounters a setback and it would take a long time for her to recover. She suffered a terrible lost by Nue, whom she once defeated. And now she is burning with motivation and working hard to get her revenge. However, her true talent lies in her ability to foresee the turning of tides on the battlefield and she is only able to utilize her greatest strength by supporting others. Nevertheless, she is still unaware of this fact herself……She is an old acquaintance and drinking buddy of Shishiou. Apparently, they hide nothing and can confide in each other.
[Event] Unrest! Duel at the ancient city!
683.name: Raishodo

skill.description: Can be used as bond and in guild conquest.
skill.name: A bolt of purple lightning

abilities.description: Immune to Poison.
abilities.name: Loyalty

from_description.event_name: Unrest! Duel at the ancient city!

684.description:
"Don't treat me like a child, Master! "
A spirit transformed from the color guard of Shinsengumi - a faction of swordsmen who protected Kyoto during the Bakumatsu Era. When he became a spirit, as the essence of Hijikata's page boy somehow became incorporated in him, he naturally became Hijikata's page boy when he took human form. As reflected by the color he wears, he is pure and naive. When Hijikata went missing, he searched faithfully for his master and never thought of giving up. He is treated like an old acquaintance by other members of Shinsengumi such as Okita and pampered like a little brother. It is even worse among female members like Izuminokami Kanesada who become overprotective of him and see him as a mascot……While some may feel envious of him, he seems to be less than happy about being treated as a kid
[Event] Unrest! Duel at the ancient city!
684.name: Shinsengumi Color Guard

skill.description: Increase damage dealt by 2 allies (ranged priority) for a limited time {delay1}
skill.name: 7th Shiki "Rumbling of the Great Mountain" (imitation)

abilities.description: Restores 15% HP to Phantasma team members at the start of each wave.
abilities.name: Demon of genesis

from_description.event_name: Unrest! Duel at the ancient city!

685.description:
"Fighting is all about certainty and safety…♪"
A spirit transformed from the Great Marquis that governs 30 Legions of Hell. She is an alchemist who serves Theurgy directly. She is the culprit that transformed Nue into a demon, and she is the type that will agree to anything as long she gets to perform human modification. Although she is stuck up and arrogant to those who are weaker in power, her demeanors and tone will change completely when she deals with anyone who is more powerful than her. She is very easy to figure out. She is not used to being involved directly in combat and much prefers to stay within her zone of safety so that she can pester and taunt her opponents incessantly. She lives by one simple motto: never trust anything.
[Event] Unrest! Duel at the ancient city!
685.name: Decarabia

skill.description: Restores {value} HP to 3 allies with the lowest percentage of HP. Targets deal {delay1} more DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: Healing tentacles

abilities.description: Increases 45% of Skill DMG at the start of the final wave.
abilities.name: Female military officer

from_description.event_name: Unrest! Duel at the ancient city!

686.description:
"If you leave this to me, I'll get the job done within an hour "
A spirit transformed from a muzzleloader that was invented in the United Kingdom. She was one of the most famous weapons that dramatically changed how wars were fought during her time as she excels in all three areas of accuracy, range and power. During the Bakumatsu Era, the weapon was imported into Japan in huge quantities as the primary weapon for the forces of the Imperial Court. In other words, she is the arch-nemesis for Shinsengumi. Presently, she is loyally serving the corrupted Hijikata and aiding him with her deadly force. Though she might appear as a stoic and obstinate military officer, whenever she is alone with Hijikata, she would become very snarky like a drill sergeant. In other words, she is a tsundere. Perhaps it was due to her feminine nature that she became aware of Demon of Laplace's true feelings and as a result, the two has trouble getting along and would always insult each other.
[Event] Unrest! Duel at the ancient city!
686.name: Enfield Rifle

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to the enemy with the most HP. Decreases target's speed by {delay1} for a limited time.
skill.name: Triple shoot

abilities.description: Increases 25% of Crit Rate and increases 50% Crit DMG
abilities.name: Dominator factor

from_description.event_name: Unrest! Duel at the ancient city!

687.description:
"What is the fun in battle if you don't bet your life as a wager? "
A spirit transformed from the mighty monster that caused great unrest in Kyoto. She is capable of amazing physical feats by drawing strength from the monkey, tanuki, tiger and snake, and after being transformed by Decarabia, she even attained power that far exceeds her own limits. She loves to fight as much as she loves having her three meals each day. She is a born fighter through and through and she found great satisfaction in successfully having her vengeance by besting her rival Raishodo. And now she has gotten so carried away that she has her mind set on starting as many fights as she can with different opponents in Kyoto City using the same move……On a related note, her only weakness of losing her fighting spirit due to an empty stomach has been resolved by simply feasting on the spirit essence of Brutes around her. Her tenacity and fearsome strength certainly make her live up to her nickname of "Dominator."
[Event] Unrest! Duel at the ancient city!
687.name: Nue [Dominator]

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to the 2 enemies with the highest ATK, with a {probability} of inflicting Stun.
skill.name: Dominator Thunderclap Palm

abilities.description: Increases 10% of DMG dealt and slightly reduces 10% DMG taken.
abilities.name: Mastermind behind the unrest

abilities.description: Increases 13% of skill DMG dealt at the start of each wave.
abilities.name: Clavicles of the King

from_description.event_name: Unrest! Duel at the ancient city!

688.description:
"Am I really myself?……Sometimes I would ask myself the same question. "
A spirit transformed from the Vice-Commander of Shinsengumi, which was a faction of the swordsmen who protected Kyoto during the Bakumatsu Era. Along with Oda Nobunaga and Tenkai, he had transformed from a mortal into a Spirit Agent and once served under the Headquarters of the Unrest Counter Strategy of the Bureau of the Occult (Death Squad) as the right-hand man of Nobunaga in protecting the world from the Brutes. During the last "unrest", he went missing in action and returned to become a commander of the enemy as a member of the Clavicles of the King in this "unrest." He is straight-forward and fearless by nature. In stark contrast to his image as the "Demon Vice-Commander" of Shinsengumi and feared by all, he has become a mysterious man who is able to crack jokes and be funny in all situations. However, he has involved himself in a delicate and sophisticated situation with many women. Even though he is romantically involved with Izuminokami Kanesada, the Demon of Laplace and Enfield Rifle have also fallen for him. As for his exact reason for becoming a member of the Clavicles of the King, the truth is still out there, unknown……
[Event] Unrest! Duel at the ancient city!
688.name: Hijikata Toshizo

skill.description: Can be used as bond and in guild conquest.
skill.name: 42nd Shiki "Sunset"

abilities.description: Increases 45% of Skill DMG and 45% Crit DMG at the start of the final wave.
abilities.name: Secret technique of the sword master

abilities.description: Increases 25% of Crit DMG dealt of Divina allies.(only take effect once to the team)
abilities.name: Captain of Shinsengumi's 1st Unit

from_description.event_name: Unrest! Duel at the ancient city!

689.description:
"Cough……cough……It's alright…I can still keep on going! "
A spirit transformed from the captain of Shinsengumi's 1st Unit, which was a faction of the swordsmen who protected Kyoto during the Bakumatsu Era. After fighting Hijikata Toshizo, who was once his senior in sword skills, Okita attained the secret technique of "heart," "skill" and "body" and awoken as the true form of "Okita Soji." However, his awakening also became a double-edged sword that only worsened his illness, limiting him to only take part in brief fights that are even shorter in duration. But even so, he had not given up fighting. The burning regret of his failure to protect the streets of Kyoto during his lifetime and his determination to keep Kyoto from being once again involved in a war have called him to battle once more.
689.name: Okita Soji [1st Unit]

skill.description: Can be used as bond and in guild conquest.
skill.name: True・Muso Six Hit

69.description:
"You want this too, huh?"
Princess of Wu during Ancient China's Three Kingdoms period. Every bit as prodigious a talent as her elder brothers, and an exceptional fighter. Though her marriage to Liu Bei—a suitor thirty years her senior—was one of political convenience, the two forged an instant connection, and could often be seen exchanging peach manju together.
69.name: Sun Shangxiang

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to current target.
skill.name: Hundred Blooming Blades

abilities.description: Increases 25% of Crit DMG by the 2 allies Anima team members at the start of every wave.
abilities.name: Hijikata's Favorite Sword

abilities.description: At the start of the final wave, all foes take 30% more damage and decreases 30% of the ATK speed..
abilities.name: Refreshing belle

from_description.event_name: Unrest! Duel at the ancient city!

690.description:
"If it means I'll get to see Master Hijikata again……I'll go to even the deepest part of inferno "
A spirit transformed from the favorite katana yielded by Hijikata Toshizo - the Vice-Commander of Shinsengumi. Once remove from her sheath, her spirit would manifest like a frilled pink carnation in the image of the perfect woman. With her signature calm and temperate demeanor, she radiates a motherly aura to all who come her way. The truth is, she has already saved countless lost souls. Even Hijikata, the womanizer, would be powerless before her innocent smile. Although she has been very close with Hijikata as his partner in various campaigns, she became separated from him during the last "unrest" and she is still lamenting the fact that she had failed to protect her master. She is on very good terms with Okita's beloved katanas "Kashuu Kiyomitsu" and "Kikuichimonji Norimune" as besties. She also has two elder sisters "Nosada" and "Kasen Kanesada," both significantly older than her.
690.name: Izuminokami Kanesada

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to enemy with the most HP. Targets receives {delay1} more DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: Guidance to purity

abilities.description: Reduces 15% of DMG taken and Increases DMG dealt by 15% at the same time.
abilities.name: Page boy

691.description:
"Hey~ Hey~ Sister. Do you dare to try green pepper? "
A spirit transformed from the hybrid between goblin and demon. He has replaced Shinsengumi's Color Guard and became the current page boy for Hijikata. He takes care of everything and perform various chores for Hijikata. It is uncertain whether he is born with the talents or Hijikata has taught him well, but he has grown to become a decent negotiator and can even trick Brutes to do his bidding. That said, he is still naive and immature in specific areas and would often fight with others over trivial things……He has recently been seen hitting on girls who are older than him as he had learn from watching Hijikata…. He has reached that age where he wishes to become a grown up as quickly as possible.
691.name: Minor demon: Nishimaru

skill.description: Increases DMG taken by 2 enemies (melee priority) by {delay1} for a limited time.
skill.name: 24th Shiki "Kakuharai"

abilities.description: Increases 10% of DMG of all Phantasma allies.(only take effect once to the team)
abilities.name: Corvus

692.description:
"I am not interested in any other ways of winning other than taking my opponents head on! "
A spirit transformed from one of the Ptolemy48 constellations. She is the new champion in the Interstellar light-speed race. As the last opponent of the champion "Phoenix" in the race, she tasted defeat when he became affected by evil essence in an evenly matched race with the champion. However, as Phoenix was alleged to have taken illegal drug prior to the race, she absolutely could not live with the fact that he became the de-facto champion due to Phoenix's disqualification. The fact that drives her absolutely nuts is the fact that Phoenix covered up the fact that she was in fact affected by evil essence during the race. "What is this……a stupid joke to him……!?　I will……I must make you retract your declaration for retirement! "As much as she was upset, she has also made up her mind to save the man whom she has idolized for so long in the past.
692.name: Stella: Corvus

skill.description: Can be used as bond and in guild conquest.
skill.name: Wings of darkness

abilities.description: Increases 45% of Skill DMG.
abilities.name: Red-eye assassin

abilities.description: Increases 15% of Crit Rate and increases 35% Crit DMG.
abilities.name: Big-sister complex

693.description:
"Death……is the closest thingyou will get to true equality in this world. "
A spirit transformed from the renowned demon dog that is said to show up at crossroads according to English folklore. He is known to the assassin witha pair of fiery red eyes that burn like flames. He has the composure that is able to contain his ferocious nature and claim the life of his target from behind without making the slightest noise. He is a born-killer. No one who became his target has managed to survive and tell his tale. Sometimes, his mood would determine whether or not he is going to accept a job. He is also known to kill his client if he truly despises the job. Although he is vicious and dangerous, he would behave so well like a pet on loan in the presence of Cerberus (who is the same person as Chimera and Hydra of Lerna); apparently each time they meet, he would be ask to pay for the meal……
693.name: Hellhound

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to current target.
skill.name: Crimson manipulator

abilities.description: Skill attacks have a 60% chances of inflicting Poison.
abilities.name: Unparalleled beauty

694.description:
"Would you mind sharing with me more of your stories? "
A spirit transformed from CleopatraVII, the last ruling pharaoh of the Ptolemaic Kingdom of Egypt. Known for her exquisite beauty that was unrivaled, she had a harem of handsome men despite her young age. But if you were to make the mistake of thinking that beauty is the only weapon she has in her arsenal, you will be sorely mistaken. The reason for this is simple: her true weapon lies in her rhetoric known as "temptation;" the first time one talks to her, he would develop a liking for her. The second conversation with her, the victim would grow fonder of her, and it only takes one more conversation for him to become her slave. Her beauty is nothing more than a superficial edge she has; in order to survive and succeed in the royal court that is rampant with scheming and plotting, her ways of the world have turned out to be her greatest strength. Even so, the fact that she has more room for development and growth makes her a formidable enemy……Her only weakness is her distaste for reptiles. She has a special hatred for snakes. She is intricately involved in a complicated relationship with Julius and Brutus……
694.name: Cleopatra

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to the 3 enemies with the least HP.
skill.name: Temptation

abilities.description: 90% chances of inflicting Sleep to all foes at the start of each wave.
abilities.name: Sleeping child

695.description:
"Hmm~ Is it chow time~? "
A spirit transformed from one of the wooden sculpture that watches over the Tosho-gu Shrine. She was once a nekomata who committed countless evil and nefarious deeds but has repented her ways and became the guardian of the east gate at the shrine for Tosho Daigongen. Even so…just as her name implies, she is always asleep. And as such, she would be completely unware of urgent situations and is utterly useless as a guard. If anyone is unfortunate enough to wake her from her sleep, she will explode in a foul temper and not even her master Tosho Gaigongen would attempt to placate her……But if you are doubting if she is of any use at all, she is one of the very few who is gifted with the ability of "good fortune manipulation" without herself realizing the fact. Those who get on her good side would enjoy the fruits of good fortune and this makes her a great talent. However, as her skill is activated without her conscious knowledge, even she herself doesn't know when her skill is activated……
695.name: Nemuri-neko

skill.description: Can be used as bond and in guild conquest.
skill.name: Good Fortune Manipulation

abilities.description: Increases 50% of DMG dealt at the start of the final wave.
abilities.name: The Empress

696.description:
"Even if it's for the sake of others, I shall become the flawless Empress. "
A spirit transformed from one of the Ptolemy48 constellations. She is the highest commander of the mightiest fleet in the Universe. She takes pride in her long running streak of victories without defeat in combat and as a politician, she is endowed with innate gifts and has therefore been revered as "The Empress." However, despite her beauty and talents, her true self is a "dried fish woman" who can't even survive on her own without the help of Oleg. Just to give you an idea of how hopeless she is……She wears a dress shirt around the clock; dumps her unwashed clothing everywhere; rolls around in her sleep and surfs the net on her phone for the entire day. Because she is too lazy to clean up, she is willing to feed herself with biscuit or supplement energy gels. Unable to watch her in this state, Oleg has taken it upon himself to tend to herday-to-daylife, including cooking for her, doing her household chores as his daily routine……In reality, she seems to be doing this to snuck up to him――Hmm, there's someone at the door apparently……
[Event] Guild Conquest
696.name: Stella: Cassiopeia

skill.description: Can be used as bond and in guild conquest.
skill.name: Focused Barrage

abilities.description: Increase 35% crit damage for all allies at the start of the final wave.(only take effect once to the team)
abilities.name: Big family

abilities.description: Increases 20% crit rate of skill target.
abilities.name: Father of music

697.description:
"Music is not to be listened to by the ear, but rather experienced by the soul. "
A spirit transformed from the great composer who contributed to the culmination of Baroque music. Widely regarded as the Father of Music, he is an outstanding genius from the family of musicians he was born into. His soul that values freedom above all else and refuses to be bound by anything has not changed the slightest even after he became a spirit. And as such, trouble would soon follow wherever he goes. Anything that has to do with promises he involves himself, dispute and altercation are guaranteed to take place. Coupled with his predisposition to commit to what others ask of him, the arguments of "Yes you said that" and "No I didn't" have never ceased for him. But even so, his reputation has not been tarnished by the slightest bit. His signature style of solemn pipe organ music is a favorite among the angels, who are apparently more than willing to fight for Bach's music. The fact that his conflicting reservations with Gabriel and Uriel almost led to the 2nd Apocalypse has been a popular topic of discussion in the circle of composers.
697.name: Bach

skill.description: Can be used as bond and in guild conquest.
skill.name: Toccata and Fugue in D minor, BWV 565

abilities.description: Restores 2% of HP every 5 seconds by the 2 allies with the highest ATK.(only take effect once to the team)
abilities.name: Elixir of immortality

698.description:
"Ahhh……Please don't look at me with that pleading gaze……"
A spirit transformed from the legendary panacea that can restore a person's youth and vitality from the Underworld that is said to be located on the back of the moon. She is a timid girl who serves "Tsukiyomi" (one of the three noble children) as his handmaiden. She is so faint-hearted that she cannot even have a normal conversation with others without hiding behind Tsukiyomi; she is extremely afraid of strangers. However, she possesses such incredible healing powers that she has been perceived as the elixir from Japan. She is capable of not only bringing the dead back to life but also returning the dead to his/her youth. In fact, her powers is so ridiculous that one can't help but feel that it’s almost as bad as the "reanimation technique" from popular anime. That said, misuse of her power would result in the exacerbation of overpopulation that the world has already been suffering from. And as such, a pact has been made with Izanami to ensure that her power must never be used on anyone without the explicit permission from Tsukiyomi.
698.name: Ochimizu

skill.description: Can be used as bond and in guild conquest.
skill.name: Ochimizu

abilities.description: Increases 50% of DMG dealt when one of the Four Heavenly Kings of Raiko is on the team.
abilities.name: Raiko's first lieutenant

699.description:
"Get lost!　If you do not wish to die by my katana, then get out of my way! "
The leader of the four legendary retainers of Minamoto no Yorimitsu who defeated the demons that plagued Kyoto in the past. He is senior to Kintaro and he is the arch-rival of Ibaraki Doji for severing his right arm. Famed as the "Demon Slayer," he possesses such incredible power that evil beings would tremble merely at the mention of his name. Not only that, as he carries the lineage of Hikaru Genji, he also happens to incredibly good looking. As such, he has had countless female suitors but apparently he had turned them all down……He is apparently extremely proud and confident, never failing to act in an arrogant way with anyone, with the sole exception of Raiko. Because of his demeanor, he was forsaken by his former partner Dojigiri Yasutsuna. Refusing to acknowledge this fact, Watanabe no Tsuna seems have directed his frustration on Shuten Doji.
699.name: Watanabe no Tsuna

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to current target, with a {probability} of inflicting Stun.
skill.name: Cleaving Sword "Kimetsu"

7.description:
"Leering at me again? You should be ashamed of yourself!"
The daughter of Saito Dosan, she was the wife of Oda Nobunaga. She doesn't like feeling constrained, so she's always loosening her obi to expose her front side. It basically looks like she's naked if you look at her directly. Yet, strangely enough, no one has ever testified to having seen her naked. Maybe it has some kind of indescribable power...
7.name: Lady Nō

skill.description: Reduces the DEF of 2 enemies (melee priority) by {delay1} for a limited time.
skill.name: Alluring Dance

abilities.description: Increases 10% of all allies' Crit DMG.
abilities.name: Nectar of the Gods

70.description:
"What am I drinking, you ask? Why, that'd be telling."
A rare spirit said to produce rice wine with the mysterious ability to weaken demons. Rumor has it the sake itself isn't what's magical, so much as the magic with which this skillful vintner imbues the mix. She's said to be particularly effective at expunging spells. Oh, and the "S" in her name stands for "sake."
70.name: Poison S. Brew

skill.description: A {probability} of inflicting Virulent Poison on all enemies.
skill.name: Alcohol Poisoning

abilities.description: Increases 10% of Crit Rate and increases 15% Crit DMG
abilities.name: Goddess of food

from_description.event_name: The Definitive Eating Competition for Spirits!

700.description:
"Hoho♪　Curry is my signature dish! "
She is the goddess of food - one of the pillars of the Shinto religion of Japan. She is the twin sister of "Uke Mochi" and in terms of her lineage, she is actually older than the three noble children. She is an elder god who is directly related to Izanagi and Izanami. She apparently had an altercation with Susanoo but now she would only casually dismiss it by saying, "Well, a lot of things had happened back when I was young" and she doesn't seem to take it to heart (at least on her part). She is very homely by nature and is willing to give everything for the sake of family. As soon as one makes the request, she would receive the guest with food she has personally prepared. The strange thing is, the dining table would be covered with dishes and no one has any idea when she has cooked all that food. That said, most spirits only care about being able to taste her delicious dishes and seldom spare a second thought to such triviality. And thus, they'd simply overlook the bizarre circumstance. And in case anyone ever wonders about it, her signature dish is just..."cooking." You'd be better off by directing your attention elsewhere, seriously.
[Event] The Definitive Eating Competition for Spirits!
700.name: Ogetsu Hime [Gula]

skill.description: Can be used as bond and in guild conquest.
skill.name: The bentou of love from wife

abilities.description: Reduces 40% of DMG taken at the start of the final wave.
abilities.name: Beast of Compassion

from_description.event_name: The Definitive Eating Competition for Spirits!

701.description:
"I'll do my best...for the sake of seeing a smile on everyone's face! "
A legendary boar in Norse Mythology that has been slaughtered countless times and prepared as food. She has the special ability to turn anything into premium A5-grade meat. When it comes to meat dishes, her culinary skills are second to none. She can prepare meat of any doneness, from medium rare to well done, with perfection and has thus been known as the "divine cook." She is joyful and warm-hearted by nature and as long as she knows that she could bring a smile to the person eating her dish, nothing would ever be too hard or difficult for her. She is the type that any man would dream to have as his wife. Her only flaw is her pre-disposition to get into situations that cause her to split hairs; once she has made up her mind, there's no way to talk her out of it.
[Event] The Definitive Eating Competition for Spirits!
701.name: Sæhrímnir

skill.description: Can be used as bond and in guild conquest.
skill.name: Well done

abilities.description: Increases 5% of Crit DMG dealt at the start of each wave.
abilities.name: God's Vessel

from_description.event_name: The Definitive Eating Competition for Spirits!

702.description:
"First, have a taste of the soup!　Then try the noodles!　Ah! If you want seasonings, you can only have it with your second bowl! "
A spirit transformed from a wondrous cauldron from Celtic mythology; apparently one only has to pray to it and the cauldron will give any food that he/she so desires. She has the gifts as a genius chef. Any dish that needs to be prepared in a pot or cauldron, be it soup or noodles of any kind, she will be able to re-create it, regardless of how old/new/exotic the recipe is. She is most well-known for re-creating the ultimate ramen - the signature dish of "Tientien Ken" that was once thought to be gone from the world when the recipe was lost. The story is so wide spread that no one in the circle of spirit culinary hasn't heard her name. However, if you praise her too much, she would forget herself and become very cocky. When this happens, you'd have to eat exactly the way she demands you to. When it's a stubborn old geezer that does this to you, you will probably get upset; but she has the look of an innocent little girl, so some may actually consider this as an added bonus in a twisted sense...
[Event] The Definitive Eating Competition for Spirits!
702.name: Dagda's Cauldron

skill.description: Can be used as bond and in guild conquest.
skill.name: Imperial Feast

abilities.description: Absorbs a 25% of DMG dealt as HP.
abilities.name: The Gourmet

from_description.event_name: The Definitive Eating Competition for Spirits!

703.description:
"No one has taken a hit from my hammer and lived to tell the tale! "
A spirit transformed from the God of Thunder who is one of the key deities in Norse Mythology. A conceited, mischievous brat with a huge ego; he is the type that will never relent unless he comes in first. Despite his youthful appearance, he has the power and might that make him worthy of his title as the God of Thunder. If he feels like it, he can easily take on other gods and hold his own. That's how powerful he is. He is the partner of Mjölnir, who happens to be a miser with a penchant to coax him to do silly things that get him into trouble... After all, a teenage boy in puberty is utterly defenseless before a woman with a great pair of knockers. On an unrelated note, even though he is a competitive eater, he is a stickler to principles and will only accept the ways of eating that catch his fancy.
[Event] The Definitive Eating Competition for Spirits!
703.name: Thor

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to the row of enemies directly in front, with a {probability} of inflicting Stun.
skill.name: Hammer of the Thunder God

abilities.description: Increases 15% of the skill DMG of all ranged allies
abilities.name: The heart of curiosity

from_description.event_name: The Definitive Eating Competition for Spirits!

704.description:
"Oh, I am helpless when it comes to anything that is novel! "
A spirit transformed from the famed and beloved Vice-Shogun who compiled the Dai Nihonshi. She is an energetic high school student who has a penchant for all things new and novel (by appearance). Due to the powerful influence of her portrayal in the period drama, after she became a spirit and took on the appearance of a girl, she still speaks like an old man. Apparently, some habits just die harder than others. She is crafty, clever and a tactician by nature. Not only that, she is also incredibly gifted in her rhetoric, so much so that even Shogun Yoshimune didn't stand a chance against her in a duel of words. Given the fact that flashing her inro has failed to surprise anyone as of late, she is thinking of other ways to bring back the surprise element... On an unrelated note, she is also famous for being allegedly the first person in Japan to have tasted ramen.
[Event] The Definitive Eating Competition for Spirits!
704.name: Mito Mitsukuni

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to the enemy with the lowest HP, with a {probability} of inflicting Silence.
skill.name: The most power aide CODE-SUKE

abilities.description: Increases 1% of Max HP to Anima team members at the start of each wave.
abilities.name: Perpetual machine

from_description.event_name: The Definitive Eating Competition for Spirits!

705.description:
"Affirming a hostile response at 20 degrees from port side; eliminate the target. "
Originating from a convention in Greek tragedy, it transformed into a spirit from its literal meaning of "god from the machine" in a conversion of concepts. She is powered by a core generator of a perpetual machine and is capable of converting any material or substance into energy. Her power and strength will vary depending on the source of energy she taps from. Since there is theoretically no limit to the energy she can convert, given the right circumstances she could possibly become the most power spirit of all spirits. As she was created as a machine, she is skilled at computation and seems to have the ability to quantify all events for analysis. Conversely, she has little knowledge in her capacity to process emotions and feelings. And since she talks like a robot, she has often been perceived as hopelessly useless. This has perplexed her greatly...
[Event] The Definitive Eating Competition for Spirits!
705.name: Deus Ex Machina

skill.description: Restores {value} HP to all allies. Targets receive {delay1} less DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: The invisible hand of god

abilities.description: Increases 20% of skill DMG of Phantasma team members.
abilities.name: Female champion in competitive eating

abilities.description: Increases 30% of the ATK speed of all allies at the start of the final wave.
abilities.name: Wolfing

from_description.event_name: The Definitive Eating Competition for Spirits!

706.description:
"You've got a long way to go to even have the slightest chance of beating me as a competitive eater! "
A spirit transformed from the demon of gluttony - one of the seven lords of Hell. As the sin she stands for, she is unmatched when it comes to eating. She is the main culprit that has brought the untime end of famous eating competitions and speed eating events. But that alone wasn't enough to satisfy her; she is also infamous for involving herself in every eating competition organized by restaurants and turning them into utter mess, thereby causing countless restaurants to go out of business..... evil, just as one would expect from a demon. By the way, her age old problem of body odor seems to have been resolved with the fragrance that Star of Bethlehem has given her as a present, and that has put her in a wondrous mood recently.
[Event] The Definitive Eating Competition for Spirits!
706.name: Beelzebub [Gula]

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to the 3 enemies with the highest ATK. Targets receive {delay1} more DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: Crimson wings

abilities.description: Increases 50% of Skill DMG.
abilities.name: Legend of the heavenly robes

abilities.description: Increases 50% of Crit DMG.
abilities.name: Primordial god of food

from_description.event_name: The Definitive Eating Competition for Spirits!

707.description:
"To eat is the basis of life; do not treat it so casually. "
One of the gods of creation that is responsible for the origins of food. She is the mother of "Ogetsuhime", "Uke Mochi" and "Inari Okami" - a major deity who protects Japan. Originally created as a kingdom of volcano that had nothing but barren lands, Japan is able to evolve into a country of abundance with plenty of food for all only because of her blessings. In her youth, she descended into the mortal world for a shower but her divine robes were concealed by man. This caused her to have to spend a considerable period of time living amongst mankind. During that period, she has gotten to learn the ugly and beautiful aspects of humanity and she made up her mind to be a guide for man and lead them on the right path by being strict or benevolent when the occasion calls for it. Despite her mellow temperaments, she is cool-headed and dignified. In a chaotic event like an eating competition whereby all sorts of characters come together, it wouldn't be an exaggeration to say that it is all thanks to her that the event could proceed at all with some sort of order.
[Event] The Definitive Eating Competition for Spirits!
707.name: Toyouke-Omikami

skill.description: Can be used as bond and in guild conquest.
skill.name: Oomonoimi

abilities.description: Increases 20% of the EXP gained from battle.(only take effect once to the team)
abilities.name: The all-purpose aide

708.description:
"One day, I shall become a powerful man and surpass Lady Cassiopeia! "
A spirit transformed from one of the Ptolemy 48 constellations. The secretary of the Empress Cassiopeia, he is a sharp-witted and observant lad. He has tremendous respect for Cassiopeia as the highest commander of the fleet. But after witnessing the way she leads her disorganized and unruly personal life, he was consumed with a burning desire and a sense of mission to help Cassiopeia. He had wanted to ask Cassiopeia to instruct him in the skills of sword play and military tactics, but he quickly realized that the only things he had gotten better at were domestic tasks such as cooking, doing laundry and so forth. This has vexed him greatly. Although he isn't sure if he should continue to do it, he can't help responding to Cassiopeia's requests.
708.name: Stella: Auriga

skill.description: Can be used as bond and in guild conquest.
skill.name: Leadership skills

abilities.description: Increases 12% of Crit DMG dealt at the start of each wave.
abilities.name: The boundless stomach

abilities.description: Increases 45% of DMG dealt at the start of the final wave.
abilities.name: The beast the brings the end

from_description.event_name: The Definitive Eating Competition for Spirits!

709.description:
"Never thought our paths would cross again──! "
A spirit transformed from the monstrosity that embodies gluttonous eating. She is an energetic and curious girl and has trouble staying still or settling down. In other words, she is a troublemaker who creates problems everywhere she goes. During the last Halloween, she developed romantic feelings for the protagonist and semi-coerced him to participate in the "Definitive Eating Competition for Spirits." Since she is always hungry, she is never able to access her full power due to the lack of energy. But it is said when she gets serious, her terrible power could destroy the world. By the way, she seems to be a distant relative of the Leviathan...and the connection seems to be evident from the way they both create problems and troubles for others.
709.name: Behemoth [Gula]

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to the enemy with the highest ATK. Targets receives {delay1} more DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: Bahamut of the End

abilities.description: Increases 10% of DMG dealt by Phantasma team members when this daemon is Team Leader.
abilities.name: Faerie Queen

71.description:
"Pretty clothes make everything better!"
This beautiful fairy queen is crazy about fashion, and chooses her outfits for maximum compliment-receiving potential. Unsurprisingly, she lacks much in the way of inner confidence, and secretly worries that her passion for fashion might be a sign of some deeper-seated desire for approval.
71.name: Titania

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to 3 enemies (ranged priority).
skill.name: Kaleidoscopic Beauty

abilities.description: Increases own level by 10.
abilities.name: Obstinate old man

abilities.description: Increases 20% of skill DMG by Divina team members.(only take effect once to the team)
abilities.name: Father of Gods

from_description.event_name: The Definitive Eating Competition for Spirits!

710.description:
"To be a man……is to be able to narrate a story through his deeds……"
The leader of the Titans who gave to the Olympian Gods; the father of Hades, Zeus, Hera and Hestia. Taciturn and succinct, he is an obstinate father figure who will never back down once he has made up his mind. The conflict between him and his son Zeus in the past almost led to the annihilation of the world. In addition, he is an old acquaintance of Adamant Sickle, as both believe that no one knows them better than one another. Considering that he would always get into a fight whenever Zeus is around, the two have made a conscious effort to avoid each other.
710.name: Chronos

skill.description: Can be used as bond and in guild conquest.
skill.name: Wrath of the Earth

abilities.description: Increases 20% of Max HP and Reduces 20% of DMG taken.
abilities.name: The crest of aoi

711.description:
"My Komon is really something, isn't she! "
A spirit transformed from the famous container "Mitsu Aoi Inro" that has appeared numerous times in the period drama of Mito Komon. She is the confidant of Mito Mitsukuni and adores Mitsukuni above all else. In fact, she is actually overprotective of Mitsukuni. Coupled with the fact that she is a natural busybody, she treats Mitsukuni like a mother who can't bear to be separated from her child despite the two being of the same age. In the beginning, Mitsukuni wasn't able to deal with the way she acts but as of late, she seems to have given up and would simply let her rattle on and on about how great Mitsukuni is... The truth is, she has a dangerous side to her that is unknown to all - the determination to do even the worst of dirty jobs if it were for the sake of Mitsukuni……
711.name: Mitsu Aoi Inro

skill.description: Reduces all enemies' DEF by {delay1} for a limited time.
skill.name: Inro flash

abilities.description: Reduces 10% DMG dealt by all foes at the start of each wave.
abilities.name: Aphrodisiac

abilities.description: Increases 10% of skill DMG dealt at the start of each wave.
abilities.name: Aromas of seven spices

from_description.event_name: The Definitive Eating Competition for Spirits!

712.description:
"I like everything, be it insects, flowers and animals. The only thing I dislike is human. "
A spirit transformed from the precious spice harvested from civets. She is the key ingredient of that world-renown bottle of fragrance and everyone has heard of her name. She has materialized as a graceful prophet in this world. She is arrogant and xenophobic - anyone whom she meets for the first time would probably get the cold shoulder and snotty treatment from her. But if you were to listen to what she has to say more closely, you will realize that her blunt delivery of the truth has been for the sake of that person. Once you get to truly know her temperaments, your impression of her will change dramatically and realize that she is actually just a girl who is not very good at socializing with others. And if you ever say anything good about her trademark cat ears, she would always blush and conceal them.
712.name: Civet Musk

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to enemy with highest ATK, target receives {delay1} more DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: Offensive fragrance

abilities.description: Increases 10% of DMG dealt; Increases 10% of skill DMG.
abilities.name: Hot-blooded man

713.description:
"Gahahaha!　You wish to fight me, kid? "
A spirit transformed from the one-eyed, fearless warrior who was the cousin of warlord Cao Cao. He is mostly known for his fiery temperament and passion for battle and he has been one of the earliest supporters of Cao Cao when he was still a fledging military leader. Cao Cao trusted him deeply and even told him that he can skip the formalities and etiquettes that would be otherwise required for Cao's subjects. As he is fiercely loyal and upholds friendship, he is admired and respected by his subordinates and perceived as the ideal commander to follow. He also has had a bit of history with Guan Yu. When Guan Yu decided to leave Cao Cao, he was the one to pursue Guan Yu until the very end and this has become a popular story in folklore. Even after becoming a spirit, he would often duel with Guan Yu. But apparently the two haven't determined who is the better fighter.
713.name: Xiahou Dun

skill.description: Can be used as bond and in guild conquest.
skill.name: Fiery halberd

abilities.description: Increases 20% of Crit DMG by Phantasma team members.
abilities.name: Devil of the ocean

714.description:
"Rage is very similar to a storm. They both appear without any sign or warning but when you become aware of it, it is already gone……"
A spirit transformed from the Great Duke of Hell that governs 29 Legions of Hell. She is a demon who takes the form of a mermaid with the ability to control water. She can freely transform her feet into her tailfin as she wishes and can easily move about when she is on land. At the first glance, she will appear as a simple, pretty and elegant lady. But the truth is, she has an extremely short temper over even the most trivial things and when she becomes enraged, she can summon a terrible storm that can flood an entire region. She would reflect on her misdeeds afterward, but such reflection usually takes the tone of "Oh well, it can't be helped now that it has happened," and it only causes greater irritation and contempt from others. It is of utmost importance to pay careful attention at all times when conversing with her in order to prevent pushing her buttons inadvertently.
714.name: Vepar

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to 3 enemies (ranged priority).
skill.name: The unreasonable tempest

abilities.description: Increases 28% of the DMG of all ranged allies. (only take effect once to the team)
abilities.name: Wild Child

715.description:
"Gwaaaaooohh──! "
A spirit transformed from one of the Ptolemy 48 constellations. She is a space monster with an immense body and terrorizes the universe wherever she goes. Because of her unfathomable powers of destruction, she has been feared and revered as a god of destruction. With the ability to regenerate any wound she sustains in a matter of seconds, she has astounding regenerative capability and when she lets loose her roar, the sheer power of the sound can obliterate even planets and stars. And as such, she has been perceived as an existence that can never be conquered. Although she can't speak, she would get angry when anyone is foolish enough to badmouth her. This also means she seems to be able to understand the language of human beings. With no hope of ever defeating her, mankind felt that at the very least, attempts should be made to communicate with her so that a consensus on coexistence can be struck with her. Thus far, numerous brave souls have tried talking to her but none has succeeded to date. There has only ever been one man - the young warrior Perseus, who allegedly has had an encounter with her that can be said as a conversation. But no one can attest to the truth of such rumor.
[Event] Guild Conquest

estimate.note: Auctions typically start on the 15th, ~7 months after event

716.description:
"All I want is to live in peace. "
A spirit transformed from the famous demon that once served Otsuno. He is also the red demon who is known for his immense power and the husband of Goki. He is born with such a mellow and easygoing personality that one would easily take him to be a fool. But once he enters combat, he never fails to obliterate his enemies using his trusty iron axe with insane ferocity that is akin to a raging bull. You can't get any manlier than him. His body is protected by his steely muscles that are impervious to even the sharpest blades and this makes him, quite literally, a moving fortress. In order to avoid any encounters with men with their penchant for lies and deceit, he has chosen to lead a life of seclusion with his with Goki in the depths of a mountain. He loves Goki more than anything in the world, and nothing is too difficult to achieve for him as long as she asks for it. In other words, he is an uxorious husband.
[Event] Incoming! The hunter of demons
716.name: Zenki

skill.description: Can be used as bond and in guild conquest.
skill.name: Axe Whirlwind

abilities.description: Normal attack targets have 50% chances of increasing 5% more DMG taken.
abilities.name: Eight Legions of Demons

estimate.note: Auctions typically start on the 15th, ~7 months after event

717.description:
"I am definitely not seeking to validate my sense of existence"
A spirit transformed from one of the Eight Legions who are entrusted to the protection of Dharma. She belongs to the tribe of demons who watch over the northern quarter and is skilled at concealing herself. Operating as an excellent secret spy, she currently serves as the head of intelligence collection department for the Bureau of the Occult. With her exceptional physical prowess as ninja and her deadly skills of assassination with wires, she is absolutely terrifying and none of her targets has lived to tell their tales of their demise. At the first glance, she may seem to be a cold and reticent character. In reality, she has trouble keeping secrets and apparently she had leaked information of vital importance through careless slips of her tongue... Other members of her tribe include Heaven Yaksha and Earth Yaksha.
[Event] Incoming! The hunter of demons
717.name: Yaksha

skill.description: Can be used as bond and in guild conquest.
skill.name: Demon Slaying Wires

abilities.description: Increases 20% of Skill DMG and 20% Crit DMG at the start of the final wave.
abilities.name: The Meaning of Destruction

estimate.note: Auctions typically start on the 15th, ~7 months after event

718.description:
"If you get the choice of spending your life crying or laughing, it is definitely better to opt for the latter, don't you think? "
A famous spirit transformed from a mace with iron studs known for offering this nugget of wisdom to Onitetsubo. A bighearted woman of incredible martial power known for her blunt and direct words. Despite her immense power as a fighter, her true strength lies in her ability to amplify the power of whoever wields her as a weapon. She is also the partner (weapon) of Kuma Doji; a big sister figure to the four heavenly kings. Interestingly, she has serious compatibility issues with other demons; Torakuma Doji refuses to wield her because blunt weapons feel slow to him; Kane Doji has a habit of getting careless with his weapons and has thus been rejected by Konsaibo. The greatest blow to her is the fact that she weighs too much for Hoshikuma Doji to even lift her and thus she is giving serious thoughts to going on a diet…
[Event] Incoming! The hunter of demons
718.name: Konsaibo

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to further enemies, with a {probability} of inflicting Stun.
skill.name: Body Impact

abilities.description: Restores 20% HP to the ally with the lowest percentage of HP at the start of each wave.
abilities.name: Chaste Wife

estimate.note: Auctions typically start on the 15th, ~7 months after event

719.description:
"Happiness and joy will never come to those who do not have the capacity to love. "
A spirit transformed from the famous demon that once served Otsuno. She is the wife of Zenki and the gentle Blue Demon who heals the wounded with Soul Water. She has never complained about the life of simplicity she leads and has been a responsible and chaste wife who offers her full support to her husband. Despite her limited fighting prowess, she is skilled at the manipulation of water and capable of handling different situations with great versatility. Despite having been married to Zenki for a very long time, her love for him has never diminished and she would flirt with him without batting her eyes in front of others. It is said that spirits who are single should stay clear away from her to prevent suffering from fits of jealousy or sorrow of loneliness.
[Event] Incoming! The hunter of demons
719.name: Goki

skill.description: Restores {value} HP to all allies.
skill.name: Blessing of Soul Water

abilities.description: Increases 15% of DMG dealt.
abilities.name: Death Deliverer

abilities.description: All melee foes take 5% more DMG.
abilities.name: Ceaseless Pain

72.description:
"What is your crime?"
The Anima of a particularly gruesome method of torture. She might look like an angel sent from above, but don't be fooled—she's got spite in spades, and has doled out despair to sinners, innocents, and the repentant alike in their droves. The wheels scarcely protecting her modesty are said to spin of their own accord.
72.name: Breaking Wheel

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to surrounding enemies, with a {probability} of inflicting Stun to targets.
skill.name: Incandescent Howl

abilities.description: Increases 15% of skill DMG of the 2 allies with highest ATK.
abilities.name: Kiai

estimate.note: Auctions typically start on the 15th, ~7 months after event

720.description:
"Hey!　Is there anyone who has enough courage to take me head on!? "
A spirit transformed from a servant of Shuten Doji. A hot-headed and feisty lady with the greatest fighting power among the four heavenly kings. She is the former mentor of Ibaraki Doji who became the first to discover his true power. When his power exceeded hers, she became one of his subordinates instead. Although they all operate at the same rank, other members of the four heavenly kings respected and feared her as an older sister. It is worth mentioning that when she uses her partner Konsaibo as a weapon in battle, her destructive power can almost rival that of Shuten Doji... She also happens to be very intolerant of alcohol and even a single shot of liquor will cause her to be intoxicated. In other words, she has zero defense against Poison S. Brew.
[Event] Incoming! The hunter of demons
720.name: Kuma Doji

skill.description: Increases DMG dealt by 2 allies (ranged priority) by {delay1} for a limited time.
skill.name: Zanki―Zero―

abilities.description: Normal attacks have 10% chances of inflicting stun.
abilities.name: The Sadist

estimate.note: Auctions typically start on the 15th, ~7 months after event

721.description:
"Ahhh…Yes…That expression...it is turning me on♪"
A spirit transformed from one of the Eight Legions who are entrusted to the protection of Dharma. She belongs to the tribe of demons who watch over the northern quarter. She also happens to be a sadistic woman who loves nothing more than the expression of intense pain on her opponents. She works for the Bureau of Occult and due to her personality, she is often assigned to work as a spy to infiltrate enemy ranks and perhaps is most distinctive in the fact that she can conceal herself in the midst of Brutes and naturally appear to be one of them. In reality, she has a habit of playing her role too seriously, so much so that even the Brutes would stay away from her for her feistiness... She is an old acquaintance of the Duke of Hell and it is said that they used to be so close that they would compare their favorite pets. If you find yourself wondering: what pet are we talking about here? That is a question that is not suited here.
[Event] Incoming! The hunter of demons
721.name: Rakshasa

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to the row of enemies directly in front, with a {probability} of inflicting Stun.
skill.name: Sange

abilities.description: Increases 60% of Crit DMG dealt at the start of the final wave.
abilities.name: Higekiri

abilities.description: Increases 10% of Crit Rate of Anima allies.
abilities.name: Natural Enemy of Demons

estimate.note: Auctions typically start on the 15th, ~7 months after event

722.description:
"Tis my mission to slay demons… For the sake of my grand wish, I'll take your head! "
A spirit transformed from the very katana that was used to sever Ibaraki Doji's right arm. And because of the anecdote, she has earned the nicknames of "Onikirimaru", "Higekiri" and so forth as a demon blade that is known as the bane of all demons. She also happens to be the twin sister of Dojigiri Yasutsuna with an identical look. Even those who know them well have trouble telling them apart... Between the two sisters, they refer to each other by the nicknames of "Blood-drinker" and "Onikiri." Nevertheless, the two of them don't really get along all that well and it is said that she suffers from inferiority complex due to her lesser fame compared to her sister. In addition, due to her history of being forced to take on the name of "Kunitsuna" at a point in the past, she has apparently harbored a grudge against Onimaru Kunitsuna...
[Event] Incoming! The hunter of demons
722.name: Onikiri Yasutsuna

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to the enemy with the most HP. Targets deal {delay1} less DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: Soul Devour
