abilities.name: Radiance of Evil Banishment

abilities.description: Increases 10% of skill DMG by Divina team members at the start of each wave.
abilities.name: The Most Powerful Exorcist

estimate.note: Auctions typically start on the 15th, ~7 months after event

723.description:
"A world in peace is a terrible bore. And that's why I have decided to bring some chaos. "
A spirit transformed from a renowned samurai who earned his fame by defeating Shuten Doji during the mid-Heian period. He has defeated countless demons and spirits and has been acknowledged as the most powerful exorcist in the realm with incredibly dashing looks. He is one of the members of the Clavicles of the King. He is a staunch believer in human supremacy with a great sense of pride. He sees all spirits, especially tool kamis, as nothing more than tools at the disposal of human beings. Because of his personality and antics, he is on very poor terms with other members of the Clavicles of the King. Despite the incredibly tense situation he shares with other compatriots, due to his ability of forcing any tool kami he got into his servitude as a weapon, even the other powerful members of the Clavicles of the King wouldn't dare to challenge him. Such is the delicate status of balance between him and others. He is deeply perturbed by the peaceful world of today in which samurais are subjected to ridicule and disrespect and he intends to corrupt the world with evil essence to bring back strife and conflict.
[Event] Incoming! The hunter of demons
723.name: Minamotono Yorimitsu

skill.description: Can be used as bond and in guild conquest.
skill.name: Evil Banishing Sword

abilities.description: Increases 30% more DMG dealt of all team members when this daemon is Team Leader.
abilities.name: Heart of Atonement

abilities.description: Increases 30% of ATK speed of all allies.
abilities.name: Proof of Resolve

estimate.note: Auctions typically start on the 15th, ~7 months after event

724.description:
"I don't think this is sufficient for me to atone for my sins…"
A spirit transformed from the samurai who defeated demons with the help of his companions: a talking dog, pheasant and monkey. Even though his rampage has been the result of evil essence that corrupted him, he still suffered from a terrible guilt and regret for hurting a great number of demons. He has vowed that his sword will only be used to protect innocent demons from now on. In order to punish himself for his apparent failure, he has subjected himself to even more rigorous and extreme trainings. As a result, he became an even more powerful warrior. By enveloping his sword with the holy aura of peach, his attack has the incredible power to purify countless Brutes in an instant. But even with his gentle smile for the small demons, will he ever gain true freedom from his lifestyle of getting away simply by running at full speed?
724.name: Momotaro [Demon Savior]

skill.description: Increases DMG dealt by all allies by {delay1} for a limited time.
skill.name: Cry of the Gods - Style Two

abilities.description: Normal attacks decrease the current target's ATK speed by 40%.
abilities.name: Tsundere

abilities.description: Increases 60% of skill DMG of the 2 allies with highest ATK at the start of the final wave.
abilities.name: Genealogy of Goddess

estimate.note: Auctions typically start on the 15th, ~7 months after event

725.description:
"Now isn't the time for that!　For crying out loud, be a better judge of the occasion! "
A spirit who is known for her penchant of playing pranks on the hearts of men. But now, she rarely plays practical jokes. Because she has fallen in love and she no longer has time for such things. It began very innocently when she was trying to prank a simple-minded guy who only cares about fighting but without her realizing, she became very aware of him and cared about his feelings. As she followed his trails, she realized that simply hearing his voice would make her tremendously happy. In fact, she is already in the hopeless state that she can't stop thinking about him around the clock. And as such, she has gotten hold of Onimaru Kunitsuna whom she heard has recently found a lover to be her confidant…
725.name: Amanojaku[Strife]

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to the enemy with the most HP, target receives {delay1} more DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: The Blow of Love

abilities.description: Reduces 10% of DMG dealt by opponent with highest ATK at the start of each wave.
abilities.name: Utter Devotion

726.description:
"No matter how many stories and anecdotes there have been, my path of loyalty and fulfillment of duty will never change. "
A spirit transformed from the weapon wielded by Usui Sadamitsu, one of the Four Heavenly Kings of Raiko. While there are many katanas that shared the same name, each and every one of them has manifested in accordance with their own will and consciousness. Despite her feelings of insecurity, she is tremendously loyal to her past master "Usui Sadamitsu" who has yet to transform into a spirit. In order to bring back Sadamitsu, she has pledged her allegiance to Raiko. She is by nature taciturn and obedient. She is always controlling her own feelings and taking orders without question. Her style of fighting is to leverage her tough body as a weapon to perform an attack known as "bone-crusher." Since she knows she isn't gifted in martial arts, she has resorted to such sacrificial counter attacks as her secret technique.
726.name: Ishikirimaru

skill.description: Can be used as bond and in guild conquest.
skill.name: Bone-crusher

abilities.description: Increases own level by 15.
abilities.name: Heroic Wish

727.description:
"I am a man who has been born to be a hero! "
A spirit transformed from one of the Ptolemy 48 constellations. A young swordsman who is passionate about heroes of mythologies. Being one of Zeus' illegitimate sons, he is gifted with exceptional talents. On top of his impressive competence with both the sword and magic, his incredible "luck" is simply beyond the scope of reason. It is such an incredible attribute so much so that no matter how badly he screws up, he will somehow end up succeeding in the end. In other words, it's simply OP. His half-sister Athena seems to be terribly fond of him too, and she never seems to be able to reject his requests... Although he is very much in love with his fiancee Andromeda, she was on the record for saying "I will never marry someone who hasn't achieved significant accomplishments." As such, he is currently in the process of feverishly training himself.
727.name: Stella: Perseus

skill.description: Can be used as bond and in guild conquest.
skill.name: Star Slicer

abilities.description: Increases 10% of DMG dealt at the start of each wave.
abilities.name: Flames of Dignity

abilities.description: Increases 10% of Crit DMG dealt at the start of each wave.
abilities.name: Judge of the Netherworld

728.description:
"While desire is not equivalent to evil, it does become a problem if you let it consume you. "
A spirit transformed from the king of the netherworld who passes judgment to the deceased based on the deeds they have performed when they were alive. He is strict, almost to the point of being neurotic, and as long as something catches his attention, he will never rest until he figures it out. Despite often being made fun of by his friends as a troublemaker, he is perfectly suited for his position as the judge of hell. He is on great terms with Satan and Hades, who have agreed to divide the vast territories of hell and rule their turfs separately in peace. He treats and loves Satan like his own daughter but recently he hasn't seen too much of her because she made new friends. Seeing the happy expression on Satan's face gives him mixed feelings of joy and loneliness...
728.name: King Enma

skill.description: Can be used as bond and in guild conquest.
skill.name: Judgment of Inferno Demon

abilities.description: Restores 50% HP to the ally with the lowest percentage of HP at the start of each wave.
abilities.name: Drink of the Gods

729.description:
"Do not let your work and labor build up!　It's best if you finish whatever you need to do today! "
A spirit transformed from the ambrosia that means "honey" in Greek mythology. Contrary to her delicate and exquisite appearance, she is in fact a professional and efficient secretary to Zeus. She often picks up or cleans up the mess that Zeus leaves behind. Despite her habit of offering sound advice to Zeus who is willful and unrestrained in his ways, she respects him more than anyone else and feels deeply honored to be able to work for him. Zeus is well aware of this fact and has therefore been taking advantage of her by leaving all his work to her. When she realized the gravity of the situation, she reported to Hera and that had led to terrible consequences.
729.name: Nektar

skill.description: Restores {value} HP to ally with the lowest percentage of HP. Targets receive {delay1} less DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: Golden Drop

abilities.description: Increases 8% of Crit Rate.
abilities.name: Demon Dicer

abilities.description: Increases 15% of DMG dealt when one of the Five Swords under Heaven is on the team.
abilities.name: The Five Swords under Heaven

73.description:
"Heads up!"
Legendary blade that beheaded ruler of demons Shuten Doji. Despite being feared by demons far and wide, Yasutsuna has an unlikely fan in Shuten Doji himself, who was drawn to her bloodlust to end his time as A spirit. Their bad blood forgotten, the two have since developed a deep connection, though some say that Yasutsuna is a sucker for her former enemy's capacity to empathize with the less fortunate.
73.name: Dojigiri Yasutsuna

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to nearby enemies.
skill.name: Destruct Mode

abilities.description: Increases 20% of skill DMG dealt by Divina team members at the start of the final wave.
abilities.name: Wei's Tactician

730.description:
"As long as I am around, you should give up any idea of pulling any tricks behind my back. "
A spirit transformed from the famed tactician who served Cao Cao. He was the renowned strategist who helped his master in many military campaigns with impressive stratagems and creative ideas but sadly passed away at a young age due to illness. His untimely demise was mourned by many. It is said that the outcome of the battle at the Red Cliff would have been very different if he were still alive at the time. Cao Cao placed a great deal of trust in him. On the other hand, he is terribly lazy and negligent in his personal life, which is a side of him that no one should ever learn from. He hasn't changed his ways after becoming a spirit and has often found excuses to go out and have fun. And he would always get reprimanded by Xiahou Dun when his cover gets blown...
730.name: Guo Jia Fengxiao

skill.description: Can be used as bond and in guild conquest.
skill.name: Vaulting at Wuhuan

abilities.description: Increases 30% of Crit Rate and increases 10% of battle reward drop rate.
abilities.name: The Dragon of Avarice

731.description:
"The life of every living organism begins from nothingness and ends in nothingness… Why don't you return to Mother's embrace as well…"
The embodiment of miasma that came from outer space. "One who devours everything and in the end will consume even himself. "A spirit that heralds the doom for the universe. The true essence of miasma is actually the highly concentrated form of desires of life. By fulfilling the wish and impulses of the spirit that has assimilated the miasma, it grows ever stronger and will eventually become "an entity that embodies all" that devours all spirits in order to become the ultimate life form. When it reached the solar system, it was separated from its emotional half of "Malefic Being: Thorn" when he fought Zeus. He has thus been waiting for the perfect opportunity to strike again. However when Sola and company stopped his wicked plan, he was consumed along with the miasma that "Malefic Being: Thorn" assimilated and came back as the ultimate life form. He continues to assimilate all forms of energy and grows ever larger. And his rampage will only end when he has consumed everything.
[Event] Guild Conquest
731.name: Wild Star Thorn

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to the 3 enemies with the highest ATK, decreases targets' speed by {delay1} for a limited time.
skill.name: Destruction for You

abilities.description: Increases 25% of DMG dealt by Anima team members when this daemon is Team Leader.
abilities.name: Absolute Cleave

abilities.description: Increases 15% of skill DMG to Anima team members at the start of each wave.
abilities.name: Divine Blade

estimate.note: Auctions typically start on the 15th, ~7 months after event

732.description:
"Your path……must be created with your own strength nyan! !"
A spirit transformed from a renowned blade with many legends and stories. During her involvement in the incident with Sola and company, she gained the ability to control powers that are directly opposite to her own and evolved into "Divine Blade." The experiences also enabled her spirit to grow and mature. Her confidence and unwavering belief in herself became the source of her strengths. The fact that she is capable of striking at an opponent's weak spot at any time alone already makes her a formidable opponent; yet her most deadly power lies in her command of the hybrid force of divinity and demons to execute an "Absolute Cleave." There is nothing in existence that can withstand her slash. Apparently it is akin to gambling with your life if you ever point a cat teaser in her general direction.
[Event] Clavicle of the King
732.name: Muramasa [3rd anniversary]

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to 2 enemies (ranged priority).
skill.name: Flash of Divinity and Demon

abilities.description: Increases 50% of Crit DMG dealt by Divina team members when this daemon is Team Leader.
abilities.name: Temporal Jump

abilities.description: Increases 15% of skill DMG by Divina team members at the start of each wave.
abilities.name: God of Sword

estimate.note: Auctions typically start on the 15th, ~7 months after event

733.description:
"I shall wager my everything with this move!"
A spirit transformed from the Captain of the 1st unit of Shinsengumi's - which was a faction of swordsmen who protected Kyoto during the Bakumatsu Era. After his infusion with the soul of Okita Soji, he awakened the true power that laid dormant in his body and attained the level of "God of Sword." With his newly awakened power of "Temporal Jump," he can circumvent the process of "cutting" and directly go to the result of "slashing his opponent." The speed of his sword flash is beyond imagination. Not only that, his movements have also become as smooth and seamless as the flow of water; he can easily parry any attacks made against him and unless one has attained the state of seeing with his/her mind's eye, his/her attack wouldn't even be able to find its target. Nevertheless, his infusion also exacerbated his illness and now he can only fight at his full power for no longer than 3 minutes. But even so, it is said that there are less than five individuals in this world who can last for longer than a minute in a fight against him... Still, he is training just as diligently as ever on a daily basis, and perhaps that's what makes him "a genius at diligent training".
[Event] Clavicle of the King
733.name: Okita Soji [3rd anniversary]

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to the enemy with the highest ATK.
skill.name: Ultimate Secret Sword ─ Empty Death─

abilities.description: Increases 25% of Crit Rate by Phantasma team members when this daemon is Team Leader.
abilities.name: Conqueror

abilities.description: Increases 15% of skill DMG of Phantasma team members at the start of each wave.
abilities.name: Kishin

estimate.note: Auctions typically start on the 15th, ~7 months after event

734.description:
"I can definitely do better than this! This will not stop me in my path!"
A spirit transformed from the capable lieutenant of Shuten Doji. He is also said to be the incarnation of the Demon General who will be the next leader of all demons. Because of his passion for railways and the profound sentiments of camaraderie with his companions, he was able to evolve into "Demon God" - gaining incredible powers that make him an equal to Shuten Doji. In addition to that, due to the numerous campaigns and missions he took part, his talents and competence as a commander finally bloomed as he attained the ability of "Conqueror" - a talent that augments the strength of his troops by multifold when under his command. Although he still has a penchant for easily getting carried away and fond of women, he has recently learned to behave himself when Hoshikuma Doji gets the upper hand... Although the two have denied having feelings for one another, one really can't help feeling that they act and behave as if they have been couples for an extremely long time...
[Event] Clavicle of the King
734.name: Ibaraki Doji [3rd anniversary]

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to all enemies.
skill.name: Kishingeki ─ Rain of May─

abilities.description: Increases 25% of the number of soulstones received from battle.
abilities.name: Guide of the Underworld

estimate.note: Auctions typically start on the 15th, ~7 months after event

735.description:
"I don't really care for any of those trivial things, as long as you pay up."
A spirit transformed from the famous boatman who ferries souls of the dead across Styx and answers to Hades directly. As far as she is concerned, anything in the Underworld can be solved with money. As long as one can afford her fees, no principles or guidelines will apply to her. She is a professional navigator who gets the job done. She charges on an hourly basis and she accepts various payments including rokumonsen, one obol or electronic currency. When asked about her infatuation with money, her response was: "Because my dream is to one day travel around the world." As inspiring as her goal is, given the ten of thousands of dead who go to the Underworld each day, will she actually be able to take such a long leave? And by the way, she is an old friend of Orpheus. Once she ditched her job just because she wanted to hear him play his harp and she was severely reprimanded by Hades as a result.
[Event] Clavicle of the King
735.name: Charon

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to current target, with a {probability} of inflicting Stun.
skill.name: Sanzu River

abilities.description: Reduces 10% of DMG taken and Increases DMG dealt by 20% at the same time.
abilities.name: Katana of Might

estimate.note: Auctions typically start on the 15th, ~7 months after event

736.description:
"Why waste time thinking when you just don't have the brain power for the job?"
A spirit transformed from the finest even among the best katanas that have been recognized as Saijo Owazamono. Frivolous and cocky by nature, he has a bad habit of getting out of control whenever he gets excited. He is very close to his partner Kondo Isami and nothing is taboo between the two. Sometimes Isami would catch a glimpse of him feeling down for having said something over the top... Even so, he is deeply trusted by Isami, who was on the record for saying, "It is all thanks to Kotetsu that I was able to get out of the Ikedaya incident unscathed." On a related note, he and Kashuu Kiyomitsu and others have been old acquaintances and the true reason that Isami emerged from the incident without injury was because they got careless. And as such, he feels slightly awkward in their presence.
[Event] Clavicle of the King
736.name: Meito Kotetsu [3rd anniversary]

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to 3 enemies (ranged priority).
skill.name: The Killing Blow

abilities.description: Decreases 15% the ATK speed of all foes.
abilities.name: Spy

estimate.note: Auctions typically start on the 15th, ~7 months after event

737.description:
"Well if it is a request from you, I guess I have got to take it seriously."
A spirit transformed from the tricky fox demon who commands both the powers of good and ill fortune. Apt at gathering intel, you can count on his to always have the latest intelligence. He is very close with the Sakuma Clan. Despite being thought by everyone to possess enormous power, he would easily give up a fight even against a much weaker opponent as he doesn't think it's worth the effort. Consequently, he has been overly underestimated in this world. But he doesn't seem to care about what others feel about his and he has gone on the record for saying, "I'd rather be treated with contempt by the weak if that saves me from having to show the ace in my sleeve." And thus, no one has actually witness his power.
[Event] Clavicle of the King
737.name: Pipe Fox [3rd anniversary]

skill.description: Increases all allies' DEF by {delay1} for a limited time.
skill.name: Itsuna Saburou

abilities.description: Increases Crit DMG of 2 Phantasma team members by 25% at the start of each wave.
abilities.name: Half-Spirit

abilities.description: Increases 20% of DMG dealt by Phantasma team members at the start of the final wave.
abilities.name: Mastermind

estimate.note: Auctions typically start on the 15th, ~7 months after event

738.description:
"Make your choice; serve me, or die……"
A spirit transformed from the legendary warlord, politician and hero who has left the world with incredible literary works as his legacy. The true leader of the Clavicle of the King; he is the mastermind who wishes to free spirits from the control of mankind. To achieve his ambition, he has spent years in meticulous planning and preparation. In fact, even the past encounters he has had were simply part of his stratagem. He was the cruel and merciless tyrant who once love mankind more than anyone else but ended up being responsible for the deaths of most men in history. Just what exactly he sees through his dark, burning pupils ...nobody will ever know.
[Event] Clavicle of the King
738.name: Cao Cao [3rd anniversary]

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to the 2 enemies with the highest ATK. Targets deal {delay1} less DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: Blade of Ruinous Seven Stars

abilities.description: Increases 25% of Crit DMG by the 2 allies with the highest ATK at the start of every wave.
abilities.name: Karmic Liberation

abilities.description: Increases skill DMG of all team members by 45% when this daemon is Team Leader.
abilities.name: Director of the Bureau of the Occult

estimate.note: Auctions typically start on the 15th, ~7 months after event

739.description:
"Alright, pull yourself together already!"
The Director of the Bureau of the Occult and the young mistress of the Tsuchimikado Clan. Borrowing the power of Senji Ryakketsu, she merged with Shuten Doji and become the ultimate entity - a "joker" that commands power beyond the comprehension of human wisdom. Born with the most powerful spirit essence ever gifted to heirs of the Tsuchimikado Clan, she led a secluded life from the mortal world and grew up with spirits and demons instead. As a result, she has grown to see spirits and demons as equals to mankind. Because of this, she secretly developed a method of manifestation that is unrestricted by karma and named her technique as "Karmic Liberation" - giving life to numerous spirits who could live in freedom. Her greatest wish is to create a world where humans, spirits and demons can live in peace, harmony and joy. Nevertheless, for spirit agents who use and order demons as tools and soldiers, her ideas are nothing short of radical and out of the box. Will the concept and vision of a world of inclusion and harmony be accepted by mankind? The answer is still out there.
[Event] Clavicle of the King
739.name: Tsuchimikado Mikado [Demon]

skill.description: Increases the DMG of 2 allies with the highest ATK by {delay1} for a limited time.
skill.name: Sword of Protection/Blade of Annihilation

abilities.description: Increases 7% of battle reward drop rate.
abilities.name: Prosperous Goddess

74.description:
"How can I get my sister to like me?"
Goddess of childbirth and rearing from Japanese folklore, and younger sister of Princess Iwanaga. A picture of dignity and grace, this classy lady's abundant charm inspires seething jealousy in her elder sister, who harbors a bitter, one-sided grudge against her younger sibling. Desperate to salvage their relationship, Sakuya is currently accepting ideas on how to win her mean sister's affections.
74.name: Konohana Sakuya

skill.description: Restores {value} HP to 2 allies with the lowest percentage of HP. Targets receive {delay1} less DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: Raining Petals

abilities.description: Increases 25% of skill DMG of the 2 allies with highest ATK.
abilities.name: Deputy Director of the Bureau of the Occult

abilities.description: Increases 10% of DMG of Phantasma team members at the start of each wave.
abilities.name: Demon King

estimate.note: Auctions typically start on the 15th, ~7 months after event

740.description:
"It's been so long since my last fight. Don't blame me if I have forgotten how to pull my punches."
A spirit transformed from the most powerful entity that is the leader figure for all spirits and demons in Japan. He was once the mighty demon that brought terror unto this world from his lair at Mount Oe. However, he was put into an extended slumber due to Minamoto no Yorimitsu's clever ambush. When he manifested in the modern days, his terrible grudge drove him to exact his revenge on mankind but was utterly humbled by Tsuchimikado Mikado as he finally tasted defeat. Just as he thought he would be put to a long slumber, he was surprised by the fact that Mikado had not sealed him away and instead chose to befriend him. This period of placid serenity helped him to find peace within his heart. Even though he can't find it in himself to show his true feelings in the presence of Mikado, he is extremely loyal to her and will even willingly give up his life for her sake. And it is thanks to Mikado that he managed to see heart to heart with Dojigiri Yasutsuna, his once sworn enemy...
740.name: Shuten Doji [3rd anniversary]

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to enemy with highest ATK, target receives {delay1} more DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: Psalm of Destructive Sin

abilities.description: Reduces 15% of DMG taken of all team members; increases 20% of ATK speed at the start of the final wave.
abilities.name: Impeccable Visage

abilities.description: Increases 43% of crit rate and increases 100% of crit DMG of skill targets at the same time.
abilities.name: Da Liu Ren

estimate.note: Auctions typically start on the 15th, ~7 months after event

741.description:
"What's this? How did that adorable little darling ended up being such an old hag……"
A spirit transformed from the oldest tome of divination in Japan that has been passed down as a family heirloom in the Tsuchimikado Clan. With the spirit of Abe no Seimei residing in the tome, she has been taking care of Mikado ever since she was a little girl and reverted to her true form as a tome when she matured. She is one of the very few spirits that truly understands the inner workings of the world through techniques of divination and the truth behind the existence of spirits. Despite appearing to be a loquacious individual who has trouble keeping her mouth shut, she is actually cunningly diverting the subject with useless trivial talks so that she never has to impart what really matters. In other words, she achieves her silence through ceaselessly talking. No one has greater confidence in Mikado's potentials and strengths than her and whenever Mikado finds herself in crisis, she would break her seal and manifest in the world.
741.name: Senji Ryakketsu

skill.description: Restores {value} HP to ally with the highest ATK. Targets deal {delay1} more DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: Qimen Dunjia Formation

abilities.description: Increases 10% of the EXP gained from battle and increases 10% of battle reward drop rate.(only take effect once to the team)
abilities.name: Goddess of Performance

742.description:
"Here's a song for you to keep you entertained!"
A spirit transformed from the goddess of dance and performance in Japanese mythology. She is the oldest dancer in the history of Japan and it is said that all who see her dance would become captivated by her performance. According to rumor, her latest goal is to become an idol who can sing as well as she can dance but apparently her progress in singing has not improved by the slightest. Only heaven knows if the day she becomes an idol would ever come. She is also one of the best friends of Cherry Blossom Front from the same agency. But as flowers don't bloom in the Underworld, Cherry Blossom Front would be entirely useless, and thus she has taken Cherry Blossom Front's place in this incident. And lastly, she is still on bad terms with Goddess Amaterasu...
742.name: Ame-no-Uzume [3rd anniversary]

skill.description: Can be used as bond and in guild conquest.
skill.name: Song of Angel

abilities.description: Increases 35% of Skill DMG and 35% of Crit DMG.
abilities.name: Extraterrestrial Princess

743.description:
"Hohoho!　How did you like that? Very sexy right?"
This is the true form of the spirit transformed from the princess of the moon when she unleashes her true powers. When her stores of lunar energy reach the maximum, she will be able to maintain this form for 5 minutes. Her true identity is an extraterrestrial demon lord who has been banished to this dimension to atone for her sins. She has the ability to manipulate gravity; she doesn't age and will never die. However, such powers are sealed off completely when she is in the form of a child. If she really wishes to, she could easily turn Earth into a black hole without breaking a sweat. But now that she has befriended other spirits, she no longer finds it in herself to do such a thing. A demon lord who cannot stand to be alone due to fear of solitude has apparently gone out to play with her friends today, as usual.
743.name: Kaguya [Tsuki Hime]

skill.description: Can be used as bond and in guild conquest.
skill.name: Gravitational Disintegration

abilities.description: Increases 15% of DMG of all allies at the start of each wave.
abilities.name: Legendary Instrument

744.description:
"Complacency rots the soul……and I'll never want that to happen to me."
A spirit transformed from the priceless acoustic guitar made by the renowned luthier Antonio Stradivari. She is the guitarist of unparalleled renown in the genre of spirit music. She used to be a lady from an extremely affluent family. But as she loathes a lifestyle of material comfort without challenges and hardship, she grabbed a guitar and simply left home, without any knowledge of the world. As she led a life of a street performer who can barely put food on her table, she encountered Homer, who shares similar values and beliefs with her. The two have been partners ever since. It is said that their neighbors would hear the sounds of guitar duet from the run-down apartment they once dwelled from time to time and such stories have become legends... Not only that, she actually jammed with a saucepan once but the session ended up in a fight due to differences in their perceived musicality. She will probably never accept any offer for ensemble or group performance from now on.
744.name: Sabionari

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to all enemies; decreases targets' speed by {delay1} for a limited time.
skill.name: Resonating Eradication

abilities.description: Increases own level by 15.
abilities.name: Beautiful Princess of True Ancestor

745.description:
"Come, let the roses of blood bloom."
A spirit transformed the beautiful princess and one of the true ancestors of vampires. She is the chief of the 108 clans of vampires with the lineage of true ancestors - an energetic girl who is most trusted by Count Dracula. Despite being a vampire, she is not affected by sunlight in anyway and can withstand direct exposure. Apparently she has used it as an excuse to go about all sorts of places to have fun using the excuse of going on missions. Not only that, since food in modern times are much richer in nutritional values, she apparently no longer has to drink blood for sustenance. But even so, one will find his life force secretly drained away if he ever gets careless. One should never let his/her guard down just because of her appearance as a bishojo. On a related note, her ability is "Bloody Create." It allows her to manipulate the iron in her blood to create all sorts of weapons and devices of torture as she wishes.
745.name: Carmilla

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to the 2 enemies with the least HP. Targets take {delay1} more DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: Bloody Spiral

abilities.description: Increases 50% of Skill DMG at the start of the final wave.
abilities.name: Huntress of the Dark

746.description:
"Let me show you my secret techniques that men will never be able to imitate!"
A spirit transformed from a female jonin -a leader of all female ninjas. She is the mentor of Camellia and Peony and has been nicknamed as "The Dark Hunter" while serving as the Captain of the Exorcist Squad. Apart from her exceptional fighting techniques and her cool head, her "charisma" is the deadliest weapon in her arsenal. Just as her opponents become bewitched by her sensual charms, she would take them out with a sudden attack that came from nowhere. Consequently, male spirits have grown to develop a genuine fear of her ……Apparently she has been rather upset about the ineptitude of dames who do not know how to leverage their gifts as women.
746.name: Chrysanthemum the Ninja

skill.description: Can be used as bond and in guild conquest.
skill.name: Ran‧Kachofugetsu

abilities.description: Skill attacks increase 40% DMG taken by targets.
abilities.name: Legacy of Yagyu Shinkage-ryu

747.description:
"You have to defeat me first before you can claim to be the strongest!"
A spirit transformed from the famed odachi that has been passed down as a family heirloom; a great weapon that runs more than two meters in length. Anyone who is deemed worthy of wielding her must have proven his/her mettle as the true heir and master of the Yagyu Shinkage-ryu. As she embodies the honor of a prestigious martial family with profound history, she is well-mannered and gracious in her demeanors. But due to her absolute confidence in her own abilities and strengths, she would inadvertently perceive others in a condescending manner...The truth is, she is a dame who knows little of the ways of the world and whenever she gets called out on this fact, she would become infuriated. In fact, this whole incident wouldn't have happened if this wasn't brought up in conversation when she went on a blind date... She really has tons of energy as a young lady, that's for certain. On a side note, she almost had no experience in dealing with other famed swords and katanas. The only friend she gets along well is Kuji Kanesada, whom she often spars with.
[Event] Guild Conquest
747.name: Yagyu no Odachi

skill.description: Can be used as bond and in guild conquest.
skill.name: Edge of Destruction

abilities.description: Increases 3% of max HP of Divina team members.
abilities.name: Dawn Light

748.description:
"Please look upon me all you like!"
A ghost only visible on New Year's Day, and widely believed to be extremely valuable. Bowing down before her beauty is said to ensure peace and tranquility for the year ahead. But, actually, contrary to popular belief, she's always wandering around here and there. It's just that no one takes any notice of her until New Year's Day. She's a pretty lonely ghost for the rest of the year, and craves more attention.
748.name: New Year Sunrise

skill.description: Restore {value} HP to self, increase crit rate for a limited time {delay1}
skill.name: New Year Sunrise

abilities.description: All divina allies take 10% less DMG.(only take effect once to the team)
abilities.name: Ruler of Night

abilities.description: Increases 15% of skill DMG by Divina team members at the start of each wave.
abilities.name: Dark Affinity

from_description.event_name: Galaxy Express and the mysterious signal

749.description:
"I'll paint the sky black so that everyone can sleep peacefully."
Original form. One of Greek mythology's original deities, and the goddess of night. She lives together with her good friend Hemera, the goddess of day.
749.name: Nyx

skill.description: Can be used as bond and in guild conquest.
skill.name: Eternal Night Veil

75.description:
"Me? A split personality? Get outta town!"
This Anima of a perfectly preserved pistol is no stranger to frontline action. She might look sweet, but with a weapon in her hand this girl puts the "miss" in "missile." Although lacking official training, she's a master in military affairs, and can go head to head with multiple trained soldiers and emerge with nary a scratch. Her only weak point is her slight lack in the stature department.
75.name: Tokarev Pistol

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to an enemy (healers priority).
skill.name: Perfect Headshot

abilities.description: Normal attacks have 7% chances of inflicting Freeze.
abilities.name: Snow Spirit's Frolic

750.description:
"Hey, you! Come and play with me! You want a snowball fight? Mind if I use icicles? Tee hee... How about we build a snowman? Yippee!"
A child spirit who appears in snowy territories. The family of any who play with her are said to be blessed with good fortune for generations to come.
750.name: Snow Sprite

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to current target, with a {probability} of inflicting Freeze.
skill.name: Dance of Ice and Snow

abilities.description: Increases 15% of the EXP gained from battle.(only take effect once to the team)
abilities.name: Shichi-Go-San Rite

abilities.description: Increases battle reward drop rate by 25%.(only take effect once to the team)
abilities.name: Precocious Expert

estimate.note: Auctions typically start on the 15th, ~7 months after event

751.description:
"You look like you've never tied an obi before!"
A spirit who embodies the traditional Japanese ceremony where a seven-year old girl puts on her first obi sash. She is rather precocious, believing herself to be an expert on all things sash-related, and she likes to lord it over less enlightened children. It is true that girls are often more mature than boys at that age, but considering herself a full-blown grown-up might be taking things too far.
751.name: Obi Ceremony

skill.description: Can be used as bond and in guild conquest.
skill.name: Alluring Aura

abilities.description: Increases 40% of skill DMG of the 2 allies with highest ATK at the start of the final wave.
abilities.name: Prayer for Growth

abilities.description: Increases 40% of crit rate and increases 90% of crit DMG of skill targets at the same time.
abilities.name: Not to be Outdone

estimate.note: Auctions typically start on the 15th, ~7 months after event

752.description:
"Ready, set, jump!"
A spirit who embodies the traditional Japanese ceremony where a five-year old boy dons his first hakama robe. Believing that his ceremony was getting overlooked in favor of all the other events in the Shichi-Go-San Children's Festival, he became determined to raise its profile. He's willing to do anything to get people to acknowledge the supreme importance of the hakama ceremony - even stepping on his close friends' toes. He usually apologizes for this afterwards, though.
752.name: Hakama Ceremony

skill.description: Restores {value} HP to ally with the highest ATK,Targets receive {delay1} less DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: Dropkick

abilities.description: All Divina team members deal 25% more DMG.(only take effect once to the team)
abilities.name: Queen's Knight

753.description:
"I would lay down my life in service of my Queen."
A dashing swordsman who serves the Queen of Hearts. Blessed with a heroic disposition and admirably egalitarian in his treatment of others, he's rather popular with the ladies. His background is somewhat shrouded in mystery, but that's a story for another time.
753.name: Jack of Hearts

skill.description: Can be used as bond and in guild conquest.
skill.name: Blinding Flash

abilities.description: All Anima team members take 5% less DMG
abilities.name: Centennial Tune

abilities.description: Restores 5% HP to Anima team members at the start of each wave.
abilities.name: Healing Opus

754.description:
"Does the sound of the koto harp not cause your chest to swell?"
The Anima of a koto harp, who plays beautiful music. Her music heals those who listen to it, and she plays dutifully every day.
754.name: Kotofurunushi

skill.description: Restores {value} HP to all allies. Targets deal {delay1} more DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: Elegant Melody

abilities.description: Increases Combat Damage by 30%.
abilities.name: Faerie King's Magic Bow

abilities.description: Increases Attack Speed by 50% when 'Oberon' is present.
abilities.name: Oberon's Decree

755.description:
"Name your target and I'll shoot it right down!"
The soul of Oberon's bow. The arrows fired from this magic-infused bow have never once failed to strike their target, but he only ever listens to what Oberon tells him to do.
755.name: Arko

skill.description: Can be used as bond and in guild conquest.
skill.name: Bullseye

76.description:
"Step away from the gecko if you value your life."
This lizard spirit's fangs can deliver quite the venomous bite. He harbors nothing but hatred for poachers, and has made it his life's mission to hamper the hunting hordes who'd do harm to his fellow scaly friends.
76.name: Komodo Dragon

skill.description: Increases Crit Rate to 3 allies (ranged priority) by {delay1} for a limited time.
skill.name: Serpent Charmer

77.description:
"Can I help you? To DIE, perhaps?"
The Anima of attire once worn by legendary ninja Hattori Hanzo. A Hanzo fanatic who imitates every aspect of her idol, from the way he talks right down to his ticks and habits.
[Special Bond] Increases “Hattori Hanzo” max HP

changes.new:
"Can I help you? To DIE, perhaps?"
The Anima of attire once worn by legendary ninja Hattori Hanzo. A Hanzo fanatic who imitates every aspect of her idol, from the way he talks right down to his ticks and habits.
[Special Bond] Increases “Hattori Hanzo” max HP

[Special Bond] Increases “{#MonsterName#391}” max HP

77.name: Hanzo's Uniform

skill.description: Increases the Crit Rate of the ally with the highest ATK by {delay1} for a limited time.
skill.name: Secrets of the Shinobi

78.description:
"But I'm the one trying the hardest!"
An elven spirit sprung from a chemical element. A member of popular EDM (elf dance music) outfit ELF 118. Despite her best efforts, she's often considered the least memorable of her bandmates. Unfortunately, her bland outfits and negligible stage presence mean she'll likely be remaining in their shadows for sometime...
78.name: Helium Elf

skill.description: Decreases DMG taken by the 2 allies with the lowest percentage of HP by {delay1} for a limited time.
skill.name: Danse Macabre

79.description:
"You're up next!"
A headless-horse riding prankster who spends her nights prowling for new victims to scare. The sight of her target's shocked expression is enough to send her on her way, although the trauma stays with her victims long afterward. Rumor has it she spreads stories of her own sightings in an effort to increase her ghostly notoriety.
79.name: Night Trickster

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to a random enemy.
skill.name: Sadistic Set-Up

8.description:
"Yum! Oh my gosh, this is good!"
The spirit of a giant from Norse mythology. She loves food and appreciates delicious things no matter where they are from. When she has to go somewhere far away she turns into an eagle and enjoys her journey from the skies. The only catch is that since she's a giant, she has to eat a lot of food to feel full. So restaurants sometimes ban her from coming there again. Lately her favorite shop is a place in the Far East called "THE JOHN"(it has a weird name because the owner is bad at English).
8.name: Hraesvelgr

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to surrounding enemies.
skill.name: The Big Bite

80.description:
"Prepare to fight me!"
The Anima of an ancient Okinawan martial arts weapon. As gifted a brawler as her pedigree suggests, she's especially savvy when it comes to matters of self defense. After traveling all the way to Tokyo expecting some crooks to clobber, she's somewhat dismayed to find less to subdue than she'd originally thought.
80.name: Tonfa

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to current target.
skill.name: Twin Dragons

81.description:
"All I can do is pray..."
The spirit of a hurricane lily recognizable for her red bulbs atop a leafless stem. Her beauty straddles the line between stunning and violent, lending her appearance a heavenly or hellish bent, depending on the mindset of the beholder. Either interpretation suits her just fine as she stands stock still, serene and at one with her surroundings.
81.name: Lily Amaryllis

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to current target, with a {probability} of inflicting Weak Poison.
skill.name: Funeral Bouquet

82.description:
"Nnnggh... Come on, RAIN! Just a drop?!"
An as-yet lowly apprentice among other rain-controlling spirits. Although she can just about make it shower with enough concentration, she's yet to achieve a sustained downfall. In thrall to her deluge-dealing, flood-flinging, torrent-tossing heroes, she spends her days mustering up every last droplet she can.
82.name: Rayne Shower

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to current target.
skill.name: Piercing Raindrops

83.description:
"Currently seeking new mummy for wrapping and good times."
This Anima of a bandage was once wrapped around the mummy of a reclusive senior priest. After witnessing her former host achieve a state of nirvana, she decided she probably didn't have what it takes to follow in his footsteps.
83.name: Mummy's Bandage

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to current target; decreases target's speed by {delay1} for a limited time.
skill.name: Total Bind

abilities.description: Increases 3% of all allies' Crit Rate.
abilities.name: Supreme Sage

abilities.description: Restores 25% HP to the 2 allies with the lowest percentage of HP at the start of each wave.
abilities.name: Socratic Method

84.description:
"The world is full of perplexing mysteries. Take my wife, for example..."
The granddaddy of all Ancient Greek philosophers. A renowned polymath and thinker ahead of his time, Socrates made himself none-too-popular when he dared attempt to prove the Oracle of Apollo wrong. He didn't blame anyone else for his predicament, though—he had the foresight to know that would only get him in deeper trouble.
84.name: Socrates

skill.description: Reduces all enemies' DEF by {delay1} for a limited time.
skill.name: Murmurs of Wisdom

85.description:
"Do you have any plans later?"
An amorous princess with a constant eye out for potential suitors. For some reason, she turned into a great serpent after getting burned one too many times in love. She becomes paralyzed if her love interest shows even a hint of returning her deep and torrid emotions, and tends to enjoy wallowing in a misery of her own making.
85.name: Kiyo

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to 2 enemies (ranged priority).
skill.name: Turbulent Passion

86.description:
"No one shall approach me. Even shadows will feel my wrath!"
War-hardened steed of Lü Bu, the villain in beloved Chinese epic "Romance of Three Kingdoms." His flaming mane invokes images of fiery sutures scorched into ravaged battlefields. Even as a spirit, he reserves his saddle exclusively for Lü Bu, and refuses to be "broken in" by anyone else.
86.name: Red Hare

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to the row of enemies directly in front.
skill.name: Crimson Afterglow

abilities.description: Increases 10% of the number of soulstones received from battle.
abilities.name: Guardian of Gold

87.description:
"Steal my gold, will ya?! I'd like to see ya try..."
A legendary figure from numerous stories of lore, and the living embodiment of arrogance. He's a mixture of kings both furry and fowl, for which reason he's often considered a go-to symbol of royalty. Of course, Mr. Bighead here just assumes it's because he's so darn popular.
87.name: Gryphon

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to current target.
skill.name: Swipe From the Blue

abilities.description: When HP is 1/3 or less, Reduces 60% of DMG taken.
abilities.name: Unbendable Will

88.description:
"Even if the heavens forgive you, I shall not!"
The hardest of all natural materials known to man. Possessed of a gritty will deserving of her namesake, this young swordfighter's legendary blade fires rainbow beams to cleave through her foes. Despite her tough facade, her noble soul is said to be fragile like glass. Take care you don't break her... or let her break you.
88.name: Diamond

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to the row of enemies directly in front.
skill.name: Prism Slicer

abilities.description: Normal attacks have a 28% of inflicting Poison.
abilities.name: Demonic Lure

abilities.description: Absorbs a 15% of DMG dealt as HP.
abilities.name: Faust's Pact

89.description:
"That's right, have no fear! I have your back, after all..."
Grants the wish of any who make a deal with him in exchange for their eternal soul. No one knows for sure what goes through his head most the time, but it's probably something to do with collecting on hapless victims's debt and dragging them kicking and screaming into the underworld.
89.name: Mephistopheles

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to the enemy with the most HP, with a {probability} of inflicting Virulent Poison.
skill.name: The Price of Kindness

abilities.description: Skill attacks have 65% chances of inflicting Sleep.
abilities.name: Nightmare Binding

9.description:
"Hmm, yes, I can see it now. The continent hidden beneath the sea..."
The forbidden book of the Cthulhu Mythos. It supposedly contains lots of secrets, legends and symbols, but her memory is bad so you can't get many facts out of her. She has been a spirit for quite some time now, and has friends and fans worldwide.
9.name: R'lyeh

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to 2 enemies (ranged priority).
skill.name: Doorway to Demons

abilities.description: Increases 10% of DMG dealt.
abilities.name: Shrine Maiden

abilities.description: Increases 10% of DMG dealt by Divina team members when this daemon is Team Leader.
abilities.name: Queen of Yamato

90.description:
"Calm yourself! Who do you think you're talking to? (Yeah, that sounded queenly! Go me!)"
The spirit of a shaman queen who ruled Yamataikoku long ago. Her shamanic powers were strong and she used them to save her domain many times. That's how she went from being one of many shrine maidens to being the queen. She actually enjoyed being a shrine maiden, but her serious side wouldn't permit her to turn down the offer to rule the land, so she's trying to start acting more like a queen. She unexpectedly finds it very fulfilling and is completely satisfied with her new role.
90.name: Himiko

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to the 3 enemies with the highest ATK, with a {probability} of inflicting Silence.
skill.name: Unmistakable Oracle

abilities.description: Skill attacks have 24% chances of inflicting Stun.
abilities.name: Japanese Magic Knight

from_description.event_name: Outbreak! A Day of Battle in Shinjuku!

91.description:
"Your life is worthless if you don't constantly try to improve yourself!"
The spirit of a Tao sword with the number 9 carved into it. It's not only super sharp but also has incredible anti-monster powers due to the 9 carved into it. He has complete confidence in his own abilities and can't stand people who are all talk and no walk. He sharpens his senses everyday with intense training and drills. And if you greet him in a half-hearted tone, you'll start throwing up blood. The word on the street is that he is much softer when dealing with ambitious people who want to get ahead in life.
[Event] Outbreak! A Day of Battle in Shinjuku!
91.name: Kuji Kanesada

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to current target.
skill.name: Refined Blade of Virtue

abilities.description: Restores 15% HP to the ally with the lowest percentage of HP at the start of each wave.
abilities.name: Mother of All

from_description.event_name: Outbreak! A Day of Battle in Shinjuku!

92.description:
"I am a Buddhist guardian deity, after all."
The spirit of a guardian goddess of Buddhism. As the goddess of safe childbirth and childrearing, she is something of a mother figure. But when she gets angry she turns into a yaksha and chases people around, so no one wants to make her mad. She doesn't want children to see her in yaksha form, either. People who do anger her can at least savor the feeling of pure fear.
[Event] Outbreak! A Day of Battle in Shinjuku!
92.name: Hariti

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to 2 enemies (melee priority).
skill.name: Second Coming of the Yaksha

abilities.description: Increases 10% of all allies' Crit DMG.
abilities.name: Genius Tactician

from_description.event_name: Outbreak! A Day of Battle in Shinjuku!

93.description:
"I'm just as much a genius as my brother!"
The spirit of the sister of a famous military tactician from the Three Kingdoms period in Chinese history. She has a complex about the fact that her name didn't go down in history even though she worked just as hard as her brother and is just as smart. Since becoming a spirit, she's been doing everything she can to make a name for herself.
[Event] Outbreak! A Day of Battle in Shinjuku!
93.name: Zhuge Ling

skill.description: Increases DMG taken by 2 random enemies by {delay1} for a limited time.
skill.name: Razor-sharp Wit

from_description.event_name: Outbreak! A Day of Battle in Shinjuku!

94.description:
"I'm not good for much besides archery..."
The spirit of a hero's beloved bow from Chinese mythology. The bow was involved in the legendary shooting down of nine suns. She is a nice, mild-mannered girl in addition to being an expert with the bow, but she's a bit weak-spirited and often finds herself in trouble. All this trouble has made her a bit of a wise woman in worldly matters, though. She's scared of crows and runs to hide whenever she sees one and waits for it to go away. When asked why, she said seeing crows gives her flashbacks to when she had to shoot down the nine sunbirds.
[Event] Outbreak! A Day of Battle in Shinjuku!
94.name: Scarlett Shott

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to 2 enemies (ranged priority).
skill.name: Sure Shot

from_description.event_name: Outbreak! A Day of Battle in Shinjuku!

95.description:
"Who dares to belittle the talent of a French commander?"
The spirit of a commander considered to be a hero and savior of France. He's best known for the bad things he did while alive, so lots of people get the wrong idea and avoid him at all costs. However, he regrets what he did in the past and is searching for a way to make up for it. He has the strength you'd expect from a hero and savior. He's always concerned about the well-being of Joan of Arc, viewing her like a younger sister. He can't seem to get along with a certain archangel for certain reasons.
[Event] Outbreak! A Day of Battle in Shinjuku!
95.name: Gilles de Rais

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to all enemies.
skill.name: Rallying Cry

abilities.description: Immune to Poison.
abilities.name: Amitabha Power

from_description.event_name: Outbreak! A Day of Battle in Shinjuku!

96.description:
"Trust in me, and I'll lend you my power."
The spirit of a bronze plate from the Heian Period with an image of the Buddha carved into it. Far from being an enlightened bodhisattva, she loves being the center of attention. And it's gotten even worse ever since she was declared a national treasure. She does have deep faith and undeniable strength, so lots of people really trust in her.
[Event] Outbreak! A Day of Battle in Shinjuku!
96.name: Amitabha Tathagata

skill.description: Restores {value} HP to all allies and cures them of Poison.
skill.name: All-seeing Eye of Buddha

abilities.description: Restores 4% HP to all allies at the start of each wave.
abilities.name: Archangel

from_description.event_name: Outbreak! A Day of Battle in Shinjuku!

97.description:
"May I interest you in a divine revelation?"
The spirit of an archangel considered the greatest angel of them all. She takes actions for the good out of her faith in God, but things don't always work out the way she plans. This bothers her a lot, and sometimes things end up even worse than when they started. Still, she continues to reign supreme as an archangel thanks to her unparalleled effort and faith.
[Event] Outbreak! A Day of Battle in Shinjuku!
97.name: Mikhael

skill.description: Restores {value} HP to 3 allies (melee priority). Targets receive {delay1} less DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: Saved by Revelation

abilities.description: Increases 15% of DMG dealt when Takeda Shingen is on the team.
abilities.name: Warm-hearted Warlord

abilities.description: All melee allies take 5% less DMG and deal 5% more DMG.
abilities.name: God of War

98.description:
"This battle is mine."
The spirit of a daimyo from the Warring States Period who was known as the god of war. She can easily beat foes even when she's outnumbered, so her battles never end in a draw. She's blessed with both beauty and strength. Uesugi Kenshin presented as male when he was alive, but due to extenuating circumstances, he took on a female form as a spirit.
98.name: Uesugi Kenshin

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to all enemies.
skill.name: Godly Pressure

abilities.description: Increases 15% of Crit Rate when Chimera and Hydra are all on the team
abilities.name: Three Beasts, One Body

99.description:
"Transforming to Cerberus mode!"
A chimera with a puppet based on Cerberus, the watchdog of the underworld. Her personality changes based on the puppet that she's using, so things can get pretty crazy with the right combination. After making some kids cry, she's not allowed to perform for them anymore.
[Special Bond] Increases “Orthrus [Festival]”’s skill DMG

"Transforming to Cerberus mode!"
A chimera with a puppet based on Cerberus, the watchdog of the underworld. Her personality changes based on the puppet that she's using, so things can get pretty crazy with the right combination. After making some kids cry, she's not allowed to perform for them anymore.
[Special Bond] Increases “Orthrus [Festival]”’s skill DMG

[Special Bond] Increases “{#MonsterName#409}”’s skill DMG

99.name: Cerberus

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to current target; decreases target's speed by {delay1} for a limited time.
skill.name: Underworld Comedy
